text2: Kepha abapristi abakhulu bazithatha izinhlamvu zesiliva , bathi : “ Akuvunyelwe ukuzifaka emnikelweni , ngokuba kuyimali yegazi . ”

text: And they took counsel , and bought with them the potter ' s field , to bury strangers in .
text2: Benza icebo , bathenga ngayo insimu yombumbi , ibe ngeyokumbela abafokazi .

text: Wherefore that field was called , The field of blood , unto this day .
text2: Ngalokho insimu leyo ithiwa insimu yegazi kuze kube namuhla .

text: Then was fulfilled that which was spoken by Jeremy the prophet , saying , And they took the thirty pieces of silver , the price of him that was valued , whom they of the children of Israel did value ;
text2: Khona kwagcwaliseka okwashiwo ngomprofethi uJeremiya ukuthi : “ Bathatha izinhlamvu zesiliva ezingamashumi amathathu , inani lowamiselwa inani onani lakhe lamiswa ngamadodana ka - Israyeli ;

text: And gave them for the potter ' s field , as the Lord appointed me .
text2: bakhokha ngazo insimu yombumbi , njengokuba iNkosi ingiyalile . ”

text: And Jesus stood before the governor : and the governor asked him , saying , Art thou the King of the Jews ? And Jesus said unto him , Thou sayest .
text2: Kepha uJesu wayemi phambi kombusi ; umbusi wambuza wathi : “ Wena uyinkosi yabaJuda na ? ” UJesu wathi kuye : “ Usho khona . ”

text: And when he was accused of the chief priests and elders , he answered nothing .
text2: Kwathi lapho abapristi abakhulu namalunga bemthwesa icala , kaphendulanga lutho .

text: Then said Pilate unto him , Hearest thou not how many things they witness against thee ?
text2: Khona uPilatu wathi kuye : “ Awuzwa yini lokho okungaka abakufakaza ngawe na ? ”

text: And he answered him to never a word ; insomuch that the governor marvelled greatly .
text2: Akaze amphendula nakwelilodwa izwi , umbusi waze wamangala kakhulu .

text: Now at that feast the governor was wont to release unto the people a prisoner , whom they would .
text2: Kepha ngomkhosi umbusi wayejwayele ukukhululela isixuku isiboshwa sibe sinye esasisithanda .

text: And they had then a notable prisoner , called Barabbas .
text2: Ngaleso sikhathi babe nesiboshwa esidumileyo esithiwa uBaraba .

text: Therefore when they were gathered together , Pilate said unto them , Whom will ye that I release unto you ? Barabbas , or Jesus which is called Christ ?
text2: Ngakho sebebuthene , uPilatu wathi kubo : “ Nithanda ukuba nginikhululele bani , uBaraba nokuba uJesu othiwa uKristu , na ? ”

text: For he knew that for envy they had delivered him .
text2: Ngokuba wayekwazi ukuthi bamnikele ngomhawu .

text: When he was set down on the judgment seat , his wife sent unto him , saying , Have thou nothing to do with that just man : for I have suffered many things this day in a dream because of him .
text2: Esahlezi esihlalweni sokwahlulela , umkakhe wathumela kuye , wathi : “ Ungabi nandaba kulowo muntu olungileyo ; ngokuba ngihluphekile kakhulu namuhla ngaye ephusheni . ”

text: But the chief priests and elders persuaded the multitude that they should ask Barabbas , and destroy Jesus .
text2: Kepha abapristi abakhulu namalunga bancenga izixuku ukuba zicele uBaraba , zimbulale uJesu .

text: The governor answered and said unto them , Whether of the twain will ye that I release unto you ? They said , Barabbas .
text2: Wayesephendula umbusi , wathi kubo : “ Nithanda ukuba nginikhululele muphi kulaba ababili na ? ” Bathi : “ UBaraba . ”

text: Pilate saith unto them , What shall I do then with Jesus which is called Christ ? They all say unto him , Let him be crucified .
text2: UPilatu wathi kubo : “ Pho - ke , ngimenze njani uJesu othiwa uKristu na ? ” Bonke bathi : “ Makabethelwe esiphambanweni . ”

text: And the governor said , Why , what evil hath he done ? But they cried out the more , saying , Let him be crucified .
text2: Wayesethi : “ Ngokuba wenze bubi buni na ? ” Kepha bamemeza kakhulu , bathi : “ Makabethelwe esiphambanweni . ”

text: When Pilate saw that he could prevail nothing , but that rather a tumult was made , he took water , and washed his hands before the multitude , saying , I am innocent of the blood of this just person : see ye to it .
text2: UPilatu esebona ukuthi akanakwenza lutho nokuthi isiphithiphithi sesanda kakhulu , wathatha amanzi , wahlamba izandla phambi kwesixuku , wathi : “ Anginacala egazini lalo muntu ; ziboneleni nina . ”

text: Then answered all the people , and said , His blood be on us , and on our children .
text2: Abantu bonke base bephendula bethi : “ Igazi lakhe malibe phezu kwethu naphezu kwabantwana bethu . ”

text: Then released he Barabbas unto them : and when he had scourged Jesus , he delivered him to be crucified .
text2: Wayesebakhululela uBaraba , kepha wamshaya uJesu , wamnikela ukuba abethelwe esiphambanweni .

text: Then the soldiers of the governor took Jesus into the common hall , and gathered unto him the whole band of soldiers .
text2: Khona amabutho ombusi ayesemthatha uJesu , amngenisa enqabeni , aqoqela kuye ibutho lonke .

text: And they stripped him , and put on him a scarlet robe .
text2: Amhlubula , amembathisa ingubo ebomvu ,

text: And when they had platted a crown of thorns , they put it upon his head , and a reed in his right hand : and they bowed the knee before him , and mocked him , saying , Hail , King of the Jews !
text2: aluka umqhele wameva , awufaka ekhanda lakhe , nomhlanga esandleni sakhe sokunene , aguqa ngamadolo phambi kwakhe , ambhinqa athi : “ Bayede , nkosi yabaJuda ! ”

text: And they spit upon him , and took the reed , and smote him on the head .
text2: Amkhafulela ngamathe , athatha umhlanga , amshaya ekhanda lakhe .

text: And after that they had mocked him , they took the robe off from him , and put his own raiment on him , and led him away to crucify him .
text2: Esembhinqile amhlubula ingubo , amembathisa izingubo zakhe , amuka naye ukuyombethela esiphambanweni .

text: And as they came out , they found a man of Cyrene , Simon by name : him they compelled to bear his cross .
text2: Esaphuma afumana umuntu waseKhurene , nguSimoni igama lakhe ; amcindezela lowo ukuba athwale isiphambano sakhe .

text: And when they were come unto a place called Golgotha , that is to say , a place of a skull ,
text2: Esefikile endaweni ethiwa iGolgotha okungukuthi iNdawo Yekhanda ,

text: They gave him vinegar to drink mingled with gall : and when he had tasted thereof , he would not drink .
text2: amphuzisa iwayini elixutshwe nenyongo ; kepha kuthe elizwa , akathandanga ukuliphuza .

text: And they crucified him , and parted his garments , casting lots : that it might be fulfilled which was spoken by the prophet , They parted my garments among them , and upon my vesture did they cast lots .
text2: Esembethele esiphambanweni abelana izingubo zakhe , enzelana inkatho ;

text: And sitting down they watched him there ;
text2: ahlala amlinda khona .

text: And set up over his head his accusation written , THIS IS JESUS THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Abeka ngaphezu kwekhanda lakhe icala lakhe libhalwe ngokuthi : LO NGUJESU , INKOSI YABAJUDA .

text: Then were there two thieves crucified with him , one on the right hand , and another on the left .
text2: Kwabethelwa kanye naye abaphangi ababili , omunye ngakwesokunene nomunye ngakwesokhohlo .

text: And they that passed by reviled him , wagging their heads ,
text2: Kepha abadlulayo bamhlambalaza benikina amakhanda abo ,

text: And saying , Thou that destroyest the temple , and buildest it in three days , save thyself . If thou be the Son of God , come down from the cross .
text2: bathi : “ Wena odiliza ithempeli , ubuye ulakhe ngezinsuku ezintathu , zisindise , uma uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu , wehle esiphambanweni . ”

text: Likewise also the chief priests mocking him , with the scribes and elders , said ,
text2: Kanjalo nabapristi abakhulu bambhinqa kanye nababhali namalunga , bathi :

text: He saved others ; himself he cannot save . If he be the King of Israel , let him now come down from the cross , and we will believe him .
text2: “ Wasindisa abanye , angezisindise yena ; uyinkosi yakwa - Israyeli , akehle manje esiphambanweni , sikholwe nguye .

text: He trusted in God ; let him deliver him now , if he will have him : for he said , I am the Son of God .
text2: Wethembile uNkulunkulu ; makamkhulule manje , uma emthanda , ngokuba wathi : ‘ NgiyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu . ’ ”

text: The thieves also , which were crucified with him , cast the same in his teeth .
text2: Kepha nabaphangi ababebethelwe esiphambanweni kanye naye bamdumaza kanjalo .

text: Now from the sixth hour there was darkness over all the land unto the ninth hour .
text2: Kepha kusukela ngehora lesithupha kwaba mnyama emhlabeni wonke , kwaze kwaba yihora lesishiyagalolunye .

text: And about the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice , saying , Eli , Eli , lama sabachthani ? that is to say , My God , my God , why hast thou forsaken me ?
text2: Kepha ngehora lesishiyagalolunye uJesu wamemeza ngezwi elikhulu , wathi : “ Eli , Eli , lama sabaktani ? ” okungukuthi : “ Nkulunkulu wami , Nkulunkulu wami , ungishiyeleni na ? ”

text: Some of them that stood there , when they heard that , said , This man calleth for Elias .
text2: Abanye kwababemi khona bekuzwa bathi : “ Lo ubiza u - Eliya . ”

text: And straightway one of them ran , and took a spunge , and filled it with vinegar , and put it on a reed , and gave him to drink .
text2: Masinyane omunye kubo wagijima , wathatha ilula , waligcwalisa ngoviniga , walihloma emhlangeni , wamphusiza .

text: The rest said , Let be , let us see whether Elias will come to save him .
text2: Kepha abanye bathi : “ Yeka , sibone uma u - Eliya eza ukumsindisa . ”

text: Jesus , when he had cried again with a loud voice , yielded up the ghost .
text2: UJesu wabuye wamemeza ngezwi elikhulu , wafa .

text: And , behold , the veil of the temple was rent in twain from the top to the bottom ; and the earth did quake , and the rocks rent ;
text2: Bheka - ke , isihenqo sethempeli sadabuka kabili , kusukela phezulu kuze kufike phansi ; umhlaba wazamazama , amadwala aqhekezeka ;

text: And the graves were opened ; and many bodies of the saints which slept arose ,
text2: amathuna avuleka , imizimba eminingi yabangcwele ababelele yavuka ;

text: And came out of the graves after his resurrection , and went into the holy city , and appeared unto many .
text2: baphuma emathuneni emva kokuvuka kwakhe , bangena emzini ongcwele , babonakala kwabaningi .

text: Now when the centurion , and they that were with him , watching Jesus , saw the earthquake , and those things that were done , they feared greatly , saying , Truly this was the Son of God .
text2: Kepha induna yekhulu nababe nayo belinda uJesu sebebona ukuzamazama nalokho okwenzekileyo besaba kakhulu , bathi : “ Nempela lo ube yiNdodana kaNkulunkulu . ”

text: And many women were there beholding afar off , which followed Jesus from Galilee , ministering unto him :
text2: Kwakukhona lapho abesifazane abaningi bebukela , bekude , ababemlandele uJesu bevela eGalile , bemkhonza ;

text: Among which was Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James and Joses , and the mother of Zebedee ' s children .
text2: phakathi kwabo kwakukhona oMariya Magdalena , unina kaJakobe nokaJose , nonina wamadodana kaZebedewu .

text: When the even was come , there came a rich man of Arimathaea , named Joseph , who also himself was Jesus ' disciple :
text2: Sekuhlwile , kwafika umuntu ocebileyo wase - Arimatheya , igama lakhe nguJosefa , owayengumfundi kaJesu naye ;

text: He went to Pilate , and begged the body of Jesus . Then Pilate commanded the body to be delivered .
text2: lo waya kuPilatu , wacela isidumbu sikaJesu . Khona uPilatu wayala ukuba anikwe sona .

text: And when Joseph had taken the body , he wrapped it in a clean linen cloth ,
text2: UJosefa wasithatha isidumbu , wasisonga ngendwangu enhle ehlanzekileyo ,

text: And laid it in his own new tomb , which he had hewn out in the rock : and he rolled a great stone to the door of the sepulchre , and departed .
text2: wasibeka ethuneni lakhe elisha ayeliqophe edwaleni , wagingqela itshe elikhulu emnyango wethuna , wahamba .

text: And there was Mary Magdalene , and the other Mary , sitting over against the sepulchre .
text2: Kepha kwakukhona lapho uMariya Magdalena nomunye uMariya behlezi phambi kweliba .

text: Now the next day , that followed the day of the preparation , the chief priests and Pharisees came together unto Pilate ,
text2: Kepha ngangomuso okungolulandela usuku lokulungisela abapristi abakhulu nabaFarisi babuthana kuPilatu ,

text: Saying , Sir , we remember that that deceiver said , while he was yet alive , After three days I will rise again .
text2: bathi : “ Nkosi , sikhumbula ukuthi lowo mkhohlisi esekhona wathi : ‘ Emva kwezinsuku ezintathu ngizakuvuka . ’

text: Command therefore that the sepulchre be made sure until the third day , lest his disciples come by night , and steal him away , and say unto the people , He is risen from the dead : so the last error shall be worse than the first .
text2: Ngakho yala ukuba iliba ligcinwe kuze kube lusuku lwesithathu ukuba abafundi bakhe bangaze bafike bamebe , bathi kubantu : ‘ Uvukile kwabafileyo ; ’ kuthi inkohliso yokugcina ibe mbi kuneyokuqala . ”

text: Pilate said unto them , Ye have a watch : go your way , make it as sure as ye can .
text2: UPilatu wathi kubo : “ Nampa abalindi ; hambani niligcine njengokubona kwenu . ”

text: So they went , and made the sepulchre sure , sealing the stone , and setting a watch .
text2: Base behamba , baligcina iliba , babeka uphawu etsheni bekanye nabalindi .

text: In the end of the sabbath , as it began to dawn toward the first day of the week , came Mary Magdalene and the other Mary to see the sepulchre .
text2: Kepha ekupheleni kwesabatha ngovivi lolokuqala lweviki kwafika uMariya Magdalena nomunye uMariya , beza ukuyobona iliba .

text: And , behold , there was a great earthquake : for the angel of the Lord descended from heaven , and came and rolled back the stone from the door , and sat upon it .
text2: Bheka , kwaba khona ukuzamazama komhlaba okukhulu , ngokuba ingelosi yeNkosi yehla ezulwini , yeza yagingqa itshe , yahlala phezu kwalo .

text: His countenance was like lightning , and his raiment white as snow :
text2: Ukubonakala kwayo kwakunjengonyazi , nesambatho sayo sasimhlophe njengongqoqwane .

text: And for fear of him the keepers did shake , and became as dead men .
text2: Kepha abalindi bathuthumela ngokuyesaba , baba njengabafileyo .

text: And the angel answered and said unto the women , Fear not ye : for I know that ye seek Jesus , which was crucified .
text2: Kodwa ingelosi yaphendula , yathi kwabesifazane : “ Ningesabi nina ; ngokuba ngiyazi ukuthi nifuna uJesu obebethelwe esiphambanweni ;

text: He is not here : for he is risen , as he said . Come , see the place where the Lord lay .
text2: kakho lapha , ngokuba uvukile njengokusho kwakhe ; zanini nibone indawo lapho ebelele khona .

text: And go quickly , and tell his disciples that he is risen from the dead ; and , behold , he goeth before you into Galilee ; there shall ye see him : lo , I have told you .
text2: Hambani masinyane , nitshele abafundi bakhe ukuthi uvukile kwabafileyo ; bhekani , uyanandulela ukuya eGalile , nizakumbona khona . Bhekani , nginitshelile . ”

text: And they departed quickly from the sepulchre with fear and great joy ; and did run to bring his disciples word .
text2: Base beshesha bamuka ethuneni benokwesaba nokuthokoza okukhulu , bagijima baya ukubikela abafundi bakhe .

text: And as they went to tell his disciples , behold , Jesus met them , saying , All hail . And they came and held him by the feet , and worshipped him .
text2: Bheka , uJesu wabahlangabeza , wathi : “ Sanibona . ” Besondela babamba izinyawo zakhe , bakhuleka kuye .

text: Then said Jesus unto them , Be not afraid : go tell my brethren that they go into Galilee , and there shall they see me .
text2: Khona uJesu wathi kubo : “ Ningesabi ; hambani , nibikele abafowethu ukuba bahambe baye eGalile ; bayakungibona khona . ”

text: Now when they were going , behold , some of the watch came into the city , and shewed unto the chief priests all the things that were done .
text2: Besahamba , bheka , abanye kubalindi bafika emzini , babikela abapristi abakhulu konke okwenzekileyo .

text: And when they were assembled with the elders , and had taken counsel , they gave large money unto the soldiers ,
text2: Sebebuthene namalunga benza icebo , banika amabutho imali eningi , 28 : 12 Math . 27 : 64 .

text: Saying , Say ye , His disciples came by night , and stole him away while we slept .
text2: bathi : “ Shonini ukuthi abafundi bakhe beza ebusuku , bameba silele .

text: And if this come to the governor ' s ears , we will persuade him , and secure you .
text2: Uma kuzwakala lokho kumbusi , siyakuncengana naye thina , nina ningakhathazeki . ”

text: So they took the money , and did as they were taught : and this saying is commonly reported among the Jews until this day .
text2: Ayeseyithatha imali , enza njengokufundiswa kwawo . Leli zwi landa phakathi kwabaJuda kuze kube namuhla .

text: Then the eleven disciples went away into Galilee , into a mountain where Jesus had appointed them .
text2: Kepha abafundi abayishumi nanye baya eGalile kuleyo ntaba uJesu ayebayalele yona ;

text: And when they saw him , they worshipped him : but some doubted .
text2: sebembona bakhuleka kuye , kepha abanye bangabaza .

text: And Jesus came and spake unto them , saying , All power is given unto me in heaven and in earth .
text2: UJesu wasondela , wakhuluma kubo , wathi : “ Ngiphiwe amandla onke ezulwini nasemhlabeni ;

text: Go ye therefore , and teach all nations , baptizing them in the name of the Father , and of the Son , and of the Holy Ghost :
text2: ngalokho hambani nenze izizwe zonke abafundi , nibabhapathize egameni likaYise neleNdodana nelikaMoya oNgcwele ,

text: Teaching them to observe all things whatsoever I have commanded you : and , lo , I am with you alway , even unto the end of the world . Amen .
text2: nibafundise ukugcina konke enginiyale ngakho ; bhekani , mina nginani izinsuku zonke kuze kube sekupheleni kwezwe . ”

text: The beginning of the gospel of Jesus Christ , the Son of God ;
text2: Ukuqala kwevangeli likaJesu Kristu , iNdodana kaNkulunkulu .

text: As it is written in the prophets , Behold , I send my messenger before thy face , which shall prepare thy way before thee .
text2: Njengokulotshwe kumprofethi u - Isaya ukuthi : “ Bheka , ngiyasithuma isithunywa sami phambi kwakho esiyakulungisa indlela yakho , ” —

text: The voice of one crying in the wilderness , Prepare ye the way of the Lord , make his paths straight .
text2: “ izwi lomemezayo ehlane , lithi : ‘ Lungisani indlela yeNkosi , nenze imikhondo yayo iqonde , ’ ”

text: John did baptize in the wilderness , and preach the baptism of repentance for the remission of sins .
text2: kwavela uJohane ebhapathiza ehlane , eshumayela umbhapathizo wokuphenduka , kube ngukuthethelelwa kwezono .

text: And there went out unto him all the land of Judaea , and they of Jerusalem , and were all baptized of him in the river of Jordan , confessing their sins .
text2: Kwaphumela kuye izwe lonke laseJudiya nabo bonke abaseJerusalema , babhapathizwa nguye emfuleni iJordani , bevuma izono zabo .

text: And John was clothed with camel ' s hair , and with a girdle of a skin about his loins ; and he did eat locusts and wild honey ;
text2: UJohane wayembethe eyoboya bekamela , enoqhotho lwesikhumba okhalweni lwakhe , edla izinkumbi nezinyosi zasendle .

text: And preached , saying , There cometh one mightier than I after me , the latchet of whose shoes I am not worthy to stoop down and unloose .
text2: Washumayela wathi : “ Emva kwami kuyeza onamandla kunami , engingafanele ukuba ngikhothame ngithukulule umchilo wezicathulo zakhe .

text: I indeed have baptized you with water : but he shall baptize you with the Holy Ghost .
text2: Mina nginibhapathize ngamanzi , kepha yena uzakunibhapathiza ngoMoya oNgcwele . ”

text: And it came to pass in those days , that Jesus came from Nazareth of Galilee , and was baptized of John in Jordan .
text2: Kwathi ngaleyo mihla kwafika uJesu evela eNazaretha laseGalile , wabhapathizwa nguJohane eJordani .

text: And straightway coming up out of the water , he saw the heavens opened , and the Spirit like a dove descending upon him :
text2: Wanele ukukhuphuka emanzini , wabona izulu livuleka , noMoya ehlela phezu kwakhe njengejuba .

text: And there came a voice from heaven , saying , Thou art my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased .
text2: Kwavela izwi ezulwini , lithi : “ Wena uyiNdodana yami ethandekayo ; ngithokozile ngawe . ”

text: And immediately the Spirit driveth him into the wilderness .
text2: Masinyane uMoya wayesemqhubela ehlane .

text: And he was there in the wilderness forty days , tempted of Satan ; and was with the wild beasts ; and the angels ministered unto him .
text2: Wayekhona ehlane izinsuku ezingamashumi amane elingwa nguSathane ; wayendawonye nezilwane ; izingelosi zamkhonza .

text: Now after that John was put in prison , Jesus came into Galilee , preaching the gospel of the kingdom of God ,
text2: Emva kokuboshwa kukaJohane uJesu wafika eGalile eshumayela ivangeli likaNkulunkulu ,

text: And saying , The time is fulfilled , and the kingdom of God is at hand : repent ye , and believe the gospel .
text2: wathi : “ Isikhathi sigcwalisekile , umbuso kaNkulunkulu ususondele ; phendukani , nikholwe yivangeli . ”

text: Now as he walked by the sea of Galilee , he saw Simon and Andrew his brother casting a net into the sea : for they were fishers .
text2: Kwathi edlula ngaselwandle lwaseGalile , wabona oSimoni no - Andreya umfowabo kaSimoni bephonsa inetha elwandle , ngokuba babe ngabadobi .

text: And Jesus said unto them , Come ye after me , and I will make you to become fishers of men .
text2: UJesu wayesethi kubo : “ Ngilandeleni ; ngiyakunenza nibe ngabadobi babantu . ”

text: And straightway they forsook their nets , and followed him .
text2: Base bewashiya masinyane amanetha , bamlandela .

text: And when he had gone a little further thence , he saw James the son of Zebedee , and John his brother , who also were in the ship mending their nets .
text2: Eseqhubekile ingcosana wabona uJakobe kaZebedewu noJohane umfowabo besemkhunjini , belungisa amanetha .

text: And straightway he called them : and they left their father Zebedee in the ship with the hired servants , and went after him .
text2: Wababiza masinyane ; base bemshiya uyise uZebedewu emkhunjini kanye nezisebenzi , bamlandela .

text: And they went into Capernaum ; and straightway on the sabbath day he entered into the synagogue , and taught .
text2: Bangena eKapernawume . Kwathi masinyane ngesabatha wangena esinagogeni , wafundisa .

text: And they were astonished at his doctrine : for he taught them as one that had authority , and not as the scribes .
text2: Bamangala ngokufundisa kwakhe ; ngokuba wabafundisa njengonamandla , kungenjengababhali .

text: And there was in their synagogue a man with an unclean spirit ; and he cried out ,
text2: Kwakukhona - ke esinagogeni umuntu onomoya ongcolileyo , wamemeza ,

text: Saying , Let us alone ; what have we to do with thee , thou Jesus of Nazareth ? art thou come to destroy us ? I know thee who thou art , the Holy One of God .
text2: wathi : “ Sinamsebenzi muni nawe Jesu waseNazaretha ? Uze ukusibhubhisa na ? Ngiyakwazi ukuba ungubani — ungoNgcwele kaNkulunkulu . ”

text: And Jesus rebuked him , saying , Hold thy peace , and come out of him .
text2: UJesu wamkhuza wathi : “ Thula , uphume kuye ! ”

text: And when the unclean spirit had torn him , and cried with a loud voice , he came out of him .
text2: Umoya ongcolileyo wamhlukumeza , wakhala ngezwi elikhulu , waphuma kuye .

text: And they were all amazed , insomuch that they questioned among themselves , saying , What thing is this ? what new doctrine is this ? for with authority commandeth he even the unclean spirits , and they do obey him .
text2: Bethuka bonke , babuzana bodwa , bathi : “ Kuyini lokhu ? Yisifundiso esisha esinamandla ; nawomoya abangcolileyo uyabayala , bamlalele . ”

text: And immediately his fame spread abroad throughout all the region round about Galilee .
text2: Udumo lwakhe lwase lwanda masinyane kuso sonke isifunda saseGalile .

text: And forthwith , when they were come out of the synagogue , they entered into the house of Simon and Andrew , with James and John .
text2: Sebephume esinagogeni bangena masinyane endlini kaSimoni no - Andreya , benoJakobe noJohane .

text: But Simon ' s wife ' s mother lay sick of a fever , and anon they tell him of her .
text2: Umkhwekazi kaSimoni wayelele enomkhuhlane ; bashesha bamtshela ngaye .

text: And he came and took her by the hand , and lifted her up ; and immediately the fever left her , and she ministered unto them .
text2: Waya kuye , wamlulamisa embamba ngesandla ; umkhuhlane wamyeka , wabakhonza .

text: And at even , when the sun did set , they brought unto him all that were diseased , and them that were possessed with devils .
text2: Kwathi ukuba kuhlwe , selishonile ilanga , baletha kuye bonke abagulayo nabakhwelwe ngamademoni .

text: And all the city was gathered together at the door .
text2: Umuzi wonke wawubuthene ngasemnyango .

text: And he healed many that were sick of divers diseases , and cast out many devils ; and suffered not the devils to speak , because they knew him .
text2: Waphulukisa abaningi abaphethwe yizifo ngezifo , wakhipha amademoni amaningi , wayengawavumeli amademoni ukukhuluma , ngokuba ayemazi .

text: And in the morning , rising up a great while before day , he went out , and departed into a solitary place , and there prayed .
text2: Ekuseni kusemnyama kakhulu , wavuka waphuma , waya endaweni eyihlane , wakhuleka khona .

text: And Simon and they that were with him followed after him .
text2: USimoni nababe naye bamlandela ngokuphuthuma .

text: And when they had found him , they said unto him , All men seek for thee .
text2: Sebemfumene bathi kuye : “ Bonke bayakufuna . ”

text: And he said unto them , Let us go into the next towns , that I may preach there also : for therefore came I forth .
text2: Wathi kubo : “ Masiye kwezinye izindawo emizaneni eseduze ukuba ngishumayele nakhona ; ngokuba ngiphumele khona lokho . ”

text: And he preached in their synagogues throughout all Galilee , and cast out devils .
text2: Wahamba eshumayela emasinagogeni abo kulo lonke iGalile , ekhipha amademoni .

text: And there came a leper to him , beseeching him , and kneeling down to him , and saying unto him , If thou wilt , thou canst make me clean .
text2: Kwafika kuye onochoko , wamncenga eguqa ngamadolo , ethi kuye : “ Uma uthanda , ungangihlambulula . ”

text: And Jesus , moved with compassion , put forth his hand , and touched him , and saith unto him , I will ; be thou clean .
text2: UJesu wamhawukela , welula isandla , wamphatha , wathi kuye : “ Ngiyathanda ; hlambuluka . ”

text: And as soon as he had spoken , immediately the leprosy departed from him , and he was cleansed .
text2: Lwasuka masinyane uchoko kuye , wahlambuluka .

text: And he straitly charged him , and forthwith sent him away ;
text2: Esemyalisisile washesha wammukisa ,

text: And saith unto him , See thou say nothing to any man : but go thy way , shew thyself to the priest , and offer for thy cleansing those things which Moses commanded , for a testimony unto them .
text2: wathi kuye : “ Bheka , ungasho lutho kumuntu , kepha hamba uzibonakalise kumpristi , unikele ngokuhlanjululwa kwakho lokho okwayalelwa nguMose , kube ngubufakazi kubo . ”

text: But he went out , and began to publish it much , and to blaze abroad the matter , insomuch that Jesus could no more openly enter into the city , but was without in desert places : and they came to him from every quarter .
text2: Kepha yena esephumile waqala ukuyandisa kakhulu nokuyidumisa le ndaba , ngangokuba uJesu wayengasenakungena emzini obala ; wayesehlala ngaphandle ezindaweni eziyihlane ; beza kuye bevela nxazonke .

text: And again he entered into Capernaum , after some days ; and it was noised that he was in the house .
text2: Wabuye wangena eKapernawume emva kwezinsuku ezithile ; kwezwakala ukuthi usendlini .

text: And straightway many were gathered together , insomuch that there was no room to receive them , no , not so much as about the door : and he preached the word unto them .
text2: Kwase kubuthana abaningi , akwabe kusabakho ndawo nangasemnyango ; wakhuluma izwi kubo .

text: And they come unto him , bringing one sick of the palsy , which was borne of four .
text2: Beza kuye bethwele umuntu ofe uhlangothi , ephethwe ngabantu abane .

text: And when they could not come nigh unto him for the press , they uncovered the roof where he was : and when they had broken it up , they let down the bed wherein the sick of the palsy lay .
text2: Bengenakusondela kuye ngenxa yesixuku baqaqa uphahla lapho ekhona , bathi sebebhobozile behlisa uhlaka alele kulo ofe uhlangothi .

text: When Jesus saw their faith , he said unto the sick of the palsy , Son , thy sins be forgiven thee .
text2: UJesu ebona ukukholwa kwabo wathi kofe uhlangothi : “ Ndodana , uthethelelwe izono zakho . ”

text: But there were certain of the scribes sitting there , and reasoning in their hearts ,
text2: Kepha kwakukhona ababhali abathile behlezi khona , bezindla ezinhliziyweni zabo ngokuthi :

text: Why doth this man thus speak blasphemies ? who can forgive sins but God only ?
text2: “ Lo ukhulumelani kanje na ? Uyahlambalaza . Ngubani ongathethelela izono , kungeyena uNkulunkulu yedwa na ? ”

text: And immediately when Jesus perceived in his spirit that they so reasoned within themselves , he said unto them , Why reason ye these things in your hearts ?
text2: UJesu ekwazi masinyane emoyeni wakhe ukuthi bazindla kanjalo phakathi kwabo , wathi kubo : “ Nizindlelani ngalokhu ezinhliziyweni zenu na ?

text: Whether is it easier to say to the sick of the palsy , Thy sins be forgiven thee ; or to say , Arise , and take up thy bed , and walk ?
text2: Yikuphi okulula ukuthi kofe uhlangothi : ‘ Uthethelelwe izono zakho , ’ noma ukuthi : ‘ Vuka , uthathe uhlaka lwakho , uhambe , ’ na ?

text: But that ye may know that the Son of man hath power on earth to forgive sins , ( he saith to the sick of the palsy , )
text2: Kepha ukuze nazi ukuthi iNdodana yomuntu inamandla emhlabeni okuthethelela izono ” — wathi kofe uhlangothi —

text: I say unto thee , Arise , and take up thy bed , and go thy way into thine house .
text2: “ ngithi kuwe : Vuka , uthathe uhlaka lwakho , uye endlini yakho . ”

text: And immediately he arose , took up the bed , and went forth before them all ; insomuch that they were all amazed , and glorified God , saying , We never saw it on this fashion .
text2: Wayesevuka , wathatha masinyane uhlaka lwakhe , waphuma phambi kwabo bonke , baze bamangala bonke , bamdumisa uNkulunkulu , bathi : “ Asizange sikubone okunje . ”

text: And he went forth again by the sea side ; and all the multitude resorted unto him , and he taught them .
text2: Waphuma futhi , waya ngaselwandle ; isixuku sonke sabantu seza kuye , wabafundisa .

text: And as he passed by , he saw Levi the son of Alphaeus sitting at the receipt of custom , and said unto him , Follow me . And he arose and followed him .
text2: Wathi edlula , wambona uLevi ka - Alfewu ehlezi endaweni yokuthela , wathi kuye : “ Ngilandele . ” Wasuka - ke , wamlandela .

text: And it came to pass , that , as Jesus sat at meat in his house , many publicans and sinners sat also together with Jesus and his disciples : for there were many , and they followed him .
text2: Kwathi ehlezi ekudleni endlini yakhe , abathelisi abaningi nezoni bahlala noJesu nabafundi bakhe ; ngokuba babe baningi , bamlandela .

text: And when the scribes and Pharisees saw him eat with publicans and sinners , they said unto his disciples , How is it that he eateth and drinketh with publicans and sinners ?
text2: Khona ababhali babaFarisi bembona edla nezoni nabathelisi bathi kubafundi bakhe : “ Yini ukuba adle nabathelisi nezoni na ? ”

text: When Jesus heard it , he saith unto them , They that are whole have no need of the physician , but they that are sick : I came not to call the righteous , but sinners to repentance .
text2: UJesu ekuzwa lokho wathi kubo : “ Abaphilileyo abadingi inyanga , ngabagulayo bodwa ; kangizelanga ukubiza abalungileyo kodwa izoni . ”

text: And the disciples of John and of the Pharisees used to fast : and they come and say unto him , Why do the disciples of John and of the Pharisees fast , but thy disciples fast not ?
text2: Abafundi bakaJohane nabaFarisi babezila ukudla ; beza bathi kuye : “ Yini ukuba abafundi bakaJohane nabafundi babaFarisi bazile ukudla , kodwa abafundi bakho bangazili na ? ”

text: And Jesus said unto them , Can the children of the bridechamber fast , while the bridegroom is with them ? as long as they have the bridegroom with them , they cannot fast .
text2: UJesu wathi kubo : “ Abayeni bangazila yini , umyeni esenabo na ? Bese naye umyeni bangezile .

text: But the days will come , when the bridegroom shall be taken away from them , and then shall they fast in those days .
text2: Kodwa zizakufika izinsuku , lapho umyeni ezakususwa kubo ; yikhona - ke bezakuzila ngalolo suku .

text: No man also seweth a piece of new cloth on an old garment : else the new piece that filled it up taketh away from the old , and the rent is made worse .
text2: Akakho othungela isiziba esingakashukeki engutsheni endala , funa okusha okubekelwayo kuklebhule kwendala , kwande ukuklebhuka .

text: And no man putteth new wine into old bottles : else the new wine doth burst the bottles , and the wine is spilled , and the bottles will be marred : but new wine must be put into new bottles .
text2: Futhi akakho othela iwayini elisha ezimvabeni ezindala , funa iwayini liqhumise izimvaba , lichitheke iwayini , nezimvaba zonakale ; kodwa iwayini elisha lithelwa ezimvabeni ezintsha . ”

text: And it came to pass , that he went through the corn fields on the sabbath day ; and his disciples began , as they went , to pluck the ears of corn .
text2: Kwathi edabula amasimu ngesabatha , abafundi bakhe baqala ukukha izikhwebu behamba .

text: And the Pharisees said unto him , Behold , why do they on the sabbath day that which is not lawful ?
text2: Base bethi kuye abaFarisi : “ Bheka , bakwenzelani ngesabatha okungavunyelwe na ? ”

text: And he said unto them , Have ye never read what David did , when he had need , and was an hungred , he , and they that were with him ?
text2: Wathi kubo : “ Anizange nifunde yini akwenzayo uDavide mhla eswele , elambile yena nababe naye

text: How he went into the house of God in the days of Abiathar the high priest , and did eat the shewbread , which is not lawful to eat but for the priests , and gave also to them which were with him ?
text2: ukuthi wangena endlini kaNkulunkulu enkathini ka - Abiyathara umpristi omkhulu , wadla izinkwa zokubukwa ezingavunyelwe ukudliwa muntu , ngabapristi bodwa , wanika nababe naye , na ? ”

text: And he said unto them , The sabbath was made for man , and not man for the sabbath :
text2: Wayesethi kubo : “ Isabatha lenzelwa umuntu , umuntu akenzelwanga isabatha .

text: Therefore the Son of man is Lord also of the sabbath .
text2: Ngokunjalo iNdodana yomuntu iyinkosi neyesabatha . ”

text: And he entered again into the synagogue ; and there was a man there which had a withered hand .
text2: Khona wabuye wangena esinagogeni . Kwakukhona lapho umuntu onesandla esishwabeneyo .

text: And they watched him , whether he would heal him on the sabbath day ; that they might accuse him .
text2: Bamqaphela ukuba uzakumphilisa yini ngesabatha , ukuze bambeke icala .

text: And he saith unto the man which had the withered hand , Stand forth .
text2: Wathi kumuntu onesandla esishwabeneyo : “ Sukuma , ume phakathi . ”

text: And he saith unto them , Is it lawful to do good on the sabbath days , or to do evil ? to save life , or to kill ? But they held their peace .
text2: Wayesethi kubo : “ Kuvunyelwe ngesabatha ukwenza okuhle noma okubi yini , ukusindisa umuntu noma ukumbulala na ? ” Kepha bathula .

text: And when he had looked round about on them with anger , being grieved for the hardness of their hearts , he saith unto the man , Stretch forth thine hand . And he stretched it out : and his hand was restored whole as the other .
text2: Waqalaza ebabuka ngokuthukuthela , edabukile ngobulukhuni benhliziyo yabo ; wayesethi kulowo muntu : “ Yelula isandla . ” Waselula , saphiliswa isandla sakhe .

text: And the Pharisees went forth , and straightway took counsel with the Herodians against him , how they might destroy him .
text2: AbaFarisi base bephuma masinyane bacebisana ngaye nabakaHerode ukuthi bangambhubhisa kanjani .

text: But Jesus withdrew himself with his disciples to the sea : and a great multitude from Galilee followed him , and from Judaea ,
text2: UJesu wasuka kanye nabafundi bakhe , waya ngaselwandle ; isixuku esikhulu samlandela sivela eGalile , naseJudiya ,

text: And from Jerusalem , and from Idumaea , and from beyond Jordan ; and they about Tyre and Sidon , a great multitude , when they had heard what great things he did , came unto him .
text2: naseJerusalema , nase - Idumiya , nangaphesheya kweJordani , nangaseTire , naseSidoni ; isixuku esikhulu sesizwile konke akwenzayo seza kuye .

text: And he spake to his disciples , that a small ship should wait on him because of the multitude , lest they should throng him .
text2: Wayeseyala abafundi bakhe ukuba isikebhe simlindele ngenxa yesixuku sabantu , ukuze bangamcindezeli ,

text: For he had healed many ; insomuch that they pressed upon him for to touch him , as many as had plagues .
text2: ngokuba wayephulukisa abaningi , kwaze kwathi bonke abanezifo bawela phezu kwakhe ukuba bamnamathe .

text: And unclean spirits , when they saw him , fell down before him , and cried , saying , Thou art the Son of God .
text2: Nawomoya abangcolileyo bathi ukuba bambone , bawa phansi phambi kwakhe , bamemeza bathi : “ Wena uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu . ”

text: And he straitly charged them that they should not make him known .
text2: Wabayalisisa ukuba bangamzwakalisi .

text: And he goeth up into a mountain , and calleth unto him whom he would : and they came unto him .
text2: Wayesenyukela entabeni , wabizela kuye abebafuna yena ; beza kuye .

text: And he ordained twelve , that they should be with him , and that he might send them forth to preach ,
text2: Wamisa abayishumi nambili ukuba babe naye nokuba abathume baye kushumayela ,

text: And to have power to heal sicknesses , and to cast out devils :
text2: babe namandla okukhipha amademoni .

text: And Simon he surnamed Peter ;
text2: Wayesemisa laba abayishumi nambili : uSimoni owamqamba igama lokuthi uPetru ,

text: And James the son of Zebedee , and John the brother of James ; and he surnamed them Boanerges , which is , The sons of thunder :
text2: noJakobe kaZebedewu , noJohane umfowabo kaJakobe ; laba wabaqamba igama lokuthi oBowanergesi okungukuthi amadodana okuduma ;

text: And Andrew , and Philip , and Bartholomew , and Matthew , and Thomas , and James the son of Alphaeus , and Thaddaeus , and Simon the Canaanite ,
text2: no - Andreya , noFiliphu , noBartolomewu , noMathewu , noTomase , noJakobe ka - Alfewu , noThadewu , noSimoni umKhanani ,

text: And Judas Iscariot , which also betrayed him : and they went into an house .
text2: noJuda Iskariyothe owamkhaphelayo .

text: And the multitude cometh together again , so that they could not so much as eat bread .
text2: Wayesefika ekhaya ; isixuku sabuthana futhi , ababe besaba nathuba lokudla nasinkwa .

text: And when his friends heard of it , they went out to lay hold on him : for they said , He is beside himself .
text2: Abakubo sebekuzwile baphuma ukuyombamba , ngokuba bathi uyahlanya .

text: And the scribes which came down from Jerusalem said , He hath Beelzebub , and by the prince of the devils casteth he out devils .
text2: Nababhali abehla bevela eJerusalema bathi : “ UnoBelzebule , ukhipha amademoni ngombusi wamademoni . ”

text: And he called them unto him , and said unto them in parables , How can Satan cast out Satan ?
text2: Wayesebabiza , wakhuluma kubo ngemifanekiso , ethi : “ USathane angakhipha kanjani uSathane na ?

text: And if a kingdom be divided against itself , that kingdom cannot stand .
text2: Uma umbuso wahlukene wodwa , lowo mbuso ungeme .

text: And if a house be divided against itself , that house cannot stand .
text2: Nendlu , uma yahlukene yodwa , leyo ndlu ayizukuma .

text: And if Satan rise up against himself , and be divided , he cannot stand , but hath an end .
text2: NoSathane , uma ezivukela yena , ahlukane , akanakuma , kepha uyaphela .

text: No man can enter into a strong man ' s house , and spoil his goods , except he will first bind the strong man ; and then he will spoil his house .
text2: Yebo , akakho ongangena endlini yesiqhwaga , aphange impahla yaso , uma engabophi kuqala isiqhwaga , andukuba aphange indlu yaso .

text: Verily I say unto you , All sins shall be forgiven unto the sons of men , and blasphemies wherewith soever they shall blaspheme :
text2: Ngiqinisile ngithi kini : Abantwana babantu bayakuthethelelwa izono zonke nokuhlambalaza noma kungakanani abangahlambalaza ngakho ,

text: But he that shall blaspheme against the Holy Ghost hath never forgiveness , but is in danger of eternal damnation :
text2: kepha lowo ohlambalaza uMoya oNgcwele kanakuthethelelwa naphakade , kodwa unecala lesono esingapheliyo . ”

text: Because they said , He hath an unclean spirit .
text2: Ngokuba bathi unomoya ongcolileyo .

text: There came then his brethren and his mother , and , standing without , sent unto him , calling him .
text2: Kwase kufika unina nabafowabo , bema ngaphandle , bathumela kuye bembiza .

text: And the multitude sat about him , and they said unto him , Behold , thy mother and thy brethren without seek for thee .
text2: Isixuku sabantu sasimphahlile ; bathi kuye : “ Bheka , unyoko nabafowenu nawodadewenu bangaphandle bekufuna . ”

text: And he answered them , saying , Who is my mother , or my brethren ?
text2: Wabaphendula wathi : “ Ngubani umame nabafowethu na ? ”

text: And he looked round about on them which sat about him , and said , Behold my mother and my brethren !
text2: Waqalaza ebuka ababehlezi bemphahlile , wathi : “ Bhekani , nangu umame nabafowethu .

text: For whosoever shall do the will of God , the same is my brother , and my sister , and mother .
text2: Ngokuba owenza intando kaNkulunkulu nguye ongumfowethu nodadewethu nomame . ”

text: And he began again to teach by the sea side : and there was gathered unto him a great multitude , so that he entered into a ship , and sat in the sea ; and the whole multitude was by the sea on the land .
text2: Khona wabuye waqala ukufundisa ngaselwandle . Kwabuthana kuye isixuku esikhulu kakhulu , waze wangena emkhunjini , wahlala elwandle ; isixuku sonke sasisemhlabathini ngaselwandle .

text: And he taught them many things by parables , and said unto them in his doctrine ,
text2: Wabafundisa okuningi ngemifanekiso ; wathi kubo ekufundiseni kwakhe :

text: Hearken ; Behold , there went out a sower to sow :
text2: “ Lalelani ; bhekani , kwaphuma umhlwanyeli ukuyohlwanyela .

text: And it came to pass , as he sowed , some fell by the way side , and the fowls of the air came and devoured it up .
text2: Kwathi ekuhlwanyeleni kwakhe enye imbewu yawela ngasendleleni ; kwafika izinyoni , zayidla zayiqeda .

text: And some fell on stony ground , where it had not much earth ; and immediately it sprang up , because it had no depth of earth :
text2: Enye yawela edwaleni , lapho yayingenamhlabathi omningi khona ; yamila masinyane , ngokuba ingenamhlabathi ojulileyo .

text: But when the sun was up , it was scorched ; and because it had no root , it withered away .
text2: Kwathi ukuba liphume ilanga , yahamuka ; nangokuba ingenampande , yabuna .

text: And some fell among thorns , and the thorns grew up , and choked it , and it yielded no fruit .
text2: Enye yawela emeveni ; ameva akhula , ayiminyanisa , ayaze yathela isithelo .

text: And other fell on good ground , and did yield fruit that sprang up and increased ; and brought forth , some thirty , and some sixty , and some an hundred .
text2: Enye yawela emhlabathini omuhle ; yahluma , yakhula , yathela isithelo , yaveza ngamashumi amathathu , nangamashumi ayisithupha , nangekhulu . ”

text: And he said unto them , He that hath ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Wayesethi : “ Onezindlebe zokuzwa makezwe . ”

text: And when he was alone , they that were about him with the twelve asked of him the parable .
text2: Lapho esengasesitha , ababe naye kanye nabayishumi nambili bambuza ngale mifanekiso .

text: And he said unto them , Unto you it is given to know the mystery of the kingdom of God : but unto them that are without , all these things are done in parables :
text2: Wathi kubo : “ Nina niphiwe imfihlakalo yombuso kaNkulunkulu , kodwa abangaphandle benzelwa konke ngemifanekiso ,

text: That seeing they may see , and not perceive ; and hearing they may hear , and not understand ; lest at any time they should be converted , and their sins should be forgiven them .
text2: ukuze ngokubona babone , bangabonisisi , nangokuzwa bezwe , bangaqondi , funa baphenduke , bathethelelwe . ”

text: And he said unto them , Know ye not this parable ? and how then will ye know all parables ?
text2: Wayesethi kubo : “ Aniwazi lo mfanekiso ; pho , niyakuyazi kanjani yonke imifanekiso na ?

text: The sower soweth the word .
text2: Umhlwanyeli uhlwanyela izwi .

text: And these are they by the way side , where the word is sown ; but when they have heard , Satan cometh immediately , and taketh away the word that was sown in their hearts .
text2: Abangasendleleni yilabo abathi lapho kuhlwanyelwa khona izwi , nanxa sebelizwile , kufike masinyane uSathane , alisuse izwi elihlwanyelwe kubo .

text: And these are they likewise which are sown on stony ground ; who , when they have heard the word , immediately receive it with gladness ;
text2: Kanjalo abahlwanyelwe edwaleni yilabo abathi sebelizwile izwi , balamukele masinyane ngokuthokoza ;

text: And have no root in themselves , and so endure but for a time : afterward , when affliction or persecution ariseth for the word ' s sake , immediately they are offended .
text2: kepha kabanampande phakathi kwabo , kodwa bahlala isikhashana nje , kuthi sekuvele ukuhlupheka nokuzingelwa ngenxa yezwi , bakhubeke masinyane .

text: And these are they which are sown among thorns ; such as hear the word ,
text2: Abanye bangabahlwanyelwe emeveni ; yibo abalizwile izwi ,

text: And the cares of this world , and the deceitfulness of riches , and the lusts of other things entering in , choke the word , and it becometh unfruitful .
text2: kepha iminako yalesi sikhathi , nokukhohlisa kwengcebo , nokunxanela ezinye izinto kungena kuliminyanise izwi , libe ngelingatheliyo .

text: And these are they which are sown on good ground ; such as hear the word , and receive it , and bring forth fruit , some thirtyfold , some sixty , and some an hundred .
text2: Nabahlwanyelwe emhlabathini omuhle yilabo abalizwa izwi , balamukele , bathele isithelo ngamashumi amathathu , nangamashumi ayisithupha , nangekhulu . ”

text: And he said unto them , Is a candle brought to be put under a bushel , or under a bed ? and not to be set on a candlestick ?
text2: Wayesethi kubo : “ Imbala isibani siza ukuba sibekwe phansi kwesitsha nokuba phansi kombhede yini , singabekwa othini , na ?

text: For there is nothing hid , which shall not be manifested ; neither was any thing kept secret , but that it should come abroad .
text2: Ngokuba akukho okusithekileyo okungayikuhlalukiswa ; akukho okuyisifuba okungayikuba sobala .

text: If any man have ears to hear , let him hear .
text2: Uma ekhona onezindlebe zokuzwa , makezwe . ”

text: And he said unto them , Take heed what ye hear : with what measure ye mete , it shall be measured to you : and unto you that hear shall more be given .
text2: Wayesethi kubo : “ Qaphelani enikuzwayo ; ngaleso silinganiso enilinganisa ngaso nani niyakulinganiselwa ngaso , nenezelwe nina .

text: For he that hath , to him shall be given : and he that hath not , from him shall be taken even that which he hath .
text2: Ngokuba onakho uyakuphiwa ; kepha ongenakho uyakwamukwa nalokho anakho . ”

text: And he said , So is the kingdom of God , as if a man should cast seed into the ground ;
text2: Wayesethi : “ Unjalo umbuso kaNkulunkulu ; unjengokuba umuntu ephonsa imbewu emhlabathini ,

text: And should sleep , and rise night and day , and the seed should spring and grow up , he knoweth not how .
text2: alale , avuke ubusuku nemini , imibewu imile , ikhule , engazi ukuthi kanjani .

text: For the earth bringeth forth fruit of herself ; first the blade , then the ear , after that the full corn in the ear .
text2: Umhlabathi uthela isithelo ngokwawo , kuqala ikhaba , khona isikhwebu , besekuba yizinhlamvu ezipheleleyo esikhwetshini .

text: But when the fruit is brought forth , immediately he putteth in the sickle , because the harvest is come .
text2: Nxa sesivuthiwe isithelo , afake masinyane isikela , ngokuba ukuvuna sekufikile . ”

text: And he said , Whereunto shall we liken the kingdom of God ? or with what comparison shall we compare it ?
text2: Wathi futhi : “ Siyakuwufanisa nani umbuso kaNkulunkulu ? Siyakuwuchaza ngamfanekiso muni na ?

text: It is like a grain of mustard seed , which , when it is sown in the earth , is less than all the seeds that be in the earth :
text2: Unjengenhlamvu yesinaphi ethi , nxa ihlwanyelwe emhlabathini , incinyane kunazo zonke izimbewu ezisemhlabeni ,

text: But when it is sown , it groweth up , and becometh greater than all herbs , and shooteth out great branches ; so that the fowls of the air may lodge under the shadow of it .
text2: kodwa nxa isihlwanyelwe imila ibe nkulu kunazo zonke izilimo , ixhante amagatsha amakhulu , ukuze izinyoni zezulu zakhele emthunzini wawo . ”

text: And with many such parables spake he the word unto them , as they were able to hear it .
text2: Walikhuluma izwi kubo ngemifanekiso eminingi enjalo njengamandla abo okuzwa ;

text: But without a parable spake he not unto them : and when they were alone , he expounded all things to his disciples .
text2: kodwa ngaphandle komfanekiso kakhulumanga kubo ; kepha sebebodwa wabachasisela abafundi bakhe konke .

text: And the same day , when the even was come , he saith unto them , Let us pass over unto the other side .
text2: Ngalolo suku sekuhlwile , wathi kubo : “ Asiwele siye ngaphesheya . ”

text: And when they had sent away the multitude , they took him even as he was in the ship . And there were also with him other little ships .
text2: Base bemukisa isixuku , bahamba naye , njengalokho ebesemkhunjini ; kwakukhona neminye imikhumbi ihambisana naye .

text: And there arose a great storm of wind , and the waves beat into the ship , so that it was now full .
text2: Kwase kuvuka isivunguvungu esikhulu somoya , amaza aphonseka phakathi emkhunjini , umkhumbi waze waqala ukugcwala .

text: And he was in the hinder part of the ship , asleep on a pillow : and they awake him , and say unto him , Master , carest thou not that we perish ?
text2: Kepha yena wayengasemuva emkhunjini elele esicamelweni ; bamvusa , bathi kuye : “ Mfundisi , awunaki , nakuba sibhubha , na ? ”

text: And he arose , and rebuked the wind , and said unto the sea , Peace , be still . And the wind ceased , and there was a great calm .
text2: Wayesevuka , wakhuza umoya , wathi kulo ulwandle : “ Thula , uthi du . ” Kwanqamuka umoya , kwaba khona ukuthula okukhulu .

text: And he said unto them , Why are ye so fearful ? how is it that ye have no faith ?
text2: Wathi kubo : “ Yini ukuba nesabe kangaka na ? Yini ukuba ningabi nakukholwa na ? ”

text: And they feared exceedingly , and said one to another , What manner of man is this , that even the wind and the sea obey him ?
text2: Besaba ngokwesaba okukhulu , bathi omunye komunye : “ Kanti lo ungubani , lokhu nomoya nolwandle kuyamlalela ? ”

text: And they came over unto the other side of the sea , into the country of the Gadarenes .
text2: Base befika phesheya kolwandle ezweni lamaGerasa .

text: And when he was come out of the ship , immediately there met him out of the tombs a man with an unclean spirit ,
text2: Esephume emkhunjini , kwahlangana naye masinyane umuntu ovela emathuneni , enomoya ongcolileyo .

text: Who had his dwelling among the tombs ; and no man could bind him , no , not with chains :
text2: Wayehlala emathuneni , kungasekho muntu ongambopha nangeketanga ;

text: Because that he had been often bound with fetters and chains , and the chains had been plucked asunder by him , and the fetters broken in pieces : neither could any man tame him .
text2: ngokuba wayeseboshwe kaningi ngawozankosi nangamaketanga , kepha amaketanga ayegqashuliwe nguye nawozankosi babephuliwe , kungekho noyedwa owayenamandla okumthambisa .

text: And always , night and day , he was in the mountains , and in the tombs , crying , and cutting himself with stones .
text2: Ngesikhathi sonke ubusuku nemini wayesemathuneni nasezintabeni , ememeza , ezilimaza ngamatshe .

text: But when he saw Jesus afar off , he ran and worshipped him ,
text2: Wathi ukuba ambone uJesu esekude , wagijima , wakhuleka kuye ;

text: And cried with a loud voice , and said , What have I to do with thee , Jesus , thou Son of the most high God ? I adjure thee by God , that thou torment me not .
text2: wayesememeza ngezwi elikhulu , ethi : “ Nginamsebenzi muni nawe Jesu , Ndodana kaNkulunkulu oPhezukonke ? Ngikufungisa uNkulunkulu , ungangihluphi . ”

text: For he said unto him , Come out of the man , thou unclean spirit .
text2: Ngokuba wathi kuye : “ Phuma kulo muntu , moya ongcolileyo . ”

text: And he asked him , What is thy name ? And he answered , saying , My name is Legion : for we are many .
text2: Wayesembuza ethi : “ Ngubani igama lakho ? ” Wathi kuye : “ NginguLegiyona igama lami , ngokuba sibaningi . ”

text: And he besought him much that he would not send them away out of the country .
text2: Wamncenga kakhulu ukuba angabamukisi kulelo zwe .

text: Now there was there nigh unto the mountains a great herd of swine feeding .
text2: Kwakukhona lapho ngasentabeni umhlambi omkhulu wezingulube ziklabile .

text: And all the devils besought him , saying , Send us into the swine , that we may enter into them .
text2: Bamncenga bathi : “ Sithumele ezingulubeni ukuba singene kuzo . ”

text: And forthwith Jesus gave them leave . And the unclean spirits went out , and entered into the swine : and the herd ran violently down a steep place into the sea , ( they were about two thousand ; ) and were choked in the sea .
text2: Wabavumela . Omoya abangcolileyo baphuma , bangena ezingulubeni ; umhlambi wagulukudela eweni , waphonseka elwandle kungathi izinkulungwane ezimbili , zaminza elwandle .

text: And they that fed the swine fled , and told it in the city , and in the country . And they went out to see what it was that was done .
text2: Ababezalusa babaleka , baya babika emzini nasemaphandleni ; base beza ukuyobona okwenzekileyo .

text: And they come to Jesus , and see him that was possessed with the devil , and had the legion , sitting , and clothed , and in his right mind : and they were afraid .
text2: Bafika kuJesu , bambona obekhwelwe ngamademoni ehlezi embethe , esangulukile , yena owayenelegiyona ; base besaba .

text: And they that saw it told them how it befell to him that was possessed with the devil , and also concerning the swine .
text2: Ababekubonile babatshela ukuthi kwenzeke kanjani kowayekhwelwe ngamademoni , nangezingulube .

text: And they began to pray him to depart out of their coasts .
text2: Base beqala ukumncenga ukuba amuke ezweni lakubo .

text: And when he was come into the ship , he that had been possessed with the devil prayed him that he might be with him .
text2: Wathi ukuba angene emkhunjini , lowo owayekhwelwe ngamademoni wamncenga ukuba abe naye .

text: Howbeit Jesus suffered him not , but saith unto him , Go home to thy friends , and tell them how great things the Lord hath done for thee , and hath had compassion on thee .
text2: Akamvumelanga , kepha wathi kuye : “ Hamba uye ekhaya kwabakini , ubabikele ukuthi kungakanani iNkosi ekwenzele khona , yakuhawukela . ”

text: And he departed , and began to publish in Decapolis how great things Jesus had done for him : and all men did marvel .
text2: Wamuka - ke , waqala ukulanda eDekapholi ngokuthi kungakanani abekwenzile kuye uJesu ; bamangala bonke .

text: And when Jesus was passed over again by ship unto the other side , much people gathered unto him : and he was nigh unto the sea .
text2: Khona uJesu esebuye ewelele ngaphesheya ngomkhumbi , kwabuthana isixuku esikhulu kuye engaselwandle .

text: And , behold , there cometh one of the rulers of the synagogue , Jairus by name ; and when he saw him , he fell at his feet ,
text2: Kwase kufika omunye wabaphathi besinagoge , nguJayiru igama lakhe , owathi ukuba ambone , waziphonsa phansi ngasezinyaweni zakhe ,

text: And besought him greatly , saying , My little daughter lieth at the point of death : I pray thee , come and lay thy hands on her , that she may be healed ; and she shall live .
text2: wamncenga kakhulu , wathi : “ Indodakazi yami isiyalela ; ake uze , ubeke izandla phezu kwayo ukuba isindiswe , iphile . ”

text: And Jesus went with him ; and much people followed him , and thronged him .
text2: Wahamba naye . Isixuku esikhulu samlandela , samcindezela .

text: And a certain woman , which had an issue of blood twelve years ,
text2: Owesifazane owayenomopho iminyaka eyishumi nambili ,

text: And had suffered many things of many physicians , and had spent all that she had , and was nothing bettered , but rather grew worse ,
text2: ehluphekile ngokuningi ezinyangeni eziningi , echithile konke ayenakho , engasizakalanga ngalutho , kodwa kwayilokhu kuqhubeka ,

text: When she had heard of Jesus , came in the press behind , and touched his garment .
text2: esezwile ngoJesu , weza esixukwini ngasemuva , wathinta ingubo yakhe ,

text: For she said , If I may touch but his clothes , I shall be whole .
text2: ngokuba wathi : “ Uma ngingathinta nje izingubo zakhe , ngizakusindiswa . ”

text: And straightway the fountain of her blood was dried up ; and she felt in her body that she was healed of that plague .
text2: Kwanqamuka masinyane umthombo wegazi lakhe , wezwa emzimbeni ukuthi uphulukile enhluphekweni yakhe .

text: And Jesus , immediately knowing in himself that virtue had gone out of him , turned him about in the press , and said , Who touched my clothes ?
text2: Wanele ukuzwa uJesu phakathi kwakhe ukuthi amandla aphumile kuye , waphendukela esixukwini , wathi : “ Ngubani othinte izingubo zami na ? ”

text: And his disciples said unto him , Thou seest the multitude thronging thee , and sayest thou , Who touched me ?
text2: Abafundi bakhe bathi kuye : “ Uyabona isixuku sikucindezela , usuthi : ‘ Ngubani ongithintileyo na ? ’ ”

text: And he looked round about to see her that had done this thing .
text2: Waqalaza ukuba ambone owenzile lokho .

text: But the woman fearing and trembling , knowing what was done in her , came and fell down before him , and told him all the truth .
text2: Khona owesifazane esaba ethuthumela , azi okwenzekile kuye , weza waziphonsa phansi phambi kwakhe , wamtshela iqiniso lonke .

text: And he said unto her , Daughter , thy faith hath made thee whole ; go in peace , and be whole of thy plague .
text2: Wayesethi kuye : “ Ndodakazi , ukukholwa kwakho kukusindisile ; hamba ube nokuthula ; usuphulukile enhluphekweni yakho . ”

text: While he yet spake , there came from the ruler of the synagogue ' s house certain which said , Thy daughter is dead : why troublest thou the Master any further ?
text2: Esakhuluma , kwafika abomphathi wesinagoge , bathi : “ Indodakazi yakho isifile ; usamkhathazelani uMfundisi na ? ”

text: As soon as Jesus heard the word that was spoken , he saith unto the ruler of the synagogue , Be not afraid , only believe .
text2: Kwathi ukuba uJesu ezwile izwi elishiwoyo , wathi kumphathi wesinagoge : “ Ungesabi , kholwa kuphela . ”

text: And he suffered no man to follow him , save Peter , and James , and John the brother of James .
text2: Akavumelanga muntu amlandele , kuphela oPetru , noJakobe , noJohane umfowabo kaJakobe .

text: And he cometh to the house of the ruler of the synagogue , and seeth the tumult , and them that wept and wailed greatly .
text2: Bafika - ke endlini yomphathi wesinagoge , wabona isiyaluyalu nabakhalayo nabalila kakhulu .

text: And when he was come in , he saith unto them , Why make ye this ado , and weep ? the damsel is not dead , but sleepeth .
text2: Wangena , wathi kubo : “ Niyaluzelani , nikhalelani na ? Umntwana akafile , kodwa ulele . ”

text: And they laughed him to scorn . But when he had put them all out , he taketh the father and the mother of the damsel , and them that were with him , and entereth in where the damsel was lying .
text2: Bamhleka usulu . Kepha yena wabakhipha bonke , wathatha uyise womntwana nonina kanye nababe naye , wangena lapho kulele khona umntwana .

text: And he took the damsel by the hand , and said unto her , Talitha cumi ; which is , being interpreted , Damsel , I say unto thee , arise .
text2: Wabamba umntwana ngesandla , wathi kuye : “ Thalitha , kumi , ” okungukuthi ngokuhunyushwa : “ Ntombazana , ngithi kuwe , vuka ! ”

text: And straightway the damsel arose , and walked ; for she was of the age of twelve years . And they were astonished with a great astonishment .
text2: Yayisivuka masinyane intombazana , yahamba ; ngokuba yayineminyaka eyishumi nambili . Khona bamangala ngokumangala okukhulu .

text: And he charged them straitly that no man should know it ; and commanded that something should be given her to eat .
text2: Wabayalisisa ukuba lokhu kungaziwa muntu ; futhi wathi mayiphiwe ukudla .

text: And he went out from thence , and came into his own country ; and his disciples follow him .
text2: Khona wamuka lapho , waya ezweni lakubo ; abafundi bakhe bamlandela .

text: And when the sabbath day was come , he began to teach in the synagogue : and many hearing him were astonished , saying , From whence hath this man these things ? and what wisdom is this which is given unto him , that even such mighty works are wrought by his hands ?
text2: Sekufikile isabatha , waqala ukufundisa esinagogeni . Abaningi abamuzwayo bamangala bathi : “ Lo ukuthathaphi lokhu na ? Ukuhlakanipha kuni akunikiwe lona na ? Nemisebenzi yamandla enje yenziwe ngezandla zakhe na ?

text: Is not this the carpenter , the son of Mary , the brother of James , and Joses , and of Juda , and Simon ? and are not his sisters here with us ? And they were offended at him .
text2: Lo akusiye umbazi , indodana kaMariya , nomfowabo kaJakobe , noJose , noJuda , noSimoni , na ? Nawodadewabo abakho yini lapha kithi na ? ” Base bekhubeka ngaye .

text: But Jesus said unto them , A prophet is not without honour , but in his own country , and among his own kin , and in his own house .
text2: Wayesethi kubo uJesu : “ Umprofethi kadelelwa ngaphandle kwasezweni lakubo , nasezihlotsheni zakhe , nasendlini yakwabo . ”

text: And he could there do no mighty work , save that he laid his hands upon a few sick folk , and healed them .
text2: Wayengenakwenza lapho nowodwa umsebenzi wamandla ngaphandle kokuthi wabeka izandla phezu kwabagulayo abayingcosana , wabaphulukisa .

text: And he marvelled because of their unbelief . And he went round about the villages , teaching .
text2: Wamangala ngokungakholwa kwabo . Wahamba imizi ngemizi efundisa .

text: And he called unto him the twelve , and began to send them forth by two and two ; and gave them power over unclean spirits ;
text2: Wayesebabiza abayishumi nambili , waqala ukubathuma ngababili , wabanika amandla phezu kwawomoya abangcolileyo .

text: And commanded them that they should take nothing for their journey , save a staff only ; no scrip , no bread , no money in their purse :
text2: Wabayala ukuba bangaphathi lutho lwendlela , kuphela udondolo lodwa , bangaphathi nasinkwa , nasikhwama , nathusi emixhakeni ,

text: But be shod with sandals ; and not put on two coats .
text2: kepha bafake izicathulo , bangembathi kodwa amabhantshi amabili .

text: And he said unto them , In what place soever ye enter into an house , there abide till ye depart from that place .
text2: Wathi kubo : “ Nakuphi lapho ningena khona endlini , hlalani kuyo , nize nimuke khona .

text: And whosoever shall not receive you , nor hear you , when ye depart thence , shake off the dust under your feet for a testimony against them . Verily I say unto you , It shall be more tolerable for Sodom and Gomorrha in the day of judgment , than for that city .
text2: Nayiphi indawo engayikunamukela , nalapho bengayikunizwa khona , anothi nimuka kuyo , nivuthulule uthuli oluphansi kwezinyawo zenu , kube ngubufakazi kubo . ”

text: And they went out , and preached that men should repent .
text2: Base behamba beshumayela ukuba abantu baphenduke .

text: And they cast out many devils , and anointed with oil many that were sick , and healed them .
text2: Bakhipha amademoni amaningi , bagcoba abagulayo abaningi ngamafutha , babaphulukisa .

text: And king Herod heard of him ; ( for his name was spread abroad : ) and he said , That John the Baptist was risen from the dead , and therefore mighty works do shew forth themselves in him .
text2: Yayisikuzwa inkosi uHerode , ngokuba lalidumile igama lakhe . Kwathiwa uJohane uMbhapathizi uvukile kwabafileyo ; kungalokho lawa mandla asebenza kuye .

text: Others said , That it is Elias . And others said , That it is a prophet , or as one of the prophets .
text2: Kodwa abanye bathi : “ Ngu - Eliya ; ” abanye bathi : “ Ngumprofethi njengomunye wabaprofethi . ”

text: But when Herod heard thereof , he said , It is John , whom I beheaded : he is risen from the dead .
text2: Kepha uHerode ekuzwile wathi : “ UJohane engamnquma ikhanda nguye ovukile . ”

text: For Herod himself had sent forth and laid hold upon John , and bound him in prison for Herodias ' sake , his brother Philip ' s wife : for he had married her .
text2: Ngokuba yena uHerode wayethumele wambamba uJohane , wambopha etilongweni ngenxa kaHerodiya umkaFiliphu umfowabo , ngokuba wayeganwe nguye .

text: For John had said unto Herod , It is not lawful for thee to have thy brother ' s wife .
text2: Ngokuba uJohane wayethe kuHerode : “ Awuvunyelwe ukuthatha umkamfowenu . ”

text: Therefore Herodias had a quarrel against him , and would have killed him ; but she could not :
text2: Njalo uHerodiya wambambela amagqubu , wafuna ukumbulala ; kepha kabanga namandla ,

text: For Herod feared John , knowing that he was a just man and an holy , and observed him ; and when he heard him , he did many things , and heard him gladly .
text2: ngokuba uHerode wayemesaba uJohane emazi ukuthi uyindoda elungileyo engcwele , wamlonda ; nalapho emuzwa , wayesambatheka kaningi , nokho kwabamnandi kuye ukumuzwa .

text: And when a convenient day was come , that Herod on his birthday made a supper to his lords , high captains , and chief estates of Galilee ;
text2: Kwathi sekufikile usuku oluhle , lapho uHerode ngosuku lokuzalwa kwakhe ezenzela idili izikhulu zakhe , nezinduna zempi , nabanumzane baseGalile ,

text: And when the daughter of the said Herodias came in , and danced , and pleased Herod and them that sat with him , the king said unto the damsel , Ask of me whatsoever thou wilt , and I will give it thee .
text2: kwangena indodakazi kaHerodiya uqobo , yasina , yajabulisa uHerode nababehlezi naye . Inkosi yayisithi entombazaneni : “ Cela kimi noma yini okuthandayo , ngizakukunika . ”

text: And he sware unto her , Whatsoever thou shalt ask of me , I will give it thee , unto the half of my kingdom .
text2: Wafunga kuyo , wathi : “ Noma yini ongakucela kimi ngizakukunika , nakuba kungaze kube yinxenye yombuso wami . ”

text: And she went forth , and said unto her mother , What shall I ask ? And she said , The head of John the Baptist .
text2: Yayisiphuma , yathi kunina : “ Ngizakucelani na ? ” Yena wathi : “ Ikhanda likaJohane uMbhapathizi . ”

text: And she came in straightway with haste unto the king , and asked , saying , I will that thou give me by and by in a charger the head of John the Baptist .
text2: Yakhawuleza yangena masinyane enkosini , yacela yathi : “ Ngithanda ukuba ungiphe khona manje ngoqwembe ikhanda likaJohane uMbhapathizi . ”

text: And the king was exceeding sorry ; yet for his oath ' s sake , and for their sakes which sat with him , he would not reject her .
text2: Inkosi yadabuka kakhulu , kepha ngenxa yezifungo nangenxa yababehlezi nayo ekudleni ayithandanga ukuyilandulela .

text: And immediately the king sent an executioner , and commanded his head to be brought : and he went and beheaded him in the prison ,
text2: Inkosi yayisithuma masinyane ibutho , waliyala ukuba lilethe ikhanda lakhe . Lahamba , lamnquma ikhanda etilongweni .

text: And brought his head in a charger , and gave it to the damsel : and the damsel gave it to her mother .
text2: Laletha ikhanda lakhe ngoqwembe , layinika intombazana , intombazana yamnika unina .

text: And when his disciples heard of it , they came and took up his corpse , and laid it in a tomb .
text2: Kwathi ukuba abafundi bakhe bakuzwe lokho , beza bathatha isidumbu sakhe , basibeka ethuneni .

text: And the apostles gathered themselves together unto Jesus , and told him all things , both what they had done , and what they had taught .
text2: Abaphostoli babuthana kuJesu , bambikela ababekwenzile nababekufundisile .

text: And he said unto them , Come ye yourselves apart into a desert place , and rest a while : for there were many coming and going , and they had no leisure so much as to eat .
text2: Wayesethi kubo : “ Zanini nina nodwa endaweni eyihlane , niphumule ingcosana . ” Ngokuba babe baningi abezayo nabahambayo , abaze bathola nasikhathi sokudla .

text: And they departed into a desert place by ship privately .
text2: Base bemuka ngomkhumbi , baya endaweni eyihlane bebodwa .

text: And the people saw them departing , and many knew him , and ran afoot thither out of all cities , and outwent them , and came together unto him .
text2: Abaningi sebebabona bemuka , baqonda , baze bagijimela khona ngezinyawo , bephuma kuyo yonke imizi , babandulela .

text: And Jesus , when he came out , saw much people , and was moved with compassion toward them , because they were as sheep not having a shepherd : and he began to teach them many things .
text2: Wathi ephuma , wabona isixuku esikhulu , waba nesihe ngabantu , ngokuba babe njengezimvu ezingenamalusi ; waqala ukubafundisa okuningi .

text: And when the day was now far spent , his disciples came unto him , and said , This is a desert place , and now the time is far passed :
text2: Kwathi isikhathi sesihambile , beza kuye abafundi bakhe , bathi : “ Le ndawo iyihlane , isikhathi sesidlulile ;

text: Send them away , that they may go into the country round about , and into the villages , and buy themselves bread : for they have nothing to eat .
text2: bamukise ukuba baye emaphandleni nasemizaneni ezungezileyo , bazithengele ukudla . ”

text: He answered and said unto them , Give ye them to eat . And they say unto him , Shall we go and buy two hundred pennyworth of bread , and give them to eat ?
text2: Wayesephendula , ethi kubo : “ Bapheni nina ukudla . ” Bathi kuye : “ Sihambe yini , siyothenga izinkwa zawodenariyu abangamakhulu amabili , sibaphe badle na ? ”

text: He saith unto them , How many loaves have ye ? go and see . And when they knew , they say , Five , and two fishes .
text2: Wathi kubo : “ Ninezinkwa ezingaki na ? Hambani nibone . ” Sebazi bathi : “ Ziyisihlanu , nezinhlanzi ezimbili . ”

text: And he commanded them to make all sit down by companies upon the green grass .
text2: Wabayala ukuba bonke bahlale phansi etshanini obuluhlaza izigaba ngezigaba .

text: And they sat down in ranks , by hundreds , and by fifties .
text2: Base behlala phansi amaviyo ngamaviyo , kwaba ngamakhulu nangamashumi ayisihlanu .

text: And when he had taken the five loaves and the two fishes , he looked up to heaven , and blessed , and brake the loaves , and gave them to his disciples to set before them ; and the two fishes divided he among them all .
text2: Wazithabatha izinkwa eziyisihlanu nezinhlanzi ezimbili , wabheka ngasezulwini , wazibusisa , wazihlephula izinkwa , wazinika abafundi ukuba bazibeke phambi kwabo ; nezinhlanzi ezimbili wababela bonke ngazo .

text: And they did all eat , and were filled .
text2: Badla bonke , basutha .

text: And they took up twelve baskets full of the fragments , and of the fishes .
text2: Babutha imvuthuluka , iziqabetho eziyishumi nambili ezigcwele , neyezinhlanzi .

text: And they that did eat of the loaves were about five thousand men .
text2: Ababedlile izinkwa babe ngamadoda ayizinkulungwane eziyisihlanu .

text: And straightway he constrained his disciples to get into the ship , and to go to the other side before unto Bethsaida , while he sent away the people .
text2: Wayesecindezela masinyane abafundi bakhe ukuba bangene emkhunjini , bamandulele ukuya phesheya eBetsayida , yena aze amukise isixuku .

text: And when he had sent them away , he departed into a mountain to pray .
text2: Esebavalelisile wahamba waya entabeni ukuyokhuleka .

text: And when even was come , the ship was in the midst of the sea , and he alone on the land .
text2: Kwathi sekuhlwile , umkhumbi wawuphakathi nolwandle , yena eyedwa emhlabathini .

text: And he saw them toiling in rowing ; for the wind was contrary unto them : and about the fourth watch of the night he cometh unto them , walking upon the sea , and would have passed by them .
text2: Wababona behlupheka ekugwedleni , ngokuba umoya wawuphambene nabo , weza kubo ngomlindo wesine wobusuku ehamba phezu kolwandle . Kwangathi uyadlula kubo .

text: But when they saw him walking upon the sea , they supposed it had been a spirit , and cried out :
text2: Sebembonile ehamba phezu kolwandle , bacabanga ukuthi yisithunzi ; bakhala .

text: For they all saw him , and were troubled . And immediately he talked with them , and saith unto them , Be of good cheer : it is I ; be not afraid .
text2: Ngokuba bonke bambona , bethuka . Kepha washesha wakhuluma nabo , wathi kubo : “ Yimani isibindi ; yimina , ningesabi . ”

text: And he went up unto them into the ship ; and the wind ceased : and they were sore amazed in themselves beyond measure , and wondered .
text2: Wayesekhwela emkhunjini kubo , umoya wanqamuka ; bamangala kakhulu impela phakathi kwabo .

text: For they considered not the miracle of the loaves : for their heart was hardened .
text2: Ngokuba abaqondanga okwezinkwa , lokhu inhliziyo yabo yayilukhuni .

text: And when they had passed over , they came into the land of Gennesaret , and drew to the shore .
text2: Sebewelile bafika ezweni laseGenesaretha , babopha ogwini .

text: And when they were come out of the ship , straightway they knew him ,
text2: Ukuphuma kwabo emkhunjini yena wayaziwa masinyane .

text: And ran through that whole region round about , and began to carry about in beds those that were sick , where they heard he was .
text2: Bagijimela kulo lonke lelo zwe , baqala ukuletha abagulayo ngezinhlaka , lapho bemuzwa ukuthi ukhona .

text: And whithersoever he entered , into villages , or cities , or country , they laid the sick in the streets , and besought him that they might touch if it were but the border of his garment : and as many as touched him were made whole .
text2: Kwathi nomaphi lapho engena khona , emizaneni , nasemizini , nasemaphandleni , babeka abagulayo ezigcawini , bamncenga ukuba bathinte noma umphetho wengubo yakhe kuphela ; bonke abamthinta basindiswa .

text: Then came together unto him the Pharisees , and certain of the scribes , which came from Jerusalem .
text2: Kwabuthana kuye abaFarisi nabanye bababhali bevela eJerusalema .

text: And when they saw some of his disciples eat bread with defiled , that is to say , with unwashen , hands , they found fault .
text2: Sebebonile ukuthi abanye babafundi bakhe badla izinkwa ngezandla ezimbi okungukuthi ezingahlanjiwe —

text: For the Pharisees , and all the Jews , except they wash their hands oft , eat not , holding the tradition of the elders .
text2: ngokuba abaFarisi kanye nabaJuda bonke abadli bengahlambisisanga izandla , bebamba isiko labadala ;

text: And when they come from the market , except they wash , they eat not . And many other things there be , which they have received to hold , as the washing of cups , and pots , brasen vessels , and of tables .
text2: nanxa bevela endalini , abadli bengakahlambi ; kukhona nezinye izinto eziningi abazamukeleyo ukuba bazibambe , njengokuhlanza izinkezo , nezinkamba , nezitsha zethusi —

text: Then the Pharisees and scribes asked him , Why walk not thy disciples according to the tradition of the elders , but eat bread with unwashen hands ?
text2: abaFarisi nababhali bambuza bathi : “ Abafundi bakho abahambi ngani ngesiko labadala , kepha badla isinkwa ngezandla ezimbi na ? ”

text: He answered and said unto them , Well hath Esaias prophesied of you hypocrites , as it is written , This people honoureth me with their lips , but their heart is far from me .
text2: Wayesethi kubo : “ U - Isaya waprofetha kahle ngani nina bazenzisi njengokulotshiweyo ukuthi : “ ‘ Lesi sizwe singidumisa ngezindebe zomlomo , kepha inhliziyo yaso ikude nami ;

text: Howbeit in vain do they worship me , teaching for doctines the commandments of men .
text2: kodwa bangikhonza ngeze befundisa izifundiso eziyimiyalo yabantu . ’

text: For laying aside the commandment of God , ye hold the tradition of men , as the washing of pots and cups : and many other such like things ye do .
text2: “ Niyeka umyalo kaNkulunkulu , nibambe isiko labantu . ”

text: And he said unto them , Full well ye reject the commandment of God , that ye may keep your own tradition .
text2: Wayesethi kubo : “ Yebo , nichitha umyalo kaNkulunkulu ukuba nigcine isiko lenu .

text: For Moses said , Honour thy father and thy mother ; and , Whoso curseth father or mother , let him die the death :
text2: Ngokuba uMose wathi : ‘ Yazisa uyihlo nonyoko , ’ nokuthi : ‘ Othuka uyise noma unina makafe nokufa ; ’

text: But ye say , If a man shall say to his father or mother , It is Corban , that is to say , a gift , by whatsoever thou mightest be profited by me ; he shall be free .
text2: kepha nina nithi : ‘ Uma umuntu ethi kuyise noma kunina : YiKorbana , okungukuthi umnikelo , lokho ongabe usizwa yimi ngakho , ’

text: And ye suffer him no more to do ought for his father or his mother ;
text2: anisamvumeli ukuba enzele uyise noma unina utho .

text: Making the word of God of none effect through your tradition , which ye have delivered : and many such like things do ye .
text2: Izwi likaNkulunkulu nilenza libe yize ngesiko lenu enilivezileyo ; nokunye okuningi okunjalo niyakwenza . ”

text: And when he had called all the people unto him , he said unto them , Hearken unto me every one of you , and understand :
text2: Khona wabuye wabiza isixuku , wathi kuso : “ Ngizweni nonke , niqonde .

text: There is nothing from without a man , that entering into him can defile him : but the things which come out of him , those are they that defile the man .
