text: And he left the linen cloth , and fled from them naked .
text2: Yayisiyishiya indwangu , yabaleka ze .

text: And they led Jesus away to the high priest : and with him were assembled all the chief priests and the elders and the scribes .
text2: Base bemusa uJesu kumpristi omkhulu ; kwabuthana bonke abapristi abakhulu namalunga nababhali .

text: And Peter followed him afar off , even into the palace of the high priest : and he sat with the servants , and warmed himself at the fire .
text2: UPetru wamlandela ekude , waze wangena egcekeni lompristi omkhulu ; wayehlezi kanye nezikhonzi otha umlilo .

text: And the chief priests and all the council sought for witness against Jesus to put him to death ; and found none .
text2: Abapristi abakhulu nomphakathi wonke bafuna ubufakazi ngoJesu ukuba bambulale , kepha ababufumananga .

text: For many bare false witness against him , but their witness agreed not together .
text2: Ngokuba abaningi bafakaza amanga ngaye , kepha ubufakazi babo abuhlangananga .

text: And there arose certain , and bare false witness against him , saying ,
text2: Kwasukuma abathile , bafakaza amanga ngaye , bathi :

text: We heard him say , I will destroy this temple that is made with hands , and within three days I will build another made without hands .
text2: “ Thina simzwile ethi : ‘ Ngiyakulidiliza leli thempeli elenziwe ngezandla , ngakhe ngezinsuku ezintathu elinye elingenziwe ngezandla . ’ ”

text: But neither so did their witness agree together .
text2: Nakuba kunjalo ubufakazi babo abuhlangananga .

text: And the high priest stood up in the midst , and asked Jesus , saying , Answerest thou nothing ? what is it which these witness against thee ?
text2: Kwase kusukuma umpristi omkhulu phakathi kwabo , wambuza uJesu , wathi : “ Awuphenduli lutho na ? Kuyini abakufakaza ngawe laba na ? ”

text: But he held his peace , and answered nothing . Again the high priest asked him , and said unto him , Art thou the Christ , the Son of the Blessed ?
text2: Kepha wathula , akaphendula lutho . Umpristi omkhulu wabuye wambuza , wathi kuye : “ UnguKristu , iNdodana yoBongekayo na ? ”

text: And Jesus said , I am : and ye shall see the Son of man sitting on the right hand of power , and coming in the clouds of heaven .
text2: Wathi uJesu : “ Nginguye . Niyakubona iNdodana yomuntu ihlezi ngakwesokunene saMandla , iza ngamafu ezulu . ”

text: Then the high priest rent his clothes , and saith , What need we any further witnesses ?
text2: Khona umpristi omkhulu waklebhula izingubo zakhe , wathi : “ Sisaswelelani ofakazi na ?

text: Ye have heard the blasphemy : what think ye ? And they all condemned him to be guilty of death .
text2: Senikuzwile ukuhlambalaza ; nithini na ? ” Bamlahla bonke ngokuthi ufanele ukufa .

text: And some began to spit on him , and to cover his face , and to buffet him , and to say unto him , Prophesy : and the servants did strike him with the palms of their hands .
text2: Abanye base beqala ukumkhafulela ngamathe nokumgubuzela ubuso nokumdushuza , bathi kuye : “ Profetha . ” Nezikhonzi zamthatha zammukula .

text: And as Peter was beneath in the palace , there cometh one of the maids of the high priest :
text2: UPetru esesegcekeni ngaphansi , kwafika enye yamantombazana ompristi omkhulu ,

text: And when she saw Peter warming himself , she looked upon him , and said , And thou also wast with Jesus of Nazareth .
text2: yambona uPetru otha , yambheka , yathi : “ Nawe ubunoJesu waseNazaretha . ”

text: But he denied , saying , I know not , neither understand I what thou sayest . And he went out into the porch ; and the cock crew .
text2: Kepha waphika wathi : “ Angikwazi , yebo , angikuzwisisi okushoyo ; ” waphumela enkundleni ; lakhala iqhude .

text: And a maid saw him again , and began to say to them that stood by , This is one of them .
text2: Intombazana imbona yabuye yaqala ukusho kwababemi khona ukuthi : “ Lona ungomunye wabo . ”

text: And he denied it again . And a little after , they that stood by said again to Peter , Surely thou art one of them : for thou art a Galilaean , and thy speech agreeth thereto .
text2: Kepha waphinda waphika . Emva kwesikhashana futhi ababemi khona bathi kuPetru : “ Nempela ungomunye wabo , ngokuba ungowaseGalile . ”

text: But he began to curse and to swear , saying , I know not this man of whom ye speak .
text2: Wayeseqala ukuthuka nokufunga , ethi : “ Angimazi lowo muntu enikhuluma ngaye . ”

text: And the second time the cock crew . And Peter called to mind the word that Jesus said unto him , Before the cock crow twice , thou shalt deny me thrice . And when he thought thereon , he wept .
text2: Lase likhala masinyane iqhude ngokwesibili . UPetru wayesekhumbula izwi abelishilo kuye uJesu lokuthi : “ Iqhude lingakakhali kabili , uzakungiphika kathathu ; ” wakhala nokukhala izinyembezi .

text: And straightway in the morning the chief priests held a consultation with the elders and scribes and the whole council , and bound Jesus , and carried him away , and delivered him to Pilate .
text2: Kwathi masinyane ekuseni abapristi abakhulu namalunga nababhali nomphakathi wonke benza icebo , bambopha uJesu , bamqhuba , bamnikela kuPilatu .

text: And Pilate asked him , Art thou the King of the Jews ? And he answering said unto him , Thou sayest it .
text2: UPilatu wambuza wathi : “ Wena uyinkosi yabaJuda na ? ” Waphendula , wathi kuye : “ Usho khona . ”

text: And the chief priests accused him of many things : but he answered nothing .
text2: Abapristi abakhulu bammangalela ngokuningi .

text: And Pilate asked him again , saying , Answerest thou nothing ? behold how many things they witness against thee .
text2: UPilatu wabuye wambuza , wathi : “ Awuphenduli lutho na ? Bheka , bakuthwesa icala ngokuningi kangaka . ”

text: But Jesus yet answered nothing ; so that Pilate marvelled .
text2: Kodwa uJesu akabe esaphendula lutho , waze wamangala uPilatu .

text: Now at that feast he released unto them one prisoner , whomsoever they desired .
text2: Kwathi ngomkhosi wayehleze ebakhululela isiboshwa sibe sinye abasicelayo .

text: And there was one named Barabbas , which lay bound with them that had made insurrection with him , who had committed murder in the insurrection .
text2: Kwakukhona - ke omunye , nguBaraba igama lakhe , owayeboshiwe kanye namahlubuka ; wona ayebulele umuntu ekuhlubukeni .

text: And the multitude crying aloud began to desire him to do as he had ever done unto them .
text2: Isixuku senyuka , saqala ukucela ukuba abenzele njengalokho ebehleze ebenzela .

text: But Pilate answered them , saying , Will ye that I release unto you the King of the Jews ?
text2: Kepha uPilatu wabaphendula wathi : “ Nithanda ukuba nginikhululele inkosi yabaJuda na ? ”

text: For he knew that the chief priests had delivered him for envy .
text2: Ngokuba wayekwazi ukuthi abapristi abakhulu bamnikele ngomhawu .

text: But the chief priests moved the people , that he should rather release Barabbas unto them .
text2: Kepha abapristi abakhulu babhebhezela isixuku ukuba okungcono asikhululele uBaraba .

text: And Pilate answered and said again unto them , What will ye then that I shall do unto him whom ye call the King of the Jews ?
text2: UPilatu wabuye waphendula , wathi kubo : “ Pho - ke , ngimenzenjani lo enithi uyinkosi yabaJuda na ? ”

text: And they cried out again , Crucify him .
text2: Babuye bamemeza , bathi : “ Mbethele esiphambanweni ! ”

text: Then Pilate said unto them , Why , what evil hath he done ? And they cried out the more exceedingly , Crucify him .
text2: Kodwa uPilatu wathi kubo : “ Ngokuba wenze bubi buni na ? ” Kepha bamemeza kakhulu , bathi : “ Mbethele esiphambanweni ! ”

text: And so Pilate , willing to content the people , released Barabbas unto them , and delivered Jesus , when he had scourged him , to be crucified .
text2: Khona uPilatu ethanda ukudelisa isixuku wasikhululela uBaraba , kepha wamshaya uJesu , wamnikela ukuba abethelwe esiphambanweni .

text: And the soldiers led him away into the hall , called Praetorium ; and they call together the whole band .
text2: Amabutho ayesemngenisa phakathi endlini ethiwa iPretoriyu , abizela ndawonye ibutho lonke .

text: And they clothed him with purple , and platted a crown of thorns , and put it about his head ,
text2: Ayesemembathisa ingubo ebubende , amcwashelisa ngomqhele ayeweluke ngameva .

text: And began to salute him , Hail , King of the Jews !
text2: Aqala ukumkhulekela , athi : “ Bayede , nkosi yabaJuda ! ”

text: And they smote him on the head with a reed , and did spit upon him , and bowing their knees worshipped him .
text2: Amshaya ekhanda ngomhlanga , amkhafulela ngamathe , aguqa ngamadolo , akhuleka kuye .

text: And when they had mocked him , they took off the purple from him , and put his own clothes on him , and led him out to crucify him .
text2: Esembhinqile amhlubula ingubo ebubende , amembathisa izingubo zakhe . Ayesephuma naye ukuba ambethele esiphambanweni .

text: And they compel one Simon a Cyrenian , who passed by , coming out of the country , the father of Alexander and Rufus , to bear his cross .
text2: Acindezela umuntu obedlula , uSimoni waseKhurene , evela endle , uyise ka - Aleksandru noRufu , ukuba athwale isiphambano sakhe .

text: And they bring him unto the place Golgotha , which is , being interpreted , The place of a skull .
text2: Ayesemyisa endaweni yaseGolgotha okungukuthi ngokuhunyushwa iNdawo Yekhanda .

text: And they gave him to drink wine mingled with myrrh : but he received it not .
text2: Amnika iwayini elixutshwe nemure ; kepha akalamukelanga .

text: And when they had crucified him , they parted his garments , casting lots upon them , what every man should take .
text2: Ayesembethela esiphambanweni , abelana izingubo zakhe , enzelana inkatho ngazo ukuthi yilowo nalowo uyakuthathani .

text: And it was the third hour , and they crucified him .
text2: Kwakuyihora lesithathu esembethela esiphambanweni .

text: And the superscription of his accusation was written over , THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Umbhalo wecala lakhe ubulotshiwe ngaphezulu wokuthi : INKOSI YABAJUDA .

text: And with him they crucify two thieves ; the one on his right hand , and the other on his left .
text2: Kwabethelwa kanye naye abaphangi ababili , omunye ngakwesokunene nomunye ngakwesokhohlo sakhe .

text: And the scripture was fulfilled , which saith , And he was numbered with the transgressors .
text2: Kwase kugcwaliseka umbhalo othi : “ Wabalwa kanye naboni . ”

text: And they that passed by railed on him , wagging their heads , and saying , Ah , thou that destroyest the temple , and buildest it in three days ,
text2: Abadlulayo bamhlambalaza benikina amakhanda abo , bathi : “ Eya wena odiliza ithempeli , ubuye ulakhe ngezinsuku ezintathu ;

text: Save thyself , and come down from the cross .
text2: zisindise , wehle esiphambanweni . ”

text: Likewise also the chief priests mocking said among themselves with the scribes , He saved others ; himself he cannot save .
text2: Kanjalo nabapristi abakhulu bambhinqa bebodwa kanye nababhali , bathi : “ Wasindisa abanye , angezisindise yena .

text: Let Christ the King of Israel descend now from the cross , that we may see and believe . And they that were crucified with him reviled him .
text2: UKristu , iNkosi yakwa - Israyeli , makehle manje esiphambanweni , ukuze sibone , sikholwe . ” Nababebethelwe kanye naye bamdumaza .

text: And when the sixth hour was come , there was darkness over the whole land until the ninth hour .
text2: Sekufikile ihora lesithupha kwaba mnyama emhlabeni wonke , kwaze kwaba yihora lesishiyagalolunye .

text: And at the ninth hour Jesus cried with a loud voice , saying , Eloi , Eloi , lama sabachthani ? which is , being interpreted , My God , my God , why hast thou forsaken me ?
text2: Ngehora lesishiyagalolunye uJesu wamemeza ngezwi elikhulu , wathi : “ Eloi , Eloi , lama sabaktani ? ” okungukuthi ngokuhunyushwa : “ Nkulunkulu wami , Nkulunkulu wami , ungishiyeleni na ? ”

text: And some of them that stood by , when they heard it , said , Behold , he calleth Elias .
text2: Abanye kwababemi khona bekuzwa bathi : “ Bheka , ubiza u - Eliya . ”

text: And one ran and filled a spunge full of vinegar , and put it on a reed , and gave him to drink , saying , Let alone ; let us see whether Elias will come to take him down .
text2: Wayesegijima omunye , wagcwalisa ilula ngoviniga , walichoma emhlangeni , wamphuzisa , wathi : “ Yekani , sibone uma u - Eliya eza ukumehlisa . ”

text: And Jesus cried with a loud voice , and gave up the ghost .
text2: UJesu wayesememeza ngezwi elikhulu , wafa .

text: And the veil of the temple was rent in twain from the top to the bottom .
text2: Khona isihenqo sethempeli sadabuka kabili , kusukela phezulu kuze kufike phansi .

text: And when the centurion , which stood over against him , saw that he so cried out , and gave up the ghost , he said , Truly this man was the Son of God .
text2: Kepha induna yekhulu eyayimi maqondana naye imbona efa ngokunjalo , yathi : “ Nempela lo muntu ube yiNdodana kaNkulunkulu . ”

text: There were also women looking on afar off : among whom was Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James the less and of Joses , and Salome ;
text2: Kwakukhona nabesifazane bebukela , bekude ; phakathi kwabo kwakukhona noMariya Magdalena , noMariya unina kaJakobe omncane nokaJose , kanye noSalome

text: ( Who also , when he was in Galilee , followed him , and ministered unto him ; ) and many other women which came up with him unto Jerusalem .
text2: ababemlandela eseseGalile , bemkhonza , nabanye abesifazane abaningi abenyukela naye eJerusalema .

text: And now when the even was come , because it was the preparation , that is , the day before the sabbath ,
text2: Kwathi ukuba kuhlwe , ngokuba kwakulusuku lokulungisela okungukuthi olwandulela isabatha ,

text: Joseph of Arimathaea , and honourable counseller , which also waited for the kingdom of God , came , and went in boldly unto Pilate , and craved the body of Jesus .
text2: kwafika uJosefa wase - Arimatheya , ilunga elidumileyo lomphakathi , owayewubheka naye umbuso kaNkulunkulu ; wangena ngesibindi kuPilatu , wacela isidumbu sikaJesu .

text: And Pilate marvelled if he were already dead : and calling unto him the centurion , he asked him whether he had been any while dead .
text2: Kepha uPilatu wamangala ngokuthi ngabe usefile , wabiza induna yekhulu , wabuza kuyo ukuthi sekukade efile na ?

text: And when he knew it of the centurion , he gave the body to Joseph .
text2: Esezwile enduneni yekhulu wamnika uJosefa isidumbu .

text: And he bought fine linen , and took him down , and wrapped him in the linen , and laid him in a sepulchre which was hewn out of a rock , and rolled a stone unto the door of the sepulchre .
text2: Wathenga indwangu enhle , wamehlisa , wamsonga ngaleyo ndwangu , wambeka ethuneni elaliqoshwe edwaleni , wagingqela itshe emnyango wethuna .

text: And Mary Magdalene and Mary the mother of Joses beheld where he was laid .
text2: OMariya Magdalena noMariya unina kaJose babona lapho abekwa khona .

text: And when the sabbath was past , Mary Magdalene , and Mary the mother of James , and Salome , had bought sweet spices , that they might come and anoint him .
text2: Selidlulile isabatha , oMariya Magdalena , noMariya unina kaJakobe , noSalome bathenga amakha ukuba beze bamgcobe .

text: And very early in the morning the first day of the week , they came unto the sepulchre at the rising of the sun .
text2: Ekuseni kakhulu ngosuku lokuqala lweviki beza ethuneni ekuphumeni kwelanga .

text: And they said among themselves , Who shall roll us away the stone from the door of the sepulchre ?
text2: Bakhuluma bodwa , bathi : “ Ngubani oyakusigingqela itshe , lisuke emnyango wethuna na ? ”

text: And when they looked , they saw that the stone was rolled away : for it was very great .
text2: Bathi ukubheka , babona ukuthi itshe seligingqiwe ; ngokuba lalilikhulu kakhulu .

text: And entering into the sepulchre , they saw a young man sitting on the right side , clothed in a long white garment ; and they were affrighted .
text2: Kuthe bengena ethuneni , babona insizwa ihlezi ngakwesokunene yembethe ingubo ende emhlophe ; bethuka .

text: And he saith unto them , Be not affrighted : Ye seek Jesus of Nazareth , which was crucified : he is risen ; he is not here : behold the place where they laid him .
text2: Kepha yathi kubo : “ Ningethuki ; nifuna uJesu waseNazaretha obebethelwe esiphambanweni ; uvukile ; kakho lapha ; bhekani nansi indawo lapho bebembeke khona .

text: But go your way , tell his disciples and Peter that he goeth before you into Galilee : there shall ye see him , as he said unto you .
text2: Kodwa hambani nitshele abafundi bakhe kanye noPetru ukuthi uyanandulela ukuya eGalile ; nizakumbona lapho , njengalokho eshilo kini . ”

text: And they went out quickly , and fled from the sepulchre ; for they trembled and were amazed : neither said they any thing to any man ; for they were afraid .
text2: Base bephuma , babaleka ethuneni , ngokuba babefikelwe ngukuthuthumela nokumangala , kabashongo lutho kumuntu , ngokuba babesaba .

text: Now when Jesus was risen early the first day of the week , he appeared first to Mary Magdalene , out of whom he had cast seven devils .
text2: Esevukile , kusekuseni ngosuku lokuqala lweviki , wabonakala kuqala kuMariya Magdalena ayekhiphe kuye amademoni ayisikhombisa .

text: And she went and told them that had been with him , as they mourned and wept .
text2: Yena wahamba wababikela labo ababe naye uJesu , besalila bekhala .

text: And they , when they had heard that he was alive , and had been seen of her , believed not .
text2: Kwathi bona sebezwile ukuthi uyaphila nokuthi uboniwe nguye , abaze bakholwa .

text: After that he appeared in another form unto two of them , as they walked , and went into the country .
text2: Emva kwalokho wabonakala ngesinye isimo kwababili kubo behamba beya emaphandleni .

text: And they went and told it unto the residue : neither believed they them .
text2: Nabo bahamba babikela abanye ; nalabo abaze bakholwa .

text: Afterward he appeared unto the eleven as they sat at meat , and upbraided them with their unbelief and hardness of heart , because they believed not them which had seen him after he was risen .
text2: Ngasemuva wabonakala kwabayishumi nanye behlezi ekudleni , wabasola ngokungakholwa kwabo nangobulukhuni benhliziyo yabo , ngokuba bengakholwanga yilabo abambonileyo esevukile .

text: And he said unto them , Go ye into all the world , and preach the gospel to every creature .
text2: Wayesethi kubo : “ Hambani niye ezweni lonke , nishumayele ivangeli kukho konke okudaliweyo .

text: He that believeth and is baptized shall be saved ; but he that believeth not shall be damned .
text2: Okholwayo abhapathizwe uyakusindiswa , kepha ongakholwayo uyakulahlwa .

text: And these signs shall follow them that believe ; In my name shall they cast out devils ; they shall speak with new tongues ;
text2: Lezi zibonakaliso ziyakubalandela abakholwayo : ngegama lami bayakukhipha amademoni , bashumayele ngezilimi ezintsha ,

text: They shall take up serpents ; and if they drink any deadly thing , it shall not hurt them ; they shall lay hands on the sick , and they shall recover .
text2: baphathe izinyoka ; uma bephuza okubulalayo , akusoze kwaba nangozi ; bayakubeka izandla phezu kwabagulayo , basinde . ”

text: So then after the Lord had spoken unto them , he was received up into heaven , and sat on the right hand of God .
text2: Njalo - ke iNkosi uJesu isikhulumile kubo yakhushulelwa ezulwini , yahlala ngakwesokunene sikaNkulunkulu .

text: And they went forth , and preached everywhere , the Lord working with them , and confirming the word with signs following . Amen .
text2: Kepha bona bephuma bashumayela ezindaweni zonke , iNkosi isebenza nabo , iqinisa izwi ngezibonakaliso ezilandelayo .

text: Forasmuch as many have taken in hand to set forth in order a declaration of those things which are most surely believed among us ,
text2: Njengokuba abaningi sebezamile ukulanda ngokuhlelekile ngalezo zindaba ezigcwaliseke phakathi kwethu ,

text: Even as they delivered them unto us , which from the beginning were eyewitnesses , and ministers of the word ;
text2: njengalokho basinika zona labo ababekhona kwasekuqaleni , bezibonela ngamehlo , beyizikhonzi zezwi ,

text: It seemed good to me also , having had perfect understanding of all things from the very first , to write unto thee in order , most excellent Theophilus ,
text2: kwasengathi kuhle nakimina , lokhu ngizihlolisisile zonke izinto , kusukela ekuqaleni , ngikulobele ngokulandelana , Theyofilu odumileyo ,

text: That thou mightest know the certainty of those things , wherein thou hast been instructed .
text2: ukuze wazi ukuqiniseka kwalezo zindaba ozifundisiweyo .

text: There was in the days of Herod , the king of Judaea , a certain priest named Zacharias , of the course of Abia : and his wife was of the daughters of Aaron , and her name was Elisabeth .
text2: Emihleni kaHerode inkosi yaseJudiya kwakukhona umpristi othile ogama lakhe nguZakariya , esigabeni sika - Abiya , nomkakhe engowamadodakazi ka - Aroni , igama lakhe ngu - Elisabethe .

text: And they were both righteous before God , walking in all the commandments and ordinances of the Lord blameless .
text2: Babelungile bobabili phambi kukaNkulunkulu behamba ngayo yonke imiyalo nezimiso zeNkosi , bengasoleki .

text: And they had no child , because that Elisabeth was barren , and they both were now well stricken in years .
text2: Kepha babengenamntwana , ngokuba u - Elisabethe wayeyinyumba ; bobabili base bekhulile .

text: And it came to pass , that while he executed the priest ' s office before God in the order of his course ,
text2: Kwathi - ke esayenza inkonzo yobupristi phambi kukaNkulunkulu njengokuhlelwa kwesikhathi sesigaba sakubo ,

text: According to the custom of the priest ' s office , his lot was to burn incense when he went into the temple of the Lord .
text2: ngokomthetho wobupristi kwaba nguye owabelwa ukungena ethempelini leNkosi , azoshisa impepho .

text: And the whole multitude of the people were praying without at the time of incense .
text2: Isixuku sonke sabantu sasikhuleka ngaphandle ngesikhathi sempepho .

text: And there appeared unto him an angel of the Lord standing on the right side of the altar of incense .
text2: Kwabonakala kuye ingelosi yeNkosi imi ngakwesokunene se - altare lempepho .

text: And when Zacharias saw him , he was troubled , and fear fell upon him .
text2: UZakariya eyibona wethuka , wehlelwa luvalo .

text: But the angel said unto him , Fear not , Zacharias : for thy prayer is heard ; and thy wife Elisabeth shall bear thee a son , and thou shalt call his name John .
text2: Kepha ingelosi yathi kuye : “ Ungesabi , Zakariya , ngokuba isicelo sakho sizwakele ; umkakho u - Elisabethe uzakukuzalela indodana , uyiqambe igama lokuthi uJohane .

text: And thou shalt have joy and gladness ; and many shall rejoice at his birth .
text2: Uzakuba nokujabula nokuthokoza wena ; nabaningi bazakujabula ngokuzalwa kwakhe .

text: For he shall be great in the sight of the Lord , and shall drink neither wine nor strong drink ; and he shall be filled with the Holy Ghost , even from his mother ' s womb .
text2: Ngokuba uzakuba mkhulu emehlweni eNkosi ; kasoze waphuza iwayini nophuzo oludakisayo ; uzakugcwaliswa nguMoya oNgcwele esesesiswini sikanina .

text: And many of the children of Israel shall he turn to the Lord their God .
text2: Abaningi kubantwana bakwa - Israyeli uyakubaphendulela eNkosini uNkulunkulu wabo .

text: And he shall go before him in the spirit and power of Elias , to turn the hearts of the fathers to the children , and the disobedient to the wisdom of the just ; to make ready a people prepared for the Lord .
text2: Uyakuhamba ngaphambi kwayo emoyeni nasemandleni ka - Eliya ukuphendulela izinhliziyo zawoyise kubantwana nabangalaleliyo ekuqondeni kwabalungileyo , ukulungisela iNkosi isizwe esilungiselweyo . ”

text: And Zacharias said unto the angel , Whereby shall I know this ? for I am an old man , and my wife well stricken in years .
text2: UZakariya wathi engelosini : “ Ngiyakukwazi ngani lokhu na ? Ingani sengiyindoda endala mina , nomkami uqhubekile ezinsukwini zakhe . ”

text: And the angel answering said unto him , I am Gabriel , that stand in the presence of God ; and am sent to speak unto thee , and to shew thee these glad tidings .
text2: Ingelosi yaphendula , yathi kuye : “ NginguGabriyeli mina , omiyo phambi kukaNkulunkulu ; ngithunyiwe ukuba ngikhulume kuwe , ngikubikele lezi zindaba ezinhle .

text: And , behold , thou shalt be dumb , and not able to speak , until the day that these things shall be performed , because thou believest not my words , which shall be fulfilled in their season .
text2: Bheka - ke , uzakuba yisimungulu , ungakwazi ukukhuluma kuze kube lusuku okwenzeka ngalo lokhu , ngokuba ungakholwanga ngamazwi ami azakugcwaliseka ngesikhathi sawo . ”

text: And the people waited for Zacharias , and marvelled that he tarried so long in the temple .
text2: Abantu bemlindele uZakariya bamangala ngokulibala kwakhe ethempelini .

text: And when he came out , he could not speak unto them : and they perceived that he had seen a vision in the temple : for he beckoned unto them , and remained speechless .
text2: Kuthe esephuma , wahluleka ukukhuluma kubo ; bazi ukuthi ubone umbono ethempelini ; wayelokhu ebaqhweba , wahlala eyisimungulu .

text: And it came to pass , that , as soon as the days of his ministration were accomplished , he departed to his own house .
text2: Kwathi seziphelile izinsuku zokukhonza kwakhe , wamuka waya ekhaya .

text: And after those days his wife Elisabeth conceived , and hid herself five months , saying ,
text2: Kepha emva kwalezo zinsuku u - Elisabethe umkakhe wakhulelwa , wazifihla izinyanga eziyisihlanu , wathi :

text: Thus hath the Lord dealt with me in the days wherein he looked on me , to take away my reproach among men .
text2: “ Yenze njalo iNkosi kimi emihleni eyangibheka ngayo ukususa ihlazo lami phakathi kwabantu . ”

text: And in the sixth month the angel Gabriel was sent from God unto a city of Galilee , named Nazareth ,
text2: Ngenyanga yesithupha ingelosi uGabriyeli yathunywa nguNkulunkulu emzini waseGalile ogama lawo yiNazaretha ,

text: To a virgin espoused to a man whose name was Joseph , of the house of David ; and the virgin ' s name was Mary .
text2: entombini eyayimiselwe indoda ebizo layo nguJosefa wendlu kaDavide ; ibizo lentombi nguMariya .

text: And the angel came in unto her , and said , Hail , thou that art highly favoured , the Lord is with thee : blessed art thou among women .
text2: Yangena ingelosi kuye , yathi : “ E wena ophiwe umusa ! INkosi inawe ; ubusisiwe esifazaneni . ”

text: And when she saw him , she was troubled at his saying , and cast in her mind what manner of salutation this should be .
text2: Kepha yena wethuka ngezwi layo ezindla ngokuthi kungaba ngukubingelela kuni lokhu .

text: And the angel said unto her , Fear not , Mary : for thou hast found favour with God .
text2: Ingelosi yathi kuye : “ Ungesabi , Mariya , ngokuba ufumene umusa kuNkulunkulu .

text: And , behold , thou shalt conceive in thy womb , and bring forth a son , and shalt call his name JESUS .
text2: Bheka , uzakukhulelwa , uzale indodana , uyiqambe igama lokuthi uJesu .

text: He shall be great , and shall be called the Son of the Highest : and the Lord God shall give unto him the throne of his father David :
text2: Yena uyakuba mkhulu , athiwe iNdodana yoPhezukonke ; iNkosi uNkulunkulu iyakumnika isihlalo sobukhosi sikayise uDavide ;

text: And he shall reign over the house of Jacob for ever ; and of his kingdom there shall be no end .
text2: uyakuba yinkosi yendlu kaJakobe kuze kube phakade , nombuso wakhe awuyikuba nakuphela . ”

text: Then said Mary unto the angel , How shall this be , seeing I know not a man ?
text2: UMariya wathi engelosini : “ Lokhu kuyakwenzeka kanjani , njengokuba ngingayazi indoda na ? ”

text: And the angel answered and said unto her , The Holy Ghost shall come upon thee , and the power of the Highest shall overshadow thee : therefore also that holy thing which shall be born of thee shall be called the Son of God .
text2: Ingelosi yaphendula , yathi kuye : “ UMoya oNgcwele uzakuza phezu kwakho , amandla oPhezukonke akusibekele ; ngakho - ke okungcwele okuzozalwa kuzakuthiwa iNdodana kaNkulunkulu .

text: And , behold , thy cousin Elisabeth , she hath also conceived a son in her old age : and this is the sixth month with her , who was called barren .
text2: Bheka , u - Elisabethe isihlobo sakho naye ukhulelwe indodana esemdala ; lena ngeyesithupha yakhe obethiwa inyumba .

text: For with God nothing shall be impossible .
text2: Ngokuba akukho lutho olungenzeke kuNkulunkulu . ”

text: And Mary said , Behold the handmaid of the Lord ; be it unto me according to thy word . And the angel departed from her .
text2: UMariya wathi : “ Bheka , ngiyincekukazi yeNkosi ; akube kimi njengezwi lakho . ” Ingelosi yamuka kuye .

text: And Mary arose in those days , and went into the hill country with haste , into a city of Juda ;
text2: Ngalezo zinsuku uMariya wasuka waya ngokushesha kwelezintaba emzini wakwaJuda .

text: And entered into the house of Zacharias , and saluted Elisabeth .
text2: Wangena endlini kaZakariya , wambingelela u - Elisabethe .

text: And it came to pass , that , when Elisabeth heard the salutation of Mary , the babe leaped in her womb ; and Elisabeth was filled with the Holy Ghost :
text2: Kwathi ukuba u - Elisabethe ezwe ukubingelela kukaMariya , umntwana waxhuma esiswini sakhe ; u - Elisabethe wagcwala uMoya oNgcwele ,

text: And she spake out with a loud voice , and said , Blessed art thou among women , and blessed is the fruit of thy womb .
text2: wamemeza ngezwi elikhulu , wathi : “ Ubusisiwe wena esifazaneni ! Sibusisiwe nesithelo sesisu sakho !

text: And whence is this to me , that the mother of my Lord should come to me ?
text2: Ngehlelwe kanjani yilokhu ukuba unina weNkosi yami ahambele kimi na ?

text: For , lo , as soon as the voice of thy salutation sounded in mine ears , the babe leaped in my womb for joy .
text2: Ngokuba bheka , kuthe izwi lokubingelela kwakho lifika ezindlebeni zami , umntwana waxhuma esiswini sami ngokujabula .

text: And blessed is she that believed : for there shall be a performance of those things which were told her from the Lord .
text2: Ubusisiwe owakholwayo , ngokuba kuzakuba khona ukufezeka kwalokho akutshelwa , kuvela eNkosini . ”

text: And Mary said , My soul doth magnify the Lord ,
text2: Wayesethi uMariya : “ Umphefumulo wami uyayitusa Nkosi ,

text: And my spirit hath rejoiced in God my Saviour .
text2: nomoya wami uyathokoza kuNkulunkulu , uMsindisi wami ,

text: For he hath regarded the low estate of his handmaiden : for , behold , from henceforth all generations shall call me blessed .
text2: ngokuba ubhekile ubuphansi bencekukazi yakhe . Bheka , kusukela manje izizukulwane zonke ziyakuthi ngibusisiwe .

text: For he that is mighty hath done to me great things ; and holy is his name .
text2: Ngokuba uSomandla ungenzele izinto ezinkulu : igama lakhe lingcwele .

text: And his mercy is on them that fear him from generation to generation .
text2: Isihawu sakhe sikuzo izizukulwane ngezizukulwane kubo abamesabayo .

text: He hath shewed strength with his arm ; he hath scattered the proud in the imagination of their hearts .
text2: Wenzile amandla ngengalo yakhe ; uchithile abazidlayo ekuzidleni kwenhliziyo yabo .

text: He hath put down the mighty from their seats , and exalted them of low degree .
text2: Uwisile amakhosi ezihlalweni , uphakamisile abantukazana .

text: He hath filled the hungry with good things ; and the rich he hath sent empty away .
text2: Abalambileyo ubasuthisile ngezinto ezinhle , abacebileyo ubamukise ze .

text: He hath holpen his servant Israel , in remembrance of his mercy ;
text2: Uyisizile inceku yakhe u - Israyeli , ukuze akhumbule isihawu ,

text: As he spake to our fathers , to Abraham , and to his seed for ever .
text2: njengalokho akusho kokhokho bethu ku - Abrahama nenzalo yakhe kuze kube phakade . ”

text: And Mary abode with her about three months , and returned to her own house .
text2: UMariya wahlala naye kungathi izinyanga ezintathu , wabuyela ekhaya .

text: Now Elisabeth ' s full time came that she should be delivered ; and she brought forth a son .
text2: Saphelela - ke isikhathi sika - Elisabethe sokuba abelethe ; wazala indodana .

text: And her neighbours and her cousins heard how the Lord had shewed great mercy upon her ; and they rejoiced with her .
text2: Abakhelene naye nezihlobo zakhe bezwa ukuthi iNkosi yenze isihawu sayo saba sikhulu kuye , bathokoza naye .

text: And it came to pass , that on the eighth day they came to circumcise the child ; and they called him Zacharias , after the name of his father .
text2: Kwathi ngosuku lwesishiyagalombili beza ukusoka umntwana , bamqamba ngegama likayise uZakariya .

text: And his mother answered and said , Not so ; but he shall be called John .
text2: Unina wayesephendula ethi : “ Qhabo , uzakuthiwa uJohane . ”

text: And they said unto her , There is none of thy kindred that is called by this name .
text2: Bathi kuye : “ Akakho noyedwa emndenini wakini obizwa ngalelo gama . ”

text: And they made signs to his father , how he would have him called .
text2: Bamqhweba uyise ukuthi ufuna ukumqamba ngaliphi .

text: And he asked for a writing table , and wrote , saying , His name is John . And they marvelled all .
text2: Wabiza isileti , waloba ukuthi . “ NguJohane igama lakhe . ” Bamangala bonke .

text: And his mouth was opened immediately , and his tongue loosed , and he spake , and praised God .
text2: Kwase kuvuleka umlomo wakhe khona lapho nolimi lwakhe , wakhuluma embonga uNkulunkulu .

text: And fear came on all that dwelt round about them : and all these sayings were noised abroad throughout all the hill country of Judaea .
text2: Bonke abakhelene nabo behlelwa ngukwesaba , bakhuluma ngazo zonke lezo zindaba kulo lonke lezintaba laseJudiya ,

text: And all they that heard them laid them up in their hearts , saying , What manner of child shall this be ! And the hand of the Lord was with him .
text2: nabo bonke abazizwayo bazigcina ezinhliziyweni zabo , bethi : “ Kodwa lo mntwana uyakuba yini na ? ” Isandla seNkosi sasinaye .

text: And his father Zacharias was filled with the Holy Ghost , and prophesied , saying ,
text2: UZakariya uyise wagcwala uMoya oNgcwele , waprofetha wathi :

text: Blessed be the Lord God of Israel ; for he hath visited and redeemed his people ,
text2: “ Mayibongwe iNkosi , uNkulunkulu ka - Israyeli , ngokuba ibahambele abantu bayo , yabenzela inkululeko .

text: And hath raised up an horn of salvation for us in the house of his servant David ;
text2: Yasivusela uphondo lwensindiso endlini kaDavide inceku yayo ,

text: As he spake by the mouth of his holy prophets , which have been since the world began :
text2: njengalokho yakhuluma ngomlomo wabaprofethi bayo abangcwele basendulo ,

text: That we should be saved from our enemies , and from the hand of all that hate us ;
text2: insindiso ezitheni zethu nasesandleni sabo bonke abasizondayo ,

text: To perform the mercy promised to our fathers , and to remember his holy covenant ;
text2: ukwenzela okhokho bethu isihawu nokukhumbula isivumelwano sayo esingcwele ,

text: The oath which he sware to our father Abraham ,
text2: isifungo eyasifunga kubaba u - Abrahama ,

text: That he would grant unto us , that we being delivered out of the hand of our enemies might serve him without fear ,
text2: ukusinika ukuba sithi sikhululiwe esandleni sezitha zethu , siyikhonze singenakwesaba

text: In holiness and righteousness before him , all the days of our life .
text2: ngobungcwele nangokulunga phambi kwayo zonke izinsuku zethu .

text: And thou , child , shalt be called the prophet of the Highest : for thou shalt go before the face of the Lord to prepare his ways ;
text2: Nawe - ke mntwana , uyakuthiwa umprofethi woPhezukonke , ngokuba uyakuhamba phambi kweNkosi ukulungisa izindlela zayo

text: To give knowledge of salvation unto his people by the remission of their sins ,
text2: ukunika abantu bayo ukuyazi insindiso ngokuthethelelwa kwezono zabo ,

text: Through the tender mercy of our God ; whereby the dayspring from on high hath visited us ,
text2: ngemisesane yesihawu sikaNkulunkulu wethu esizakuhanjelwa ngayo ngukusa kwaphezulu ,

text: To give light to them that sit in darkness and in the shadow of death , to guide our feet into the way of peace .
text2: ukubakhanyisela abahlezi ebumnyameni nasethunzini lokufa nokuqondisa izinyawo zethu endleleni yokuthula . ”

text: And the child grew , and waxed strong in spirit , and was in the deserts till the day of his shewing unto Israel .
text2: Wakhula - ke umntwana , waba namandla emoyeni ; wahlala ehlane kwaze kwaba lusuku lokubonakaliswa kwakhe ku - Israyeli .

text: And it came to pass in those days , that there went out a decree from Caesar Augustus , that all the world should be taxed .
text2: Kwathi ngalezo zinsuku kwaphuma isimemezelo kuKesari Awugustu sokuba kubalwe izwe lonke .

text: ( And this taxing was first made when Cyrenius was governor of Syria . )
text2: Lokhu kubalwa kokuqala kwenziwa uKhureniyu engumbusi waseSiriya .

text: And all went to be taxed , every one into his own city .
text2: Bonke baya kubalwa , yilowo nalowo emzini wakubo .

text: And Joseph also went up from Galilee , out of the city of Nazareth , into Judaea , unto the city of David , which is called Bethlehem ; ( because he was of the house and lineage of David : )
text2: Naye uJosefa wakhuphuka ephuma eGalile emzini waseNazaretha , waya eJudiya emzini kaDavide othiwa iBetlehema , ngokuba wayengowendlu nozalo lukaDavide ,

text: To be taxed with Mary his espoused wife , being great with child .
text2: ukuyobalwa kanye noMariya owayemmiselwe ukuba abe ngumkakhe , ekhulelwe .

text: And so it was , that , while they were there , the days were accomplished that she should be delivered .
text2: Kwathi - ke beselapho , zaphelela izinsuku zokuba abelethe .

text: And she brought forth her firstborn son , and wrapped him in swaddling clothes , and laid him in a manger ; because there was no room for them in the inn .
text2: Wazibula ngendodana , wayembesa , wayilalisa emkhombeni , ngokuba bantula indawo endlini yezihambi .

text: And there were in the same country shepherds abiding in the field , keeping watch over their flock by night .
text2: Kwakukhona abelusi kulelo zwe ababehlezi endle , belinda umhlambi wabo ebusuku .

text: And , lo , the angel of the Lord came upon them , and the glory of the Lord shone round about them : and they were sore afraid .
text2: Ingelosi yeNkosi yema phambi kwabo , inkazimulo yeNkosi yabakhanyisa nxazonke ; besaba ngokwesaba okukhulu .

text: And the angel said unto them , Fear not : for , behold , I bring you good tidings of great joy , which shall be to all people .
text2: Ingelosi yathi kubo : “ Ningesabi ; ngokuba bhekani , nginibikela izindaba ezinhle zokuthokoza okukhulu okuzakuba kubantu bonke ,

text: For unto you is born this day in the city of David a Saviour , which is Christ the Lord .
text2: ukuthi nizalelwe namuhla uMsindisi onguKristu iNkosi emzini kaDavide .

text: And this shall be a sign unto you ; Ye shall find the babe wrapped in swaddling clothes , lying in a manger .
text2: Nalokhu kuyisiboniso kini : niyakufumana umntwana embesiwe , elele emkhombeni . ”

text: And suddenly there was with the angel a multitude of the heavenly host praising God , and saying ,
text2: Masinyane kwaba khona kanye nengelosi uquqaba lwebandla lasezulwini , lumdumisa uNkulunkulu , luthi :

text: Glory to God in the highest , and on earth peace , good will toward men .
text2: “ Udumo kuNkulunkulu kweliphezulu , nokuthula emhlabeni kubantu abathokozelwa nguye . ”

text: And it came to pass , as the angels were gone away from them into heaven , the shepherds said one to another , Let us now go even unto Bethlehem , and see this thing which is come to pass , which the Lord hath made known unto us .
text2: Kwathi ukuba zimuke kubo izingelosi ziya ezulwini , abelusi bakhuluma bodwa , bathi : “ Asihambe manje , size sifike eBetlehema , sibone leyo nto eyenzekileyo iNkosi esazisile yona . ”

text: And they came with haste , and found Mary , and Joseph , and the babe lying in a manger .
text2: Bephuthuma bafika , bafumanisa oMariya noJosefa , nomntwana olele emkhombeni .

text: And when they had seen it , they made known abroad the saying which was told them concerning this child .
text2: Sebebonile balanda ngalelo zwi ababetshelwe lona ngalowo mntwana .

text: And all they that heard it wondered at those things which were told them by the shepherds .
text2: Bonke abezwayo bamangala ngokukhulunywe kubo ngabelusi .

text: But Mary kept all these things , and pondered them in her heart .
text2: Kepha uMariya wagcina onke lawo mazwi ezindla ngawo enhliziyweni yakhe .

text: And the shepherds returned , glorifying and praising God for all the things that they had heard and seen , as it was told unto them .
text2: Babuya - ke abelusi bemdumisa , bembonga uNkulunkulu ngakho konke abakuzwileyo nabakubonileyo , njengalokho kwakukhulunyiwe kubo .

text: And when eight days were accomplished for the circumcising of the child , his name was called JESUS , which was so named of the angel before he was conceived in the womb .
text2: Kwathi seziphelile izinsuku eziyisishiyagalombili zokuba umntwana asokwe , igama lakhe lathiwa uJesu , elaliqanjiwe yingelosi , engakathatshathwa esiswini .

text: And when the days of her purification according to the law of Moses were accomplished , they brought him to Jerusalem , to present him to the Lord ;
text2: Kwathi ukuba kuphelele izinsuku zokuhlanjululwa kwabo ngokomthetho kaMose , benyukela naye eJerusalema ukuba bammise phambi kweNkosi

text: ( As it is written in the law of the Lord , Every male that openeth the womb shall be called holy to the Lord ; )
text2: njengokulotshiwe emthethweni weNkosi ukuthi : “ Konke okwesilisa okuyizibulo kuyakuthiwa okwahlukaniselwe iNkosi ” ,

text: And to offer a sacrifice according to that which is said in the law of the Lord , A pair of turtledoves , or two young pigeons .
text2: banikele ngomhlatshelo njengokushiwo emthethweni weNkosi : “ Amahobhe amabili noma amaphuphu amabili amajuba . ”

text: And , behold , there was a man in Jerusalem , whose name was Simeon ; and the same man was just and devout , waiting for the consolation of Israel : and the Holy Ghost was upon him .
text2: Bheka , kwakukhona umuntu eJerusalema ogama lakhe linguSimeyoni ; lo muntu wayelungile , emesaba uNkulunkulu , ebhekile induduzo ka - Israyeli ; noMoya oNgcwele wayephezu kwakhe .

text: And it was revealed unto him by the Holy Ghost , that he should not see death , before he had seen the Lord ' s Christ .
text2: Kwakubonakalisiwe kuye ngoMoya oNgcwele ukuthi akayikubona ukufa engakamboni uKristu weNkosi .

text: And he came by the Spirit into the temple : and when the parents brought in the child Jesus , to do for him after the custom of the law ,
text2: Wafika ngoMoya ethempelini . Kwathi ukuba abazali balethe umntwana uJesu ethempelini ukuba benze kuye njengesiko lomthetho ,

text: Then took he him up in his arms , and blessed God , and said ,
text2: wamamukela ngokumgona , wambonga uNkulunkulu , wathi :

text: Lord , now lettest thou thy servant depart in peace , according to thy word :
text2: “ Sale usumukisa ngokuthula inceku yakho , Somandla , njengezwi lakho ,

text: For mine eyes have seen thy salvation ,
text2: ngokuba amehlo ami abonile insindiso yakho

text: Which thou hast prepared before the face of all people ;
text2: oyilungisele ebusweni babantu bonke ,

text: A light to lighten the Gentiles , and the glory of thy people Israel .
text2: ukukhanya kokwambulela abezizwe nenkazimulo yesizwe sakho u - Israyeli . ”

text: And Joseph and his mother marvelled at those things which were spoken of him .
text2: Uyise nonina bamangala ngalokho okukhulunywa ngaye .

text: And Simeon blessed them , and said unto Mary his mother , Behold , this child is set for the fall and rising again of many in Israel ; and for a sign which shall be spoken against ;
text2: USimeyoni wababusisa , wathi kuMariya unina : “ Bheka , lo umiselwe ukuwa nokuvuka kwabaningi ku - Israyeli , nesibonakaliso esiphikwayo —

text: ( Yea , a sword shall pierce through thy own soul also , ) that the thoughts of many hearts may be revealed .
text2: yebo , inkemba iyakudabula nowakho umphefumulo — ukuba kwambulwe izizindlo zezinhliziyo eziningi . ”

text: And there was one Anna , a prophetess , the daughter of Phanuel , of the tribe of Aser : she was of a great age , and had lived with an husband seven years from her virginity ;
text2: Kwakukhona nomprofethikazi , u - Ana , indodakazi kaFanuweli , owesizwe sika - Aseri ; wayesekhulile kakhulu , ebehlalile nendoda iminyaka eyisikhombisa emva kobuntombi bakhe ,

text: And she was a widow of about fourscore and four years , which departed not from the temple , but served God with fastings and prayers night and day .
text2: engumfelokazi waze waba neminyaka engamashumi ayisishiyagalombili nane , engasuki ethempelini , ekhonza ngokuzila nangokukhuleka ubusuku nemini .

text: And she coming in that instant gave thanks likewise unto the Lord , and spake of him to all them that looked for redemption in Jerusalem .
text2: Naye - ke efika ngasona leso sikhathi wamtusa uNkulunkulu , wakhuluma ngaye kubo bonke ababebheke ukukhululwa kweJerusalema .

text: And when they had performed all things according to the law of the Lord , they returned into Galilee , to their own city Nazareth .
text2: Kwathi sebefeze konke okungokomthetho weNkosi babuyela eGalile emzini wakubo iNazaretha .

text: And the child grew , and waxed strong in spirit , filled with wisdom : and the grace of God was upon him .
text2: Wakhula umntwana , waba namandla , wagcwala ukuhlakanipha ; nomusa kaNkulunkulu wawuphezu kwakhe .

text: Now his parents went to Jerusalem every year at the feast of the passover .
text2: Abazali bakhe baya eJerusalema iminyaka yonke ngomkhosi wePhasika .

text: And when he was twelve years old , they went up to Jerusalem after the custom of the feast .
text2: Eseneminyaka eyishumi nambili , bakhuphuka njengokomthetho womkhosi .

text: And when they had fulfilled the days , as they returned , the child Jesus tarried behind in Jerusalem ; and Joseph and his mother knew not of it .
text2: Sebeziqedile izinsuku , ekubuyeni kwabo , umntwana uJesu wasala eJerusalema , abazali bakhe bengazi .

text: But they , supposing him to have been in the company , went a day ' s journey ; and they sought him among their kinsfolk and acquaintance .
text2: Bethi - ke bona uphakathi kwabahambisana nabo bahamba ibanga losuku , bamfuna phakathi kwezihlobo nabazana nabo .

text: And when they found him not , they turned back again to Jerusalem , seeking him .
text2: Bengamtholi babuyela eJerusalema , bemfuna .

text: And it came to pass , that after three days they found him in the temple , sitting in the midst of the doctors , both hearing them , and asking them questions .
text2: Kwathi emva kwezinsuku ezintathu bamfumana ethempelini ehlezi phakathi kwabafundisi , ebezwa , ebabuza .

text: And all that heard him were astonished at his understanding and answers .
text2: Bonke ababemuzwa bamangala ngokuqonda nangokuphendula kwakhe .

text: And when they saw him , they were amazed : and his mother said unto him , Son , why hast thou thus dealt with us ? behold , thy father and I have sought thee sorrowing .
text2: Bathi bembona , bamangala ; unina wathi kuye : “ Mntanami , usenzeleni okunje na ? Bheka , uyihlo nami besikufuna silusizi . ”

text: And he said unto them , How is it that ye sought me ? wist ye not that I must be about my Father ' s business ?
text2: Wathi kubo : “ Kukanjani , beningifunelani na ? Beningazi yini ukuthi kumelwe ukuba ngibe kokukaBaba na ? ”

text: And they understood not the saying which he spake unto them .
text2: Abaliqondanga lelo zwi abelikhuluma kubo .

text: And he went down with them , and came to Nazareth , and was subject unto them : but his mother kept all these sayings in her heart .
text2: Wehla nabo , wafika eNazaretha , wabathobela . Kepha unina wawagcina onke lawa mazwi enhliziyweni yakhe .

text: And Jesus increased in wisdom and stature , and in favour with God and man .
text2: UJesu waqhubeka ekuhlakanipheni , nasekukhuleni , nasemseni kuNkulunkulu nakubantu .

text: Now in the fifteenth year of the reign of Tiberius Caesar , Pontius Pilate being governor of Judaea , and Herod being tetrarch of Galilee , and his brother Philip tetrarch of Ituraea and of the region of Trachonitis , and Lysanias the tetrarch of Abilene ,
text2: Kwathi ngomnyaka weshumi nanhlanu wokubusa kukaTiberiyu Kesari , uPontiyu Pilatu engumbusi waseJudiya , uHerode engumtetrarki waseGalile , uFiliphu umfowabo engumtetrarki wezwe lase - Itureya nelaseTrakhoniti , uLisaniya engumtetrarki wase - Abilene ,

text: Annas and Caiaphas being the high priests , the word of God came unto John the son of Zacharias in the wilderness .
text2: u - Anase engumpristi omkhulu noKayafase , kwafika izwi likaNkulunkulu kuJohane indodana kaZakariya ehlane .

text: And he came into all the country about Jordan , preaching the baptism of repentance for the remission of sins ;
text2: Weza ezweni lonke laseJordani eshumayela umbhapathizo wokuphenduka , kube ngukuthethelelwa kwezono ,

text: As it is written in the book of the words of Esaias the prophet , saying , The voice of one crying in the wilderness , Prepare ye the way of the Lord , make his paths straight .
text2: njengokuba kulotshiwe encwadini yamazwi ka - Isaya umprofethi ukuthi : “ Izwi lomemezayo ehlane , lithi : ‘ Lungisani indlela yeNkosi , nenze imikhondo yayo iqonde .

text: Every valley shall be filled , and every mountain and hill shall be brought low ; and the crooked shall be made straight , and the rough ways shall be made smooth ;
text2: Izigodi zonke ziyakugqitshwa , zonke izintaba namagquma kuyakwehliswa ; kuqonde izinsongansonga , nemigoxigoxi ibe yizindlela ezilelezekile ;

text: And all flesh shall see the salvation of God .
text2: inyama yonke izakubona insindiso kaNkulunkulu . ’ ”

text: Then said he to the multitude that came forth to be baptized of him , O generation of vipers , who hath warned you to flee from the wrath to come ?
text2: Ngakho - ke wathi ezixukwini ezaziphumela ukubhapathizwa nguye : “ Nzalo yezinyoka , ubani onibonise ukubalekela intukuthelo ezayo na ?

text: Bring forth therefore fruits worthy of repentance , and begin not to say within yourselves , We have Abraham to our father : for I say unto you , That God is able of these stones to raise up children unto Abraham .
text2: Ngakho vezani izithelo ezifanele ukuphenduka , ningaqali ukuthi phakathi kini : ‘ Sinobaba u - Abrahama ; ’ ngokuba ngithi kini : UNkulunkulu unamandla okumvusela u - Abrahama abantwana kulawa matshe .

text: And now also the axe is laid unto the root of the trees : every tree therefore which bringeth not forth good fruit is hewn down , and cast into the fire .
text2: Namanje izembe selibekiwe empandeni yemithi ; ngakho yonke imithi engatheli isithelo esihle iyanqunywa , iphonswe emlilweni . ”

text: And the people asked him , saying , What shall we do then ?
text2: Izixuku zambuza zathi : “ Pho , sizakwenzani na ? ”

text: He answereth and saith unto them , He that hath two coats , let him impart to him that hath none ; and he that hath meat , let him do likewise .
text2: Waphendula , wathi kubo : “ Onezingubo ezimbili akamuphe ongenayo ; naye onokudla enze njalo . ”

text: Then came also publicans to be baptized , and said unto him , Master , what shall we do ?
text2: Kwafika nabathelisi ukuba babhapathizwe , bathi kuye : “ Mfundisi , sizakwenzani na ? ”

text: And he said unto them , Exact no more than that which is appointed you .
text2: Wathi kubo : “ Ningabizi lutho ngaphezu kwenikumiselweyo . ”

text: And the soldiers likewise demanded of him , saying , And what shall we do ? And he said unto them , Do violence to no man , neither accuse any falsely ; and be content with your wages .
text2: Namabutho ambuza athi : “ Thina - ke , sizakwenzani na ? ” Wathi kuwo : “ Ningamuki muntu lutho ngendluzula , ningamxabheleli ; yaneliswani yizinkokhelo zenu . ”

text: And as the people were in expectation , and all men mused in their hearts of John , whether he were the Christ , or not ;
text2: Abantu besabhekile , bezindla bonke ezinhliziyweni zabo ngoJohane ukuthi ingabe unguKristu yini ,

text: John answered , saying unto them all , I indeed baptize you with water ; but one mightier than I cometh , the latchet of whose shoes I am not worthy to unloose : he shall baptize you with the Holy Ghost and with fire :
text2: uJohane waphendula , wathi kubo bonke : “ Mina kambe nginibhapathiza ngamanzi , kepha uyeza onamandla kunami engingafanele ukuthukulula umchilo wezicathulo zakhe ; yena uzakunibhapathiza ngoMoya oNgcwele nangomlilo ;

text: Whose fan is in his hand , and he will throughly purge his floor , and will gather the wheat into his garner ; but the chaff he will burn with fire unquenchable .
text2: oqoma lakhe lokwela lisesandleni sakhe ukushanelisisa isibuya sakhe nokubuthela ukolweni enqolobaneni yakhe ; kepha amakhoba uzakuwashisa ngomlilo ongacimekiyo . ”

text: And many other things in his exhortation preached he unto the people .
text2: Nangokunye okuningi washumayela ivangeli kubantu , ebayala .

text: But Herod the tetrarch , being reproved by him for Herodias his brother Philip ' s wife , and for all the evils which Herod had done ,
text2: Kepha uHerode umtetrarki , esolwa nguye ngenxa kaHerodiya umkamfowabo nangenxa yakho konke okubi abekwenzile uHerode ,

text: Added yet this above all , that he shut up John in prison .
text2: wenezela nalokhu kokunye konke , wamvalela uJohane etilongweni .

text: Now when all the people were baptized , it came to pass , that Jesus also being baptized , and praying , the heaven was opened ,
text2: Kwathi bebhapathiziwe abantu bonke , naye uJesu esebhapathiziwe , ekhuleka , izulu lavuleka ,

text: And the Holy Ghost descended in a bodily shape like a dove upon him , and a voice came from heaven , which said , Thou art my beloved Son ; in thee I am well pleased .
text2: uMoya oNgcwele enesimo somzimba njengejuba wehlela phezu kwakhe ; kwavela izwi ezulwini , lithi : “ Wena uyiNdodana yami ethandekayo ; ngithokozile ngawe . ”

text: And Jesus himself began to be about thirty years of age , being ( as was supposed ) the son of Joseph , which was the son of Heli ,
text2: Yena uJesu , ukuqala kwakhe , wayeneminyaka engaba ngamashumi amathathu , eyindodana , njengokushiwoyo , kaJosefa ka - Eli

text: Which was the son of Matthat , which was the son of Levi , which was the son of Melchi , which was the son of Janna , which was the son of Joseph ,
text2: kaMathati kaLevi kaMeliki kaJanayi kaJosefa

text: Which was the son of Mattathias , which was the son of Amos , which was the son of Naum , which was the son of Esli , which was the son of Nagge ,
text2: kaMatathiya ka - Amose kaNahume ka - Eseli kaNagayi

text: Which was the son of Maath , which was the son of Mattathias , which was the son of Semei , which was the son of Joseph , which was the son of Juda ,
text2: kaMati , kaMatathiya kaSemeyini kaJosefa kaJuda

text: Which was the son of Joanna , which was the son of Rhesa , which was the son of Zorobabel , which was the son of Salathiel , which was the son of Neri ,
text2: kaJohanani kaResa kaZorobabeli kaSalatiyeli kaNeri

text: Which was the son of Melchi , which was the son of Addi , which was the son of Cosam , which was the son of Elmodam , which was the son of Er ,
text2: kaMeliki ka - Adi kaKosamu ka - Elimadamu ka - Eri

text: Which was the son of Jose , which was the son of Eliezer , which was the son of Jorim , which was the son of Matthat , which was the son of Levi ,
text2: kaJose ka - Eliyezeri kaJorimi kaMathati kaLevi

text: Which was the son of Simeon , which was the son of Juda , which was the son of Joseph , which was the son of Jonan , which was the son of Eliakim ,
text2: kaSimeyoni kaJuda kaJosefa kaJonamu ka - Eliyakimi

text: Which was the son of Melea , which was the son of Menan , which was the son of Mattatha , which was the son of Nathan , which was the son of David ,
text2: kaMeleya kaMena kaMathata kaNathamu kaDavide

text: Which was the son of Jesse , which was the son of Obed , which was the son of Booz , which was the son of Salmon , which was the son of Naasson ,
text2: kaJesayi ka - Obede kaBowasi kaSala kaNasoni

text: Which was the son of Aminadab , which was the son of Aram , which was the son of Esrom , which was the son of Phares , which was the son of Juda ,
text2: ka - Aminadaba ka - Adameyini ka - Arani ka - Esiromu kaFaresi kaJuda

text: Which was the son of Jacob , which was the son of Isaac , which was the son of Abraham , which was the son of Thara , which was the son of Nachor ,
text2: kaJakobe ka - Isaka ka - Abrabama kaThara kaNahori

text: Which was the son of Saruch , which was the son of Ragau , which was the son of Phalec , which was the son of Heber , which was the son of Sala ,
text2: kaSeruki kaRagawu kaFaleki ka - Ebere kaSala

text: Which was the son of Cainan , which was the son of Arphaxad , which was the son of Sem , which was the son of Noe , which was the son of Lamech ,
text2: kaKayinamu ka - Arfakisadi kaSemi kaNowa kaLameka

text: Which was the son of Mathusala , which was the son of Enoch , which was the son of Jared , which was the son of Maleleel , which was the son of Cainan ,
text2: kaMathusala ka - Enoke kaJarethi kaMaleleyeli kaKayinani

text: Which was the son of Enos , which was the son of Seth , which was the son of Adam , which was the son of God .
text2: ka - Enose kaSeti ka - Adamu kaNkulunkulu .

text: And Jesus being full of the Holy Ghost returned from Jordan , and was led by the Spirit into the wilderness ,
text2: UJesu egcwele uMoya oNgcwele wabuya eJordani , waholekela ngoMoya ehlane ,

text: Being forty days tempted of the devil . And in those days he did eat nothing : and when they were ended , he afterward hungered .
text2: elingwa nguSathane izinsuku ezingamashumi amane . Akadlanga lutho kulezo zinsuku ; seziphelile , walamba .

text: And the devil said unto him , If thou be the Son of God , command this stone that it be made bread .
text2: Wayesethi kuye uSathane : “ Uma uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu , yisho kuleli tshe ukuba libe yisinkwa . ”

text: And Jesus answered him , saying , It is written , That man shall not live by bread alone , but by every word of God .
text2: UJesu wamphendula wathi : “ Kulotshiwe ukuthi : ‘ Akusinkwa sodwa umuntu azakuphila ngaso . ’ ”

text: And the devil , taking him up into an high mountain , shewed unto him all the kingdoms of the world in a moment of time .
text2: Esemenyusela entabeni ende wambonisa imibuso yonke yezwe ngomzuzwanyana .

text: And the devil said unto him , All this power will I give thee , and the glory of them : for that is delivered unto me ; and to whomsoever I will I give it .
text2: USathane wathi kuye : “ Amandla onke lana ngokunika wena kanye nenkazimulo yawo , ngokuba inikwe mina , futhi ngiyinika noma ubani ngokuthanda kwami .

text: If thou therefore wilt worship me , all shall be thine .
text2: Ngakho - ke wena , uma ukhuleka phambi kwami , konke kuzakuba ngokwakho . ”

text: And Jesus answered and said unto him , Get thee behind me , Satan : for it is written , Thou shalt worship the Lord thy God , and him only shalt thou serve .
text2: UJesu waphendula , wathi kuye : “ Kulotshiwe ukuthi : ‘ Wokhuleka eNkosini uNkulunkulu wakho , umkhonze yena yedwa . ’ ”

text: And he brought him to Jerusalem , and set him on a pinnacle of the temple , and said unto him , If thou be the Son of God , cast thyself down from hence :
text2: Wayesemholela eJerusalema , wammisa esiqongweni sethempeli , wathi kuye : “ Uma uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu , ziphonse phansi lapha ,

text: For it is written , He shall give his angels charge over thee , to keep thee :
text2: ngokuba kulotshiwe ukuthi :

text: And in their hands they shall bear thee up , lest at any time thou dash thy foot against a stone .
text2: “ ‘ Uyakuyaleza izingelosi zakhe ngawe , zikulinde , ’ “ nokuthi : “ ‘ Ziyakukuthwala ngezandla , ungaze waqhuzuka etsheni ngonyawo lwakho . ’ ”

text: And Jesus answering said unto him , It is said , Thou shalt not tempt the Lord thy God .
text2: UJesu waphendula , wathi kuye : “ Kwathiwa : ‘ Ungayilingi iNkosi uNkulunkulu wakho . ’ ”

text: And when the devil had ended all the temptation , he departed from him for a season .
text2: USathane eseqede ukulinga konke wamuka kuye isikhathi .

text: And Jesus returned in the power of the Spirit into Galilee : and there went out a fame of him through all the region round about .
text2: UJesu wabuyela eGalile ngamandla kaMoya ; udumo lwakhe lwanda kulo lonke izwe langakhona .

text: And he taught in their synagogues , being glorified of all .
text2: Wafundisa emasinagogeni abo edunyiswa yibo bonke .

text: And he came to Nazareth , where he had been brought up : and , as his custom was , he went into the synagogue on the sabbath day , and stood up for to read .
text2: Wafika eNazaretha , lapho wayondliwa khona , wangena esinagogeni ngosuku lwesabatha njengokwenza kwakhe , wasukumela ukufunda .

text: And there was delivered unto him the book of the prophet Esaias . And when he had opened the book , he found the place where it was written ,
text2: Wanikwa incwadi ka - Isaya umprofethi , wayivula incwadi , wafumana indawo okulotshwe kuyo ukuthi :

text: The Spirit of the Lord is upon me , because he hath anointed me to preach the gospel to the poor ; he hath sent me to heal the brokenhearted , to preach deliverance to the captives , and recovering of sight to the blind , to set at liberty them that are bruised ,
text2: “ UMoya weNkosi uphezu kwami , ngokuba ingigcobile ukuba ngishumayele ivangeli kwabampofu , ingithumele ukumemezela ukukhululwa kwabathunjiweyo , nokubona kwabayizimpumputhe , nokuhlenga abacindezelweyo ,

text: To preach the acceptable year of the Lord .
text2: nokumemezela umnyaka omuhle weNkosi . ”

text: And he closed the book , and he gave it again to the minister , and sat down . And the eyes of all them that were in the synagogue were fastened on him .
text2: Wayigoqonga incwadi , wayinika isikhonzi , wahlala ; amehlo abo bonke ababesesinagogeni amgqolozela .

text: And he began to say unto them , This day is this scripture fulfilled in your ears .
text2: Waqala ukukhuluma kubo , ethi : “ Namhlanje ugcwalisekile lo mbhalo ezindlebeni zenu . ”

text: And all bare him witness , and wondered at the gracious words which proceeded out of his mouth . And they said , Is not this Joseph ' s son ?
text2: Bonke bamfakazela bemangala ngamazwi omusa aphuma emlonyeni wakhe , bathi : “ Lo akasiyo indodana kaJosefa na ? ”

text: And he said unto them , Ye will surely say unto me this proverb , Physician , heal thyself : whatsoever we have heard done in Capernaum , do also here in thy country .
text2: Wathi kubo : “ Nempela niyakusho kimi lesi saga sokuthi : ‘ Nyanga , zelaphe wena . ’ Lokho esikuzwile kwenziwa eKapernawume , kwenze nalapha ezweni lakini . ”

text: And he said , Verily I say unto you , No prophet is accepted in his own country .
text2: Wathi - ke : “ Ngiqinisile ngithi kini : Akukho mprofethi owamukelwa ezweni lakubo .

text: But I tell you of a truth , many widows were in Israel in the days of Elias , when the heaven was shut up three years and six months , when great famine was throughout all the land ;
text2: Kepha ngempela ngithi kini : Kwakukhona kwa - Israyeli abafelokazi abaningi emihleni ka - Eliya , lapho izulu lalivalekile iminyaka emithathu nezinyanga eziyisithupha , kwaba khona indlala enkulu ezweni lonke ;

text: But unto none of them was Elias sent , save unto Sarepta , a city of Sidon , unto a woman that was a widow .
text2: kepha u - Eliya kathunyelwanga nakoyedwa kubona , kuphela eSarepita laseSidoni kowesifazane ongumfelokazi .

text: And many lepers were in Israel in the time of Eliseus the prophet ; and none of them was cleansed , saving Naaman the Syrian .
text2: Kwakukhona futhi kwa - Israyeli abanochoko abaningi ngesikhathi sika - Elisha umprofethi ; kepha akuhlanjululwanga namunye kubo , kuphela uNayimani umSiriya . ”

text: And all they in the synagogue , when they heard these things , were filled with wrath ,
text2: Bonke ababesesinagogeni bagcwala ulaka bekuzwa lokho .

text: And rose up , and thrust him out of the city , and led him unto the brow of the hill whereon their city was built , that they might cast him down headlong .
text2: Basukuma , bamxosha emzini , bamqhubela ekwengameni kwentaba umuzi wabo owakhiwe phezu kwayo , ukuze bamkhalakathelisele phansi .

text: But he passing through the midst of them went his way ,
text2: Kepha yena edabula phakathi kwabo wamuka .

text: And came down to Capernaum , a city of Galilee , and taught them on the sabbath days .
text2: Wehlela eKapernawume umuzi waseGalile . Wayebafundisa ngosuku lwesabatha .

text: And they were astonished at his doctrine : for his word was with power .
text2: Bamangala ngokufundisa kwakhe , ngokuba izwi lakhe lalinamandla .

text: And in the synagogue there was a man , which had a spirit of an unclean devil , and cried out with a loud voice ,
text2: Kwakukhona esinagogeni umuntu onomoya wedemoni elingcolileyo , wamemeza ngezwi elikhulu , wathi :

text: Saying , Let us alone ; what have we to do with thee , thou Jesus of Nazareth ? art thou come to destroy us ? I know thee who thou art ; the Holy One of God .
text2: “ Hhiya ! Sinamsebenzi muni nawe Jesu waseNazaretha ? Uze ukusibhubhisa na ? Ngiyakwazi ukuba ungubani : ungoNgcwele kaNkulunkulu . ”

text: And Jesus rebuked him , saying , Hold thy peace , and come out of him . And when the devil had thrown him in the midst , he came out of him , and hurt him not .
text2: UJesu wamkhuza wathi : “ Thula , uphume kuye ! ” Idemoni lamphonsa phansi phakathi kwabo , laphuma kuye lingamlimazanga .

text: And they were all amazed , and spake among themselves , saying , What a word is this ! for with authority and power he commandeth the unclean spirits , and they come out .
text2: Behlelwa ngukwesaba bonke , bakhuluma bodwa , bathi : “ Yizwi lini leli lokuba ayale omoya abangcolileyo ngegunya nangamandla , baphume ? ”

text: And the fame of him went out into every place of the country round about .
text2: Kwanda udumo ngaye kuzo zonke izindawo zangakhona .

text: And he arose out of the synagogue , and entered into Simon ' s house . And Simon ' s wife ' s mother was taken with a great fever ; and they besought him for her .
text2: Wasuka esinagogeni , wangena endlini kaSimoni . Kepha umkhwekazi kaSimoni wayebanjwe ngumkhuhlane omkhulu ; bamnxusa ngaye .

text: And he stood over her , and rebuked the fever ; and it left her : and immediately she arose and ministered unto them .
text2: Wamengama , wakhuza umkhuhlane ; wona wamyeka ; wasuka masinyane , wabakhonza .

text: Now when the sun was setting , all they that had any sick with divers diseases brought them unto him ; and he laid his hands on every one of them , and healed them .
text2: Ukushona kwelanga bonke ababe nabagulayo izifo ngezifo babaletha kuye ; ebeka izandla phezu kwabo ngabanye wabaphulukisa .

text: And devils also came out of many , crying out , and saying , Thou art Christ the Son of God . And he rebuking them suffered them not to speak : for they knew that he was Christ .
text2: Kwaphuma namademoni kwabaningi ememeza ethi : “ Wena uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu . ” Kepha wawakhuza , kawavumelanga ukuba akhulume , ngokuba ayemazi ukuthi unguKristu .

text: And when it was day , he departed and went into a desert place : and the people sought him , and came unto him , and stayed him , that he should not depart from them .
text2: Sekusile , waphuma waya endaweni eyihlane ; izixuku zamfuna , zaze zafika kuye impela , zambamba ukuba angamuki kuzo .

text: And he said unto them , I must preach the kingdom of God to other cities also : for therefore am I sent .
text2: Kepha wathi kuzo : “ Nakweminye imizi ngimelwe ukushumayela ivangeli lombuso kaNkulunkulu , ngokuba ngithunyelwe lokho . ”

text: And he preached in the synagogues of Galilee .
text2: Washumayela emasinagogeni aseGalile .

text: And it came to pass , that , as the people pressed upon him to hear the word of God , he stood by the lake of Gennesaret ,
text2: Kwathi isixuku simbunganyela ukuba sizwe izwi likaNkulunkulu , wayemi ngaselwandle lwaseGenesaretha ,

text: And saw two ships standing by the lake : but the fishermen were gone out of them , and were washing their nets .
text2: wabona imikhumbi emibili imi ngaselwandle ; abadobi babephumile kuyo behlanza amanetha .

text: And he entered into one of the ships , which was Simon ' s , and prayed him that he would thrust out a little from the land . And he sat down , and taught the people out of the ship .
text2: Esengene komunye wemikhumbi ongokaSimoni wamcela ukuba asuke kancane emhlabathini . Wahlala phansi , wabafundisa abantu esemkhunjini .

text: Now when he had left speaking , he said unto Simon , Launch out into the deep , and let down your nets for a draught .
text2: Kuthe esegcinile ukukhuluma , wathi kuSimoni : “ Qhubekela ekujuleni , nehlise amanetha enu , nibambe . ”

text: And Simon answering said unto him , Master , we have toiled all the night , and have taken nothing : nevertheless at thy word I will let down the net .
text2: USimoni waphendula wathi : “ Nkosi , sishikile ubusuku bonke , asibambanga lutho ; kepha ngezwi lakho ngiyakuwehlisa amanetha . ”

text: And when they had this done , they inclosed a great multitude of fishes : and their net brake .
text2: Sebekwenzile lokho babamba izinhlanzi eziningi kakhulu , aze agqabuka amanetha abo .

text: And they beckoned unto their partners , which were in the other ship , that they should come and help them . And they came , and filled both the ships , so that they began to sink .
text2: Babaqhweba omana babo abakomunye umkhumbi ukuba beze , bababambise . Beza - ke , bayigcwalisa imikhumbi yomibili , yaze yathi ayizike .

text: When Simon Peter saw it , he fell down at Jesus ' knees , saying , Depart from me ; for I am a sinful man , O Lord .
text2: Kuthe uSimoni Petru ekubona lokho , waziphonsa phansi ngasemadolweni kaJesu , wathi : “ Suka kimi , Nkosi , ngokuba ngingumuntu oyisoni . ”

text: For he was astonished , and all that were with him , at the draught of the fishes which they had taken :
text2: Ngokuba ubehlelwa ngukwesaba , yena kanye nabo bonke ababe naye , ngobuningi bezinhlanzi ababezibambile ,

text: And so was also James , and John , the sons of Zebedee , which were partners with Simon . And Jesus said unto Simon , Fear not ; from henceforth thou shalt catch men .
text2: kanjalo - ke noJakobe noJohane amadodana kaZebedewu ababesebenzisana noSimoni . UJesu wathi kuSimoni : “ Ungesabi ; kusukela manje uzakubamba abantu . ”

text: And when they had brought their ships to land , they forsook all , and followed him .
text2: Sebeyilethile imikhumbi emhlabathini bashiya konke , bamlandela .

text: And it came to pass , when he was in a certain city , behold a man full of leprosy : who seeing Jesus fell on his face , and besought him , saying , Lord , if thou wilt , thou canst make me clean .
text2: Kwathi ekomunye wemizi , bheka , nanso indoda egcwele uchoko . Kuthe embona uJesu , wawa ngobuso , wamnxusa wathi : “ Nkosi , uma uthanda , ungangihlambulula . ”

text: And he put forth his hand , and touched him , saying , I will : be thou clean . And immediately the leprosy departed from him .
text2: Welula isandla sakhe , wamphatha , wathi : “ Ngiyathanda ; hlambuluka . ” Masinyane uchoko lwasuka kuye .

text: And he charged him to tell no man : but go , and shew thyself to the priest , and offer for thy cleansing , according as Moses commanded , for a testimony unto them .
text2: Wamyala ukuba angatsheli muntu , wathi : “ Kepha suka , uzibonakalise kumpristi , unikele ngokuhlanjululwa kwakho , njengalokho uMose akuyalayo , kube ngubufakazi kubo . ”

text: But so much the more went there a fame abroad of him : and great multitudes came together to hear , and to be healed by him of their infirmities .
text2: Kwayilapho ukukhuluma ngaye kwanda kakhulu . Zabuthana izixuku eziningi ukuzwa nokuphulukiswa ezifweni zazo .

text: And he withdrew himself into the wilderness , and prayed .
text2: Kepha yena wamonyukela ehlane , wakhuleka .

text: And it came to pass on a certain day , as he was teaching , that there were Pharisees and doctors of the law sitting by , which were come out of every town of Galilee , and Judaea , and Jerusalem : and the power of the Lord was present to heal them .
text2: Kwathi ngolunye lwalezo zinsuku yena esafundisa , kwakuhlezi khona abaFarisi nabafundisi bomthetho ababephuma emizini yonke yaseGalile neJudiya neJerusalema . Namandla eNkosi ayekuye ukuba aphulukise .

text: And , behold , men brought in a bed a man which was taken with a palsy : and they sought means to bring him in , and to lay him before him .
text2: Bheka - ke , nanko amadoda ethwele ohlakeni umuntu ofe uhlangothi , efuna ukumngenisa nokumbeka phambi kwakhe .

text: And when they could not find by what way they might bring him in because of the multitude , they went upon the housetop , and let him down through the tiling with his couch into the midst before Jesus .
text2: Engafumani ukuthi angamngenisa kanjani ngenxa yesixuku akhwela phezu kwendlu , amehlisa ophahleni kanye nohlaka ngaphakathi phambi kukaJesu .

text: And when he saw their faith , he said unto him , Man , thy sins are forgiven thee .
text2: Ebona ukukholwa kwawo wathi : “ Mngane , uthethelelwe izono zakho . ”

text: And the scribes and the Pharisees began to reason , saying , Who is this which speaketh blasphemies ? Who can forgive sins , but God alone ?
text2: Ababhali nabaFarisi baqala ukuzindla ngokuthi : “ Ngubani lo okhuluma ngokuhlambalaza ? Ngubani ongathethelela izono ngaphandle kukaNkulunkulu yedwa na ? ”

text: But when Jesus perceived their thoughts , he answering said unto them , What reason ye in your hearts ?
text2: Kepha uJesu ezazi izizindlo zabo waphendula , wathi kubo : “ Nizindlani ezinhliziyweni zenu na ?

text: Whether is easier , to say , Thy sins be forgiven thee ; or to say , Rise up and walk ?
text2: Yikuphi okulula ukuthi : ‘ Uthethelelwe izono zakho , ’ noma ukuthi : ‘ Vuka uhambe , ’ na ?

text: But that ye may know that the Son of man hath power upon earth to forgive sins , ( he said unto the sick of the palsy , ) I say unto thee , Arise , and take up thy couch , and go into thine house .
text2: Kepha ukuze nazi ukuthi iNdodana yomuntu inamandla emhlabeni okuthethelela izono , ” wayesethi kofe uhlangothi : “ Kuwena ngithi : Vuka uthabathe uhlaka lwakho , uye endlini yakho . ”

text: And immediately he rose up before them , and took up that whereon he lay , and departed to his own house , glorifying God .
text2: Wasukuma khona lapho phambi kwabo , wathabatha lokho abelele kukho , wamuka waya endlini yakhe emdumisa uNkulunkulu .

text: And they were all amazed , and they glorified God , and were filled with fear , saying , We have seen strange things to day .
text2: Ukumangala kwabehlela bonke , bamdumisa uNkulunkulu , bagcwala ukwesaba , bathi : “ Sibonile izimanga namuhla . ”

text: And after these things he went forth , and saw a publican , named Levi , sitting at the receipt of custom : and he said unto him , Follow me .
text2: Emva kwalokho waphuma , wabona umthelisi , igama lakhe nguLevi , ehlezi endaweni yokuthela , wathi kuye : “ Ngilandele . ”

text: And he left all , rose up , and followed him .
text2: Washiya konke , wasukuma , wamlandela .

text: And Levi made him a great feast in his own house : and there was a great company of publicans and of others that sat down with them .
text2: ULevi wamenzela isidlo esikhulu endlini yakhe ; kwakukhona isixuku esikhulu sabathelisi nabanye ababehlezi nabo ekudleni .

text: But their scribes and Pharisees murmured against his disciples , saying , Why do ye eat and drink with publicans and sinners ?
text2: AbaFarisi nababhali bakhonona kubafundi bakhe , bathi : “ Yini ukuba nidle niphuze nabathelisi nezoni na ? ”

text: And Jesus answering said unto them , They that are whole need not a physician ; but they that are sick .
text2: Waphendula uJesu , wathi kubo : “ Abaphilileyo abadingi inyanga , ngabagulayo bodwa .

text: I came not to call the righteous , but sinners to repentance .
text2: Kangizelanga ukubiza abalungileyo kodwa izoni ukuba ziphenduke . ”

text: And they said unto him , Why do the disciples of John fast often , and make prayers , and likewise the disciples of the Pharisees ; but thine eat and drink ?
text2: Base bethi kuye : “ Abafundi bakaJohane bazila kaningi , benze imikhuleko , kanjalo nababaFarisi , kepha abakho bayadla , baphuze . ”

text: And he said unto them , Can ye make the children of the bridechamber fast , while the bridegroom is with them ?
text2: Kepha uJesu , wathi kubo : “ Ningabazilisa yini abayeni , umyeni esenabo na ?

text: But the days will come , when the bridegroom shall be taken away from them , and then shall they fast in those days .
text2: Kodwa kuzakufika izinsuku , lapho umyeni ezakususwa kubo ; yikhona bezakuzila ngalezo zinsuku . ”

text: And he spake also a parable unto them ; No man putteth a piece of a new garment upon an old ; if otherwise , then both the new maketh a rent , and the piece that was taken out of the new agreeth not with the old .
text2: Wabatshela nomfanekiso wokuthi : “ Akakho odabula isiziba engutsheni entsha , asibekele engutsheni endala ; uma enza lokho , uyayona entsha , futhi isiziba sentsha asizukuzwana nendala .

text: And no man putteth new wine into old bottles ; else the new wine will burst the bottles , and be spilled , and the bottles shall perish .
text2: Futhi akakho othela iwayini elisha ezimvabeni ezindala funa iwayini elisha liqhumise izimvaba , lichitheke lona , nezimvaba zonakale .

text: But new wine must be put into new bottles ; and both are preserved .
text2: Kodwa iwayini elisha limelwe ukuthelwa ezimvabeni ezintsha .

text: No man also having drunk old wine straightway desireth new : for he saith , The old is better .
text2: Akakho othi ephuze iwayini elidala , afune elisha , ngokuba uthi elidala limnandi . ”

text: And it came to pass on the second sabbath after the first , that he went through the corn fields ; and his disciples plucked the ears of corn , and did eat , rubbing them in their hands .
text2: Kwathi ngesabatha wadabula amasimu ; abafundi bakhe bakha izikhwebu , badla bezihlikihla ngezandla .

text: And certain of the Pharisees said unto them , Why do ye that which is not lawful to do on the sabbath days ?
text2: Kepha abathile babaFarisi bathi : “ Nenzelani lokho okungavunyelwe ngesabatha na ? ”

text: And Jesus answering them said , Have ye not read so much as this , what David did , when himself was an hungred , and they which were with him ;
text2: UJesu ebaphendula wathi : “ Anifundanga yini ngalokho akwenza uDavide mhla elambile yena nababe naye
