text: And Jesus walked in the temple in Solomon ' s porch .
text2: UJesu wayehamba ethempelini emphemeni kaSolomoni .

text: Then came the Jews round about him , and said unto him , How long dost thou make us to doubt ? If thou be the Christ , tell us plainly .
text2: Base bemhaqa abaJuda bethi kuye : “ Koze kube nini ulibazisa izinhliziyo zethu na ? Uma wena unguKristu , sitshele ngokuchachileyo . ”

text: Jesus answered them , I told you , and ye believed not : the works that I do in my Father ' s name , they bear witness of me .
text2: UJesu wabaphendula wathi : “ Nganitshela , kodwa anikholwanga ; imisebenzi engiyenzayo egameni likaBaba yiyona efakaza ngami .

text: But ye believe not , because ye are not of my sheep , as I said unto you .
text2: Kodwa nina anikholwa , ngokuba anisibo abezimvu zami .

text: My sheep hear my voice , and I know them , and they follow me :
text2: Izimvu zami ziyalizwa izwi lami ; nami ngiyazazi , ziyangilandela ;

text: And I give unto them eternal life ; and they shall never perish , neither shall any man pluck them out of my hand .
text2: ngizinika ukuphila okuphakade , azisoze zabhubha naphakade ; akakho ongazihlwitha esandleni sami .

text: My Father , which gave them me , is greater than all ; and no man is able to pluck them out of my Father ' s hand .
text2: UBaba onginikileyo mkhulu kunabo bonke ; akakho ongazihlwitha esandleni sikaBaba .

text: I and my Father are one .
text2: Mina noBaba simunye . ”

text: Then the Jews took up stones again to stone him .
text2: AbaJuda base bebuye bethatha amatshe ukuba bamkhande .

text: Jesus answered them , Many good works have I shewed you from my Father ; for which of those works do ye stone me ?
text2: UJesu wabaphendula wathi : “ Nginitshengise imisebenzi eminingi emihle evela kuBaba ; yimuphi umsebenzi kulena eningikhandela wona na ? ”

text: The Jews answered him , saying , For a good work we stone thee not ; but for blasphemy ; and because that thou , being a man , makest thyself God .
text2: Bamphendula abaJuda , bathi : “ Asikukhandi ngenxa yomsebenzi omuhle kepha ngenxa yokuhlambalaza , ngokuba wena ungumuntu ozenza uNkulunkulu . ”

text: Jesus answered them , Is it not written in your law , I said , Ye are gods ?
text2: UJesu wabaphendula wathi : “ Akulotshiwe yini emthethweni wakini ukuthi : ‘ Ngithe : Ningonkulunkulu , ’ na ?

text: If he called them gods , unto whom the word of God came , and the scripture cannot be broken ;
text2: Uma wathi bangonkulunkulu bona eleza kubo izwi likaNkulunkulu — nombhalo ungeqiwe —

text: Say ye of him , whom the Father hath sanctified , and sent into the world , Thou blasphemest ; because I said , I am the Son of God ?
text2: nithi ngaye uYise amahlukanisileyo , wamthumela ezweni , ukuba uyahlambalaza , ngokuba ngithe : ‘ NgiyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu , ’ na ?

text: If I do not the works of my Father , believe me not .
text2: Uma ngingenzi imisebenzi kaBaba , maningakholwa yimi .

text: But if I do , though ye believe not me , believe the works : that ye may know , and believe , that the Father is in me , and I in him .
text2: Kepha uma ngiyenza , nakuba ningakholwa yimi , kholwani yimisebenzi , ukuze nazi , niqonde ukuthi uBaba ukimi , nami ngikuBaba . ”

text: Therefore they sought again to take him : but he escaped out of their hand ,
text2: Base befuna futhi ukumbamba , kepha waphunyuka esandleni sabo .

text: And went away again beyond Jordan into the place where John at first baptized ; and there he abode .
text2: Waphinda wamuka , waya phesheya kweJordani kuleyo ndawo lapho uJohane waqala ukubhapathiza khona , wahlala lapho .

text: And many resorted unto him , and said , John did no miracle : but all things that John spake of this man were true .
text2: Nabaningi beza kuye , bathi : “ UJohane nempela akenzanga sibonakaliso nasinye , kepha konke uJohane akusho ngalowo muntu kwakuqinisile . ”

text: And many believed on him there .
text2: Abaningi bakholwa nguye lapho .

text: Now a certain man was sick , named Lazarus , of Bethany , the town of Mary and her sister Martha .
text2: Kwakukhona othile ogulayo , uLazaru waseBethaniya umuzi wakubo kaMariya nodadewabo uMarta .

text: ( It was that Mary which anointed the Lord with ointment , and wiped his feet with her hair , whose brother Lazarus was sick . )
text2: UMariya kwakunguye owagcoba iNkosi ngamafutha , wesula izinyawo zayo ngezinwele zakhe , omnewabo uLazaru wayegula .

text: Therefore his sisters sent unto him , saying , Lord , behold , he whom thou lovest is sick .
text2: Ngakho - ke odadewabo bathumela kuye , bathi : “ Nkosi , bheka , lo omthandayo uyagula . ”

text: When Jesus heard that , he said , This sickness is not unto death , but for the glory of God , that the Son of God might be glorified thereby .
text2: UJesu esekuzwile lokho wathi : “ Lokhu kugula akusikho okokufa , kodwa kungenxa yenkazimulo kaNkulunkulu ukuba iNdodana kaNkulunkulu ikhazimuliswe ngakho . ”

text: Now Jesus loved Martha , and her sister , and Lazarus .
text2: Kepha uJesu wayebathanda oMarta nodadewabo noLazaru .

text: When he had heard therefore that he was sick , he abode two days still in the same place where he was .
text2: Ngakho - ke kwathi ezwa ukuthi uyagula , wahlala futhi izinsuku ezimbili endaweni abe kuyo .

text: Then after that saith he to his disciples , Let us go into Judaea again .
text2: Emva kwalokho wathi kubafundi bakhe : “ Asibuye , siye eJudiya . ”

text: His disciples say unto him , Master , the Jews of late sought to stone thee ; and goest thou thither again ?
text2: Abafundi bathi kuye : “ Rabi , abaJuda basand ’ ukufuna ukukukhanda ngamatshe ; usaya futhi khona na ? ”

text: Jesus answered , Are there not twelve hours in the day ? If any man walk in the day , he stumbleth not , because he seeth the light of this world .
text2: UJesu waphendula wathi : “ Awakho yini amahora ayishumi nambili emini na ? Uma umuntu ehamba emini , akakhubeki , ngokuba ubona ukukhanya kwaleli zwe .

text: But if a man walk in the night , he stumbleth , because there is no light in him .
text2: Kodwa uma umuntu ehamba ebusuku , uyakhubeka , ngokuba kungekho ukukhanya kuye . ”

text: These things said he : and after that he saith unto them , Our friend Lazarus sleepeth ; but I go , that I may awake him out of sleep .
text2: Wakhuluma lokho ; emva kwalokho wathi kubo : “ ULazaru umhlobo wethu ulele , kepha ngiyahamba ukuba ngimvuse ebuthongweni . ”

text: Then said his disciples , Lord , if he sleep , he shall do well .
text2: Abafundi bakhe base bethi kuye : “ Nkosi , uma elele , uyakusinda . ”

text: Howbeit Jesus spake of his death : but they thought that he had spoken of taking of rest in sleep .
text2: Kepha uJesu wayekhuluma ngokufa kwakhe , kepha bona babethi ukhuluma ngokulala ubuthongo .

text: Then said Jesus unto them plainly , Lazarus is dead .
text2: Ngakho - ke uJesu wathi kubo ngokuchachileyo : “ ULazaru ufile ;

text: And I am glad for your sakes that I was not there , to the intent ye may believe ; nevertheless let us go unto him .
text2: ngiyathokoza ngenxa yenu ukuthi bengingekho , ukuze nikholwe ; kepha asiye kuye . ”

text: Then said Thomas , which is called Didymus , unto his fellowdisciples , Let us also go , that we may die with him .
text2: Khona uTomase , othiwa uDidimu , wathi kubafundi abakanye naye : “ Asihambe nathi , ukuze sife kanye naye . ”

text: Then when Jesus came , he found that he had lain in the grave four days already .
text2: Kwathi - ke esefika uJesu , wamfumana esenezinsuku ezine ethuneni .

text: Now Bethany was nigh unto Jerusalem , about fifteen furlongs off :
text2: IBethaniya laliseduze neJerusalema , kungaba ngamastadiyu ayishumi nanhlanu .

text: And many of the Jews came to Martha and Mary , to comfort them concerning their brother .
text2: Abaningi kubaJuda babefikile koMarta noMariya ukubakhuza ngomnewabo .

text: Then Martha , as soon as she heard that Jesus was coming , went and met him : but Mary sat still in the house .
text2: Ngakho uMarta esezwe ukuthi uJesu uyeza , waya ukumhlangabeza , kepha uMariya wahlala endlini .

text: Then said Martha unto Jesus , Lord , if thou hadst been here , my brother had not died .
text2: Wayesethi uMarta kuJesu : “ Nkosi , uma ubukhona , umnewethu nga engafanga ;

text: But I know , that even now , whatsoever thou wilt ask of God , God will give it thee .
text2: kepha ngiyazi nakalokhu ukuthi nokuba yini ongakucela kuNkulunkulu , uNkulunkulu uzakukunika khona . ”

text: Jesus saith unto her , Thy brother shall rise again .
text2: UJesu wathi kuye : “ Umnewenu uzakuvuka . ”

text: Martha saith unto him , I know that he shall rise again in the resurrection at the last day .
text2: UMarta wathi kuye : “ Ngiyazi ukuthi uyakuvuka ekuvukeni ngosuku lokugcina . ”

text: Jesus said unto her , I am the resurrection , and the life : he that believeth in me , though he were dead , yet shall he live :
text2: UJesu wathi kuye : “ Mina ngingukuvuka nokuphila ; okholwa yimi , noma efa , wophila .

text: And whosoever liveth and believeth in me shall never die . Believest thou this ?
text2: Nalowo ophila , akholwe yimi , kasoze afa naphakade . Uyakholwa yilokho na ? ”

text: She saith unto him , Yea , Lord : I believe that thou art the Christ , the Son of God , which should come into the world .
text2: Wathi kuye : “ Yebo , Nkosi , ngiyakholwa ukuthi wena unguKristu , iNdodana kaNkulunkulu , obezakuza ezweni . ”

text: And when she had so said , she went her way , and called Mary her sister secretly , saying , The Master is come , and calleth for thee .
text2: Eseshilo lokho wamuka wabiza uMariya udadewabo ngasese , wathi : “ UMfundisi ukhona , uyakubiza . ”

text: As soon as she heard that , she arose quickly , and came unto him .
text2: Yena - ke ekuzwa lokho wasuka masinyane , waya kuye .

text: Now Jesus was not yet come into the town , but was in that place where Martha met him .
text2: Kepha uJesu wayengakafiki emzini , kodwa wayesekuleyo ndawo uMarta amhlangabeza kuyo .

text: The Jews then which were with her in the house , and comforted her , when they saw Mary , that she rose up hastily and went out , followed her , saying , She goeth unto the grave to weep there .
text2: AbaJuda ababesendlini naye bemkhuza , bebona uMariya esuka masinyane ephuma , bamlandela , bathi : “ Uya ethuneni ukuba akhale khona . ”

text: Then when Mary was come where Jesus was , and saw him , she fell down at his feet , saying unto him , Lord , if thou hadst been here , my brother had not died .
text2: UMariya esefike lapho ekhona uJesu , embona , wawa ngasezinyaweni zakhe , wathi : “ Nkosi , uma ubukhona , umnewethu nga engafanga . ”

text: When Jesus therefore saw her weeping , and the Jews also weeping which came with her , he groaned in the spirit , and was troubled ,
text2: Ngakho uJesu embona ekhala , nabaJuda abafika naye bekhala , wabubula emoyeni , wakhathazeka ;

text: And said , Where have ye laid him ? They said unto him , Lord , come and see .
text2: wathi : “ Nimbekephi na ? ” Bathi kuye : “ Nkosi , woza ubone . ”

text: Jesus wept .
text2: UJesu wakhala izinyembezi .

text: Then said the Jews , Behold how he loved him !
text2: Ngakho - ke abaJuda bathi : “ Bheka , ukumthanda kwakhe okungaka . ”

text: And some of them said , Could not this man , which opened the eyes of the blind , have caused that even this man should not have died ?
text2: Kepha abanye kubo bathi : “ Lo owavula amehlo empumputhe wayengekwenze yini ukuba yena lo angafi na ? ”

text: Jesus therefore again groaning in himself cometh to the grave . It was a cave , and a stone lay upon it .
text2: Ngakho uJesu , ebubula futhi phakathi kwakhe , wafika ethuneni . Lalingumhume , kwakukhona itshe phezu kwawo .

text: Jesus said , Take ye away the stone . Martha , the sister of him that was dead , saith unto him , Lord , by this time he stinketh : for he hath been dead four days .
text2: Wathi uJesu : “ Susani itshe . ” UMarta , udadewabo wofileyo , wathi kuye : “ Nkosi , usenuka ; ngokuba sezizine . ”

text: Jesus saith unto her , Said I not unto thee , that , if thou wouldest believe , thou shouldest see the glory of God ?
text2: UJesu wathi kuye : “ Angishongo yini kuwe ukuthi uma ukholwa , uzakubona inkazimulo kaNkulunkulu , na ? ”

text: Then they took away the stone from the place where the dead was laid . And Jesus lifted up his eyes , and said , Father , I thank thee that thou hast heard me .
text2: Balisusa - ke itshe . Kepha uJesu waphakamisa amehlo , wathi : “ Baba , ngiyakubonga ngokuba ungizwile .

text: And I knew that thou hearest me always : but because of the people which stand by I said it , that they may believe that thou hast sent me .
text2: Bengazi mina ukuthi ungizwa njalo , kodwa ngenxa yesixuku esingiphahlileyo ngishilo lokho , ukuze bakholwe ukuthi nguwena ongithumileyo . ”

text: And when he thus had spoken , he cried with a loud voice , Lazarus , come forth .
text2: Esekhulume lokho wamemeza ngezwi elikhulu , wathi : “ Lazaru , phuma . ”

text: And he that was dead came forth , bound hand and foot with graveclothes : and his face was bound about with a napkin . Jesus saith unto them , Loose him , and let him go .
text2: Waphuma ofileyo eboshwe izinyawo nezandla ngezindwangu , ubuso bakhe bumboziwe ngeduku . UJesu wathi kubo : “ Mthukululeni , nimyeke ahambe . ”

text: Then many of the Jews which came to Mary , and had seen the things which Jesus did , believed on him .
text2: Khona abaningi kubaJuda ababezile kuMariya bebona abekwenzile , bakholwa nguye .

text: But some of them went their ways to the Pharisees , and told them what things Jesus had done .
text2: Kepha abanye babo baya kubaFarisi , babatshela abekwenzile uJesu .

text: Then gathered the chief priests and the Pharisees a council , and said , What do we ? for this man doeth many miracles .
text2: Ngalokho abapristi abakhulu nabaFarisi base bemema umphakathi , bathi : “ Siyakwenze njani na ? Lo muntu wenza izibonakaliso eziningi ;

text: If we let him thus alone , all men will believe on him : and the Romans shall come and take away both our place and nation .
text2: uma simyeka njalo , bazakukholwa nguye bonke ; amaRoma ayakufika , asamuke indawo nesizwe . ”

text: And one of them , named Caiaphas , being the high priest that same year , said unto them , Ye know nothing at all ,
text2: Kepha othile wabo , uKayafase , engumpristi omkhulu walowo mnyaka , wathi kubo : “ Anazi lutho nina ;

text: Nor consider that it is expedient for us , that one man should die for the people , and that the whole nation perish not .
text2: aniqondi futhi ukuthi kunilungele ukuba umuntu oyedwa afele abantu , isizwe sonke singabhubhi . ”

text: And this spake he not of himself : but being high priest that year , he prophesied that Jesus should die for that nation ;
text2: Lokho kakushongo ngokwakhe , kodwa engumpristi omkhulu walowo mnyaka waprofetha ukuba uJesu wayezakufa ngenxa yesizwe ;

text: And not for that nation only , but that also he should gather together in one the children of God that were scattered abroad .
text2: kungengenxa yesizwe kuphela , kepha ukuba abuthele ndawonye abantwana bakaNkulunklu abahlakazekileyo , babe munye .

text: Then from that day forth they took counsel together for to put him to death .
text2: Kusukela kulolo suku baceba ukuba bambulale .

text: Jesus therefore walked no more openly among the Jews ; but went thence unto a country near to the wilderness , into a city called Ephraim , and there continued with his disciples .
text2: Ngakho uJesu kabuyange esahamba obala phakathi kwabaJuda , kepha wamuka lapho , waya ezweni eliseduze nehlane emzini othiwa i - Efrayimi ; wahlala khona nabafundi bakhe .

text: And the Jews ' passover was nigh at hand : and many went out of the country up to Jerusalem before the passover , to purify themselves .
text2: Lase liseduze iPhasika labaJuda ; abaningi abavela emaphandleni bakhuphukela eJerusalema ngaphambi kwePhasika ukuba bazihlambulule .

text: Then sought they for Jesus , and spake among themselves , as they stood in the temple , What think ye , that he will not come to the feast ?
text2: Ngakho bamfuna uJesu , bexoxa bemi ethempelini , bethi : “ Nithini na ? Akayikuza nempela emkhosini na ? ”

text: Now both the chief priests and the Pharisees had given a commandment , that , if any man knew where he were , he should shew it , that they might take him .
text2: Abapristi abakhulu nabaFarisi babekhiphe umyalo wokuthi uma kukhona owaziyo lapho ekhona , ababikele , ukuze bambambe .

text: Then Jesus six days before the passover came to Bethany , where Lazarus was which had been dead , whom he raised from the dead .
text2: Ngakho kuseyizinsuku eziyisithupha ngaphambi kwePhasika , uJesu wafika eBethaniya , lapho wayekhona uLazaru uJesu amvusa kwabafileyo .

text: There they made him a supper ; and Martha served : but Lazarus was one of them that sat at the table with him .
text2: Base bemenzela ukudla khona ; uMarta wayephaka , kepha uLazaru wayengomunye wababehlezi ekudleni naye .

text: Then took Mary a pound of ointment of spikenard , very costly , and anointed the feet of Jesus , and wiped his feet with her hair : and the house was filled with the odour of the ointment .
text2: UMariya wayesethatha ilitra lamafutha enadi lodwa elinenani elikhulu , wagcoba izinyawo zikaJesu , wesula izinyawo zakhe ngezinwele zakhe ; indlu yagcwala iphunga lamafutha .

text: Then saith one of his disciples , Judas Iscariot , Simon ' s son , which should betray him ,
text2: Kepha uJuda Iskariyothe , omunye wabafundi bakhe obezakumkhaphela , wathi :

text: Why was not this ointment sold for three hundred pence , and given to the poor ?
text2: “ Yini ukuba lawa mafutha engathengiswanga ngawodenariyu abangamakhulu amathathu , kwaphiwa abampofu , na ? ”

text: This he said , not that he cared for the poor ; but because he was a thief , and had the bag , and bare what was put therein .
text2: Washo lokho kungengokuba ekhathalele abampofu , kepha ngokuba eyisela , ephethe isikhwama , eba okufakwa kuso .

text: Then said Jesus , Let her alone : against the day of my burying hath she kept this .
text2: Ngakho uJesu wathi : “ Myeke ukuba awalondolozele usuku lokumbelwa kwami .

text: For the poor always ye have with you ; but me ye have not always .
text2: Ngokuba abampofu ninabo njalo , kepha mina aninami njalo . ”

text: Much people of the Jews therefore knew that he was there : and they came not for Jesus ' sake only , but that they might see Lazarus also , whom he had raised from the dead .
text2: Ngakho isixuku esikhulu sabaJuda sezwa ukuthi ulapho . Beza - ke kungengenxa kaJesu kuphela , kepha nokuba babone uLazaru abemvusile kwabafileyo .

text: But the chief priests consulted that they might put Lazarus also to death ;
text2: Kepha abapristi abakhulu benza icebo lokuba babulale noLazaru ,

text: Because that by reason of him many of the Jews went away , and believed on Jesus .
text2: ngokuba ngenxa yakhe abaningi babaJuda bamuka bakholwa nguJesu .

text: On the next day much people that were come to the feast , when they heard that Jesus was coming to Jerusalem ,
text2: Ngangomuso abantu abaningi abafike emkhosini sebezwile ukuthi uJesu uyeza eJerusalema ,

text: Took branches of palm trees , and went forth to meet him , and cried , Hosanna : Blessed is the King of Israel that cometh in the name of the Lord .
text2: bathatha amahlamvu esundu , baphuma ukumhlangabeza . Bamemeza bathi : “ Hosiyana ! Ubusisiwe ozayo egameni leNkosi , yebo , iNkosi ka - Israyeli . ”

text: And Jesus , when he had found a young ass , sat thereon ; as it is written ,
text2: UJesu esefumene imbongolo entsha wakhwela kuyo njengokulotshiwe ukuthi :

text: Fear not , daughter of Sion : behold , thy King cometh , sitting on an ass ' s colt .
text2: “ Ungesabi , ndodakazi yaseSiyoni ; bheka , iNkosi yakho iza , ikhwele etholeni lembongolo . ”

text: These things understood not his disciples at the first : but when Jesus was glorified , then remembered they that these things were written of him , and that they had done these things unto him .
text2: Lokho abafundi bakhe abakuqondanga ekuqaleni ; kodwa esekhazimulisiwe uJesu , base bekhumbula ukuthi kulotshiwe lokho ngaye nokuthi babekwenzile lokho kuye .

text: The people therefore that was with him when he called Lazarus out of his grave , and raised him from the dead , bare record .
text2: Ngakho safakaza isixuku esasinaye , lapho ebiza uLazaru aphume ethuneni , emvusa kwabafileyo .

text: For this cause the people also met him , for that they heard that he had done this miracle .
text2: Ngenxa yalokho isixuku saya samhlangabeza , ngokuba sase sizwile ukuthi wayesenzile leso sibonakaliso .

text: The Pharisees therefore said among themselves , Perceive ye how ye prevail nothing ? behold , the world is gone after him .
text2: Ngakho abaFarisi bakhuluma bodwa , bathi : “ Niyabona ukuthi anisizi lutho ; bheka , izwe lonke liyamlandela . ”

text: And there were certain Greeks among them that came up to worship at the feast :
text2: Kwakukhona amaGreki athile phakathi kwababenyuka ukuba bakhuleke emkhosini .

text: The same came therefore to Philip , which was of Bethsaida of Galilee , and desired him , saying , Sir , we would see Jesus .
text2: Lawo - ke aya kuFiliphu waseBetsayida laseGalile , acela kuye , athi : “ Nkosi , sithanda ukubona uJesu . ”

text: Philip cometh and telleth Andrew : and again Andrew and Philip tell Jesus .
text2: UFiliphu weza wamtshela u - Andreya . Weza u - Andreya noFiliphu , basho kuJesu .

text: And Jesus answered them , saying , The hour is come , that the Son of man should be glorified .
text2: UJesu waphendula , wathi kubo : “ Sesifikile isikhathi sokuba ikhazimuliswe iNdodana yomuntu .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , Except a corn of wheat fall into the ground and die , it abideth alone : but if it die , it bringeth forth much fruit .
text2: Ngiqinisile , ngiqinisile ngithi kini : Uma inhlamvu kakolweni iwela emhlabathini ingafi , ihlala yodwa ; kepha uma ifa , ithela izithelo eziningi .

text: He that loveth his life shall lose it ; and he that hateth his life in this world shall keep it unto life eternal .
text2: Lowo othanda ukuphila kwakhe ulahlekelwa yikho , nozonda ukuphila kwakhe kuleli zwe uyakukulondela ukuphila okuphakade .

text: If any man serve me , let him follow me ; and where I am , there shall also my servant be : if any man serve me , him will my Father honour .
text2: Uma umuntu engikhonza , akangilandele ; nalapha ngikhona mina , soba khona nesikhonzi sami . Uma umuntu engikhonza , uBaba uyakumazisa lowo .

text: Now is my soul troubled ; and what shall I say ? Father , save me from this hour : but for this cause came I unto this hour .
text2: “ Kalokhu umphefumulo wami ulusizi , ngizakuthini na ? Baba , ngisindise kulo mzuzu . Kodwa ngenxa yalokhu ngize kulo mzuzu .

text: Father , glorify thy name . Then came there a voice from heaven , saying , I have both glorified it , and will glorify it again .
text2: Baba , khazimulisa igama lakho . ” Kwase kufika izwi livela ezulwini , lithi : “ Ngilikhazimulisile , ngobuye ngilikhazimulise . ”

text: The people therefore , that stood by , and heard it , said that it thundered : others said , An angel spake to him .
text2: Ngakho abantu ababemi bezwa bathi : “ Beliduma ; ” abanye bathi : “ Ingelosi ikhulume kuye . ”

text: Jesus answered and said , This voice came not because of me , but for your sakes .
text2: UJesu waphendula wathi : “ Leli zwi alizanga ngenxa yami kepha ngenxa yenu .

text: Now is the judgment of this world : now shall the prince of this world be cast out .
text2: Kalokhu kungukwahlulelwa kwaleli zwe ; kalokhu umbusi waleli zwe uzakuxoshwa .

text: And I , if I be lifted up from the earth , will draw all men unto me .
text2: Mina , nxa ngiphakanyiswa emhlabeni , ngiyakubadonsela kimi bonke . ”

text: This he said , signifying what death he should die .
text2: Lokho - ke wakusho efanekisa ukufa okumfanele afe ngakho .

text: The people answered him , We have heard out of the law that Christ abideth for ever : and how sayest thou , The Son of man must be lifted up ? who is this Son of man ?
text2: Ngakho isixuku samphendula sathi : “ Sizwile emthethweni ukuthi uKristu uyakuma phakade ; usho kanjani wena ukuthi iNdodana yomuntu imelwe ukuphakanyiswa na ? Ingubani le Ndodana yomuntu na ? ”

text: Then Jesus said unto them , Yet a little while is the light with you . Walk while ye have the light , lest darkness come upon you : for he that walketh in darkness knoweth not whither he goeth .
text2: Wayesethi kubo uJesu : “ Kuseyisikhashana ukukhanya kukhona kini . Hambani nise nokukhanya , ukuze ubumnyama bunganehleli . Ohamba ebumnyameni akazi ukuthi uya ngaphi .

text: While ye have light , believe in the light , that ye may be the children of light . These things spake Jesus , and departed , and did hide himself from them .
text2: Nise nokukhanya kholwani ngukukhanya , ukuze nibe ngabantwana bokukhanya . ” Washo lokho uJesu , wamuka , wasithela kubo .

text: But though he had done so many miracles before them , yet they believed not on him :
text2: Kepha noma ebezenzile izibonakaliso ezingaka phambi kwabo , abakholwanga nguye

text: That the saying of Esaias the prophet might be fulfilled , which he spake , Lord , who hath believed our report ? and to whom hath the arm of the Lord been revealed ?
text2: ukuba izwi lika - Isaya umprofethi ligcwaliseke , alikhuluma lokuthi : “ Nkosi , ngubani owakholwa ngukushumayela kwethu na ? Ingalo yeNkosi yambulelwa bani na ? ”

text: Therefore they could not believe , because that Esaias said again ,
text2: Ngalokho babengekholwe , ngokuba u - Isaya washo futhi ukuthi :

text: He hath blinded their eyes , and hardened their heart ; that they should not see with their eyes , nor understand with their heart , and be converted , and I should heal them .
text2: “ Uphuphuthekisile amehlo abo , wayenza lukhuni inhliziyo yabo , funa babone ngamehlo , baqonde ngenhliziyo , baphenduke , ngibaphulukise . ”

text: These things said Esaias , when he saw his glory , and spake of him .
text2: U - Isaya wakusho lokho , ngokuba ebona inkazimulo yakhe , ekhuluma ngaye .

text: Nevertheless among the chief rulers also many believed on him ; but because of the Pharisees they did not confess him , lest they should be put out of the synagogue :
text2: Nokho abaningi nasezikhulwini bakholwa nguye , kodwa ngenxa yabaFarisi abakuvumanga , funa bakhishwe esinagogeni ;

text: For they loved the praise of men more than the praise of God .
text2: ngokuba babethanda udumo lwabantu kunodumo lukaNkulunkulu .

text: Jesus cried and said , He that believeth on me , believeth not on me , but on him that sent me .
text2: Khona uJesu wamemeza wathi : “ Okholwa yimi kakholwa yimi kepha ngongithumileyo .

text: And he that seeth me seeth him that sent me .
text2: Obona mina ubona ongithumileyo .

text: I am come a light into the world , that whosoever believeth on me should not abide in darkness .
text2: Ngize ezweni ngingukukhanya ukuba yilowo nalowo okholwa yimi angahlali ebumnyameni .

text: And if any man hear my words , and believe not , I judge him not : for I came not to judge the world , but to save the world .
text2: “ Uma umuntu ezwa amazwi ami engawalondi , lowo angimahluleli mina , ngokuba angizanga ukuba ngahlulele izwe , kepha ukuba ngisindise izwe .

text: He that rejecteth me , and receiveth not my words , hath one that judgeth him : the word that I have spoken , the same shall judge him in the last day .
text2: Ongalayo engawamukeli amazwi ami unomahlulelayo ; izwi engalikhulumayo yilona eliyakumahlulela ngosuku lokugcina .

text: For I have not spoken of myself ; but the Father which sent me , he gave me a commandment , what I should say , and what I should speak .
text2: Ngokuba mina angikhulumanga ngokwami , kodwa uBaba ongithumileyo nguye onginike umyalo wokuba ngizakuthini , ngikhulumeni .

text: And I know that his commandment is life everlasting : whatsoever I speak therefore , even as the Father said unto me , so I speak .
text2: Ngiyazi ukuthi umyalo wakhe ungukuphila okuphakade . Ngakho - ke lokho engikukhulumayo ngikukhuluma njengalokho uBaba angitshela khona . ”

text: Now before the feast of the passover , when Jesus knew that his hour was come that he should depart out of this world unto the Father , having loved his own which were in the world , he loved them unto the end .
text2: Kwathi ngaphambi komkhosi wePhasika uJesu azi ukuthi isikhathi sakhe sesifikile ukuba amuke kuleli zwe , aye kuYise , ebathandile abakhe abasezweni wabathanda kwaze kwaba sekupheleni .

text: And supper being ended , the devil having now put into the heart of Judas Iscariot , Simon ' s son , to betray him ;
text2: Sekudliwa , uSathane esekufake enhliziyweni kaJuda Iskariyothe kaSimoni ukuba amkhaphele ,

text: Jesus knowing that the Father had given all things into his hands , and that he was come from God , and went to God ;
text2: uJesu ekwazi ukuthi uYise unikele konke ezandleni zakhe nokuthi wavela kuNkulunkulu , futhi ubuyela kuNkulunkulu ,

text: He riseth from supper , and laid aside his garments ; and took a towel , and girded himself .
text2: wasuka ekudleni , wabeka izingubo zakhe , wathabatha indwangu , wakhwica .

text: After that he poureth water into a bason , and began to wash the disciples ' feet , and to wipe them with the towel wherewith he was girded .
text2: Emva kwalokho wathela amanzi emcengezini , waqala ukugeza izinyawo zabafundi , wazesula ngendwangu abekhwice ngayo .

text: Then cometh he to Simon Peter : and Peter saith unto him , Lord , dost thou wash my feet ?
text2: Wafika - ke kuSimoni Petru . Wathi kuye : “ Nkosi , wena ugeza izinyawo zami na ? ”

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , What I do thou knowest not now ; but thou shalt know hereafter .
text2: UJesu waphendula , wathi kuye : “ Lokhu engikwenzayo awukwazi manje , kodwa uzakukuqonda emva kwalokhu . ”

text: Peter saith unto him , Thou shalt never wash my feet . Jesus answered him , If I wash thee not , thou hast no part with me .
text2: UPetru wathi kuye : “ Awusoze wageza izinyawo zami naphakade . ” UJesu waphendula wathi : “ Uma ngingakugezi , awunasabelo nami . ”

text: Simon Peter saith unto him , Lord , not my feet only , but also my hands and my head .
text2: USimoni Petru wathi kuye : “ Nkosi , akungabi yizinyawo zodwa kepha nezandla nekhanda . ”

text: Jesus saith to him , He that is washed needeth not save to wash his feet , but is clean every whit : and ye are clean , but not all .
text2: UJesu wathi kuye : “ Ogeziweyo kadingi lutho , kuphela ukugezwa izinyawo , kepha ugezekile wonke . Nina - ke nigezekile , kodwa angisho nonke . ”

text: For he knew who should betray him ; therefore said he , Ye are not all clean .
text2: Ngokuba emazi obezakumkhaphela kungalokho athi : “ Anigezekile nonke . ”

text: So after he had washed their feet , and had taken his garments , and was set down again , he said unto them , Know ye what I have done to you ?
text2: Esegeze izinyawo zabo wathabatha izingubo zakhe , wabuye wahlala , wathi kubo : “ Niyakwazi yini engikwenzile kini na ?

text: Ye call me Master and Lord : and ye say well ; for so I am .
text2: Ningibiza nithi : ‘ Mfundisi , Nkosi ; ’ nisho kahle , ngokuba ngiyikho .

text: If I then , your Lord and Master , have washed your feet ; ye also ought to wash one another ' s feet .
text2: Uma - ke mina , iNkosi noMfundisi , ngigeze izinyawo zenu , nani - ke nifanele ukugezana izinyawo .

text: For I have given you an example , that ye should do as I have done to you .
text2: Ngokuba ngininikile isibonelo ukuba nenze nani njengokuba ngenzile kini .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , The servant is not greater than his lord ; neither he that is sent greater than he that sent him .
text2: Ngiqinisile , ngiqinisile ngithi kini : Inceku ayinkulu kunenkosi yayo , nothunyiweyo kamkhulu kunomthumileyo .

text: If ye know these things , happy are ye if ye do them .
text2: Uma nazi lokho , nibusisiwe uma nikwenza .

text: I speak not of you all : I know whom I have chosen : but that the scripture may be fulfilled , He that eateth bread with me hath lifted up his heel against me .
text2: “ Angikhulumi ngani nonke ; ngiyabazi engibakhethileyo ; kodwa nga kugcwaliseka umbhalo othi : “ ‘ Odla isinkwa sami ungiphakamisele isithende sakhe . ’

text: Now I tell you before it come , that , when it is come to pass , ye may believe that I am he .
text2: “ Kusukela manje ngiyanitshela kungakenzeki ukuba , nxa sekwenzeka , nikholwe ukuthi nginguye .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that receiveth whomsoever I send receiveth me ; and he that receiveth me receiveth him that sent me .
text2: Ngiqinisile , ngiqinisile ngithi kini : Owamukela engimthumayo wamukela mina ; ongamukelayo mina wamukela ongithumileyo . ”

text: When Jesus had thus said , he was troubled in spirit , and testified , and said , Verily , verily , I say unto you , that one of you shall betray me .
text2: UJesu eseshilo lokho wakhathazeka emoyeni , wafakaza wathi : “ Ngiqinisile , ngiqinisile ngithi kini : Omunye wenu uyakungikhaphela . ”

text: Then the disciples looked one on another , doubting of whom he spake .
text2: Abafundi babhekana bengabaza ukuthi ukhuluma ngobani .

text: Now there was leaning on Jesus ' bosom one of his disciples , whom Jesus loved .
text2: Kwakuhlezi ekudleni omunye wabafundi bakhe uJesu amthandayo , encike esifubeni sikaJesu .

text: Simon Peter therefore beckoned to him , that he should ask who it should be of whom he spake .
text2: USimoni Petru wayesemqhweba ethi : “ Yisho ukuthi ubekhuluma ngobani na ? ”

text: He then lying on Jesus ' breast saith unto him , Lord , who is it ?
text2: Yena encike esifubeni sikaJesu wathi kuye : “ Nkosi , ngubani na ? ”

text: Jesus answered , He it is , to whom I shall give a sop , when I have dipped it . And when he had dipped the sop , he gave it to Judas Iscariot , the son of Simon .
text2: Ngakho waphendula uJesu , wathi : “ Yilowo engiyakumcwilisela ucezu , ngimnike lona . ” Eselucwilisile - ke ucezu , walunika uJuda Iskariyothe .

text: And after the sop Satan entered into him . Then said Jesus unto him , That thou doest , do quickly .
text2: Emva kocezu uSathane wayesengena kuye . Wayesethi kuye uJesu : “ Okwenzayo kwenze masinyane . ”

text: Now no man at the table knew for what intent he spake this unto him .
text2: Kepha akabakho kwababehlezi ekudleni owayekwazi lokho ukuthi ukusho ngani kuye .

text: For some of them thought , because Judas had the bag , that Jesus had said unto him , Buy those things that we have need of against the feast ; or , that he should give something to the poor .
text2: Kepha abanye bacabanga ukuthi , ngokuba uJuda ephethe isikhwama , uJesu uthi kuye : “ Thenga esikuswele emkhosini , ” noma ukuthi kabele abampofu okuthile .

text: He then having received the sop went immediately out : and it was night .
text2: Kuthe eseluthathile ucezu waphuma masinyane ; kwakuse busuku .

text: Therefore , when he was gone out , Jesus said , Now is the Son of man glorified , and God is glorified in him .
text2: Ngakho esephumile , uJesu wathi : “ Kalokhu iNdodana yomuntu ikhazimulisiwe , noNkulunkulu ukhazimulisiwe kuyo .

text: If God be glorified in him , God shall also glorify him in himself , and shall straightway glorify him .
text2: Uma uNkulunkulu ekhazimulisiwe kuyo , noNkulunkulu uyakuyikhazimulisa kuye , uyakuyikhazimulisa masinyane .

text: Little children , yet a little while I am with you . Ye shall seek me : and as I said unto the Jews , Whither I go , ye cannot come ; so now I say to you .
text2: “ Bantwanyana , ngise khona nani isikhashana . Niyakungifuna , nanjengalokho ngasho kubaJuda ukuthi lapho ngiya khona ningeze nina , ngisho nakinina manje .

text: A new commandment I give unto you , That ye love one another ; as I have loved you , that ye also love one another .
text2: “ Ngininika umyalo omusha wokuba nithandane ; njengalokhu nginithandile , nani nithandane .

text: By this shall all men know that ye are my disciples , if ye have love one to another .
text2: Ngalokho bonke bayakukwazi ukuthi ningabafundi bami , uma nithandana . ”

text: Simon Peter said unto him , Lord , whither goest thou ? Jesus answered him , Whither I go , thou canst not follow me now ; but thou shalt follow me afterwards .
text2: USimoni Petru wathi kuye : “ Nkosi , uya ngaphi na ? ” UJesu waphendula wathi : “ Lapho ngiya khona , ungengilandele kalokhu ; kepha uyakungilandela kamuva . ”

text: Peter said unto him , Lord , why cannot I follow thee now ? I will lay down my life for thy sake .
text2: Wathi kuye uPetru : “ Nkosi , ngingekulandele kalokhu ngani na ? Ngizakudela ukuphila kwami ngenxa yakho . ”

text: Jesus answered him , Wilt thou lay down thy life for my sake ? Verily , verily , I say unto thee , The cock shall not crow , till thou hast denied me thrice .
text2: UJesu waphendula wathi : “ Uzakudela ukuphila kwakho ngenxa yami na ? Ngiqinisile , ngiqinisile ngithi kuwe : Iqhude alizukukhala , ungakangiphiki kathathu . ”

text: Let not your heart be troubled : ye believe in God , believe also in me .
text2: “ Inhliziyo yenu mayingakhathazeki . Kholwani nguNkulunkulu , nikholwe nayimi .

text: In my Father ' s house are many mansions : if it were not so , I would have told you . I go to prepare a place for you .
text2: Ekhaya likaBaba kukhona izindlu eziningi ; uma bekungenjalo , bengiyakunitshela ukuthi ngiya ukunilungisela indawo .

text: And if I go and prepare a place for you , I will come again , and receive you unto myself ; that where I am , there ye may be also .
text2: Nanxa ngiya nginilungisela indawo , ngobuye ngize , nginibuyisele kimi ukuba lapho ngikhona nibe khona nani .

text: And whither I go ye know , and the way ye know .
text2: Nalapho ngiya khona niyayazi indlela . ”

text: Thomas saith unto him , Lord , we know not whither thou goest ; and how can we know the way ?
text2: UTomase wathi kuye : “ Nkosi , asazi lapho uya khona ; siyazi kanjani indlela na ? ”

text: Jesus saith unto him , I am the way , the truth , and the life : no man cometh unto the Father , but by me .
text2: UJesu wathi kuye : “ Mina ngiyindlela , neqiniso , nokuphila ; akakho oza kuBaba ngaphandle kwami .

text: If ye had known me , ye should have known my Father also : and from henceforth ye know him , and have seen him .
text2: Uma beningazi mina , beniyakumazi noBaba ; kusukela manje niyamazi , nimbonile . ”

text: Philip saith unto him , Lord , shew us the Father , and it sufficeth us .
text2: UFiliphu wathi kuye : “ Nkosi , sikhombise uYihlo , kusanele . ”

text: Jesus saith unto him , Have I been so long time with you , and yet hast thou not known me , Philip ? he that hath seen me hath seen the Father ; and how sayest thou then , Shew us the Father ?
text2: UJesu wathi kuye : “ Isikhathi esingaka nginani , awukangazi , Filiphu , na ? Ongibonile mina ubonile uBaba ; usho kanjani ukuthi : ‘ Sikhombise uYihlo , ’ na ?

text: Believest thou not that I am in the Father , and the Father in me ? the words that I speak unto you I speak not of myself : but the Father that dwelleth in me , he doeth the works .
text2: Awukholwa ukuthi ngikuBaba , noBaba ukimi , na ? Amazwi engiwakhulumayo mina kini angiwakhulumi ngokwami ; kepha uBaba ohlezi kimi wenza imisebenzi yakhe .

text: Believe me that I am in the Father , and the Father in me : or else believe me for the very works ' sake .
text2: Kholwani yimi ukuthi ngikuBaba , noBaba ukimi ; uma kungenjalo , kholwani ngenxa yale misebenzi .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , He that believeth on me , the works that I do shall he do also ; and greater works than these shall he do ; because I go unto my Father .
text2: Ngiqinisile , ngiqinisile ngithi kini : Okholwa yimi , imisebenzi engiyenzayo mina naye uyakuyenza , nemikhulu kunale uyakuyenza ; ngokuba mina ngiya kuBaba .

text: And whatsoever ye shall ask in my name , that will I do , that the Father may be glorified in the Son .
text2: Noma yini eniyakukucela egameni lami ngiyakukwenza ukuba uBaba akhazimuliswe eNdodaneni .

text: If ye shall ask any thing in my name , I will do it .
text2: Uma nicela utho kimi egameni lami , ngolwenza .

text: If ye love me , keep my commandments .
text2: “ Uma ningithanda , niyakugcina imiyalo yami .

text: And I will pray the Father , and he shall give you another Comforter , that he may abide with you for ever ;
text2: Ngiyakucela kuBaba aniphe omunye uMduduzi wokuba ahlale kini phakade ,

text: Even the Spirit of truth ; whom the world cannot receive , because it seeth him not , neither knoweth him : but ye know him ; for he dwelleth with you , and shall be in you .
text2: uMoya weqiniso , izwe elingemamukele , ngokuba lingamboni , lingamazi ; nina niyamazi yena , ngokuba uhlala nani , uyakuba kini .

text: I will not leave you comfortless : I will come to you .
text2: Angiyikunishiya niyizintandane ; ngiyeza kini .

text: Yet a little while , and the world seeth me no more ; but ye see me : because I live , ye shall live also .
text2: Kuseyisikhashana izwe lingasangiboni , kepha niyangibona nina , ngokuba ngiphila mina , nani nizakuphila .

text: At that day ye shall know that I am in my Father , and ye in me , and I in you .
text2: Ngalolo suku niyakukwazi nina ukuba ngikuBaba , nani nikimi , nami ngikini .

text: He that hath my commandments , and keepeth them , he it is that loveth me : and he that loveth me shall be loved of my Father , and I will love him , and will manifest myself to him .
text2: Onemiyalo yami ayigcine , nguyena ongithandayo ; ongithandayo uyakuthandwa nguBaba , nami ngiyakumthanda , ngizibonakalise kuye . ”

text: Judas saith unto him , not Iscariot , Lord , how is it that thou wilt manifest thyself unto us , and not unto the world ?
text2: UJuda , ongesiye u - Iskariyothe , wathi kuye : “ Nkosi , kwenziwa yini ukuba uyakuzibonakalisa kithina , ungazibonakalisi kulo izwe , na ? ”

text: Jesus answered and said unto him , If a man love me , he will keep my words : and my Father will love him , and we will come unto him , and make our abode with him .
text2: UJesu waphendula , wathi kuye : “ Uma umuntu engithanda , uyakugcina izwi lami ; uBaba uyakumthanda ; siyakuza kuye , sihlale naye .

text: He that loveth me not keepeth not my sayings : and the word which ye hear is not mine , but the Father ' s which sent me .
text2: Ongangithandiyo kagcini amazwi ami , nezwi enilizwayo akusilo elami kepha ngelikaBaba ongithumileyo .

text: These things have I spoken unto you , being yet present with you .
text2: “ Ngikhulume lokho kini ngisahlezi nani .

text: But the Comforter , which is the Holy Ghost , whom the Father will send in my name , he shall teach you all things , and bring all things to your remembrance , whatsoever I have said unto you .
text2: Kepha uMduduzi , uMoya oNgcwele , uBaba ayakumthumela egameni lami uyakunifundisa konke , anikhumbuze konke enginitshele khona .

text: Peace I leave with you , my peace I give unto you : not as the world giveth , give I unto you . Let not your heart be troubled , neither let it be afraid .
text2: Ukuthula ngikushiya kinina , ukuthula kwami nginipha khona . Akunjengokupha kwezwe ukunipha kwami . Inhliziyo yenu mayingakhathazeki , ingesabi .

text: Ye have heard how I said unto you , I go away , and come again unto you . If ye loved me , ye would rejoice , because I said , I go unto the Father : for my Father is greater than I .
text2: “ Nizwile ukuthi nganitshela ngathi : Ngiyamuka , kepha ngiyabuyela kini . Uma beningithanda , beniyakujabula , ngokuba ngiya kuBaba , lokhu uBaba mkhulu kunami .

text: And now I have told you before it come to pass , that , when it is come to pass , ye might believe .
text2: Manje senginitshelile kungakenzeki , ukuze nikholwe , nxa sekwenzekile .

text: Hereafter I will not talk much with you : for the prince of this world cometh , and hath nothing in me .
text2: Angisayikukhuluma okuningi nani , ngokuba uyeza umbusi wezwe , kepha akanalutho kimi ,

text: But that the world may know that I love the Father ; and as the Father gave me commandment , even so I do . Arise , let us go hence .
text2: kodwa kungukuba izwe lazi ukuthi ngiyamthanda uBaba nokuthi ngenza njengokuba uBaba engiyalile . “ Sukumani simuke lapha .

text: I am the true vine , and my Father is the husbandman .
text2: “ Mina ngingumvini owonawona , uBaba ungumlimi .

text: Every branch in me that beareth not fruit he taketh away : and every branch that beareth fruit , he purgeth it , that it may bring forth more fruit .
text2: Yilelo nalelo gatsha elikimi , elingatheli izithelo , uyalisusa . Yilelo nalelo elithela izithelo uyalihlunga ukuba lithele kakhulu .

text: Now ye are clean through the word which I have spoken unto you .
text2: Nina senihlanzekile ngezwi engilikhulume kinina .

text: Abide in me , and I in you . As the branch cannot bear fruit of itself , except it abide in the vine ; no more can ye , except ye abide in me .
text2: Hlalani kimi , nami kini . Njengalokhu igatsha lingethele izithelo ngokwalo , kuphela uma lihlala emvinini , kunjalo nani , kuphela uma nihlala kimi .

text: I am the vine , ye are the branches : He that abideth in me , and I in him , the same bringeth forth much fruit : for without me ye can do nothing .
text2: “ Mina ngingumvini , nina ningamagatsha ; ohlala kimi , nami kuye , lowo uthela izithelo eziningi ; ngokuba ngaphandle kwami ningenze lutho .

text: If a man abide not in me , he is cast forth as a branch , and is withered ; and men gather them , and cast them into the fire , and they are burned .
text2: Uma umuntu engahlali kimi , ulahlwa ngaphandle njengegatsha , abune ; bawabuthe , bawaphonse emlilweni , ashe .

text: If ye abide in me , and my words abide in you , ye shall ask what ye will , and it shall be done unto you .
text2: Uma nihlala kimi , namazwi ami ehlala kini , niyakucela enikuthandayo , nikwenzelwe .

text: Herein is my Father glorified , that ye bear much fruit ; so shall ye be my disciples .
text2: UBaba uyakhazimuliswa ngalokhu ukuba nithele izithelo eziningi , nibe ngabafundi bami .

text: As the Father hath loved me , so have I loved you : continue ye in my love .
text2: “ Njengalokho uBaba engithandile , nami nginithandile ; hlalani othandweni lwami .

text: If ye keep my commandments , ye shall abide in my love ; even as I have kept my Father ' s commandments , and abide in his love .
text2: Uma nigcina imiyalo yami , niyakuhlala othandweni lwami , njengalokho mina ngigcinile imiyalo kaBaba ngihlala othandweni lwakhe .

text: These things have I spoken unto you , that my joy might remain in you , and that your joy might be full .
text2: Nginitshelile lokho ukuba ukuthokoza kwami kube kini , nokuthokoza kwenu kugcwale .

text: This is my commandment , That ye love one another , as I have loved you .
text2: “ Yilo umyalo wami wokuba nithandane , njengalokho nginithandile .

text: Greater love hath no man than this , that a man lay down his life for his friends .
text2: Akakho onothando olukhulu kunalolo lokuba adele ukuphila kwakhe ngenxa yabahlobo bakhe .

text: Ye are my friends , if ye do whatsoever I command you .
text2: Ningabahlobo bami , uma nenza lokhu enginiyala ngakho .

text: Henceforth I call you not servants ; for the servant knoweth not what his lord doeth : but I have called you friends ; for all things that I have heard of my Father I have made known unto you .
text2: Angisasho ukuthi niyizinceku , ngokuba inceku ayikwazi ukuthi inkosi yayo yenzani , kepha ngithe ningabahlobo nina , ngokuba konke engikuzwile kuBaba nginazisile khona .

text: Ye have not chosen me , but I have chosen you , and ordained you , that ye should go and bring forth fruit , and that your fruit should remain : that whatsoever ye shall ask of the Father in my name , he may give it you .
text2: Aningikhethanga nina , kodwa mina nginikhethile nina , nganibeka ukuba niphume , nithele izithelo , nezithelo zenu zihlale ukuba noma yini eniyakukucela kuBaba egameni lami aninike khona .

text: These things I command you , that ye love one another .
text2: Nginiyala ngalezo zinto , ukuze nithandane .

text: If the world hate you , ye know that it hated me before it hated you .
text2: “ Uma izwe linizonda , niyazi ukuthi langizonda mina ngaphambi kwenu .

text: If ye were of the world , the world would love his own : but because ye are not of the world , but I have chosen you out of the world , therefore the world hateth you .
text2: Uma beningabezwe , izwe belizakuthanda okwalo , kepha lokhu ningesibo abezwe kodwa nganikhetha mina ezweni , kungalokho izwe linizonda .

text: Remember the word that I said unto you , The servant is not greater than his lord . If they have persecuted me , they will also persecute you ; if they have kept my saying , they will keep yours also .
text2: Khumbulani izwi enganitshela lona mina lokuthi : ‘ Inceku ayinkulu kunenkosi yayo . ’ Uma bengizingele mina , nani bayakunizingela ; uma begcina izwi lami , nelenu bayakuligcina .

text: But all these things will they do unto you for my name ' s sake , because they know not him that sent me .
text2: Kepha konke lokho bayakukwenza kini ngenxa yegama lami , ngokuba bengamazi ongithumileyo .

text: If I had not come and spoken unto them , they had not had sin : but now they have no cloke for their sin .
text2: Uma bengingafikile , ngakhuluma kubo , ngabe abanasono ; kepha kalokhu kabanazaba ngesono sabo .

text: He that hateth me hateth my Father also .
text2: Ozonda mina uzonda noBaba .

text: If I had not done among them the works which none other man did , they had not had sin : but now have they both seen and hated both me and my Father .
text2: Uma bengingenzanga phakathi kwabo imisebenzi engenziwanga ngomunye , ngabe abanasono , kepha kalokhu babonile , bangizonda nami noBaba .

text: But this cometh to pass , that the word might be fulfilled that is written in their law , They hated me without a cause .
text2: Kodwa kunjalo ukuba kugcwaliseke izwi elilotshiweyo emthethweni wakubo lokuthi : ‘ Bangizonda ngeze . ’

text: But when the Comforter is come , whom I will send unto you from the Father , even the Spirit of truth , which proceedeth from the Father , he shall testify of me :
text2: “ Nxa esefikile uMduduzi engiyakumthumela kini evela kuBaba , uMoya weqiniso , ophuma kuBaba , nguyena oyakufakaza ngami .

text: And ye also shall bear witness , because ye have been with me from the beginning .
text2: Nani niyafakaza , ngokuba beninami kwasekuqaleni .

text: These things have I spoken unto you , that ye should not be offended .
text2: “ Lokho ngikukhulume kini ukuba ningakhubeki .

text: They shall put you out of the synagogues : yea , the time cometh , that whosoever killeth you will think that he doeth God service .
text2: Bayakunikhipha emasinagogeni , yebo , siyeza isikhathi sokuba lowo onibulalayo uyakuthi ukhonza uNkulunkulu .

text: And these things will they do unto you , because they have not known the Father , nor me .
text2: Lokhu - ke bayakukwenza ngokuba bengamazanga uBaba nami ;

text: But these things have I told you , that when the time shall come , ye may remember that I told you of them . And these things I said not unto you at the beginning , because I was with you .
text2: kepha lokho ngikukhulume kini , ukuze kuthi , nxa kufika leso sikhathi , nikhumbule ukuthi nganitshela khona ; anginitshelanga lokho kwasekuqaleni , ngokuba benginani .

text: But now I go my way to him that sent me ; and none of you asketh me , Whither goest thou ?
text2: “ Manje ngiyamuka , ngiya kongithumileyo ; akakho kinina ongibuza ukuthi : ‘ Uya ngaphi na ? ’

text: But because I have said these things unto you , sorrow hath filled your heart .
text2: Kepha ngokuba ngikhulume lokho kini , inhliziyo yenu igcwele usizi .

text: Nevertheless I tell you the truth ; It is expedient for you that I go away : for if I go not away , the Comforter will not come unto you ; but if I depart , I will send him unto you .
text2: Kodwa mina nginitshela iqiniso lokuthi kunilungele ukuba ngimuke ; ngokuba uma ngingamuki , uMduduzi kayikuza kini ; kepha uma ngimuka , ngiyakumthumela kini .

text: And when he is come , he will reprove the world of sin , and of righteousness , and of judgment :
text2: Lapho esefikile yena , uyakuqondisa izwe ngesono , nangokulunga , nangokwahlulela :

text: Of sin , because they believe not on me ;
text2: ngesono , ngokuba bengakholwa yimi ;

text: Of righteousness , because I go to my Father , and ye see me no more ;
text2: ngokulunga , ngokuba ngiya kuBaba , ningabe nisangibona ;

text: Of judgment , because the prince of this world is judged .
text2: ngokwahlulela , ngokuba umbusi waleli zwe wahlulelwe .

text: I have yet many things to say unto you , but ye cannot bear them now .
text2: “ Ngise nokuningi okokunitshela , kodwa ningekuthwale manje .

text: Howbeit when he , the Spirit of truth , is come , he will guide you into all truth : for he shall not speak of himself ; but whatsoever he shall hear , that shall he speak : and he will shew you things to come .
text2: Kepha nxa esefikile yena , uMoya weqiniso , uzakuniholela kulo lonke iqiniso ; ngokuba akayikukhuluma ngokwakhe , kodwa lokho akuzwayo uyakukukhuluma , anibikele okuzayo .

text: He shall glorify me : for he shall receive of mine , and shall shew it unto you .
text2: Uyakungikhazimulisa , ngokuba uyakuthatha kokwami anibikele khona .

text: All things that the Father hath are mine : therefore said I , that he shall take of mine , and shall shew it unto you .
text2: Konke uBaba anakho kungokwami ; ngalokho - ke ngithe uyakuthatha kokwami , anibikele .

text: A little while , and ye shall not see me : and again , a little while , and ye shall see me , because I go to the Father .
text2: “ Kusezakuba yisikhashana ningabe nisangibona , kubuye kube yisikhashana ningibone , ngokuba ngiya kuBaba . ”

text: Then said some of his disciples among themselves , What is this that he saith unto us , A little while , and ye shall not see me : and again , a little while , and ye shall see me : and , Because I go to the Father ?
text2: Ngakho abanye kubo abafundi bakhe base bekhuluma bodwa , bethi : “ Kuyini lokho akushoyo kithi ukuthi : ‘ Kusezakuba yisikhashana ningabe nisangibona , kubuye kube yisikhashana ningibone , ’ nokuthi : ‘ Ngokuba ngiya kuBaba , ’ na ? ”

text: They said therefore , What is this that he saith , A little while ? we cannot tell what he saith .
text2: Bathi : “ Kuyini lokho akushoyo ukuthi : ‘ Yisikhashana , ’ na ? Asazi ukuba uthini . ”

text: Now Jesus knew that they were desirous to ask him , and said unto them , Do ye inquire among yourselves of that I said , A little while , and ye shall not see me : and again , a little while , and ye shall see me ?
text2: UJesu wazi ukuthi bebethanda ukumbuza , wathi kubo : “ Niyabuzana ngalokho engikushiloyo ukuthi : ‘ Kusezakuba yisikhashana ningabe nisangibona kubuye kube yisikhashana ningibone , ’ na ?

text: Verily , verily , I say unto you , That ye shall weep and lament , but the world shall rejoice : and ye shall be sorrowful , but your sorrow shall be turned into joy .
text2: Ngiqinisile , ngiqinisile ngithi kini : Niyakukhala nilile nina , kepha izwe liyakujabula ; niyakuba lusizi nina , kepha usizi lwenu luyakuphendulwa lube ngukuthokoza .

text: A woman when she is in travail hath sorrow , because her hour is come : but as soon as she is delivered of the child , she remembereth no more the anguish , for joy that a man is born into the world .
text2: Owesifazane , nxa esabeletha , ulusizi , ngokuba sifikile isikhathi sakhe ; kepha nxa esembelethile umntwana , akabe esakhumbula ubuhlungu ngenxa yentokozo yokuba kuzelwe umuntu ezweni .

text: And ye now therefore have sorrow : but I will see you again , and your heart shall rejoice , and your joy no man taketh from you .
text2: Nani - ke nilusizi manje , kepha ngiyakubuye nginibone , inhliziyo yenu ithokoze ; intokozo yenu akakho onganamuka yona .

text: And in that day ye shall ask me nothing . Verily , verily , I say unto you , Whatsoever ye shall ask the Father in my name , he will give it you .
text2: Ngalolo suku aniyikubuza lutho kimi . Ngiqinisile , ngiqinisile ngithi kini : Lokhu eniyakukucela kuBaba egameni lami uyakuninika khona .

text: Hitherto have ye asked nothing in my name : ask , and ye shall receive , that your joy may be full .
text2: Kuze kube kalokhu anicelanga lutho egameni lami . Celani , niyakwamukeliswa ukuba intokozo yenu igcwale .

text: These things have I spoken unto you in proverbs : but the time cometh , when I shall no more speak unto you in proverbs , but I shall shew you plainly of the Father .
text2: “ Ngikhulume lokho kini ngemifanekiso ; isikhathi siyeza , lapho ngingasayikukhuluma ngemifanekiso ; kodwa ngiyakunitshela ngoBaba ngokusobala .

text: At that day ye shall ask in my name : and I say not unto you , that I will pray the Father for you :
text2: Ngalelo langa niyakucela egameni lami ; angisho kini ukuthi ngiyakunicelela mina kuBaba ;

text: For the Father himself loveth you , because ye have loved me , and have believed that I came out from God .
text2: ngokuba uBaba uqobo uyanithanda , ngokuba ningithandile nina , nakholwa ukuthi mina ngavela kuNkulunkulu .

text: I came forth from the Father , and am come into the world : again , I leave the world , and go to the Father .
text2: Ngavela kuBaba , ngeza ezweni ; ngiyalishiya futhi izwe , ngibuyela kuBaba . ”

text: His disciples said unto him , Lo , now speakest thou plainly , and speakest no proverb .
text2: Abafundi bakhe bathi kuye : “ Bheka , manje usukhuluma ngokusobala , awusakhulumi mfanekiso .

text: Now are we sure that thou knowest all things , and needest not that any man should ask thee : by this we believe that thou camest forth from God .
text2: Kalokhu siyazi ukuthi wazi konke , awudingi ukuba umuntu akubuze ; ngalokho siyakholwa ukuba wavela kuNkulunkulu . ”

text: Jesus answered them , Do ye now believe ?
text2: UJesu waphendula wathi : “ Seniyakholwa manje na ?

text: Behold , the hour cometh , yea , is now come , that ye shall be scattered , every man to his own , and shall leave me alone : and yet I am not alone , because the Father is with me .
text2: Bhekani , isikhathi siyeza , yebo , sesifikile sokuba nihlakazeke , yilowo nalowo aye kokwakhe , ningishiye ngingedwa ; nokho angingedwa , lokhu uBaba unami .

text: These things I have spoken unto you , that in me ye might have peace . In the world ye shall have tribulation : but be of good cheer ; I have overcome the world .
text2: “ Lokho ngikukhulume kini ukuba nibe nokuthula kimi . Ezweni niyakuba lusizi , kepha yimani isibindi , mina ngilinqobile izwe . ”

text: These words spake Jesus , and lifted up his eyes to heaven , and said , Father , the hour is come ; glorify thy Son , that thy Son also may glorify thee :
text2: UJesu wakhuluma lokho ; wayesephakamisela amehlo akhe ezulwini , wathi : “ Baba , isikhathi sifikile ; khazimulisa iNdodana yakho , ukuze iNdodana ikukhazimulise wena ,

text: As thou hast given him power over all flesh , that he should give eternal life to as many as thou hast given him .
text2: njengalokho uyiphile amandla phezu kwenyama yonke ukuba bonke oyiphe bona ibaphe ukuphila okuphakade .

text: And this is life eternal , that they might know thee the only true God , and Jesus Christ , whom thou hast sent .
text2: Ukuphila okuphakade yilokhu ukuba bazi wena Nkulunkulu wedwa oqinisileyo , nomthumileyo , uJesu Kristu .

text: I have glorified thee on the earth : I have finished the work which thou gavest me to do .
text2: Ngikukhazimulisile emhlabeni , ngifeze umsebenzi ongiphe wona ukuba ngiwenze .

text: And now , O Father , glorify thou me with thine own self with the glory which I had with thee before the world was .
text2: Manje - ke ngikhazimulise wena Baba , kuwe uqobo , ngenkazimulo ebenginayo ngikuwe , izwe lingakabikho .

text: I have manifested thy name unto the men which thou gavest me out of the world : thine they were , and thou gavest them me ; and they have kept thy word .
text2: “ Ngibonakalisile igama lakho kubantu ongiphe bona kwabasezweni ; babengabakho , wangipha bona ; baligcinile izwi lakho .

text: Now they have known that all things whatsoever thou hast given me are of thee .
text2: Sebazi ukuthi konke ongiphe khona kuvela kuwe .

text: For I have given unto them the words which thou gavest me ; and they have received them , and have known surely that I came out from thee , and they have believed that thou didst send me .
text2: Ngokuba amazwi ongiphe wona ngibaphile wona , bawamukela , bazi isibili ukuthi ngavela kuwe , bakholwa ukuthi wangithuma wena .

text: I pray for them : I pray not for the world , but for them which thou hast given me ; for they are thine .
text2: Ngiyabakhulekela bona ; angikhulekeli izwe kepha labo ongiphe bona , ngokuba bengabakho .

text: And all mine are thine , and thine are mine ; and I am glorified in them .
text2: Konke okwami kungokwakho , nokwakho kungokwami ; ngikhazimulisiwe kubona .

text: And now I am no more in the world , but these are in the world , and I come to thee . Holy Father , keep through thine own name those whom thou hast given me , that they may be one , as we are .
text2: Angisekho ezweni mina , basezweni bona , mina ngiza kuwe . Baba ongcwele , bagcine egameni lakho labo ongiphe bona , ukuze babe munye njengathi .

text: While I was with them in the world , I kept them in thy name : those that thou gavest me I have kept , and none of them is lost , but the son of perdition ; that the scripture might be fulfilled .
text2: Lapho ngise nabo ezweni , ngabagcina egameni lakho labo ongiphe bona , ngabalonda ; akakho kubo owalahleka , kuphela indodana yokulahlwa , ukuba kugcwaliseke umbhalo .

text: And now come I to thee ; and these things I speak in the world , that they might have my joy fulfilled in themselves .
text2: “ Sengiza kuwe kalokhu ; ngikhuluma lokhu ezweni ukuba babe nokuthokoza kwami , kugcwale kubo .

text: I have given them thy word ; and the world hath hated them , because they are not of the world , even as I am not of the world .
text2: Mina ngibanikile izwi lakho ; izwe labazonda , ngokuba bengesibo abezwe , njengalokhu nami angisiye owezwe .

text: I pray not that thou shouldest take them out of the world , but that thou shouldest keep them from the evil .
text2: Angiceli ukuba ubasuse ezweni ; kepha ngicela ukuba ubalonde kokubi .

text: They are not of the world , even as I am not of the world .
text2: Abasibo abezwe , njengalokhu nami angisiye owezwe .

text: Sanctify them through thy truth : thy word is truth .
text2: Bangcwelise ngeqiniso , izwi lakho liyiqiniso .

text: As thou hast sent me into the world , even so have I also sent them into the world .
text2: Njengalokho wangithumela ezweni , nami ngibathumela ezweni .

text: And for their sakes I sanctify myself , that they also might be sanctified through the truth .
text2: Ngiyazingcwelisa ngenxa yabo ukuba bangcweliswe nabo ngeqiniso .

text: Neither pray I for these alone , but for them also which shall believe on me through their word ;
text2: “ Angiceleli laba bodwa kepha nalabo abakholwa yimi ngezwi labo

text: That they all may be one ; as thou , Father , art in me , and I in thee , that they also may be one in us : that the world may believe that thou hast sent me .
text2: ukuba bonke babe munye , njengalokhu wena Baba ukimi , nami ngikuwe , ukuba nabo babe kithina , ukuze izwe likholwe ukuthi wena ungithumile .

text: And the glory which thou gavest me I have given them ; that they may be one , even as we are one :
text2: Nenkazimulo ongiphe yona ngiyiphile bona , ukuze babe munye , njengalokhu thina simunye ,

text: I in them , and thou in me , that they may be made perfect in one ; and that the world may know that thou hast sent me , and hast loved them , as thou hast loved me .
text2: mina kubona , nawe kimina , ukuba bapheleliswe ebunyeni , ukuze izwe lazi ukuba wena ungithumile , wabathanda , njengalokho ungithandile .

text: Father , I will that they also , whom thou hast given me , be with me where I am ; that they may behold my glory , which thou hast given me : for thou lovedst me before the foundation of the world .
text2: “ Baba , ngithanda ukuba labo ongiphe bona nabo babe khona nami lapha ngikhona , ukuze babone inkazimulo yami ongiphe yona ; ngokuba wangithanda , kungakasekelwa izwe .

text: O righteous Father , the world hath not known thee : but I have known thee , and these have known that thou hast sent me .
text2: “ Baba olungileyo , izwe kalikwazanga , kepha mina ngikwazile , nalaba bazile ukuthi ungithumile .

text: And I have declared unto them thy name , and will declare it : that the love wherewith thou hast loved me may be in them , and I in them .
text2: Ngibazisile igama lakho , ngizakubazisa lona ukuba uthando ongithande ngalo lube kubo , nami ngibe kubo . ”

text: When Jesus had spoken these words , he went forth with his disciples over the brook Cedron , where was a garden , into the which he entered , and his disciples .
text2: UJesu esekhulume lawo mazwi waphuma kanye nabafundi bakhe , waya phesheya komfudlana iKedroni , lapho kwakukhona insimu angena kuyo yena nabafundi bakhe .

text: And Judas also , which betrayed him , knew the place : for Jesus ofttimes resorted thither with his disciples .
text2: NoJuda owamkhaphelayo wayeyazi leyo ndawo , ngokuba uJesu wayevama ukuhlangana khona nabafundi bakhe .

text: Judas then , having received a band of men and officers from the chief priests and Pharisees , cometh thither with lanterns and torches and weapons .
text2: Khona uJuda , esethole isigaba samabutho nezikhonzi kubapristi abakhulu nabaFarisi , waya lapho , benezihlanti nezibani nezikhali .

text: Jesus therefore , knowing all things that should come upon him , went forth , and said unto them , Whom seek ye ?
text2: Khona uJesu ekwazi konke okuyakumehlela waphuma , wathi kubo : “ Nifuna ubani na ? ”

text: They answered him , Jesus of Nazareth . Jesus saith unto them , I am he . And Judas also , which betrayed him , stood with them .
text2: Bamphendula bathi : “ UJesu waseNazaretha . ” UJesu wathi kubo : “ Yimina . ” UJuda omkhaphelayo wayemi nabo .

text: As soon then as he had said unto them , I am he , they went backward , and fell to the ground .
text2: Kuthe - ke ukuba athi kubo : “ Yimina , ” bahlehla nyovane , bawa phansi .

text: Then asked he them again , Whom seek ye ? And they said , Jesus of Nazareth .
text2: Waphinda wababuza wathi : “ Nifuna ubani na ? ” Bathi : “ UJesu waseNazaretha . ”

text: Jesus answered , I have told you that I am he : if therefore ye seek me , let these go their way :
text2: UJesu waphendula wathi : “ Nginitshelile ukuthi yimina ; uma - ke nifuna mina , bayekeni laba , bahambe , ”

text: That the saying might be fulfilled , which he spake , Of them which thou gavest me have I lost none .
text2: ukuba ligcwaliseke izwi alishiloyo lokuthi : “ Kulabo ongiphe bona angilahlekelwanga namunye . ”

text: Then Simon Peter having a sword drew it , and smote the high priest ' s servant , and cut off his right ear . The servant ' s name was Malchus .
text2: USimoni Petru enenkemba wayihosha , wayigenca inceku yompristi omkhulu , wayinquma indlebe yokunene . Igama lenceku lalinguMalkusi .

text: Then said Jesus unto Peter , Put up thy sword into the sheath : the cup which my Father hath given me , shall I not drink it ?
text2: Khona uJesu wathi kuPetru : “ Faka inkemba emgodleni wayo ; angiyikusiphuza kanti isitsha anginike sona uBaba na ? ”

text: Then the band and the captain and officers of the Jews took Jesus , and bound him ,
text2: Njalo - ke isigaba nenduna yenkulungwane nezikhonzi zabaJuda bambamba uJesu , bambopha ;

text: And led him away to Annas first ; for he was father in law to Caiaphas , which was the high priest that same year .
text2: baqala bamyisa ku - Anase , ngokuba engumukhwe kaKayafase obengumpristi omkhulu walowo mnyaka .

text: Now Caiaphas was he , which gave counsel to the Jews , that it was expedient that one man should die for the people .
text2: UKayafase kambe nguye owaluleka abaJuda ngokuthi kubalungele ukuba kufe umumtu abe munye ngenxa yesizwe .

text: And Simon Peter followed Jesus , and so did another disciple : that disciple was known unto the high priest , and went in with Jesus into the palace of the high priest .
text2: USimoni Petru walandela uJesu nomunye umfundi . Lowo mfundi wayaziwa ngumpristi omkhulu , wangena noJesu egcekeni lompristi omkhulu ;

text: But Peter stood at the door without . Then went out that other disciple , which was known unto the high priest , and spake unto her that kept the door , and brought in Peter .
text2: kepha uPetru wayemi ngaphandle emnyango . Waphuma - ke lowo mfundi omunye owaziwa ngumpristi omkhulu , wakhuluma nomlindikazi womnyango , wamngenisa uPetru .

text: Then saith the damsel that kept the door unto Peter , Art not thou also one of this man ' s disciples ? He saith , I am not .
text2: Intombazana elinda emnyango yayisithi kuPetru : “ Imbala nawe awusiye owabafundi balowo muntu na ? ” Wathi yena : “ Angisiye . ”

text: And the servants and officers stood there , who had made a fire of coals ; for it was cold : and they warmed themselves : and Peter stood with them , and warmed himself .
text2: Kwakumi khona izinceku nezikhonzi zibasile umlilo wamalahle , ngokuba kwakumakhaza , zotha ; noPetru wayenazo otha .

text: The high priest then asked Jesus of his disciples , and of his doctrine .
text2: Kepha umpristi omkhulu wabuza uJesu ngabafundi bakhe nangemfundiso yakhe .

text: Jesus answered him , I spake openly to the world ; I ever taught in the synagogue , and in the temple , whither the Jews always resort ; and in secret have I said nothing .
text2: UJesu wamphendula wathi : “ Ngikhulumile obala ezweni . Ngezikhathi zonke bengifundisa esinagogeni nasethempelini , lapho abaJuda bonke bebuthana khona , angikhulumanga lutho ngasese .

text: Why askest thou me ? ask them which heard me , what I have said unto them : behold , they know what I said .
text2: Ubuzelani kimi na ? Buza kulabo abezwile lokho engakukhuluma kubo ; bheka , bona bayakwazi engakushoyo . ”

text: And when he had thus spoken , one of the officers which stood by struck Jesus with the palm of his hand , saying , Answerest thou the high priest so ?
text2: Esasho lokho , esinye isikhonzi esasimi khona sammukula uJesu , sathi : “ Uphendula umpristi omkhulu kanjalo na ? ”

text: Jesus answered him , If I have spoken evil , bear witness of the evil : but if well , why smitest thou me ?
text2: UJesu wasiphendula wathi : “ Uma ngikhulume kabi , fakaza ngalobo bubi ; kodwa uma kukuhle , ungishayelani na ? ”

text: Now Annas had sent him bound unto Caiaphas the high priest .
text2: U - Anase wamthumela eboshiwe kuKayafase umpristi omkhulu .

text: And Simon Peter stood and warmed himself . They said therefore unto him , Art not thou also one of his disciples ? He denied it , and said , I am not .
text2: Kepha uSimoni Petru wayemi otha . Bathi - ke kuye : “ Imbala nawe awusiye owabafundi bakhe na ? ” Waphika yena , wathi : “ Angisiye . ”

text: One of the servants of the high priest , being his kinsman whose ear Peter cut off , saith , Did not I see thee in the garden with him ?
text2: Enye yezinceku zompristi omkhulu , eyisihlobo salowo ondlebe yaso uPetru abeyinqumile , yathi : “ Angikubonanga yini mina ensimini unaye na ? ”

text: Peter then denied again : and immediately the cock crew .
text2: Wabuye waphika uPetru ; masinyane lakhala iqhude .

text: Then led they Jesus from Caiaphas unto the hall of judgment : and it was early ; and they themselves went not into the judgment hall , lest they should be defiled ; but that they might eat the passover .
text2: Base bekhipha uJesu kuKayafase , bemyisa endlini yokwahlulela ; kwakusekuseni . Kepha bona kabangenanga enqabeni ukuba bangangcoli kodwa babe nokudla iphasika .

text: Pilate then went out unto them , and said , What accusation bring ye against this man ?
text2: Khona uPilatu waphumela kubo , wathi : “ Nimthwesa cala lini lo muntu na ? ”

text: They answered and said unto him , If he were not a malefactor , we would not have delivered him up unto thee .
text2: Baphendula , bathi kuye : “ Uma lona ebengesiye owenza okubi , nga singamlethanga kuwe . ”

text: Then said Pilate unto them , Take ye him , and judge him according to your law . The Jews therefore said unto him , It is not lawful for us to put any man to death :
text2: Khona uPilatu wathi kubo : “ Mthatheni nina , nimahlulele ngomthetho wakini . ” Bathi kuye abaJuda : “ Asivunyelwe ukubulala umuntu , ”

text: That the saying of Jesus might be fulfilled , which he spake , signifying what death he should die .
text2: ukuba kugcwaliseke izwi likaJesu alishilo lapha ebonisa ukuthi uyakufa ngokufa okunjani .

text: Then Pilate entered into the judgment hall again , and called Jesus , and said unto him , Art thou the King of the Jews ?
text2: UPilatu wabuye wangena enqabeni , wabiza uJesu , wathi kuye : “ Wena uyinkosi yabaJuda na ? ”

text: Jesus answered him , Sayest thou this thing of thyself , or did others tell it thee of me ?
text2: UJesu waphendula wathi : “ Uzisholo lokhu wena , noma kusho abanye kuwe ngami na ? ”

text: Pilate answered , Am I a Jew ? Thine own nation and the chief priests have delivered thee unto me : what hast thou done ?
text2: UPilatu waphendula wathi : “ Kanti ngingumJuda yini mina na ? Isizwe sakini nabapristi abakhulu bakunikezele kimi ; wenzeni na ? ”

text: Jesus answered , My kingdom is not of this world : if my kingdom were of this world , then would my servants fight , that I should not be delivered to the Jews : but now is my kingdom not from hence .
text2: UJesu waphendula wathi : “ Umbuso wami awusiwo owaleli zwe . Uma umbuso wami ubungowaleli zwe , izikhonzi zami zaziyakulwa ukuba nginganikezelwa kubaJuda . Kepha kalokhu umbuso wami awusiwo owalapha . ”

text: Pilate therefore said unto him , Art thou a king then ? Jesus answered , Thou sayest that I am a king . To this end was I born , and for this cause came I into the world , that I should bear witness unto the truth . Every one that is of the truth heareth my voice .
text2: Wayesethi uPilatu kuye : “ Kanti nokho uyinkosi na ? ” UJesu waphendula wathi : “ Usho khona . Ngiyinkosi ; ngizalelwe lokho , ngafikela lokho ezweni ukuba ngifakazele iqiniso . Bonke abeqiniso bayalizwa izwi lami . ”

text: Pilate saith unto him , What is truth ? And when he had said this , he went out again unto the Jews , and saith unto them , I find in him no fault at all .
text2: Wathi uPilatu kuye : “ Iqiniso liyini na ? ” Eseshilo lokho wabuye waphumela kubaJuda , wathi kubo : “ Angifumani cala kuye .

text: But ye have a custom , that I should release unto you one at the passover : will ye therefore that I release unto you the King of the Jews ?
text2: Kepha ninesiko lokuba nginikhululele omunye ngePhasika ; ngakho niyathanda ukuba nginikhululele inkosi yabaJuda na ? ”

text: Then cried they all again , saying , Not this man , but Barabbas . Now Barabbas was a robber .
text2: Khona babuye bamemeza bonke , bathi : “ Qha lona , kodwa uBaraba . ” Kepha uBaraba wayengumphangi .

text: Then Pilate therefore took Jesus , and scourged him .
text2: UPilatu wayesemthatha uJesu , wamshaya .

text: And the soldiers platted a crown of thorns , and put it on his head , and they put on him a purple robe ,
text2: Amabutho aluka umqhele wameva awufaka ekhanda lakhe , amembathisa ingubo ebubende ;

text: And said , Hail , King of the Jews ! and they smote him with their hands .
text2: aya kuye , athi : “ Bayede , nkosi yabaJuda ! ” Ammukula .

text: Pilate therefore went forth again , and saith unto them , Behold , I bring him forth to you , that ye may know that I find no fault in him .
text2: UPilatu wabuye waphuma , wathi kubo : “ Bhekani , ngimkhiphela kini , ukuze nazi ukuba angifumani cala kuye . ”

text: Then came Jesus forth , wearing the crown of thorns , and the purple robe . And Pilate saith unto them , Behold the man !
text2: Wayesephuma uJesu ethwele umqhele wameva nengubo ebubende . Wathi kubo uPilatu : “ Bhekani lo muntu ! ”

text: When the chief priests therefore and officers saw him , they cried out , saying , Crucify him , crucify him . Pilate saith unto them , Take ye him , and crucify him : for I find no fault in him .
text2: Bathi bembona abapristi abakhulu nezikhonzi , bamemeza bathi : “ Mbethele , mbethele esiphambanweni ! ” UPilatu wathi kubo : “ Mthatheni nina , nimbethele esiphambanweni , ngokuba angifumani cala kuye . ”

text: The Jews answered him , We have a law , and by our law he ought to die , because he made himself the Son of God .
text2: Kepha abaJuda bamphendula bathi : “ Sinomthetho thina ; ngalo mthetho ufanele ukufa , ngokuba ezenzile iNdodana kaNkulunkulu . ”

text: When Pilate therefore heard that saying , he was the more afraid ;
text2: Kuthe uPilatu ezwa lelo zwi , kwayikhona esaba kakhulu ,

text: And went again into the judgment hall , and saith unto Jesus , Whence art thou ? But Jesus gave him no answer .
text2: wabuye wangena enqabeni , wathi kuJesu : “ Ungowaphi wena na ? ” Kepha uJesu kamphendulanga .

text: Then saith Pilate unto him , Speakest thou not unto me ? knowest thou not that I have power to crucify thee , and have power to release thee ?
text2: Khona wathi uPilatu kuye : “ Awukhulumi kimi na ? Awazi ukuthi nginamandla okukukhulula , nginamandla futhi okukubethela esiphambanweni na ? ”

text: Jesus answered , Thou couldest have no power at all against me , except it were given thee from above : therefore he that delivered me unto thee hath the greater sin .
text2: UJesu waphendula wathi : “ Ngabe awunamandla neze phezu kwami , ukuba awuwanikwanga ngaphezulu . Ngalokho - ke onginikele kuwe unesono esikhulu . ”

text: And from thenceforth Pilate sought to release him : but the Jews cried out , saying , If thou let this man go , thou art not Caesar ' s friend : whosoever maketh himself a king speaketh against Caesar .
text2: Ngalokho uPilatu wayefuna ukumkhulula . Kepha abaJuda bamemeza bathi : “ Uma ukhulula lona , awusiye umhlobo kaKesari ; osuka ezenza inkosi , umelene noKesari . ”

text: When Pilate therefore heard that saying , he brought Jesus forth , and sat down in the judgment seat in a place that is called the Pavement , but in the Hebrew , Gabbatha .
text2: Kuthe uPilatu esezwa lawo mazwi wamkhiphela ngaphandle uJesu ; wahlala esihlalweni sokwahlulela endaweni ethiwa eGandaywe ngamatshe kodwa ngesiHeberu iGabatha .

text: And it was the preparation of the passover , and about the sixth hour : and he saith unto the Jews , Behold your King !
text2: Kwakungolokulungisela iPhasika kungathi ihora lesithupha . Wathi kubaJuda : “ Bhekani inkosi yenu . ”

text: But they cried out , Away with him , away with him , crucify him . Pilate saith unto them , Shall I crucify your King ? The chief priest answered , We have no king but Caesar .
text2: Ngakho bamemeza bathi : “ Susa , susa , mbethele esiphambanweni ! ” Wathi kubo uPilatu : “ Ngibethele inkosi yenu na ? ” Abapristi abakhulu baphendula bathi : “ Asinankosi , uKesari kuphela . ”

text: Then delivered he him therefore unto them to be crucified . And they took Jesus , and led him away .
text2: Wayesemnikela kubo ukuba abethelwe esiphambanweni . Bamthatha - ke uJesu , bahamba naye .

text: And he bearing his cross went forth into a place called the place of a skull , which is called in the Hebrew Golgotha :
text2: Waphuma ezithwalele isiphambano , waya endaweni ethiwa iNdawo Yekhanda , ethiwa ngesiHeberu iGolgotha .
