text: Where they crucified him , and two other with him , on either side one , and Jesus in the midst .
text2: Bambethela khona nabanye ababili kanye naye ngalapha nangalapha , uJesu ephakathi .

text: And Pilate wrote a title , and put it on the cross . And the writing was , JESUS OF NAZARETH THE KING OF THE JEWS .
text2: Kepha uPilatu waloba isaziso , wasibeka esiphambanweni . Kwakulotshiwe ukuthi : UJESU WASENAZARETHA , INKOSI YABAJUDA .

text: This title then read many of the Jews : for the place where Jesus was crucified was nigh to the city : and it was written in Hebrew , and Greek , and Latin .
text2: Khona abaningi babaJuda bafunda leso saziso ; ngokuba indawo leyo , lapho uJesu wabethelwa khona esiphambanweni , yayiseduze nomuzi . Kwakulotshiwe ngesiHeberu , nangesiRoma , nangesiGreki .

text: Then said the chief priests of the Jews to Pilate , Write not , The King of the Jews ; but that he said , I am King of the Jews .
text2: Base bethi abapristi abakhulu babaJuda kuPilatu : “ Ungalobi ukuthi : ‘ Inkosi yabaJuda , ’ kepha ukuba yena wathi : ‘ NgiyiNkosi yabaJuda . ’ ”

text: Pilate answered , What I have written I have written .
text2: UPilatu waphendula wathi : “ Engikulobile ngikulobile . ”

text: Then the soldiers , when they had crucified Jesus , took his garments , and made four parts , to every soldier a part ; and also his coat : now the coat was without seam , woven from the top throughout .
text2: Kuthe amabutho esembethele uJesu esiphambanweni , athatha izingubo zakhe , azenza izabelo ezine , kwaba yilelo nalelo butho laba nesabelo , neyembe futhi . Kepha iyembe lalingenamthungo , lalukiwe lonke kusukela phezulu .

text: They said therefore among themselves , Let us not rend it , but cast lots for it , whose it shall be : that the scripture might be fulfilled , which saith , They parted my raiment among them , and for my vesture they did cast lots . These things therefore the soldiers did .
text2: Ngakho - ke akhuluma odwa , athi : “ Asingalidabuli , kodwa asilenzele inkatho yokuthi liyakuba ngelikabani , ” ukuze kugcwaliseke umbhalo othi : “ Babelana izingubo zami , benzelana inkatho ngesambatho sami . ” Lokho - ke akwenza amabutho .

text: Now there stood by the cross of Jesus his mother , and his mother ' s sister , Mary the wife of Cleophas , and Mary Magdalene .
text2: Kepha kwakumi ngasesiphambanweni sikaJesu unina kanye nodadewabo kanina , uMariya umkaKleyophase , noMariya Magdalena .

text: When Jesus therefore saw his mother , and the disciple standing by , whom he loved , he saith unto his mother , Woman , behold thy son !
text2: Kuthe uJesu ebona unina nomfundi amthandayo bemi ngakhona , wathi kunina : “ Mame , bheka indodana yakho . ”

text: Then saith he to the disciple , Behold thy mother ! And from that hour that disciple took her unto his own home .
text2: Wayesethi kumfundi : “ Bheka unyoko . ” Kusukela kuleso sikhathi umfundi lowo wamyisa kwakhe .

text: After this , Jesus knowing that all things were now accomplished , that the scripture might be fulfilled , saith , I thirst .
text2: Emva kwalokho uJesu , ekwazi ukuthi konke sekuphelelisiwe ukuba umbhalo ugcwaliseke , wathi : “ Ngomile . ”

text: Now there was set a vessel full of vinegar : and they filled a spunge with vinegar , and put it upon hyssop , and put it to his mouth .
text2: Kwakubekiwe khona isitsha sigcwele uviniga ; khona bachoma ilula ligcwele uviniga othini lwehisopi , baliyisa emlonyeni wakhe .

text: When Jesus therefore had received the vinegar , he said , It is finished : and he bowed his head , and gave up the ghost .
text2: Kwathi ukuba uJesu ewamukele uviniga , wathi : “ Kufeziwe ; ” wagebisa ikhanda , wafa .

text: The Jews therefore , because it was the preparation , that the bodies should not remain upon the cross on the sabbath day , ( for that sabbath day was an high day , ) besought Pilate that their legs might be broken , and that they might be taken away .
text2: Khona abaJuda , ngokuba kwakungolokulungisela , ukuze izidumbu zingahlali esiphambanweni ngesabatha , ngokuba lolo suku lwesabatha lwalulukhulu , banxusa uPilatu ukuba yaphulwe imilenze yabo , basuswe .

text: Then came the soldiers , and brake the legs of the first , and of the other which was crucified with him .
text2: Ayeseza - ke amabutho , ayaphula imilenze yowokuqala neyomunye owayebethelwe naye .

text: But when they came to Jesus , and saw that he was dead already , they brake not his legs :
text2: Esefika kuJesu , ebona ukuthi usefile , kawayaphulanga imilenze yakhe ;

text: But one of the soldiers with a spear pierced his side , and forthwith came there out blood and water .
text2: kodwa elinye lamabutho lamgwaza ohlangothini ngomkhonto , kwaphuma masinyane igazi namanzi .

text: And he that saw it bare record , and his record is true : and he knoweth that he saith true , that ye might believe .
text2: Obonileyo ufakazile , ubufakazi bakhe buqinisile ; yena - ke uyazi ukuthi ukhuluma iqiniso , ukuze nikholwe nani .

text: For these things were done , that the scripture should be fulfilled , A bone of him shall not be broken .
text2: Ngokuba lokho kwenzeka ukuba kugcwaliseke umbhalo othi : “ Akuyikwaphulwa thambo lakhe . ”

text: And again another scripture saith , They shall look on him whom they pierced .
text2: Futhi omunye umbhalo uthi : “ Bayakumbheka abamgwazileyo . ”

text: And after this Joseph of Arimathaea , being a disciple of Jesus , but secretly for fear of the Jews , besought Pilate that he might take away the body of Jesus : and Pilate gave him leave . He came therefore , and took the body of Jesus .
text2: Emva kwalokho uJosefa wase - Arimatheya , engumfundi kaJesu kepha ekufihla ngokwesaba abaJuda , wacela kuPilatu ukuba asuse isidumbu sikaJesu ; uPilatu wavuma - ke . Wayesefika , wasisusa isidumbu sikaJesu .

text: And there came also Nicodemus , which at the first came to Jesus by night , and brought a mixture of myrrh and aloes , about an hundred pound weight .
text2: Kweza noNikodemu owafika kuye kuqala ebusuku , waletha ixube lenhlaka nomhlaba kungathi amalitra ayikhulu .

text: Then took they the body of Jesus , and wound it in linen clothes with the spices , as the manner of the Jews is to bury .
text2: Ngakho base besithatha isidumbu sikaJesu , basisonga ngezindwangu zelineni kanye namakha njengesiko labaJuda lokumbela .

text: Now in the place where he was crucified there was a garden ; and in the garden a new sepulchre , wherein was never man yet laid .
text2: Khona ngakuleyo ndawo , lapho wayebethelwe khona esiphambanweni , kwakukhona insimu , nasensimini kukhona ithuna elisha okwakungazange kubekwe muntu kulo .

text: There laid they Jesus therefore because of the Jews ' preparation day ; for the sepulchre was nigh at hand .
text2: Bambeka lapho - ke uJesu ngenxa yolokulungisela lwabaJuda , ngokuba ithuna laliseduze .

text: The first day of the week cometh Mary Magdalene early , when it was yet dark , unto the sepulchre , and seeth the stone taken away from the sepulchre .
text2: Kwathi ngosuku lokuqala lweviki uMariya Magdalena wafika ethuneni ekuseni kusemnyama , wabona itshe lisusiwe ethuneni .

text: Then she runneth , and cometh to Simon Peter , and to the other disciple , whom Jesus loved , and saith unto them , They have taken away the Lord out of the sepulchre , and we know not where they have laid him .
text2: Khona wayesegijima waya kuSimoni Petru nakulowo mfundi omunye uJesu amthandayo , wathi kubo : “ Bayisusile iNkosi ethuneni , asazi lapha beyibeke khona . ”

text: Peter therefore went forth , and that other disciple , and came to the sepulchre .
text2: Ngakho wayesephuma uPetru nomunye umfundi , beza ethuneni .

text: So they ran both together : and the other disciple did outrun Peter , and came first to the sepulchre .
text2: Bagijima bobabili kanyekanye ; kepha umfundi omunye wagijima kakhulu kunoPetru , wafika kuqala ethuneni ;

text: And he stooping down , and looking in , saw the linen clothes lying ; yet went he not in .
text2: elunguza wabona izindwangu zelineni zikhona , kepha akangenanga .

text: Then cometh Simon Peter following him , and went into the sepulchre , and seeth the linen clothes lie ,
text2: Khona wafika noSimoni Petru emlandela , wangena ethuneni , wabona izindwangu zelineni zikhona ,

text: And the napkin , that was about his head , not lying with the linen clothes , but wrapped together in a place by itself .
text2: neduku ebelisekhanda lakhe libekiwe lingekho ezindwangwini zelineni , kepha lisongwe lilodwa kwenye indawo .

text: Then went in also that other disciple , which came first to the sepulchre , and he saw , and believed .
text2: Khona wayesengena nomfundi omunye ofike kuqala ethuneni , wabona , wakholwa ;

text: For as yet they knew not the scripture , that he must rise again from the dead .
text2: ngokuba bebengakawuqondi umbhalo wokuthi ubefanele ukuvuka kwabafileyo .

text: Then the disciples went away again unto their own home .
text2: Base bemuka abafundi , baphindela kubo .

text: But Mary stood without at the sepulchre weeping : and as she wept , she stooped down , and looked into the sepulchre ,
text2: Kepha uMariya wema ethuneni ngaphandle ekhala ; esakhala walunguza ethuneni ;

text: And seeth two angels in white sitting , the one at the head , and the other at the feet , where the body of Jesus had lain .
text2: wabona izingelosi ezimbili zembethe okumhlophe , zihlezi , enye ngasekhanda nenye ngasezinyaweni , lapho isidumbu sikaJesu besilele khona .

text: And they say unto her , Woman , why weepest thou ? She saith unto them , Because they have taken away my Lord , and I know not where they have laid him .
text2: Zona - ke zathi kuye : “ Mame , ukhalelani na ? ” Wathi kuzo : “ Bayithathile iNkosi yami , futhi angazi ukuthi bayibekephi . ”

text: And when she had thus said , she turned herself back , and saw Jesus standing , and knew not that it was Jesus .
text2: Eseshilo lokho waphenduka , wabona uJesu emi , kepha wayengazi ukuthi nguJesu .

text: Jesus saith unto her , Woman , why weepest thou ? whom seekest thou ? She , supposing him to be the gardener , saith unto him , Sir , if thou have borne him hence , tell me where thou hast laid him , and I will take him away .
text2: UJesu wathi kuye : “ Mame , ukhalelani na ? Ufuna bani na ? ” Kepha yena ethi ngumphathi wensimu wathi kuye : “ Nkosi , uma umsusile , ngitshele ukuthi umbekephi , ngiye ngiyakumthatha mina . ”

text: Jesus saith unto her , Mary . She turned herself , and saith unto him , Rabboni ; which is to say , Master .
text2: UJesu wathi kuye : “ Mariya ! ” Waphenduka , wathi kuye ngesiHeberu : “ Rabuni , ” okungukuthi : “ Mfundisi . ”

text: Jesus saith unto her , Touch me not ; for I am not yet ascended to my Father : but go to my brethren , and say unto them , I ascend unto my Father , and your Father ; and to my God , and your God .
text2: UJesu wathi kuye : “ Ungangithinti , ngokuba angikenyukeli kuBaba . Kepha yana kubazalwane bami , ubatshele ukuthi ngenyukela kuBaba noYihlo , kuNkulunkulu wami noNkulunkulu wenu . ”

text: Mary Magdalene came and told the disciples that she had seen the Lord , and that he had spoken these things unto her .
text2: UMariya Magdalena weza wabikela abafundi ukuthi : “ Ngiyibonile iNkosi , ” nokuthi : “ Ishilo lokho kimi . ”

text: Then the same day at evening , being the first day of the week , when the doors were shut where the disciples were assembled for fear of the Jews , came Jesus and stood in the midst , and saith unto them , Peace be unto you .
text2: Kwathi - ke kusihlwa ngalolo suku , olokuqala lweviki , iminyango ivaliwe lapho abafundi bekhona ngokwesaba abaJuda , uJesu wafika wema phakathi kwabo , wathi kubo : “ Ukuthula makube kinina . ”

text: And when he had so said , he shewed unto them his hands and his side . Then were the disciples glad , when they saw the Lord .
text2: Eseshilo lokho wabakhombisa izandla nohlangothi lwakhe . Base bethokoza abafundi beyibona iNkosi .

text: Then said Jesus to them again , Peace be unto you : as my Father hath sent me , even so send I you .
text2: Khona uJesu wabuye wathi kubo : “ Ukuthula makube kinina . Njengokuba uBaba engithume mina , nami ngiyanithuma nina . ”

text: And when he had said this , he breathed on them , and saith unto them , Receive ye the Holy Ghost :
text2: Kwathi ukuba asho njalo , wabaphephetha , wathi kubo : “ Yamukelani uMoya oNgcwele .

text: Whose soever sins ye remit , they are remitted unto them ; and whose soever sins ye retain , they are retained .
text2: Enibathethelela izono zabo bathethelelwe ; nenibabamba ngazo babanjiwe . ”

text: But Thomas , one of the twelve , called Didymus , was not with them when Jesus came .
text2: Kepha uTomase , omunye kwabayishumi nambili , othiwa uDidimu , wayengekho kubo mhla efika uJesu .

text: The other disciples therefore said unto him , We have seen the Lord . But he said unto them , Except I shall see in his hands the print of the nails , and put my finger into the print of the nails , and thrust my hand into his side , I will not believe .
text2: Ngakho - ke abanye abafundi bathi kuye : “ Siyibonile iNkosi . ” Kepha wathi kubo : “ Uma ngingaboni ezandleni zayo inxeba lezipikili , ngifake umunwe wami enxebeni lezipikili , ngifake isandla sami ohlangothini lwayo , angisoze ngakholwa . ”

text: And after eight days again his disciples were within , and Thomas with them : then came Jesus , the doors being shut , and stood in the midst , and said , Peace be unto you .
text2: Emva kwezinsuku eziyisishiyagalombili abafundi bakhe babesendlini futhi , uTomase enabo . UJesu wafika iminyango ivaliwe , wema phakathi kwabo , wathi : “ Ukuthula makube kinina . ”

text: Then saith he to Thomas , reach hither thy finger , and behold my hands ; and reach hither thy hand , and thrust it into my side : and be not faithless , but believing .
text2: Wayesethi kuTomase : “ Zisa lapha umunwe wakho , ubone izandla zami ; zisa isandla sakho , usifake ohlangothini lwami ; ungabi ngongakholwayo kodwa okholwayo . ”

text: And Thomas answered and said unto him , My Lord and my God .
text2: UTomase waphendula , wathi kuye : “ Nkosi yami , Nkulunkulu wami ! ”

text: Jesus saith unto him , Thomas , because thou hast seen me , thou hast believed : blessed are they that have not seen , and yet have believed .
text2: UJesu wathi kuye : “ Ngokuba ungibonile , ukholiwe na ? Babusisiwe abakholwa bengabonanga . ”

text: And many other signs truly did Jesus in the presence of his disciples , which are not written in this book :
text2: Izibonakaliso ezinye eziningi uJesu wazenza phambi kwabafundi bakhe , ezingalotshiwe kule ncwadi .

text: But these are written , that ye might believe that Jesus is the Christ , the Son of God ; and that believing ye might have life through his name .
text2: Kodwa lezi zilotshiwe ukuba nikholwe ukuthi uJesu unguKristu , iNdodana kaNkulunkulu , nokuba nikholwe , nibe nokuphila egameni lakhe .

text: After these things Jesus shewed himself again to the disciples at the sea of Tiberias ; and on this wise shewed he himself .
text2: Emva kwalokho uJesu wabuye wazibonakalisa kubafundi ngaselwandle lwaseTiberiya ; wazibonakalisa kanje :

text: There were together Simon Peter , and Thomas called Didymus , and Nathanael of Cana in Galilee , and the sons of Zebedee , and two other of his disciples .
text2: kwakukhona ndawonye oSimoni Petru , noTomase othiwa uDidimu , noNathanayeli waseKhana laseGalile , nabakaZebedewu , nabanye ababili kubafundi bakhe .

text: Simon Peter saith unto them , I go a fishing . They say unto him , We also go with thee . They went forth , and entered into a ship immediately ; and that night they caught nothing .
text2: USimoni Petru wathi kubo : “ Ngiya kodoba . ” Bathi kuye : “ Nathi sihamba nawe . ” Base bephuma , bangena emkhunjini ; kepha ngalobo busuku ababambanga lutho .

text: But when the morning was now come , Jesus stood on the shore : but the disciples knew not that it was Jesus .
text2: Kuthe sekusa , uJesu wayemi ogwini . Kepha abafundi babengazi ukuthi nguJesu .

text: Then Jesus saith unto them , Children , have ye any meat ? They answered him , No .
text2: UJesu wathi - ke kubo : “ Bantwana , aninakho ukudla na ? ” Bamphendula bathi : “ Qha . ”

text: And he said unto them , Cast the net on the right side of the ship , and ye shall find . They cast therefore , and now they were not able to draw it for the multitude of fishes .
text2: Wayesethi kubo : “ Phonsani inetha ngakwesokunene somkhumbi , nizakuthola . ” Base bephonsa , ababe besaba namandla ukulidonsa ngenxa yobuningi bezinhlanzi .

text: Therefore that disciple whom Jesus loved saith unto Peter , It is the Lord . Now when Simon Peter heard that it was the Lord , he girt his fisher ' s coat unto him , ( for he was naked , ) and did cast himself into the sea .
text2: Khona lowo mfundi uJesu amthandayo wathi kuPetru : “ YiNkosi . ” USimoni Petru , ekuzwa ukuthi yiNkosi , wagqoka , ngokuba wayehamba ze , waziphonsa elwandle .

text: And the other disciples came in a little ship ; ( for they were not far from land , but as it were two hundred cubits , ) dragging the net with fishes .
text2: Kepha abanye abafundi beza ngesikebhe , ngokuba bebengekude nenhlabathi kepha kungathi izingalo ezingamakhulu amabili , bedonsa inetha linezinhlanzi .

text: As soon then as they were come to land , they saw a fire of coals there , and fish laid thereon , and bread .
text2: Kuthe sebephumele emhlabathini , babona umlilo wamalahle , nezinhlanzi zibekwe kuwo , nesinkwa .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Bring of the fish which ye have now caught .
text2: UJesu wathi kubo : “ Lethani izinhlanzi kwenizibambe manje . ”

text: Simon Peter went up , and drew the net to land full of great fishes , and hundred and fifty and three : and for all there were so many , yet was not the net broken .
text2: Wasuka uSimoni Petru , walihudulela emhlabathini inetha . Ligcwele izinhlanzi ezinkulu , ziyikhulu namashumi ayisihlanu nantathu ; noma zingako , inetha alidabukanga .

text: Jesus saith unto them , Come and dine . And none of the disciples durst ask him , Who art thou ? knowing that it was the Lord .
text2: UJesu wathi kubo : “ Wozani nidle . ” Kepha akwabakho kubafundi owaba nesibindi sokumbuza ngokuthi : “ Ungubani wena na ? ” Bazi ukuthi yiyo iNkosi .

text: Jesus then cometh , and taketh bread , and giveth them , and fish likewise .
text2: UJesu weza , wathabatha isinkwa , wabapha , nezinhlanzi futhi .

text: This is now the third time that Jesus shewed himself to his disciples , after that he was risen from the dead .
text2: Lokho sekungokwesithathu uJesu ebonakaliswa kubafundi , esevukile kwabafileyo .

text: So when they had dined , Jesus saith to Simon Peter , Simon , son of Jonas , lovest thou me more than these ? He saith unto him , Yea , Lord ; thou knowest that I love thee . He saith unto him , Feed my lambs .
text2: Khona sebedlile uJesu wathi kuSimoni Petru : “ Simoni kaJona , uyangithanda kunalaba na ? ” Wathi kuye : “ Yebo , Nkosi , uyazi wena ukuthi ngiyakuthanda . ” Wathi kuye : “ Yipha amawundlu ami . ”

text: He saith to him again the second time , Simon , son of Jonas , lovest thou me ? He saith unto him , Yea , Lord ; thou knowest that I love thee . He saith unto him , Feed my sheep .
text2: Wabuye wathi kuye ngokwesibili : “ Simoni kaJona , uyangithanda na ? ” Wathi kuye : “ Yebo , Nkosi , uyazi wena ukuthi ngiyakuthanda . ” Wathi kuye : “ Yalusa izimvu zami . ”

text: He saith unto him the third time , Simon , son of Jonas , lovest thou me ? Peter was grieved because he said unto him the third time , Lovest thou me ? And he said unto him , Lord , thou knowest all things ; thou knowest that I love thee . Jesus saith unto him , Feed my sheep .
text2: Wathi kuye ngokwesithathu : “ Simoni kaJona , uyangithanda na ? ” UPetru wadabuka ngokuba wathi kuye ngokwesithathu : “ Uyangithanda na ? ” Wathi kuye : “ Nkosi , wazi konke wena , uyazi ukuthi ngiyakuthanda . ” UJesu wathi kuye : “ Yipha izimvu zami .

text: Verily , verily , I say unto thee , When thou wast young , thou girdedst thyself , and walkedst whither thou wouldest : but when thou shalt be old , thou shalt stretch forth thy hands , and another shall gird thee , and carry thee whither thou wouldest not .
text2: Ngiqinisile , ngiqinisile ngithi kuwe : Usemusha wawugqoka , uhambe lapho uthanda khona ; kepha nxa usumdala , uyakwelula izandla zakho , omunye akugqokise , akuyise lapho ungathandi khona .

text: This spake he , signifying by what death he should glorify God . And when he had spoken this , he saith unto him , Follow me .
text2: Kepha wakusho lokho ekhomba ukufa azakumdumisa uNkulunkulu ngakho . ” Eseshilo lokho wathi : “ Ngilandele . ”

text: Then Peter , turning about , seeth the disciple whom Jesus loved following ; which also leaned on his breast at supper , and said , Lord , which is he that betrayeth thee ?
text2: UPetru ephenduka wabona umfundi uJesu amthandayo elandela , oyena futhi wayencike esifubeni sakhe ekudleni , nowathi : “ Nkosi , ngubani ozakukukhaphela na ? ”

text: Peter seeing him saith to Jesus , Lord , and what shall this man do ?
text2: Kuthe uPetru embona lowo , wathi kuJesu : “ Nkosi , kepha lona , pho ? ”

text: Jesus saith unto him , If I will that he tarry till I come , what is that to thee ? follow thou me .
text2: UJesu wathi kuye : “ Uma ngithanda ukuba ahlale ngize ngifike , kuyini kuwe na ? Wena landela mina . ”

text: Then went this saying abroad among the brethren , that that disciple should not die : yet Jesus said not unto him , He shall not die ; but , If I will that he tarry till I come , what is that to thee ?
text2: Ngakho - ke leli zwi laphumela kubazalwane lokuthi lowo mfundi akayikufa . Kanti uJesu akashongo ukuthi akayikufa kodwa ukuthi : “ Uma ngithanda ukuba ahlale ngize ngifike , kuyini kuwe na ? ”

text: This is the disciple which testifieth of these things , and wrote these things : and we know that his testimony is true .
text2: Nguye lo mfundi ofakaza ngalezi zinto nokulobile lokhu ; siyazi ukuthi ubufakazi bakhe buqinisile .

text: And there are also many other things which Jesus did , the which , if they should be written every one , I suppose that even the world itself could not contain the books that should be written . Amen .
text2: Kukhona nezinye izinto eziningi azenza uJesu ; uma zilotshiwe zona ngazinye , ngithi nezwe lonke lingezanele izincwadi ezingalotshwa .

text: The former treatise have I made , O Theophilus , of all that Jesus began both to do and teach ,
text2: Incwadi yokuqala ngayiloba , Theyofilu , ngakho konke uJesu aqala ukukwenza nokukufundisa ,

text: Until the day in which he was taken up , after that he through the Holy Ghost had given commandments unto the apostles whom he had chosen :
text2: kwaze kwaba lusuku akhushulwa ngalo , esebayalile ngoMoya oNgcwele abaphostoli ayebakhethile ;

text: To whom also he shewed himself alive after his passion by many infallible proofs , being seen of them forty days , and speaking of the things pertaining to the kingdom of God :
text2: waziveza kubo ephilile emva kokuhlupheka kwakhe ngobufakazi obuningi , wabonwa yibo izinsuku ezingamashumi amane ekhuluma ngezombuso kaNkulunkulu ;

text: And , being assembled together with them , commanded them that they should not depart from Jerusalem , but wait for the promise of the Father , which , saith he , ye have heard of me .
text2: kwathi ehlangene nabo , wabayala ngokuthi : “ Ningamuki eJerusalema , kodwa nihlalele isithembiso sikaYise enasizwa ngami .

text: For John truly baptized with water ; but ye shall be baptized with the Holy Ghost not many days hence .
text2: Ngokuba uJohane wayebhapathiza ngamanzi , kepha nina nizakubhapathizwa ngoMoya oNgcwele kungakadluli izinsuku eziningi . ”

text: When they therefore were come together , they asked of him , saying , Lord , wilt thou at this time restore again the kingdom to Israel ?
text2: Khona labo ababebuthene bambuza bathi : “ Nkosi , usawubuyisela umbuso ku - Israyeli ngalesi sikhathi na ? ”

text: And he said unto them , It is not for you to know the times or the seasons , which the Father hath put in his own power .
text2: Wathi kubo : “ Akusikho okwenu ukwazi izikhathi noma imizuzu uBaba akumisele ngamandla akhe ;

text: But ye shall receive power , after that the Holy Ghost is come upon you : and ye shall be witnesses unto me both in Jerusalem , and in all Judaea , and in Samaria , and unto the uttermost part of the earth .
text2: kodwa nizakwamukeliswa amandla , uMoya oNgcwele esefikile phezu kwenu , nibe ngofakazi bami eJerusalema , naseJudiya lonke , naseSamariya kuze kube sekugcineni komhlaba . ”

text: And when he had spoken these things , while they beheld , he was taken up ; and a cloud received him out of their sight .
text2: Kwathi eseshilo lokho , wakhushulwa bebuka ; ifu lamsusa emehlweni abo .

text: And while they looked stedfastly toward heaven as he went up , behold , two men stood by them in white apparel ;
text2: Bathi besagqolozela ezulwini emuka , bheka , amadoda amabili ayemi kubo , embethe izingubo ezimhlophe ,

text: Which also said , Ye men of Galilee , why stand ye gazing up into heaven ? this same Jesus , which is taken up from you into heaven , shall so come in like manner as ye have seen him go into heaven .
text2: athi : “ Madoda aseGalile , nimeleni nibheka ezulwini na ? UJesu lo , osuswe kini enyuselwa ezulwini , uyakuza kanjalo , njengalokho nimbonile eya ezulwini . ”

text: Then returned they unto Jerusalem from the mount called Olivet , which is from Jerusalem a sabbath day ' s journey .
text2: Khona babuyela eJerusalema bevela entabeni ethiwa eyemiNqumo eseduze neJerusalema , ibanga lohambo lwesabatha .

text: And when they were come in , they went up into an upper room , where abode both Peter , and James , and John , and Andrew , Philip , and Thomas , Bartholomew , and Matthew , James the son of Alphaeus , and Simon Zelotes , and Judas the brother of James .
text2: Kwathi sebengenile , benyukela ekamelweni eliphezulu , lapho bebehlala khona : oPetru , noJohane , noJakobe , no - Andreya , noFiliphu , noTomase , noBartolomewu , noMathewu , noJakobe ka - Alfewu , noSimoni umZelothe , noJuda kaJakobe .

text: These all continued with one accord in prayer and supplication , with the women , and Mary the mother of Jesus , and with his brethren .
text2: Bonke laba baqinisela nganhliziyonye ekukhulekeni kanye nabesifazane , noMariya unina kaJesu , nabafowabo .

text: And in those days Peter stood up in the midst of the disciples , and said , ( the number of names together were about an hundred and twenty , )
text2: Ngaleyo mihla uPetru wasukuma phakathi kwabazalwane , isixuku sabantu esasikhona ndawonye kwakungathi ikhulu namashumi amabili , wathi :

text: Men and brethren , this scripture must needs have been fulfilled , which the Holy Ghost by the mouth of David spake before concerning Judas , which was guide to them that took Jesus .
text2: “ Madoda , bazalwane , kwakumelwe ukuba kugcwaliseke umbhalo uMoya oNgcwele awukhulumayo ngaphambili ngomlomo kaDavide ngoJuda owayengumholi kulabo ababamba uJesu ,

text: For he was numbered with us , and had obtained part of this ministry .
text2: ngokuba wayebalwe kanye nathi , wathola isabelo kule nkonzo . ”

text: Now this man purchased a field with the reward of iniquity ; and falling headlong , he burst asunder in the midst , and all his bowels gushed out .
text2: Lowo - ke wazuza insimu ngomvuzo wokungalungi , wawa ngekhanda , waqhuma phakathi , nezibilini zakhe zonke zachitheka ;

text: And it was known unto all the dwellers at Jerusalem ; insomuch as that field is called in their proper tongue , Aceldama , that is to say , The field of blood .
text2: kwaziwa yibo bonke abakhileyo eJerusalema , yaze yaqanjwa leyo nsimu ngolimi lwakubo ngokuthi i - Akeldama , okungukuthi iNsimu Yegazi .

text: For it is written in the book of Psalms , Let his habitation be desolate , and let no man dwell therein : and his bishoprick let another take .
text2: Ngokuba kulotshiwe eNcwadini yamaHubo ukuthi : “ Umuzi wakhe mawube yihlane , kungabikho ohlala kuwo , ” nokuthi : “ Isikhundla sakhe asithathwe ngomunye . ”

text: Wherefore of these men which have companied with us all the time that the Lord Jesus went in and out among us ,
text2: “ Ngakho kulawo madoda ayehamba nathi isikhathi sonke , lapho iNkosi uJesu ingena , iphuma phakathi kwethu ,

text: Beginning from the baptism of John , unto that same day that he was taken up from us , must one be ordained to be a witness with us of his resurrection .
text2: kuqalela embhapathizweni kaJohane kwaze kwaba lusuku akhushulwa ngalo kithi , kumelwe ukuba enye kuwo ibe ngufakazi kanye nathi ngokuvuka kwakhe . ”

text: And they appointed two , Joseph called Barsabas , who was surnamed Justus , and Matthias .
text2: Base bemisa ababili , uJosefa othiwa uBarsaba , othiwa futhi uJustu , kanye noMathiya .

text: And they prayed , and said , Thou , Lord , which knowest the hearts of all men , shew whether of these two thou hast chosen ,
text2: Base bekhuleka bethi : “ Wena Nkosi , owazi izinhliziyo zabantu bonke , ake ukhombe omunye kulaba ababili omkhethileyo

text: That he may take part of this ministry and apostleship , from which Judas by transgression fell , that he might go to his own place .
text2: ukuba athathe isikhundla sale nkonzo nobuphostoli aphambuka kuso uJuda ukuya endaweni yakhe . ”

text: And they gave forth their lots ; and the lot fell upon Matthias ; and he was numbered with the eleven apostles .
text2: Base bebenzela inkatho ; yadla uMathiya ; wabalwa kanye nabaphostoli abayishumi nanye .

text: And when the day of Pentecost was fully come , they were all with one accord in one place .
text2: Kwathi sekufikile usuku lwePhentekoste , bonke babebuthene ndawonye .

text: And suddenly there came a sound from heaven as of a rushing mighty wind , and it filled all the house where they were sitting .
text2: Ngokungazelelwe kwavela ezulwini inhlokomo kwangathi eyokuvunguza komoya onamandla ; yona yagcwalisa indlu yonke ababehlezi kuyo .

text: And there appeared unto them cloven tongues like as of fire , and it sat upon each of them .
text2: Kwase kubonakala kubo izilimi ezahlukeneyo kungathi ezomlilo ; zahlala phezu kwalowo nalowo kubo .

text: And they were all filled with the Holy Ghost , and began to speak with other tongues , as the Spirit gave them utterance .
text2: Base begcwala bonke uMoya oNgcwele , baqala ukukhuluma ngezinye izilimi , njengalokho uMoya wabapha ukuphumisela .

text: And there were dwelling at Jerusalem Jews , devout men , out of every nation under heaven .
text2: Kepha kwakukhona abaJuda abakhile eJerusalema , amadoda akholwayo , evela ezizweni zonke eziphansi kwezulu ;

text: Now when this was noised abroad , the multitude came together , and were confounded , because that every man heard them speak in his own language .
text2: kwathi kuzwakele lowo mdumo , uquqaba lwabuthana , lwaphithiza , ngokuba kwaba yilowo nalowo wabezwa bekhuluma ngolimi lwakubo .

text: And they were all amazed and marvelled , saying one to another , Behold , are not all these which speak Galilaeans ?
text2: Bethuka , bamangala bathi : “ Bheka , bonke laba abakhulumayo abasibo abaseGalile na ?

text: And how hear we every man in our own tongue , wherein we were born ?
text2: Yini , pho , ukuba sonke ngabanye sizwe ngolimi lwakithi esazalwa nalo na ?

text: Parthians , and Medes , and Elamites , and the dwellers in Mesopotamia , and in Judaea , and Cappadocia , in Pontus , and Asia ,
text2: AmaParte , namaMede , nama - Elamithi , nabakhile eMesopotamiya , naseJudiya , naseKhaphadosiya , nasePontu , nase - Asiya ,

text: Phrygia , and Pamphylia , in Egypt , and in the parts of Libya about Cyrene , and strangers of Rome , Jews and proselytes ,
text2: naseFrigiya , nasePhamfiliya , naseGibithe , nasezweni laseLibiya ngaseKhurene , nezihambi zaseRoma ,

text: Cretes and Arabians , we do hear them speak in our tongues the wonderful works of God .
text2: nabaJuda namaproselite , abaseKrethe nabase - Arabiya , siyabezwa bekhuluma ngezilimi zakithi ngemisebenzi emikhulu kaNkulunkulu . ”

text: And they were all amazed , and were in doubt , saying one to another , What meaneth this ?
text2: Bonke bamangala , basambatheka , bathi omunye komunye : “ Kuthini lokhu na ? ”

text: Others mocking said , These men are full of new wine .
text2: Kepha abanye bebabhuqa bathi : “ Bagcwele iwayini elimnandi . ”

text: But Peter , standing up with the eleven , lifted up his voice , and said unto them , Ye men of Judaea , and all ye that dwell at Jerusalem , be this known unto you , and hearken to my words :
text2: Wayesesukuma uPetru nabayishumi nanye , waphakamisa izwi lakhe , waphumisela wathi kubo : “ Madoda akwaJuda nani nonke enakhileyo eJerusalema , makwazeke lokhu kini , nibeke indlebe emazwini ami .

text: For these are not drunken , as ye suppose , seeing it is but the third hour of the day .
text2: Ngokuba laba kabadakiwe njengokucabanga kwenu , lokhu kuseyihora lesithathu lemini ;

text: But this is that which was spoken by the prophet Joel ;
text2: kodwa lokhu kuyikho okwakhulunywa ngomprofethi uJoweli ukuthi :

text: And it shall come to pass in the last days , saith God , I will pour out of my Spirit upon all flesh : and your sons and your daughters shall prophesy , and your young men shall see visions , and your old men shall dream dreams :
text2: “ ‘ Kuyakuthi ezinsukwini zokuphela , kusho uNkulunkulu , ngiyakuthulula uMoya wami phezu kwayo yonke inyama ; amadodana enu namadodakazi enu ayakuprofetha , izinsizwa zenu zibone imibono , abadala benu baphuphe amaphupho ;

text: And on my servants and on my handmaidens I will pour out in those days of my Spirit ; and they shall prophesy :
text2: yebo , naphezu kwezinceku zami nezincekukazi zami ngiyakuthulula uMoya wami ngaleyo mihla , ziyakuprofetha .

text: And I will shew wonders in heaven above , and signs in the earth beneath ; blood , and fire , and vapour of smoke :
text2: Ngiyakuveza izimangaliso ezulwini phezulu nezibonakaliso emhlabeni phansi , igazi , nomlilo , nokuthunqa komusi .

text: The sun shall be turned into darkness , and the moon into blood , before that great and notable day of the Lord come :
text2: Ilanga liyakuphenduka ubumnyama , inyanga ibe yigazi , lungakafiki usuku olukhulu noluqhamileyo lweNkosi .

text: And it shall come to pass , that whosoever shall call on the name of the Lord shall be saved .
text2: Kuyakuthi yilowo nalowo obiza igama leNkosi uyakusindiswa . ’

text: Ye men of Israel , hear these words ; Jesus of Nazareth , a man approved of God among you by miracles and wonders and signs , which God did by him in the midst of you , as ye yourselves also know :
text2: “ Madoda akwa - Israyeli , zwanini lawa mazwi : UJesu waseNazaretha , indoda efakazelwe nguNkulunkulu phambi kwenu ngemisebenzi yamandla nangezimangaliso nangezibonakaliso uNkulunkulu azenza ngaye phakathi kwenu , njengalokhu nazi nina uqobo lwenu ,

text: Him , being delivered by the determinate counsel and foreknowledge of God , ye have taken , and by wicked hands have crucified and slain :
text2: yena lo , esenikelwe ngesu elimisiweyo nangokwaziphambili kukaNkulunkulu , nambethela ngezandla zabangenamthetho , nambulala ;

text: Whom God hath raised up , having loosed the pains of death : because it was not possible that he should be holden of it .
text2: lowo uNkulunkulu wamvusa ethukulula iminjunju yokufa , lokhu kwakungenakwenzeka ukuba abanjwe yikho .

text: For David speaketh concerning him , I foresaw the Lord always before my face , for he is on my right hand , that I should not be moved :
text2: Ngokuba uDavide uthi ngaye : “ ‘ Ngayibona iNkosi phambi kwami njalo , ngokuba ingakwesokunene sami , ukuze nginganyakaziswa .

text: Therefore did my heart rejoice , and my tongue was glad ; moreover also my flesh shall rest in hope :
text2: Ngalokho inhliziyo yami iyajabula , nolimi lwami luyethaba ; ngisho nenyama yami iyakuhlala ngokwethemba .

text: Because thou wilt not leave my soul in hell , neither wilt thou suffer thine Holy One to see corruption .
text2: Ngokuba awuyikushiya umphefumulo wami eHayidese , futhi awuyikuvuma oNgcwele wakho abone ukubola .

text: Thou hast made known to me the ways of life ; thou shalt make me full of joy with thy countenance .
text2: Wangazisa izindlela zokuphila ; uyakungigcwalisa ngokujabula ebusweni bakho . ’

text: Men and brethren , let me freely speak unto you of the patriarch David , that he is both dead and buried , and his sepulchre is with us unto this day .
text2: “ Madoda , bazalwane , ake ngikhulume kini ngokusobala ngokhokho uDavide ukuthi wafa , nokuthi wembelwa , nokuthi ithuna lakhe lisekhona kithi nanamuhla .

text: Therefore being a prophet , and knowing that God had sworn with an oath to him , that of the fruit of his loins , according to the flesh , he would raise up Christ to sit on his throne ;
text2: Ngakho lokhu engumprofethi , ekwazi ukuthi uNkulunkulu wayefungile kuye ngesifungo ukuthi enzalweni yokhalo lwakhe uyakubeka omunye esihlalweni sakhe sobukhosi ,

text: He seeing this before spake of the resurrection of Christ , that his soul was not left in hell , neither his flesh did see corruption .
text2: ebona kuse phambili , wakhuluma ngokuvuka kukaKristu ukuthi akashiywanga eHayidese , nenyama yakhe ayibonanga ukubola .

text: This Jesus hath God raised up , whereof we all are witnesses .
text2: UJesu lo uNkulunkulu wamvusa , esingofakazi bakho thina sonke ;

text: Therefore being by the right hand of God exalted , and having received of the Father the promise of the Holy Ghost , he hath shed forth this , which ye now see and hear .
text2: ngakho ephakanyiselwe ngakwesokunene sikaNkulunkulu , esamukele kuYise isithembiso sikaMoya oNgcwele , wakuthulula lokhu enikubonayo nenikuzwayo .

text: For David is not ascended into the heavens : but he saith himself , The LORD said unto my Lord , Sit thou on my right hand ,
text2: Ngokuba uDavide akenyukelanga ezulwini , kepha yena uthi : ‘ INkosi yathi eNkosini yami : “ Hlala ngakwesokunene sami ,

text: Until I make thy foes thy footstool .
text2: ngize ngibeke izitha zakho zibe yisenabelo sezinyawo zakho . ” ’

text: Therefore let all the house of Israel know assuredly , that God hath made that same Jesus , whom ye have crucified , both Lord and Christ .
text2: “ Ngakho indlu yonke yakwa - Israyeli mayazi impela ukuthi uNkulunkulu umenzile iNkosi noKristu uJesu lo enambethela nina esiphambanweni . ”

text: Now when they heard this , they were pricked in their heart , and said unto Peter and to the rest of the apostles , Men and brethren , what shall we do ?
text2: Sebekuzwa bahlabeka enhliziyweni , bathi kuPetru nakwabanye abaphostoli : “ Madoda , bazalwane , siyakwenze njani na ? ”

text: Then Peter said unto them , Repent , and be baptized every one of you in the name of Jesus Christ for the remission of sins , and ye shall receive the gift of the Holy Ghost .
text2: UPetru wayesethi : “ Phendukani , yilowo nalowo abhapathizwe egameni likaJesu Kristu kukho ukuthethelelwa kwezono zenu ; khona niyakwamukeliswa isiphiwo sikaMoya oNgcwele .

text: For the promise is unto you , and to your children , and to all that are afar off , even as many as the Lord our God shall call .
text2: Ngokuba isithembiso ngesenu nesabantwana benu , esabo bonke abakude , bonke iNkosi uNkulunkulu wethu eyakubabiza . ”

text: And with many other words did he testify and exhort , saying , Save yourselves from this untoward generation .
text2: Wafakaza nangamanye amazwi amaningi , wabayala wathi : “ Zisindiseni kulesi sizukulwane esiphambeneyo . ”

text: Then they that gladly received his word were baptized : and the same day there were added unto them about three thousand souls .
text2: Ngakho abalamukeleyo izwi lakhe babhapathizwa , kwenezelwa ngalowo muhla abantu kungathi izinkulungwane ezintathu .

text: And they continued stedfastly in the apostles ' doctrine and fellowship , and in breaking of bread , and in prayers .
text2: Baqinisela njalo esifundisweni sabaphostoli , nasekuhlanganeni , nasekuhlephuleni isinkwa , nasemikhulekweni .

text: And fear came upon every soul : and many wonders and signs were done by the apostles .
text2: Kepha kwaba yilowo nalowo muntu wehlelwa ngukwesaba ; kwenziwa ngabaphostoli izimangaliso nezibonakaliso eziningi .

text: And all that believed were together , and had all things common ;
text2: Bonke abakholwayo babe ndawonye , bahlanganyela izinto zonke ;

text: And sold their possessions and goods , and parted them to all men , as every man had need .
text2: bathengisa ngemfuyo nangempahla , babela bonke ngayo njengokuswela kwabo .

text: And they , continuing daily with one accord in the temple , and breaking bread from house to house , did eat their meat with gladness and singleness of heart ,
text2: Imihla ngemihla baqinisela nganhliziyonye ethempelini , bahlephula isinkwa ekhaya , badla ukudla kwabo ngentokozo nangobumhlophe benhliziyo ,

text: Praising God , and having favour with all the people . And the Lord added to the church daily such as should be saved .
text2: bemdumisa uNkulunkulu , bethandeka kubantu bonke . INkosi yenezela ebandleni imihla ngemihla abasindiswayo .

text: Now Peter and John went up together into the temple at the hour of prayer , being the ninth hour .
text2: UPetru noJohane bakhuphukela ethempelini ngehora lokukhuleka , elesishiyagalolunye .

text: And a certain man lame from his mother ' s womb was carried , whom they laid daily at the gate of the temple which is called Beautiful , to ask alms of them that entered into the temple ;
text2: Kwase kulethwa indoda ethile eyisishosha kwasesiswini sikanina , ababeyibeka imihla ngemihla ngasemnyango wethempeli othiwa Omuhle ukuba icele ukwabelwa izipho kwabangenayo ethempelini .

text: Who seeing Peter and John about to go into the temple asked an alms .
text2: Kwathi ukuba abone oPetru noJohane bezakungena ethempelini , wacela ukwabelwa isipho .

text: And Peter , fastening his eyes upon him with John , said , Look on us .
text2: Kepha uPetru wamgqolozela kanye noJohane , wathi : “ Sibheke ! ”

text: And he gave heed unto them , expecting to receive something of them .
text2: Wayesebabheka ethemba ukuba amukele utho kubo .

text: Then Peter said , Silver and gold have I none ; but such as I have give I thee : In the name of Jesus Christ of Nazareth rise up and walk .
text2: Kodwa uPetru wathi : “ Isiliva negolide anginalo ; kepha lokho enginakho ngikupha khona : egameni likaJesu Kristu waseNazaretha , hamba . ”

text: And he took him by the right hand , and lifted him up : and immediately his feet and ancle bones received strength .
text2: Wayesembamba ngesandla sokunene , wamsukumisa ; kwaqina masinyane izinyawo zakhe namaqakala ,

text: And he leaping up stood , and walked , and entered with them into the temple , walking , and leaping , and praising God .
text2: egxuma , wema , wahamba , wangena nabo ethempelini , ehamba , egxuma , emdumisa uNkulunkulu .

text: And all the people saw him walking and praising God :
text2: Abantu bonke bambona ehamba , edumisa uNkulunkulu .

text: And they knew that it was he which sat for alms at the Beautiful gate of the temple : and they were filled with wonder and amazement at that which had happened unto him .
text2: Kepha base bemazi ukuba nguyena owayehlalela ukuphiwa ngaseMnyango Omuhle wethempeli , behlelwa ngukwesaba nokumangala ngokwenzakele kuye .

text: And as the lame man which was healed held Peter and John , all the people ran together unto them in the porch that is called Solomon ' s , greatly wondering .
text2: Esabambelele koPetru noJohane , bonke abantu bagijimela kubo emphemeni othiwa okaSolomoni , besaba kakhulu .

text: And when Peter saw it , he answered unto the people , Ye men of Israel , why marvel ye at this ? or why look ye so earnestly on us , as though by our own power or holiness we had made this man to walk ?
text2: Khona uPetru ebona lokho wathatha wathi kubantu : “ Madoda akwa - Israyeli , nimangalelani ngalona , nisigqolozelelani ngokungathi simenze ukuba ahambe ngawethu amandla nangokwethu ukukholwa na ?

text: The God of Abraham , and of Isaac , and of Jacob , the God of our fathers , hath glorified his Son Jesus ; whom ye delivered up , and denied him in the presence of Pilate , when he was determined to let him go .
text2: UNkulunkulu ka - Abrahama noka - Isaka nokaJakobe , uNkulunkulu wawobaba bethu uyidumisile iNceku yakhe uJesu enayikhaphela , nayiphika ebusweni bukaPilatu , yena esenqumile ukuyikhulula ;

text: But ye denied the Holy One and the Just , and desired a murderer to be granted unto you ;
text2: kepha nina namphika oNgcwele noLungileyo , nacela ukuba niphiwe ongumbulali ,

text: And killed the Prince of life , whom God hath raised from the dead ; whereof we are witnesses .
text2: nayibulala iNkosi yokuphila ayivusayo uNkulunkulu kwabafileyo , esingofakazi bakho thina .

text: And his name through faith in his name hath made this man strong , whom ye see and know : yea , the faith which is by him hath given him this perfect soundness in the presence of you all .
text2: Ngokukholwa egameni layo lo enimbonayo nenimaziyo igama layo lamenza aqine , nokukholwa okungayo kumnike le mpilo phambi kwenu nonke .

text: And now , brethren , I wot that through ignorance ye did it , as did also your rulers .
text2: “ Kalokhu , bazalwane , ngiyazi ukuthi nenza lokho ngokungazi njengabo ababusi benu .

text: But those things , which God before had shewed by the mouth of all his prophets , that Christ should suffer , he hath so fulfilled .
text2: Kepha lokho uNkulunkulu akumemezela ngaphambili ngomlomo wabaprofethi bonke ukuthi uKristu wakhe uyakuhlupheka , ukugcwalisile kanje .

text: Repent ye therefore , and be converted , that your sins may be blotted out , when the times of refreshing shall come from the presence of the Lord ;
text2: Ngalokhu phendukani , niguquke ukuba kuhlangulwe izono zenu ,

text: And he shall send Jesus Christ , which before was preached unto you :
text2: ukuze kufike izikhathi zokuhlunyelelwa ezivela ebusweni beNkosi nokuba ithume uKristu Jesu enimmiselweyo ,

text: Whom the heaven must receive until the times of restitution of all things , which God hath spoken by the mouth of all his holy prophets since the world began .
text2: okumelwe ukuba izulu limamukele , kuze kube yizikhathi zokubuyiselwa kwakho konke uNkulunkulu akhuluma ngakho ngomlomo wabaprofethi bakhe abangcwele , kusukela kwaphakade .

text: For Moses truly said unto the fathers , A prophet shall the Lord your God raise up unto you of your brethren , like unto me ; him shall ye hear in all things whatsoever he shall say unto you .
text2: UMose kambe wathi : ‘ INkosi uNkulunkulu iyakunivusela umprofethi kubazalwane benu njengami , niyakumlalela kukho konke azakukukhuluma kini .

text: And it shall come to pass , that every soul , which will not hear that prophet , shall be destroyed from among the people .
text2: Kuyakuthi wonke umuntu ongayikumlalela lowo mprofethi uyakuchithwa kubantu . ’

text: Yea , and all the prophets from Samuel and those that follow after , as many as have spoken , have likewise foretold of these days .
text2: “ Yebo , nabaprofethi bonke , kusukela kuSamuweli nabalandelayo , bonke abakhulumileyo , bamemezela lezo zinsuku .

text: Ye are the children of the prophets , and of the covenant which God made with our fathers , saying unto Abraham , And in thy seed shall all the kindreds of the earth be blessed .
text2: Nina ningamadodana abaprofethi nawesivumelwano uNkulunkulu asenzayo nawoyihlo , ethi ku - Abrahama : ‘ Ngenzalo yakho iyakubusiswa imindeni yonke yomhlaba . ’

text: Unto you first God , having raised up his Son Jesus , sent him to bless you , in turning away every one of you from his iniquities .
text2: UNkulunkulu eseyivusile iNceku yakhe wayithumela kini kuqala ukunibusisa ngokuniguqula , kube yilowo nalowo kini ebubini bakhe . ”

text: And as they spake unto the people , the priests , and the captain of the temple , and the Sadducees , came upon them ,
text2: Kepha besakhuluma kubantu , abapristi nenduna yethempeli nabaSadusi babafikela ,

text: Being grieved that they taught the people , and preached through Jesus the resurrection from the dead .
text2: benengwa ngukufundisa kwabo abantu nokumemezela ngoJesu ukuvuka kwabafileyo ,

text: And they laid hands on them , and put them in hold unto the next day : for it was now eventide .
text2: bababamba , babafaka etilongweni kwaze kwaba kusasa , ngokuba kwase kuhlwile .

text: Howbeit many of them which heard the word believed ; and the number of the men was about five thousand .
text2: Kepha abaningi kwabezwayo izwi bakholwa ; umumo wamadoda waba kungathi izinkulungwane eziyisihlanu .

text: And it came to pass on the morrow , that their rulers , and elders , and scribes ,
text2: Kwathi ngangomuso kwabuthana eJerusalema ababusi namalunga nababhali babo ,

text: And Annas the high priest , and Caiaphas , and John , and Alexander , and as many as were of the kindred of the high priest , were gathered together at Jerusalem .
text2: no - Anase umpristi omkhulu , noKayafase , noJohane , no - Aleksandru , nabo bonke abendlu yompristi omkhulu ,

text: And when they had set them in the midst , they asked , By what power , or by what name , have ye done this ?
text2: babamisa phakathi kwabo , bababuza bathi : “ Lokho nikwenze ngamaphi amandla nangaliphi igama na ? ”

text: Then Peter , filled with the Holy Ghost , said unto them , Ye rulers of the people , and elders of Israel ,
text2: Khona uPetru egcwele uMoya oNgcwele wathi kubo : “ Nina babusi bezizwe namalunga ,

text: If we this day be examined of the good deed done to the impotent man , by what means he is made whole ;
text2: nxa sibuzwa namuhla ngomsebenzi omuhle kumuntu ogulayo ukuthi yena usindiswe ngani ,

text: Be it known unto you all , and to all the people of Israel , that by the name of Jesus Christ of Nazareth , whom ye crucified , whom God raised from the dead , even by him doth this man stand here before you whole .
text2: makwazeke kini nonke nasesizweni sonke sakwa - Israyeli ukuthi ngegama likaJesu Kristu waseNazaretha enambethela esiphambanweni , amvusayo uNkulunkulu kwabafileyo , ngaye umi lo muntu phambi kwenu esindile .

text: This is the stone which was set at nought of you builders , which is become the head of the corner .
text2: Yena uyitshe eladelelwa yinina bakhi , eselaba yinhloko yegumbi .

text: Neither is there salvation in any other : for there is none other name under heaven given among men , whereby we must be saved .
text2: “ Ayikho insindiso ngomunye , ngokuba alikho futhi elinye igama phansi kwezulu elinikiwe ebantwini , esimelwe ukusindiswa ngalo . ”

text: Now when they saw the boldness of Peter and John , and perceived that they were unlearned and ignorant men , they marvelled ; and they took knowledge of them , that they had been with Jesus .
text2: Kwathi bebona isibindi sikaPetru noJohane , beqonda ukuthi bangabantu abangafundile , bayimifunda nje , bamangala ; babazi ukuthi kade benoJesu ;

text: And beholding the man which was healed standing with them , they could say nothing against it .
text2: kepha bebona umuntu ophilisiweyo emi nabo , babengenakuphika lutho .

text: But when they had commanded them to go aside out of the council , they conferred among themselves ,
text2: Kodwa sebebayalile ukuba baphume emphakathini balulekana bodwa ,

text: Saying , What shall we do to these men ? for that indeed a notable miracle hath been done by them is manifest to all them that dwell in Jerusalem ; and we cannot deny it .
text2: bathi : “ Sizakubenzani laba bantu na ? Ngokuba kusobala kubo bonke abakhileyo eJerusalema ukuthi isibonakaliso esiqhamileyo senziwe yibo , asinakukuphika .

text: But that it spread no further among the people , let us straitly threaten them , that they speak henceforth to no man in this name .
text2: Kodwa ukuze kungabe kusanda phakathi kwabantu , asibalaye , bangabe besakhuluma kumuntu namunye ngalelo gama . ”

text: And they called them , and commanded them not to speak at all nor teach in the name of Jesus .
text2: Base bebabiza , babayala ngokuthi bangakhulumi , bangafundisi nakanye ngegama likaJesu .

text: But Peter and John answered and said unto them , Whether it be right in the sight of God to hearken unto you more than unto God , judge ye .
text2: Kepha oPetru noJohane baphendula , bathi kubo : “ Nqumani nina ukuba kulungile yini ebusweni bukaNkulunkulu ukulalela nina kunoNkulunkulu ,

text: For we cannot but speak the things which we have seen and heard .
text2: ngokuba thina asinakuyeka ukukhuluma ngalokho esikubonileyo nesikuzwileyo . ”

text: So when they had further threatened them , they let them go , finding nothing how they might punish them , because of the people : for all men glorified God for that which was done .
text2: Khona sebebalayile futhi babayeka , bengafumananga ukuthi bangabajezisa kanjani ngenxa yabantu , ngokuba bonke bedumisa uNkulunkulu ngalokho okwenzekileyo ;

text: For the man was above forty years old , on whom this miracle of healing was shewed .
text2: ngokuba umuntu esenziwe kuye leso sibonakaliso sokuphulukiswa wayeneminyaka eve emashumini amane .

text: And being let go , they went to their own company , and reported all that the chief priests and elders had said unto them .
text2: Sebeyekiwe baya kwabakubo , babika konke abapristi abakhulu namalunga abekushilo kubo .

text: And when they heard that , they lifted up their voice to God with one accord , and said , Lord , thou art God , which hast made heaven , and earth , and the sea , and all that in them is :
text2: Bona sebezwile baphakamisa izwi kuNkulunkulu nganhliziyonye , bathi : “ Somandla , wena owenza izulu , nomhlaba , nolwandle , nakho konke okukukho ,

text: Who by the mouth of thy servant David hast said , Why did the heathen rage , and the people imagine vain things ?
text2: owasho ngoMoya oNgcwele ngomlomo kababa uDavide inceku yakho ukuthi : “ ‘ Kungani ukuba abezizwe baxokozele , nabantu bacebe okuyize , na ?

text: The kings of the earth stood up , and the rulers were gathered together against the Lord , and against his Christ .
text2: Amakhosi omhlaba aqhelile , nababusi bayihlanganyele iNkosi noGcotshiweyo wayo . ’

text: For of a truth against thy holy child Jesus , whom thou hast anointed , both Herod , and Pontius Pilate , with the Gentiles , and the people of Israel , were gathered together ,
text2: “ Ngokuba ngempela oHerode , noPontiyu Pilatu , kanye nabezizwe , nabantu bakwa - Israyeli bayihlanganyela kulo muzi iNceku yakho engcwele uJesu owamgcobayo

text: For to do whatsoever thy hand and thy counsel determined before to be done .
text2: ukuzakukwenza lokho okumiswe ngaphambili yisandla necebo lakho ukuba kwenzeke .

text: And now , Lord , behold their threatenings : and grant unto thy servants , that with all boldness they may speak thy word ,
text2: Manje - ke , Nkosi , bheka ukusongela kwabo , unike izinceku zakho ukuba zikhulume izwi lakho ngaso sonke isibindi

text: By stretching forth thine hand to heal ; and that signs and wonders may be done by the name of thy holy child Jesus .
text2: ngokwelula isandla sakho ukuphulukisa , kwenziwe izibonakaliso nezimangaliso ngegama leNceku yakho engcwele uJesu . ”

text: And when they had prayed , the place was shaken where they were assembled together ; and they were all filled with the Holy Ghost , and they spake the word of God with boldness .
text2: Kwathi sebekhulekile , kwazanyazanyiswa indawo lapho bebebuthene khona , bagcwaliswa bonke nguMoya oNgcwele , bakhuluma izwi likaNkulunkulu ngesibindi .

text: And the multitude of them that believed were of one heart and of one soul : neither said any of them that ought of the things which he possessed was his own ; but they had all things common .
text2: Isixuku sabakholwayo sasinhliziyonye nomphefumulo munye ; akwabakho noyedwa owasho ngezimpahla zakhe ukuthi ngezakhe , kodwa bakuhlanganyela konke .

text: And with great power gave the apostles witness of the resurrection of the Lord Jesus : and great grace was upon them all .
text2: Abaphostoli baveza ngamandla amakhulu ubufakazi ngokuvuka kweNkosi uJesu ; umusa omkhulu wawuphezu kwabo bonke .

text: Neither was there any among them that lacked : for as many as were possessors of lands or houses sold them , and brought the prices of the things that were sold ,
text2: Kwakungekho oswelayo phakathi kwabo ; ngokuba bonke ababengabanikazi bamazwe noma bezindlu bathengisa ngakho , baletha imali yalokho abathengise ngakho ,

text: And laid them down at the apostles ' feet : and distribution was made unto every man according as he had need .
text2: bayibeka ngasezinyaweni zabaphostoli ; kwaba yilowo nalowo wabelwa njengokuswela kwakhe .

text: And Joses , who by the apostles was surnamed Barnabas , ( which is , being interpreted , The son of consolation , ) a Levite , and of the country of Cyprus ,
text2: Kwathi uJosefa owathiwa ngabaphostoli uBarnaba , okungukuthi ngokuhunyushwa indodana yenduduzo , umLevi waseKhupro ngokuzalwa ,

text: Having land , sold it , and brought the money , and laid it at the apostles ' feet .
text2: enensimu , wathengisa ngayo , waletha imali , wayibeka ngasezinyaweni zabaphostoli .

text: But a certain man named Ananias , with Sapphira his wife , sold a possession ,
text2: Kepha indoda ethile , igama layo lingu - Ananiya , inoSafira umkayo , yathengisa ngendawo ;

text: And kept back part of the price , his wife also being privy to it , and brought a certain part , and laid it at the apostles ' feet .
text2: yagodla inxenye yemali , nomkayo ekwazi , yaletha inxenye ethile , yayibeka ngasezinyaweni zabaphostoli .

text: But Peter said , Ananias , why hath Satan filled thine heart to lie to the Holy Ghost , and to keep back part of the price of the land ?
text2: Wayesethi uPetru : “ Ananiya , kungani ukuba uSathane agcwalise inhliziyo yakho , uqambe amanga kuMoya oNgcwele , ugodle inxenye yemali yezwe , na ?

text: Whiles it remained , was it not thine own ? and after it was sold , was it not in thine own power ? why hast thou conceived this thing in thine heart ? thou hast not lied unto men , but unto God .
text2: Lisekhona belingesilo elakho na ? Selithengisiwe belingekho emandleni akho na ? Uyibekeleni leyo nto enhliziyweni yakho na ? Awuqambanga amanga kubantu kepha kuNkulunkulu . ”

text: And Ananias hearing these words fell down , and gave up the ghost : and great fear came on all them that heard these things .
text2: Kuthe u - Ananiya ezwa lawo mazwi , wawa phansi , wafa , ukwesaba okukhulu kwehlela bonke abezwa lokho .

text: And the young men arose , wound him up , and carried him out , and buried him .
text2: Izinsizwa zasuka , zamsongelezela , zamkhiphela phandle , zammbela .

text: And it was about the space of three hours after , when his wife , not knowing what was done , came in .
text2: Kwathi emva kwesikhathi esingaba ngamahora amathathu kwangena nomkakhe , engakwazi okwenzakeleyo .

text: And Peter answered unto her , Tell me whether ye sold the land for so much ? And she said , Yea , for so much .
text2: UPetru wayesethatha ethi : “ Ngitshele ukuba izwe nilithengise ngokungaka na ? ” Wathi : “ Yebo , ngokungaka . ”

text: Then Peter said unto her , How is it that ye have agreed together to tempt the Spirit of the Lord ? behold , the feet of them which have buried thy husband are at the door , and shall carry thee out .
text2: Kepha uPetru wathi kuye : “ Kungani ukuba nivumelene ngokulinga uMoya weNkosi na ? Bheka , izinyawo zabambele indoda yakho zisemnyango , nawe bazakukukhiphela phandle . ”

text: Then fell she down straightway at his feet , and yielded up the ghost : and the young men came in , and found her dead , and , carrying her forth , buried her by her husband .
text2: Wayesewa phansi masinyane ngasezinyaweni zakhe , wafa ; izinsizwa zangena , zamfumana efile , zamkhiphela phandle , zammbela ngasendodeni yakhe .

text: And great fear came upon all the church , and upon as many as heard these things .
text2: Ukwesaba okukhulu kwalehlela ibandla lonke nabo bonke abezwa lokho .

text: And by the hands of the apostles were many signs and wonders wrought among the people ; ( and they were all with one accord in Solomon ' s porch .
text2: Kwenziwa izimangaliso nezibonakaliso eziningi ebantwini ngezandla zabaphostoli ; bonke babe nhliziyonye besemphemeni kaSolomoni .

text: And of the rest durst no man join himself to them : but the people magnified them .
text2: Kepha kwabanye akwabakho owayenesibindi sokuzihlanganisa nabo , kepha abantu babebazisa kakhulu ;

text: And believers were the more added to the Lord , multitudes both of men and women . )
text2: benezelwa kakhulu abakholwa yiNkosi , abaningi nabesilisa nabesifazane ,

text: Insomuch that they brought forth the sick into the streets , and laid them on beds and couches , that at the least the shadow of Peter passing by might overshadow some of them .
text2: ngangokuba bakhiphela phandle emigwaqweni abagulayo , bababeka emacansini nasezinhlakeni , kuze kuthi lapho eza uPetru , isithunzi nje sakhe sisithibeze abanye kubo .

text: There came also a multitude out of the cities round about unto Jerusalem , bringing sick folks , and them which were vexed with unclean spirits : and they were healed every one .
text2: Kwabuthana nesixuku esivela emizini ezungeze iJerusalema , beletha abagulayo nabakhathazwa ngawomoya abangcolileyo ; baphulukiswa bonke .

text: Then the high priest rose up , and all they that were with him , ( which is the sect of the Sadducees , ) and were filled with indignation ,
text2: Kwase kusuka umpristi omkhulu nabo bonke ababe naye abangabehlelo labaSadusi , bagcwala umhawu ,

text: And laid their hands on the apostles , and put them in the common prison .
text2: babamba abaphostoli , babafaka etilongweni lombuso .

text: But the angel of the Lord by night opened the prison doors , and brought them forth , and said ,
text2: Kepha ingelosi yeNkosi yavula iminyango yetilongo ebusuku , yabakhipha , yathi :

text: Go , stand and speak in the temple to the people all the words of this life .
text2: “ Hambani , nime nikhulume ethempelini kubantu amazwi onke alokhu kuPhila . ”

text: And when they heard that , they entered into the temple early in the morning , and taught . But the high priest came , and they that were with him , and called the council together , and all the senate of the children of Israel and sent to the prison to have them brought .
text2: Kwathi sebezwile , bangena ethempelini ekuthatheni kokusa , bafundisa . Kepha kwafika umpristi omkhulu nababe naye , babizela ndawonye umphakathi nezigele zonke zabantwana bakwa - Israyeli , bathumela endlini yeziboshwa ukuba balethwe .

text: But when the officers came , and found them not in the prison , they returned , and told ,
text2: Kepha izikhonzi ezafika khona azibafumananga etilongweni ; zase zibuyela emuva , zabika

text: Saying , The prison truly found we shut with all safety , and the keepers standing without before the doors : but when we had opened , we found no man within .
text2: zathi : “ Indlu yeziboshwa sayifumana ivaliwe , iqinile impela , nabalindi bemi eminyango ; kepha sesivulile asifumananga muntu ngaphakathi . ”

text: Now when the high priest and the captain of the temple and the chief priests heard these things , they doubted of them whereunto this would grow .
text2: Kwathi ukuba induna yethempeli nabapristi abakhulu bezwe lawo mazwi , basambatheka ngawo ngokuthi kungaba yini lokho na ?

text: Then came one and told them , saying , Behold , the men whom ye put in prison are standing in the temple , and teaching the people .
text2: Kepha kwafika omunye , wababikela wathi : “ Bhekani , amadoda ebeniwafakile etilongweni emi ethempelini , afundisa abantu . ”

text: Then went the captain with the officers , and brought them without violence : for they feared the people , lest they should have been stoned .
text2: Khona yaphuma induna kanye nezikhonzi , zabaletha , kungengampoqo , ngokuba bebesaba abantu , funa bakhandwe ngamatshe .

text: And when they had brought them , they set them before the council : and the high priest asked them ,
text2: Sebebalethile babamisa emphakathini ; umpristi omkhulu wababuza ,

text: Saying , Did not we straitly command you that ye should not teach in this name ? and , behold , ye have filled Jerusalem with your doctrine , and intend to bring this man ' s blood upon us .
text2: wathi : “ Saniyala nokuniyala ukuba ningafundisi ngalelo gama ; bhekani , senigcwalise iJerusalema ngesifundiso senu , nihlose ukwehlisela igazi lalowo muntu phezu kwethu . ”

text: Then Peter and the other apostles answered and said , We ought to obey God rather than men .
text2: Kepha uPetru nabaphostoli baphendula bathi : “ Simelwe ukulalela uNkulunkulu kunabantu .

text: The God of our fathers raised up Jesus , whom ye slew and hanged on a tree .
text2: UNkulunkulu wawobaba wamvusa uJesu enambulala nina ngokumphanyeka emthini ;

text: Him hath God exalted with his right hand to be a Prince and a Saviour , for to give repentance to Israel , and forgiveness of sins .
text2: lowo uNkulunkulu wamphakamisa ngesokunene sakhe abe yiNkosi noMsindisi ukuba anike u - Israyeli ukuphenduka nokuthethelelwa kwezono .

text: And we are his witnesses of these things ; and so is also the Holy Ghost , whom God hath given to them that obey him .
text2: Thina singofakazi balezo zinto kanye noMoya oNgcwele uNkulunkulu amnikile labo abamlalelayo . ”

text: When they heard that , they were cut to the heart , and took counsel to slay them .
text2: Bona sebezwile bathukuthela , bafuna ukubabulala .

text: Then stood there up one in the council , a Pharisee , named Gamaliel , a doctor of the law , had in reputation among all the people , and commanded to put the apostles forth a little space ;
text2: Kwase kusukuma omunye emphakathini , umFarisi ogama lakhe linguGamaliyeli , isazimthetho esitusekayo esizweni sonke , wayala ukuba abantu bakhishwe isikhashana ;

text: And said unto them , Ye men of Israel , take heed to yourselves what ye intend to do as touching these men .
text2: wayesethi kubo : “ Madoda akwa - Israyeli , qaphelani kulokho enizakukwenza kulaba bantu .

text: For before these days rose up Theudas , boasting himself to be somebody ; to whom a number of men , about four hundred , joined themselves : who was slain ; and all , as many as obeyed him , were scattered , and brought to nought .
text2: Ngokuba ngaphambi kwalezi zinsuku kwasuka uThewuda ezishaya omkhulu ; kwanamathela kuye amadoda angathi amakhulu amane ; wabulawa yena nabo bonke abamlalelayo , bachitheka , baphela .

text: After this man rose up Judas of Galilee in the days of the taxing , and drew away much people after him : he also perished ; and all , even as many as obeyed him , were dispersed .
text2: Emva kwalowo kwasuka uJuda waseGalile ezinsukwini zokubhalwa ; wahlubukisa abantu ukuba bamlandele ; nalowo wabhubha , nabo bonke abamlalelayo bahlakazeka .

text: And now I say unto you , Refrain from these men , and let them alone : for if this counsel or this work be of men , it will come to nought :
text2: Manje - ke ngithi kini : Dedani kulaba bantu , nibayeke , ngokuba uma leli su nalo msebenzi kuvela kubantu , kuyakuchitheka ;

text: But if it be of God , ye cannot overthrow it ; lest haply ye be found even to fight against God .
text2: kepha uma kuvela kuNkulunkulu , aniyikuba namandla okubachitha , funa mhlawumbe nifunyanwe ningabalwayo noNkulunkulu . ” Bamvumela - ke .

text: And to him they agreed : and when they had called the apostles , and beaten them , they commanded that they should not speak in the name of Jesus , and let them go .
text2: Base bebabiza abaphostoli , babashaya , babayala ngokuthi bangakhulumi ngegama likaJesu , babakhulula .

text: And they departed from the presence of the council , rejoicing that they were counted worthy to suffer shame for his name .
text2: Khona basuka phambi komphakathi bethokoza , ngokuba bebefanele ukudunyazwa ngenxa yalelo gama ;

text: And daily in the temple , and in every house , they ceased not to teach and preach Jesus Christ .
text2: abayekanga ukufundisa nokushumayela ivangeli ngoJesu Kristu imihla yonke ethempelini nasemakhaya .

text: And in those days , when the number of the disciples was multiplied , there arose a murmuring of the Grecians against the Hebrews , because their widows were neglected in the daily ministration .
text2: Kwathi ngaleyo mihla abafundi sebanda , kwavela ukukhonona kubaJuda abakhuluma isiGreki ngamaHeberu ngokuthi abafelokazi bakubo bayancishwa ekwabelweni kwemihla ngemihla .

text: Then the twelve called the multitude of the disciples unto them , and said , It is not reason that we should leave the word of God , and serve tables .
text2: Abayishumi nambili base bebiza ibandla labafundi , bathi : “ Akukuhle ukuba thina sishiye izwi likaNkulunkulu , sikhonze ematafuleni .

text: Wherefore , brethren , look ye out among you seven men of honest report , full of the Holy Ghost and wisdom , whom we may appoint over this business .
text2: Funani - ke phakathi kwenu bazalwane amadoda ayisikhombisa anodumo oluhle , agcwele uMoya nokuhlakanipha , esingawamisela lowo msebenzi .

text: But we will give ourselves continually to prayer , and to the ministry of the word .
text2: Kepha thina sizakuqinisela ekukhulekeni nasenkonzweni yezwi . ”

text: And the saying pleased the whole multitude : and they chose Stephen , a man full of faith and of the Holy Ghost , and Philip , and Prochorus , and Nicanor , and Timon , and Parmenas , and Nicolas a proselyte of Antioch :
text2: Leli zwi laba lihle kulo lonke ibandla ; base bekhetha uStefanu , umuntu owayegcwele ukukholwa noMoya oNgcwele , noFiliphu , noProkhoro , noNikanori , noThimoni , noPharmena , noNikolawu , iproselite lase - Antiyokiya ,

text: Whom they set before the apostles : and when they had prayed , they laid their hands on them .
text2: babamisa phambi kwabaphostoli ; bakhuleka , babeka izandla phezu kwabo .

text: And the word of God increased ; and the number of the disciples multiplied in Jerusalem greatly ; and a great company of the priests were obedient to the faith .
text2: Izwi likaNkulunkulu landa , umumo wabafundi wakhula eJerusalema , nesixuku esikhulu sabapristi salalela inkolo .

text: And Stephen , full of faith and power , did great wonders and miracles among the people .
text2: Kepha uStefanu egcwele umusa namandla wenza izimangaliso nezibonakaliso ezinkulu phakathi kwabantu .

text: Then there arose certain of the synagogue , which is called the synagogue of the Libertines , and Cyrenians , and Alexandrians , and of them of Cilicia and of Asia , disputing with Stephen .
text2: Kwase kusuka abanye besinagoge elithiwa elabaLibertino , nabaseKhurene , nabase - Aleksandriya , nabavela eKhilikhiya nase - Asiya , baphikisana noStefanu ;

text: And they were not able to resist the wisdom and the spirit by which he spake .
text2: kepha babengenamandla okumelana nokuhlakanipha noMoya ayekhuluma ngakho .

text: Then they suborned men , which said , We have heard him speak blasphemous words against Moses , and against God .
text2: Khona bathenga amadoda athi : “ Simzwile ekhuluma amazwi enhlamba ngoMose nangoNkulunkulu , ”

text: And they stirred up the people , and the elders , and the scribes , and came upon him , and caught him , and brought him to the council ,
text2: bavusa abantu namalunga nababhali , bamvukela , bambamba , bamyisa emphakathini ;

text: And set up false witnesses , which said , This man ceaseth not to speak blasphemous words against this holy place , and the law :
text2: bamisa ofakazi bamanga abathi : “ Lo muntu akayeki ukukhuluma amazwi ngale ndawo engcwele nangomthetho ;

text: For we have heard him say , that this Jesus of Nazareth shall destroy this place , and shall change the customs which Moses delivered us .
text2: ngokuba simzwile ethi uJesu lo waseNazaretha uzakuchitha le ndawo , aguqule imithetho asinika yona uMose . ”

text: And all that sat in the council , looking stedfastly on him , saw his face as it had been the face of an angel .
text2: Kwathi bemgqolozela bonke ababehlezi emphakathini , babona ubuso bakhe kungathi ubuso bengelosi .

text: Then said the high priest , Are these things so ?
text2: Umpristi omkhulu wayesethi : “ Nembala lokhu kunjalo na ? ”

text: And he said , Men , brethren , and fathers , hearken ; The God of glory appeared unto our father Abraham , when he was in Mesopotamia , before he dwelt in Charran ,
text2: Yena wathi : “ Madoda , bazalwane , nani bobaba , lalelani . UNkulunkulu wenkazimulo wabonakala kubaba u - Abrahama eseMesopotamiya , engakakhi eHarana ,

text: And said unto him , Get thee out of thy country , and from thy kindred , and come into the land which I shall shew thee .
text2: wathi kuye : ‘ Phuma ezweni lakini nasezihlotsheni zakho , uye ezweni engizakukukhombisa lona . ’

text: Then came he out of the land of the Chaldaeans , and dwelt in Charran : and from thence , when his father was dead , he removed him into this land , wherein ye now dwell .
text2: “ Khona waphuma ezweni lamaKaledi , waya wakha eHarana . Kwathi esefile uyise , uNkulunkulu wamsusa lapho , wamhlalisa kuleli zwe enakhe kulo nina manje .

text: And he gave him none inheritance in it , no , not so much as to set his foot on : yet he promised that he would give it to him for a possession , and to his seed after him , when as yet he had no child .
text2: Kepha akamnikanga ifa kulo , ngisho nelingangonyawo , wathembisa kodwa ukuthi uzakumnika lona libe ngelakhe nelenzalo yakhe emva kwakhe , engakabi namntwana .

text: And God spake on this wise , That his seed should sojourn in a strange land ; and that they should bring them into bondage , and entreat them evil four hundred years .
text2: UNkulunkulu wakhuluma kanje , wathi : ‘ Inzalo yakhe izakuba ngumfokazi ezweni lezizwe ; bayakuyenza izigqila , bayiphathe kabi iminyaka engamakhulu amane .

text: And the nation to whom they shall be in bondage will I judge , said God : and after that shall they come forth , and serve me in this place .
text2: Kepha leso sizwe abayakuba yizigqila kuso ngiyakusahlulela mina , washo uNkulunkulu , andukuba baphume , bangikhonze kule ndawo . ’

text: And he gave him the covenant of circumcision : and so Abraham begat Isaac , and circumcised him the eighth day ; and Isaac begat Jacob ; and Jacob begat the twelve patriarchs .
text2: Wayesemnika isivumelwano sokusoka ; kanjalo - ke wazala u - Isaka , wamsoka ngosuku lwesishiyagalombili ; u - Isaka wazala uJakobe , uJakobe wazala okhokho abayishumi nambili .

text: And the patriarchs , moved with envy , sold Joseph into Egypt : but God was with him ,
text2: “ Okhokho baba nomhawu ngoJosefa , bathengisa ngaye , wasiwa eGibithe ; kodwa uNkulunkulu wayenaye ,

text: And delivered him out of all his afflictions , and gave him favour and wisdom in the sight of Pharaoh king of Egypt ; and he made him governor over Egypt and all his house .
text2: wamkhipha kuzo zonke izinhlupheko zakhe , wamupha umusa nokuhlakanipha phambi kukaFaro inkosi yaseGibithe ; yena wammisa abe ngumbusi eGibithe nakuyo yonke indlu yakhe .

text: Now there came a dearth over all the land of Egypt and Chanaan , and great affliction : and our fathers found no sustenance .
text2: “ Kepha kwafika indlala kulo lonke iGibithe nakwaKhanani , nokuhlupheka okukhulu ; obaba kabafumana ukudla .

text: But when Jacob heard that there was corn in Egypt , he sent out our fathers first .
text2: UJakobe esezwile ukuthi kukhona ukudla eGibithe , wathuma obaba ngokokuqala ;

text: And at the second time Joseph was made known to his brethren ; and Joseph ' s kindred was made known unto Pharaoh .
text2: kwathi ngokwesibili uJosefa waziwa ngabafowabo ; kwabonakala kuFaro isizwe sakubo kaJosefa .

text: Then sent Joseph , and called his father Jacob to him , and all his kindred , threescore and fifteen souls .
text2: UJosefa wayesethumela wabiza uJakobe uyise nabakubo bonke , abantu abangamashumi ayisikhombisa nanhlanu .

text: So Jacob went down into Egypt , and died , he , and our fathers ,
text2: UJakobe wehlela eGibithe ; wafa yena nawobaba .

text: And were carried over into Sychem , and laid in the sepulchre that Abraham bought for a sum of money of the sons of Emmor the father of Sychem .
text2: Bayiswa eSikemi , babekwa ethuneni alithenga u - Abrahama ngenani lesiliva kumadodana kaHamori eSikemi .

text: But when the time of the promise drew nigh , which God had sworn to Abraham , the people grew and multiplied in Egypt ,
text2: “ Kepha sesisondele isikhathi sesithembiso uNkulunkulu asisho ku - Abrahama , banda abantu , baba baningi eGibithe ,

text: Till another king arose , which knew not Joseph .
text2: kwaze kwavela enye inkosi eGibithe ebingamazi uJosefa .

text: The same dealt subtilly with our kindred , and evil entreated our fathers , so that they cast out their young children , to the end they might not live .
text2: Yona yasiphatha ngobuqili isizwe sakithi , yabahlupha obaba ngokubalahlisa izingane zabo zingaphili .

text: In which time Moses was born , and was exceeding fair , and nourished up in his father ' s house three months :
text2: “ Ngaleso sikhathi kwazalwa uMose , waba muhle kuNkulunkulu ; wondliwa izinyanga ezintathu endlini kayise ;

text: And when he was cast out , Pharaoh ' s daughter took him up , and nourished him for her own son .
text2: eselahliwe , indodakazi kaFaro yamthola , yazondlela yena ukuba abe yindodana yayo .

text: And Moses was learned in all the wisdom of the Egyptians , and was mighty in words and in deeds .
text2: UMose wafundiswa ukuhlakanipha konke kwabaseGibithe ; waba namandla ngamazwi nangemisebenzi yakhe .

text: And when he was full forty years old , it came into his heart to visit his brethren the children of Israel .
text2: “ Kuthe eseneminyaka engamashumi amane ezelwe , kwafika enhliziyweni yakhe ukuba abamele abafowabo , abantwana bakwa - Israyeli .

text: And seeing one of them suffer wrong , he defended him , and avenged him that was oppressed , and smote the Egyptian :
text2: Wabona umuntu ephathwa kabi , wamvikela , wamphindisela ohlushwayo , wambulala owaseGibithe .

text: For he supposed his brethren would have understood how that God by his hand would deliver them : but they understood not .
text2: Ubethemba ukuthi abafowabo bayakuqonda ukuthi uNkulunkulu ubanika ukusindiswa ngesandla sakhe ; kepha abakuqondanga .

text: And the next day he shewed himself unto them as they strove , and would have set them at one again , saying , Sirs , ye are brethren ; why do ye wrong one to another ?
text2: Nangangomuso wafika kubo belwa , wazama ukubalamula , babuyisane , wathi : ‘ Madoda , ningabazalwane ; niphathanelani kabi na ? ’

text: But he that did his neighbour wrong thrust him away , saying , Who made thee a ruler and a judge over us ?
text2: “ Kepha lowo owayemona umakhelwane wakhe wamhlohloloza wathi : ‘ Ubekwe ngubani ube ngumbusi nomahluleli phezu kwethu na ?

text: Wilt thou kill me , as thou diddest the Egyptian yesterday ?
text2: Usufuna ukungibulala nami , njengalokho ubulele owaseGibithe izolo na ? ’

text: Then fled Moses at this saying , and was a stranger in the land of Madian , where he begat two sons .
text2: Khona uMose wabaleka ngenxa yalelo zwi , waba ngumfokazi ezweni lakwaMidiyani , lapho azala khona amadodana amabili .

text: And when forty years were expired , there appeared to him in the wilderness of mount Sina an angel of the Lord in a flame of fire in a bush .
