text2: Kepha indodana kadadewabo kaPawulu yezwa ngokumqamekela kwabo , yafika yangena ekamu , yambikela uPawulu .

text: Then Paul called one of the centurions unto him , and said , Bring this young man unto the chief captain : for he hath a certain thing to tell him .
text2: UPawulu wayesebiza enye induna yekhulu , wathi : “ Yisa le nsizwa enduneni yenkulungwane , ngokuba inento ezakuyibika kuyo . ”

text: So he took him , and brought him to the chief captain , and said , Paul the prisoner called me unto him , and prayed me to bring this young man unto thee , who hath something to say unto thee .
text2: Yayisiyithatha - ke , yayiyisa enduneni yenkulungwane , yathi : “ Isiboshwa uPawulu singibizile , sacela ukuba ngilethe le nsizwa kuwe , inento ezakukutshela yona . ”

text: Then the chief captain took him by the hand , and went with him aside privately , and asked him , What is that thou hast to tell me ?
text2: Induna yenkulungwane yayisiyibamba ngesandla , yagudluka nayo , yayibuza bebodwa , yathi : “ Kuyini ozakungibikela khona na ? ”

text: And he said , The Jews have agreed to desire thee that thou wouldest bring down Paul to morrow into the council , as though they would inquire somewhat of him more perfectly .
text2: Yathi : “ AbaJuda bavumelene ukucela kuwe ukuba wehlisele uPawulu emphakathini ngomuso ngokungathi bazakuhlolisisa indaba yakhe .

text: But do not thou yield unto them : for there lie in wait for him of them more than forty men , which have bound themselves with an oath , that they will neither eat nor drink till they have killed him : and now are they ready , looking for a promise from thee .
text2: Ngakho - ke wena ungabavumeli , ngokuba kubona amqamekele amadoda angaphezu kwamashumi amane azilokotheleyo ukuba angadli , angaphuzi , engakambulali ; manje - ke sebelungele bebheke isithembiso sakho . ”

text: So the chief captain then let the young man depart , and charged him , See thou tell no man that thou hast shewed these things to me .
text2: Khona induna yenkulungwane yayisiyimukisa insizwa , isiyiyalile ukuba ingatsheli muntu ukuthi imbikele lokho .

text: And he called unto him two centurions , saying , Make ready two hundred soldiers to go to Caesarea , and horsemen threescore and ten , and spearmen two hundred , at the third hour of the night ;
text2: Yayisibiza izinduna zekhulu ezimbili , yathi : “ Lungisani amabutho angamakhulu amabili alungele ukuya eKesariya ngehora lesithathu lasebusuku , kanye nezinkweli ezingamashumi ayisikhombisa , nabemikhonto abangamakhulu amabili ,

text: And provide them beasts , that they may set Paul on , and bring him safe unto Felix the governor .
text2: kulungiselwe futhi izilwane , ukuze bakhwelise uPawulu , bamyise kahle kuFeliksi umbusi , ”

text: And he wrote a letter after this manner :
text2: yaloba incwadi ehlelwe kanje :

text: Claudius Lysias unto the most excellent governor Felix sendeth greeting .
text2: UKlawudiyu Lisiya kuye uFeliksi umbusi odumileyo ; ngiyakubingelela .

text: This man was taken of the Jews , and should have been killed of them : then came I with an army , and rescued him , having understood that he was a Roman .
text2: Le ndoda ibibanjwe ngabaJuda ; ibisizakubulawa yibo , ngafika namabutho , ngayophula sengizwile ukuba ingumRoma .

text: And when I would have known the cause wherefore they accused him , I brought him forth into their council :
text2: Ngathi ngifuna ukwazi icala abayimangalela ngalo , ngayehlisela emphakathini wabo ;

text: Whom I perceived to be accused of questions of their law , but to have nothing laid to his charge worthy of death or of bonds .
text2: ngayifumana imangalelwe ngezindaba zomthetho wakubo , kepha engamangalelwa ngalutho olufanele ukufa nokuba ukuboshwa .

text: And when it was told me how that the Jews laid wait for the man , I sent straightway to thee , and gave commandment to his accusers also to say before thee what they had against him . Farewell .
text2: Sekudaluliwe kimi ukuthi kukhona icebo ngaleyo ndoda , ngase ngiyithumela kuwe masinyane , ngibayalile nabayimangalelayo ukuba bakhulume ngayo phambi kwakho .

text: Then the soldiers , as it was commanded them , took Paul , and brought him by night to Antipatris .
text2: Khona amabutho ayesemthatha uPawulu njengokuyalwa kwawo , amyisa e - Antipatheri ebusuku .

text: On the morrow they left the horsemen to go with him , and returned to the castle :
text2: Kepha ngangomuso ashiya izinkweli ukuba zihambe naye ; wona abuyela ekamu ;

text: Who , when they came to Caesarea , and delivered the epistle to the governor , presented Paul also before him .
text2: lezo sezifikile eKesariya zanika umbusi incwadi , zamisa uPawulu phambi kwakhe .

text: And when the governor had read the letter , he asked of what province he was . And when he understood that he was of Cilicia ;
text2: Eseyifundile wambuza ukuthi ungowasiphi isifunda ; esezwile ukuthi ungowaseKhilikhiya ,

text: I will hear thee , said he , when thine accusers are also come . And he commanded him to be kept in Herod ' s judgment hall .
text2: wathi : “ Ngiyakuyizwa kahle indaba yakho , nxa sebefikile abakumangalelayo . ” Wayala ukuba alondwe enqabeni kaHerode .

text: And after five days Ananias the high priest descended with the elders , and with a certain orator named Tertullus , who informed the governor against Paul .
text2: Emva kwezinsuku eziyisihlanu umpristi omkhulu u - Ananiya wewuka kanye namalunga athile nommeli othile uTertulu ; laba bammangalela uPawulu kumbusi .

text: And when he was called forth , Tertullus began to accuse him , saying , Seeing that by thee we enjoy great quietness , and that very worthy deeds are done unto this nation by thy providence ,
text2: Yena esebiziwe , uTertulu waqala ukumbeka icala , ethi : “ Lokho ukuthi ngenxa yakho sitholile ukuthula okukhulu nangokubonelela kwakho lesi sizwe senzelwe okuhle okuningi

text: We accept it always , and in all places , most noble Felix , with all thankfulness .
text2: siyakwamukela ngezikhathi zonke nasezindaweni zonke ngokubonga okukhulu , Feliksi odumileyo .

text: Notwithstanding , that I be not further tedious unto thee , I pray thee that thou wouldest hear us of thy clemency a few words .
text2: Kepha ukuba ngingakubambezeli , ngiyakuncenga ukuba ngobumnene bakho usizwe ngokufushane .

text: For we have found this man a pestilent fellow , and a mover of sedition among all the Jews throughout the world , and a ringleader of the sect of the Nazarenes :
text2: “ Ngokuba le ndoda siyifumene iyishinga ivusa ukwambuka phakathi kwabaJuda ezweni lonke , iyinhloko yehlelo lamaNazaretha ,

text: Who also hath gone about to profane the temple : whom we took , and would have judged according to our law .
text2: yalinga nokungcolisa ithempeli ; sayibamba , sathanda ukuyahlulela ngomthetho wakithi .

text: But the chief captain Lysias came upon us , and with great violence took him away out of our hands ,
text2: Kepha kwafika uLisiya induna yenkulungwane , wamthatha ngendluzula enkulu ezandleni zethu ,

text: Commanding his accusers to come unto thee : by examining of whom thyself mayest take knowledge of all these things , whereof we accuse him .
text2: eyala abambeka icala ukuba beze kuwe , ukuze umbuzisise wena uqobo , uzwe ngakho konke esimmangalela ngakho . ”

text: And the Jews also assented , saying that these things were so .
text2: NabaJuda bakuvuma lokho , bathi kunjalo .

text: Then Paul , after that the governor had beckoned unto him to speak , answered , Forasmuch as I know that thou hast been of many years a judge unto this nation , I do the more cheerfully answer for myself :
text2: Umbusi esemqhwebile ukuba akhulume , uPawulu waphendula wathi : “ Lokhu ngiyazi ukuthi sekuyiminyaka eminingi ungumahluleli kulesi sizwe , ngiyaziphendulela ngesibindi ;

text: Because that thou mayest understand , that there are yet but twelve days since I went up to Jerusalem for to worship .
text2: futhi ungaqonda ukuthi akungaphezu kwezinsuku eziyishumi nambili ngikhuphukile ukuyokhuleka eJerusalema ;

text: And they neither found me in the temple disputing with any man , neither raising up the people , neither in the synagogues , nor in the city :
text2: abangifumananga ngiphikisana namuntu , nakuba ngivusa isiphithiphithi esixukwini , nasethempelini , nasemasinagogeni , nasemzini ,

text: Neither can they prove the things whereof they now accuse me .
text2: futhi bangekuqinise kuwe lokhu abangibeka icala ngakho manje .

text: But this I confess unto thee , that after the way which they call heresy , so worship I the God of my fathers , believing all things which are written in the law and in the prophets :
text2: Kepha ngiyavuma lokhu kuwe ukuthi ngeNdlela abathi iyihlelo ngiyamkhonza ngokunjalo uNkulunkulu wawobaba , ngikholwa yikho konke okulotshiwe emthethweni nakubaprofethi ;

text: And have hope toward God , which they themselves also allow , that there shall be a resurrection of the dead , both of the just and unjust .
text2: nginethemba kuNkulunkulu abalibheka nabo uqobo lokuthi kuyakuba khona ukuvuka kwabafileyo , okwabalungile nokwabangalungile .

text: And herein do I exercise myself , to have always a conscience void of offence toward God , and toward men .
text2: Kulokhu nami ngiyazama ukuba njalo ngibe nonembeza ongenacala phambi kukaNkulunkulu nabantu .

text: Now after many years I came to bring alms to my nation , and offerings .
text2: “ Kwathi emva kweminyaka eminingi ngafika ukuletha izipho esizweni sakithi neminikelo ,

text: Whereupon certain Jews from Asia found me purified in the temple , neither with multitude , nor with tumult .
text2: okuthe ngikulokho bangifumana ethempelini ngihlanjululiwe , kungekho isixuku nomsindo ,

text: Who ought to have been here before thee , and object , if they had ought against me .
text2: abaJuda abathile base - Asiya ababefanele ukuvela phambi kwakho , bangimangalele , uma benotho ngami .

text: Or else let these same here say , if they have found any evil doing in me , while I stood before the council ,
text2: Nokuba mabasho laba ukuthi bafumanani okungalungile mhla ngimi phambi komphakathi ,

text: Except it be for this one voice , that I cried standing among them , Touching the resurrection of the dead I am called in question by you this day .
text2: ngaphandle kwalelo zwi elilodwa engalimemeza ngimi phakathi kwabo lokuthi : ‘ Ngokuvuka kwabafileyo mina ngimangalelwa yinina namuhla . ’ ”

text: And when Felix heard these things , having more perfect knowledge of that way , he deferred them , and said , When Lysias the chief captain shall come down , I will know the uttermost of your matter .
text2: Kepha uFeliksi ekwazi ngokuchachileyo okwaleyo Ndlela wabahlehlisa ethi : “ Lapho uLisiya induna yenkulungwane esewukile , ngizakuyinquma indaba yenu , ”

text: And he commanded a centurion to keep Paul , and to let him have liberty , and that he should forbid none of his acquaintance to minister or come unto him .
text2: wayala induna yekhulu ukuba agcinwe , kepha abe nenkululeko , kunganqatshelwa muntu wakubo ukumkhonza .

text: And after certain days , when Felix came with his wife Drusilla , which was a Jewess , he sent for Paul , and heard him concerning the faith in Christ .
text2: Kepha emva kwezinsuku ezithile wafika uFeliksi noDrusila umkakhe owayengumJudakazi , wabiza uPawulu , wamuzwa ngokukholwa nguKristu Jesu .

text: And as he reasoned of righteousness , temperance , and judgment to come Felix trembled , and answered , Go thy way for this time ; when I have a convenient season , I will call for thee .
text2: Esakhuluma ngokulunga , nangokuzithiba , nangokwahlulela okuzayo , uFeliksi washaywa luvalo , waphendula wathi : “ Okwamanje hamba ; kepha nxa ngithola isikhathi , ngizakukubiza , ”

text: He hoped also that money should have been given him of Paul , that he might loose him : wherefore he sent for him the oftener , and communed with him .
text2: wethemba futhi ukuthi uzakunikwa imali nguPawulu ; ngalokho wayehleze embiza , ekhuluma naye .

text: But after two years Porcius Festus came into Felix ' room : and Felix , willing to shew the Jews a pleasure , left Paul bound .
text2: Kepha sekuphelile iminyaka emibili , uFeliksi walandelwa nguPorkiyu Festu ; kodwa uFeliksi efuna ukubongwa ngabaJuda washiya uPawulu eboshiwe .

text: Now when Festus was come into the province , after three days he ascended from Caesarea to Jerusalem .
text2: Kwathi uFestu engenile esikhundleni , wasuka eKesariya emva kwezinsuku ezintathu , wenyukela eJerusalema ;

text: Then the high priest and the chief of the Jews informed him against Paul , and besought him ,
text2: abapristi abakhulu nezikhulu zabaJuda base bemangalela uPawulu kuye , bamncenga ,

text: And desired favour against him , that he would send for him to Jerusalem , laying wait in the way to kill him .
text2: bazicelela umusa ngaye wokuba ambizele eJerusalema , becebile ukumqamekela ukuba bambulale endleleni .

text: But Festus answered , that Paul should be kept at Caesarea , and that he himself would depart shortly thither .
text2: Kepha uFestu waphendula ngokuthi uPawulu ugcinwe eKesariya nokuthi naye usezakuya khona masinyane ;

text: Let them therefore , said he , which among you are able , go down with me , and accuse this man , if there be any wickedness in him .
text2: wathi : “ Izikhulu phakathi kwenu azehle nami ; uma kukhona utho olubi kuleyo ndoda , aziyimangalele . ”

text: And when he had tarried among them more than ten days , he went down unto Caesarea ; and the next day sitting on the judgment seat commanded Paul to be brought .
text2: Kwathi esehlale nabo izinsuku ezingaphezu kweziyisishiyagalombili nokuba eziyishumi , wehlela eKesariya ; ngangomuso wahlala esihlalweni sokwahlulela , wayala ukuba uPawulu alethwe .

text: And when he was come , the Jews which came down from Jerusalem stood round about , and laid many and grievous complaints against Paul , which they could not prove .
text2: Esefikile yena , abaJuda ababehlile eJerusalema bema bemhaqile , bembeka amacala amaningi anzima , abangenakuwaqinisa ,

text: While he answered for himself , Neither against the law of the Jews , neither against the temple , nor yet against Caesar , have I offended any thing at all .
text2: lapho uPawulu eziphendulela ngokuthi : “ Angonanga ngalutho nasemthethweni wabaJuda , nasethempelini , nakuKesari . ”

text: But Festus , willing to do the Jews a pleasure , answered Paul , and said , Wilt thou go up to Jerusalem , and there be judged of these things before me ?
text2: Kepha uFestu ethanda ukubongwa ngabaJuda , wamphendula uPawulu , wathi : “ Uyathanda yini ukwenyukela eJerusalema , wahlulelwe khona phambi kwami ngalezi zinto , na ? ”

text: Then said Paul , I stand at Caesar ' s judgment seat , where I ought to be judged : to the Jews have I done no wrong , as thou very well knowest .
text2: UPawulu wayesethi : “ Ngimi phambi kwesihlalo sokwahlulela sikaKesari , lapho ngimelwe ukwahlulelwa khona . Angenzanga okungalungile kubaJuda njengalokhu nawe wazi kahle .

text: For if I be an offender , or have committed any thing worthy of death , I refuse not to die : but if there be none of these things whereof these accuse me , no man may deliver me unto them . I appeal unto Caesar .
text2: Kepha uma ngonile ngenza utho olufanele ukufa , angali ukufa ; kodwa uma kungekho lutho lwalokho laba abangimangalela ngakho , akakho onganginikela kubo . Ngilidlulisela kuKesari . ”

text: Then Festus , when he had conferred with the council , answered , Hast thou appealed unto Caesar ? unto Caesar shalt thou go .
text2: Khona uFestu esekhulumile nomphakathi waphendula wathi : “ Ulidlulisele kuKesari , uzakuya kuKesari . ”

text: And after certain days king Agrippa and Bernice came unto Caesarea to salute Festus .
text2: Kwathi sekudlule izinsuku ezithile , u - Agripha inkosi , noBernike behlela eKesariya ukuyobingelela uFestu .

text: And when they had been there many days , Festus declared Paul ' s cause unto the king , saying , There is a certain man left in bonds by Felix :
text2: Sebehlezi khona izinsuku eziningi , uFestu weneka phambi kwenkosi indaba kaPawulu , wathi : “ Kukhona indoda ethile eyashiywa nguFeliksi iboshiwe ;

text: About whom , when I was at Jerusalem , the chief priests and the elders of the Jews informed me , desiring to have judgment against him .
text2: kwathi ngiseJerusalema , abapristi abakhulu namalunga abaJuda babika ngaye becela ukuba ilahlwe ;

text: To whom I answered , It is not the manner of the Romans to deliver any man to die , before that he which is accused have the accusers face to face , and have licence to answer for himself concerning the crime laid against him .
text2: ngabaphendula ngathi akusiwo umkhuba wamaRoma ukumnikela umuntu omangalelwayo engakamiswa phambi kwabammangalelayo , athole ithuba lokuziphendulela ngecala amangalelwe ngalo .

text: Therefore , when they were come hither , without any delay on the morrow I sat on the judgment seat , and commanded the man to be brought forth .
text2: Ngakho sebebuthene lapha , angilibalanga ; ngangomuso ngahlala esihlalweni sokwahlulela , ngayala ukuba leyo ndoda ilethwe ;

text: Against whom when the accusers stood up , they brought none accusation of such things as I supposed :
text2: basukuma - ke abayimangalelayo , kepha abavezanga cala ngayo lalezo zinto ezimbi ebengizicabangile mina ,

text: But had certain questions against him of their own superstition , and of one Jesus , which was dead , whom Paul affirmed to be alive .
text2: kodwa babe nokuphikisana okuthile naye ngenkolo yakubo nangomuntu othile , uJesu , owafayo , asho ngaye uPawulu ukuthi uyaphila .

text: And because I doubted of such manner of questions , I asked him whether he would go to Jerusalem , and there be judged of these matters .
text2: Kuthe mina ngisakhohliwe ukuthi leyo ndaba ngizakuyihlola kanjani , ngathi angathanda yini ukuya eJerusalema ukuba ahlulelwe khona ngalezo zinto .

text: But when Paul had appealed to be reserved unto the hearing of Augustus , I commanded him to be kept till I might send him to Caesar .
text2: Kepha uPawulu eselidlulisile wacela ukuba agcinwe lize lithethwe yinkosi enkulu , ngayala ukuba agcinwe ngize ngimthumele kuKesari . ”

text: Then Agrippa said unto Festus , I would also hear the man myself . To morrow , said he , thou shalt hear him .
text2: U - Agripha wayesethi kuFestu : “ Nami bengithanda ukumuzwa lowo muntu . ” Wathi : “ Uzakumuzwa ngomuso . ”

text: And on the morrow , when Agrippa was come , and Bernice , with great pomp , and was entered into the place of hearing , with the chief captains , and principal men of the city , at Festus ' commandment Paul was brought forth .
text2: Khona ngangomuso kwafika o - Agripha noBernike ngemvunulo enkulu , bangena endlini yamacala kanye nezinduna zenkulungwane nezikhulu zomuzi ; uFestu wayala ukuba uPawulu alethwe .

text: And Festus said , King Agrippa , and all men which are here present with us , ye see this man , about whom all the multitude of the Jews have dealt with me , both at Jerusalem , and also here , crying that he ought not to live any longer .
text2: UFestu wathi : “ Nkosi , Agripha , nani nonke nina madoda enikhona lapha kanye nathi , niyambona lona oluze ngaye kimi lonke uquqaba lwabaJuda eJerusalema nalapha , lumemeza luthi akafanele ukuba abe esaphila .

text: But when I found that he had committed nothing worthy of death , and that he himself hath appealed to Augustus , I have determined to send him .
text2: Kepha mina ngabona ukuthi akenzanga lutho olufanele ukuba afe , kodwa ngenxa yokudlulisela kwakhe kuKesari ngazinqumela ukumthuma .

text: Of whom I have no certain thing to write unto my lord . Wherefore I have brought him forth before you , and specially before thee , O king Agrippa , that , after examination had , I might have somewhat to write .
text2: Anginanto eqinisekileyo ngaye engingayilobela inkosi ; ngakho ngimlethile phambi kwenu , ikakhulu phambi kwakho , nkosi Agripha , ukuze kuthi sekuhloliwe , ngibe nakho engingakuloba .

text: For it seemeth to me unreasonable to send a prisoner , and not withal to signify the crimes laid against him .
text2: Ngokuba mina ngokwami ngithi akuqondile , uma kuthunyelwa isiboshwa , kungakhonjwa amacala aso . ”

text: Then Agrippa said unto Paul , Thou art permitted to speak for thyself . Then Paul stretched forth the hand , and answered for himself :
text2: Khona u - Agripha wathi kuPawulu : “ Uvunyelwe ukuba uzikhulumele . ” UPawulu wayeselula isandla , waziphendulela wathi :

text: I think myself happy , king Agrippa , because I shall answer for myself this day before thee touching all the things whereof I am accused of the Jews :
text2: “ Maqondana nakho konke engimangalelwa ngakho ngabaJuda , nkosi Agripha , ngizibona nginenhlanhla , ngokuba ngizakuziphendulela namuhla phambi kwakho ,

text: Especially because I know thee to be expert in all customs and questions which are among the Jews : wherefore I beseech thee to hear me patiently .
text2: ikakhulu lokhu uyisazi sawo onke amasiko nokuphikisana kwabaJuda ; ngalokho ngiyakunxusa ukuba ungilalele ngokubekezela .

text: My manner of life from my youth , which was at the first among mine own nation at Jerusalem , know all the Jews ;
text2: “ Inkambo yami kwasebusheni eyaba sesizweni sakithi naseJerusalema kwasekuqaleni bonke abaJuda bayayazi ,

text: Which knew me from the beginning , if they would testify , that after the most straitest sect of our religion I lived a Pharisee .
text2: bengazi kwasekuqaleni , uma bethanda ukufakaza ukuthi ngangihamba ngehlelo eliqinileyo lenkonzo yakithi ngingumFarisi .

text: And now I stand and am judged for the hope of the promise made of God unto our fathers :
text2: Kepha manje ngimi ngimangalelwe ngenxa yethemba lesithembiso asenzayo uNkulunkulu kubo obaba ,

text: Unto which promise our twelve tribes , instantly serving God day and night , hope to come . For which hope ' s sake , king Agrippa , I am accused of the Jews .
text2: ezithemba ukufinyelela kuso izizwe eziyishumi nambili zakithi , zikhonza ngesineke ubusuku nemini ; ngalelo themba , nkosi , ngimangalelwa ngabaJuda .

text: Why should it be thought a thing incredible with you , that God should raise the dead ?
text2: Kungani kube yinto engakholekile kini ukuthi uNkulunkulu uvusa abafileyo na ?

text: I verily thought with myself , that I ought to do many things contrary to the name of Jesus of Nazareth .
text2: “ Kepha mina ngokwami ngangithi ngifanele ukwenza okuningi okuphambene negama likaJesu waseNazaretha ;

text: Which thing I also did in Jerusalem : and many of the saints did I shut up in prison , having received authority from the chief priests ; and when they were put to death , I gave my voice against them .
text2: lokho ngase ngikwenza - ke eJerusalema ; mina ngabafaka abaningi kwabangcwele ematilongweni , ngiwatholile amandla kubapristi abakhulu , nalapho bebulawa ngabalahla ngevoti lami .

text: And I punished them oft in every synagogue , and compelled them to blaspheme ; and being exceedingly mad against them , I persecuted them even unto strange cities .
text2: Nasemasinagogeni onke kaningi ngabajezisa ngibacindezela ukuba bahlambalaze ; ngahlanya kakhulu ngabo , ngibazingela kwaze kwaba semizini yabezizwe .

text: Whereupon as I went to Damascus with authority and commission from the chief priests ,
text2: “ Kwathi lapho ngisaya eDamaseku ngamandla nangokuthunywa ngabapristi abakhulu ,

text: At midday , O king , I saw in the way a light from heaven , above the brightness of the sun , shining round about me and them which journeyed with me .
text2: emini enkulu , nkosi , ngisendleleni , ngabona ukukhanya okuvela ezulwini , kudlula ukukhazimula kwelanga , kungikhanyisela nxazonke kanye nababehamba nami ;

text: And when we were all fallen to the earth , I heard a voice speaking unto me , and saying in the Hebrew tongue , Saul , Saul , why persecutest thou me ? it is hard for thee to kick against the pricks .
text2: kwathi sesiwile phansi sonke emhlabathini , ngezwa izwi likhuluma kimi ngo limi lwesiHeberu , lithi : ‘ Sawulu , Sawulu , ungizingelelani na ? Kulukhuni kuwe ukukhahlela ezinkandini . ’

text: And I said , Who art thou , Lord ? And he said , I am Jesus whom thou persecutest .
text2: “ Kepha mina ngathi : ‘ Ungubani , Nkosi , na ? ’ INkosi yathi : ‘ Mina nginguJesu omzingelayo .

text: But rise , and stand upon thy feet : for I have appeared unto thee for this purpose , to make thee a minister and a witness both of these things which thou hast seen , and of those things in the which I will appear unto thee ;
text2: Kepha sukuma , ume ngezinyawo zakho ; ngokuba ngibonakele kuwe ngalokho ukuba ngikumise ube yisikhonzi nofakazi walokhu kungibona kwakho nowalokhu engizakuzibonakalisa kuwe ngakho ,

text: Delivering thee from the people , and from the Gentiles , unto whom now I send thee ,
text2: ngikophule esizweni nakwabezizwe engikuthumela kubo

text: To open their eyes , and to turn them from darkness to light , and from the power of Satan unto God , that they may receive forgiveness of sins , and inheritance among them which are sanctified by faith that is in me .
text2: ukuvula amehlo abo ukuba basuke ebumnyameni , baphendukele ekukhanyeni , basuke emandleni kaSathane , baphendukele kuNkulunkulu , ukuze bamukeliswe ukuthethelelwa kwezono nesabelo phakathi kwabangcwelisiweyo ngokukholwa kimi . ’

text: Whereupon , O king Agrippa , I was not disobedient unto the heavenly vision :
text2: “ Ngalokho , nkosi Agripha , angibanga ngongawulaleliyo umbono wasezulwini ,

text: But shewed first unto them of Damascus , and at Jerusalem , and throughout all the coasts of Judaea , and then to the Gentiles , that they should repent and turn to God , and do works meet for repentance .
text2: kodwa ngamemezela kuqala kwabaseDamaseku nakwabaseJerusalema , nakulo lonke izwe laseJudiya nakwabezizwe ukuba baphenduke , baguqukele kuNkulunkulu , benze imisebenzi efanele ukuphenduka .

text: For these causes the Jews caught me in the temple , and went about to kill me .
text2: Ngenxa yalokho abaJuda bangibamba ethempelini , balinga ukungibulala .

text: Having therefore obtained help of God , I continue unto this day , witnessing both to small and great , saying none other things than those which the prophets and Moses did say should come :
text2: Ngitholile usizo kuNkulunkulu ngimi kuze kube kulolu suku ngifakaza kwabancane nakwabakhulu , angikhulumi lutho ngaphandle kwalokho abakukhulumile abaprofethi noMose ukuthi kuzakwenzeka ,

text: That Christ should suffer , and that he should be the first that should rise from the dead , and should shew light unto the people , and to the Gentiles .
text2: ukuthi uKristu nga ehlupheka nokuthi engowokuqala ekuvukeni kwabafileyo uzakumemezela ukukhanya kuso isizwe nakwabezizwe . ”

text: And as he thus spake for himself , Festus said with a loud voice , Paul , thou art beside thyself ; much learning doth make thee mad .
text2: Kwathi esaziphendulela kanjalo , uFestu wathi ngezwi elikhulu : “ Pawulu , uyahlanya ; ukufunda okuningi kuyakuhlanyisa . ”

text: But he said , I am not mad , most noble Festus ; but speak forth the words of truth and soberness .
text2: Kepha uPawulu wathi : “ Angihlanyi , Festu odumileyo , kodwa ngikhuluma amazwi ayiqiniso nawokuqonda .

text: For the king knoweth of these things , before whom also I speak freely : for I am persuaded that none of these things are hidden from him ; for this thing was not done in a corner .
text2: Ngokuba inkosi engikhuluma kuyo ngesibindi iyazi ngalezi zinto , ngokuba angikholwa ukuthi kukhona utho lwalokhu olufihlekile kuyo ; ngokuba lokhu akwenziwanga engosini .

text: King Agrippa , believest thou the prophets ? I know that thou believest .
text2: Nkosi Agripha , uyakholwa ngabaprofethi na ? Ngiyazi ukuthi uyakholwa . ”

text: Then Agrippa said unto Paul , Almost thou persuadest me to be a Christian .
text2: U - Agripha wathi kuPawulu : “ Kusilele kancane ungivumise ngibe ngumKristu . ”

text: And Paul said , I would to God , that not only thou , but also all that hear me this day , were both almost , and altogether such as I am , except these bonds .
text2: UPawulu wayesethi : “ Bengingafisa kuNkulunkulu ukuba , noma kukancane noma kukakhulu , kungabi wena wedwa kodwa bonke abangizwayo namuhla babe njengami , ngaphandle kwalezi zibopho . ”

text: And when he had thus spoken , the king rose up , and the governor , and Bernice , and they that sat with them :
text2: Inkosi yayisisukuma nombusi noBernike kanye nababehlezi nabo ;

text: And when they were gone aside , they talked between themselves , saying , This man doeth nothing worthy of death or of bonds .
text2: kwathi sebegudlukile , bakhuluma bodwa , bathi : “ Lo muntu akenzi lutho olufanele ukufa noma izibopho . ”

text: Then said Agrippa unto Festus , This man might have been set at liberty , if he had not appealed unto Caesar .
text2: Kepha u - Agripha wathi kuFestu : “ Lo muntu ngabe ekhululiwe , uma ebengalidluliselanga kuKesari . ”

text: And when it was determined that we should sail into Italy , they delivered Paul and certain other prisoners unto one named Julius , a centurion of Augustus ' band .
text2: Kwathi sekunqunyiwe ukuba siye e - Italiya ngomkhumbi , banikela uPawulu nezinye iziboshwa ezithile enduneni yekhulu , igama layo linguJuliyu , eyebutho likaKesari .

text: And entering into a ship of Adramyttium , we launched , meaning to sail by the coasts of Asia ; one Aristarchus , a Macedonian of Thessalonica , being with us .
text2: Sangena emkhunjini wase - Adramitiyu obusuzakuya ezindaweni zangase - Asiya , u - Aristarku umMakedoniya waseThesalonika enathi .

text: And the next day we touched at Sidon . And Julius courteously entreated Paul , and gave him liberty to go unto his friends to refresh himself .
text2: Ngangomuso safika eSidoni ; uJuliyu wamphatha kahle uPawulu , wamvumela ukuba aye kubahlobo bakhe , ahlunyelelwe .

text: And when we had launched from thence , we sailed under Cyprus , because the winds were contrary .
text2: Sasuka lapho , sagudla ngenzansi kweKhupro , ngokuba imimoya yayiphambene nathi .

text: And when we had sailed over the sea of Cilicia and Pamphylia , we came to Myra , a city of Lycia .
text2: Sesidabulile ulwandle olungaseKhilikhiya nePhamfiliya safika eMira laseLikhiya .

text: And there the centurion found a ship of Alexandria sailing into Italy ; and he put us therein .
text2: Lapho - ke induna yafumana umkhumbi wase - Aleksandriya oqonde e - Italiya , yasingenisa kuwo .

text: And when we had sailed slowly many days , and scarce were come over against Cnidus , the wind not suffering us , we sailed under Crete , over against Salmone ;
text2: Sesihambe kancane izinsuku eziningi saze safika kalukhuni ngaseKinidu , umoya ungasivumeli , sagudla iKrethe maqondana neSalimone ,

text: And , hardly passing it , came unto a place which is called The fair havens ; nigh whereunto was the city of Lasea .
text2: sagudla lona kalukhuni , safika endaweni ethile ethiwa Matheku Mahle ; eduze nayo kukhona umuzi waseLaseya .

text: Now when much time was spent , and when sailing was now dangerous , because the fast was now already past , Paul admonished them ,
text2: Kwathi sekudlulile isikhathi eside , sekuyingozi ukuhamba ngomkhumbi , ngokuba isikhathi seNzilo sase sidlulile , uPawulu wabaluleka ,

text: And said unto them , Sirs , I perceive that this voyage will be with hurt and much damage , not only of the lading and ship , but also of our lives .
text2: wathi kubo : “ Madoda , ngiyabona ukuthi lolu hambo luzakuba nengozi nokuchithakala okukhulu , kungabi ngokwempahla nokomkhumbi kuphela kepha nokokuphila kwethu . ”

text: Nevertheless the centurion believed the master and the owner of the ship , more than those things which were spoken by Paul .
text2: Kepha induna yekhulu yethemba umshayeli womkhumbi nomniniwo kakhulu kunalokho okwakhulunywa nguPawulu .

text: And because the haven was not commodious to winter in , the more part advised to depart thence also , if by any means they might attain to Phenice , and there to winter ; which is an haven of Crete , and lieth toward the south west and north west .
text2: Njengokuba itheku lalingalungile ukuhlala khona ebusika , iningi labo laluleka ukuba kusukwe khona , mhlawumbe kwenzeke ukuba bafinyelele eFeniksi , itheku laseKrethe elibheke entshonalanga yaseningizimu nasentshonalanga yasenyakatho , bahlale khona ebusika .

text: And when the south wind blew softly , supposing that they had obtained their purpose , loosing thence , they sailed close by Crete .
text2: Kuthe iningizimu isaphephetha kahle , bacabanga ukuthi sebetholile ababekuqondile , bakhuphula ihange , bagudla iKrethe .

text: But not long after there arose against it a tempestuous wind , called Euroclydon .
text2: Kepha emva kwesikhathi esingeside kwavuka kwehla kulo umoya oyisivunguvungu othiwa i - Ewurakiloni ;

text: And when the ship was caught , and could not bear up into the wind , we let her drive .
text2: kodwa umkhumbi usududulwa ungasenakubhekana nomoya , sayeka saqhutshwa nje .

text: And running under a certain island which is called Clauda , we had much work to come by the boat :
text2: Kwathi sigudla ngenzansi kwesiqhingana esithiwa iKlawuda , sabamba isikebhe kalukhuni ;

text: Which when they had taken up , they used helps , undergirding the ship ; and , fearing lest they should fall into the quicksands , strake sail , and so were driven .
text2: sebe sikhuphulile basebenzisa izinto zokusiza , bawuzongolozela umkhumbi ngezintambo ; kuthe besaba ukuthi bazakukhahleleka eSirti , behlisa izindwangu zomkhumbi , baqhutshwa kanjalo .

text: And we being exceedingly tossed with a tempest , the next day they lightened the ship ;
text2: Kuthe ukuba sibhengulwe kakhulu yisiphepho , ngangomuso bachitha umthwalo ;

text: And the third day we cast out with our own hands the tackling of the ship .
text2: kwathi ngolwesithathu balahla izimpahla zomkhumbi ngezandla zabo .

text: And when neither sun nor stars in many days appeared , and no small tempest lay on us , all hope that we should be saved was then taken away .
text2: Khona - ke ilanga nezinkanyezi zingasabonakali izinsuku eziningi , nesiphepho esingesincane siqinisa njalo , lase liphela ithemba lonke lokuba singasindiswa .

text: But after long abstinence Paul stood forth in the midst of them , and said , Sirs , ye should have hearkened unto me , and not have loosed from Crete , and to have gained this harm and loss .
text2: Sekuyisikhathi eside bengasadli lutho , uPawulu wasukuma phakathi kwabo , wathi : “ Madoda , ngabe nalalela mina , kanamuka eKrethe , naphepha kule ngozi nakulokhu kuchithakala .

text: And now I exhort you to be of good cheer : for there shall be no loss of any man ' s life among you , but of the ship .
text2: Kepha manje senginiluleka ukuba nime isibindi , ngokuba akuyikufa muntu kini , umkhumbi kuphela .

text: For there stood by me this night the angel of God , whose I am , and whom I serve ,
text2: Ngokuba ngalobu busuku bekumi ngakimi ingelosi kaNkulunkulu engingowakhe nengimkhonzayo ,

text: Saying , Fear not , Paul ; thou must be brought before Caesar : and , lo , God hath given thee all them that sail with thee .
text2: yathi : ‘ Ungesabi , Pawulu ; umelwe ukuma phambi kukaKesari ; bheka , uNkulunkulu ukuphile bonke abahamba nawe emkhunjini . ’

text: Wherefore , sirs , be of good cheer : for I believe God , that it shall be even as it was told me .
text2: Ngalokho yimani isibindi , madoda ; ngokuba ngiyakholwa nguNkulunkulu ukuthi kuzakuba njengalokho kukhulunyiwe kimi .

text: Howbeit we must be cast upon a certain island .
text2: Kepha simelwe ukukhahleleka esiqhingini esithile . ”

text: But when the fourteenth night was come , as we were driven up and down in Adria , about midnight the shipmen deemed that they drew near to some country ;
text2: Kwathi ukuba kufike ubusuku beshumi nane sisazulazuliswa elwandle lwase - Adriya phakathi kobusuku , abomkhumbi bacabanga ukuthi bayasondela ezweni elithile .

text: And sounded , and found it twenty fathoms : and when they had gone a little further , they sounded again , and found it fifteen fathoms .
text2: Base bephonsa intambo yokulinganisa , bafumana kungamafatome angamashumi amabili ; sebeqhubekile kancane bayiphonsa futhi , bafumana kungamafatome ayishumi nanhlanu ;

text: Then fearing lest we should have fallen upon rocks , they cast four anchors out of the stern , and wished for the day .
text2: besaba ukuthi mhlawumbe singashayeka ezindaweni ezinamadwala , baphonsa amahange amane ngasemuva , bafisa ukuba kuse .

text: And as the shipmen were about to flee out of the ship , when they had let down the boat into the sea , under colour as though they would have cast anchors out of the foreship ,
text2: Abomkhumbi sebefuna ukubaleka emkhunjini , behlisela isikebhe elwandle ngokungathi bazakuphonsa amahange enhlokweni yomkhumbi ,

text: Paul said to the centurion and to the soldiers , Except these abide in the ship , ye cannot be saved .
text2: uPawulu wathi enduneni yekhulu nasemabuthweni : “ Uma laba bengahlali emkhunjini , ningesindiswe nina . ”

text: Then the soldiers cut off the ropes of the boat , and let her fall off .
text2: Khona amabutho anquma amagoda esikebhe , asidedela sawa .

text: And while the day was coming on , Paul besought them all to take meat , saying , This day is the fourteenth day that ye have tarried and continued fasting , having taken nothing .
text2: Kwathi sekuzakusa , uPawulu wabancenga bonke ukuba badle , wathi : “ Namuhla kulusuku lweshumi nane nilindile , nihlezi nizila , ningadli lutho .

text: Wherefore I pray you to take some meat : for this is for your health : for there shall not an hair fall from the head of any of you .
text2: Ngalokho ngiyanincenga ukuba nidle , ngokuba lokhu kungokokusinda kwenu ; akuyikulahleka unwele lwekhanda nakoyedwa phakathi kwenu . ”

text: And when he had thus spoken , he took bread , and gave thanks to God in presence of them all : and when he had broken it , he began to eat .
text2: Eseshilo lokho wathatha isinkwa , wabonga uNkulunkulu phambi kwabo bonke , wasihlephula , waqala ukudla .

text: Then were they all of good cheer , and they also took some meat .
text2: Base bema isibindi bonke , badla nabo .

text: And we were in all in the ship two hundred threescore and sixteen souls .
text2: Thina sonke esasisemkhunjini besingabantu abangamakhulu amabili namashumi ayisikhombisa nesithupha .

text: And when they had eaten enough , they lightened the ship , and cast out the wheat into the sea .
text2: Sebesuthi ukudla benza lula umkhumbi belahla ukolweni elwandle .

text: And when it was day , they knew not the land : but they discovered a certain creek with a shore , into the which they were minded , if it were possible , to thrust in the ship .
text2: Sekusile , abalazanga izwe , kepha babona itheku elithile elinesihlabathi abanquma ukuba baqhubele kulo umkhumbi , uma kungenzeka .

text: And when they had taken up the anchors , they committed themselves unto the sea , and loosed the rudder bands , and hoised up the mainsail to the wind , and made toward shore .
text2: Banquma amahange bawashiya elwandle , bathukulula futhi izintambo zamaphini okuqondisa , baphakamisela emoyeni indwangu ephambili , baqonda ogwini .

text: And falling into a place where two seas met , they ran the ship aground ; and the forepart stuck fast , and remained unmoveable , but the hinder part was broken with the violence of the waves .
text2: Batheleka endaweni enolwandle nxazombili , baqhubela umkhumbi kuyo , inhloko yomkhumbi yagxumekeka , yema ingenakunyakaziswa , kepha ingasemuva laphulwa ngamandla amaza .

text: And the soldiers ' counsel was to kill the prisoners , lest any of them should swim out , and escape .
text2: Kepha amabutho ayehlosa ukubulala iziboshwa , funa ezinye zibaleke ngokuhlamba ;

text: But the centurion , willing to save Paul , kept them from their purpose ; and commanded that they which could swim should cast themselves first into the sea , and get to land :
text2: kepha induna yekhulu ithanda ukusindisa uPawulu yawavimbela enhlosweni yawo , yayala ukuba labo abakwazi ukuhlamba baziphonse kuqala emanzini , bafike emhlabathini ,

text: And the rest , some on boards , and some on broken pieces of the ship . And so it came to pass , that they escaped all safe to land .
text2: nabaseleyo bafike , abanye ngamapulangwe , abanye ngezinye izinto zomkhumbi . Kanjalo - ke kwenzeka ukuba bonke baphumele emhlabathini besindile .

text: And when they were escaped , then they knew that the island was called Melita .
text2: Kwathi sesisindile khona , sezwa ukuthi isiqhingi sithiwa iMelitha .

text: And the barbarous people shewed us no little kindness : for they kindled a fire , and received us every one , because of the present rain , and because of the cold .
text2: Abantu bakhona basiphatha ngobubele obungavamile , ngokuba babebasa umlilo , basamukela sonke ngenxa yemvula eyayisina nangenxa yamakhaza .

text: And when Paul had gathered a bundle of sticks , and laid them on the fire , there came a viper out of the heat , and fastened on his hand .
text2: Kepha uPawulu ecakashile ixha lezinsaba , elibeka emlilweni , kwaphuma inyoka ngenxa yokushisa , yanamathela esandleni sakhe .

text: And when the barbarians saw the venomous beast hang on his hand , they said among themselves , No doubt this man is a murderer , whom , though he hath escaped the sea , yet vengeance suffereth not to live .
text2: Abantu bakhona sebebona isilwane silenga esandleni sakhe , bakhuluma bodwa , bathi : “ Ngempela lo muntu ungumbulali othi noma esindile elwandle ukuLunga akuvumi ukuba aphile . ”

text: And he shook off the beast into the fire , and felt no harm .
text2: Kodwa yena wasinikinela isilwane emlilweni , akaze alimala .

text: Howbeit they looked when he should have swollen , or fallen down dead suddenly : but after they had looked a great while , and saw no harm come to him , they changed their minds , and said that he was a god .
text2: Kepha babheka ukuthi usezakuvuvuka , nokuba awe phansi masinyane , afe . Kepha sebebheka isikhathi eside , bebona ukuthi akafikelwa ngozi , baphenduka bathi ungunkulunkulu .

text: In the same quarters were possessions of the chief man of the island , whose name was Publius ; who received us , and lodged us three days courteously .
text2: Kwakukhona kuleyo ndawo izwe lesikhulu sesiqhingi , igama laso linguPhubiliyu ; yena wasamukela , wasiphatha kahle izinsuku ezintathu .

text: And it came to pass , that the father of Publius lay sick of a fever and of a bloody flux : to whom Paul entered in , and prayed , and laid his hands on him , and healed him .
text2: Kepha uyise kaPhubiliyu wayelele phansi ephethwe ngumkhuhlane nembo ; uPawulu wangena kuye , wakhuleka , wabeka izandla phezu kwakhe , wamphilisa .

text: So when this was done , others also , which had diseases in the island , came , and were healed :
text2: Kwathi lokho sekwenzekile , beza nabanye abasesiqhingini abanezifo , baphulukiswa ,

text: Who also honoured us with many honours ; and when we departed , they laded us with such things as were necessary .
text2: basitusa ngokutusa okuningi ; kwathi mhla simuka ngomkhumbi , basinika esikudingayo .

text: And after three months we departed in a ship of Alexandria , which had wintered in the isle , whose sign was Castor and Pollux .
text2: Emva kwezinyanga ezintathu sase simuka ngomkhumbi wase - Aleksandriya owawudlulisa ubusika esiqhingini , uphawu lwawo lungolwamaWele .

text: And landing at Syracuse , we tarried there three days .
text2: Sangena eSirakhuse , sahlala izinsuku ezintathu ;

text: And from thence we fetched a compass , and came to Rhegium : and after one day the south wind blew , and we came the next day to Puteoli :
text2: sasuka lapho , sagwegwesa , safika eRegiyu . Sekudlule usuku lwaba lunye , kwavuka iningizimu , safika ePhutheyoli ngosuku lwesibili .

text: Where we found brethren , and were desired to tarry with them seven days : and so we went toward Rome .
text2: Safumana khona abazalwane , sancengwa ukuba sihlale nabo izinsuku eziyisikhombisa ; kanjalo safika eRoma .

text: And from thence , when the brethren heard of us , they came to meet us as far as Appiiforum , and The three taverns : whom when Paul saw , he thanked God , and took courage .
text2: Abazalwame sebezwile ngathi basuka khona , beza ukusihlangabeza baze bafika e - Aphiyo Foru naseTresi Thaberne ; uPawulu ebabona wabonga uNkulunkulu , wema isibindi .

text: And when we came to Rome , the centurion delivered the prisoners to the captain of the guard : but Paul was suffered to dwell by himself with a soldier that kept him .
text2: Sesifikile eRoma , uPawulu wavunyelwa ukuhlala yedwa enebutho elimlindayo .

text: And it came to pass , that after three days Paul called the chief of the Jews together : and when they were come together , he said unto them , Men and brethren , though I have committed nothing against the people , or customs of our fathers , yet was I delivered prisoner from Jerusalem into the hands of the Romans .
text2: Kwathi emva kwezinsuku ezintathu wabizela ndawonye kuye abakhulu babaJuda ; sebebuthene , wathi kubo : “ Madoda , bazalwame , noma mina ngingenzanga lutho oluphambene nesizwe namasiko awobaba , nokho ngasuswa eJerusalema ngiyisiboshwa , nganikelwa ezandleni zamaRoma ;

text: Who , when they had examined me , would have let me go , because there was no cause of death in me .
text2: wona esengihlolile afuna ukungikhulula , ngokuba kungekho cala kimi lokuba ngife ;

text: But when the Jews spake against it , I was constrained to appeal unto Caesar ; not that I had ought to accuse my nation of .
text2: kepha abaJuda bekuphikisa , ngacindezelwa ukuba ngilidlulisele kuKesari , kungesikho ukuthi ngisimangalela isizwe sakithi ngalutho .

text: For this cause therefore have I called for you , to see you , and to speak with you : because that for the hope of Israel I am bound with this chain .
text2: Ngakho ngaleso sizathu nginibizele lapha ukuba nginibone , ngikhulume nani ; ngokuba ngenxa yethemba lika - Israyeli ngiboshiwe ngaleli ketanga . ”

text: And they said unto him , We neither received letters out of Judaea concerning thee , neither any of the brethren that came shewed or spake any harm of thee .
text2: Base bethi kuye : “ Thina asamukelanga ncwadi ngawe evela eJudiya , akufikanga namuntu wabazalwane ukubika nokukhuluma utho olubi ngawe .

text: But we desire to hear of thee what thou thinkest : for as concerning this sect , we know that every where it is spoken against .
text2: Kepha sithi kufanele sizwe kuwe okucabangayo , ngokuba siyazi ngaleli hlelo ukuthi liyaphikiswa ezindaweni zonke . ”

text: And when they had appointed him a day , there came many to him into his lodging ; to whom he expounded and testified the kingdom of God , persuading them concerning Jesus , both out of the law of Moses , and out of the prophets , from morning till evening .
text2: Khona sebemmisele usuku beza kuye endlini yakhe bebaningi , wabachasisela efakaza ngombuso kaNkulunkulu , wabaqondisa ngoJesu ethathela emthethweni kaMose nakubaprofethi , kusukela ekuseni kwaze kwahlwa .

text: And some believed the things which were spoken , and some believed not .
text2: Abanye baneliswa ngokwakhulunywayo , abanye abakholwanga ;

text: And when they agreed not among themselves , they departed , after that Paul had spoken one word , Well spake the Holy Ghost by Esaias the prophet unto our fathers ,
text2: kwathi ukuba bangezwani bodwa , bamuka , uPawulu esekhuluma izwi labalinye lokuthi : “ Wakhuluma kahle uMoya oNgcwele ngo - Isaya umprofethi koyihlo

text: Saying , Go unto this people , and say , Hearing ye shall hear , and shall not understand ; and seeing ye shall see , and not perceive :
text2: ngokuthi : “ ‘ Hamba uye kulesi sizwe , uthi : “ Ngokuzwa niyakuzwa , ningaze naqonda , nangokubona niyakubona , ningaze nabonisisa ,

text: For the heart of this people is waxed gross , and their ears are dull of hearing , and their eyes have they closed ; lest they should see with their eyes , and hear with their ears , and understand with their heart , and should be converted , and I should heal them .
text2: ngokuba inhliziyo yalesi sizwe seyaba buthuntu ; bezwa kanzima ngezindlebe , amehlo abo bawacimezile , funa mhlawumbe babone ngamehlo , bezwe ngezindlebe , baqonde ngenhliziyo , baphenduke , ngibaphilise . ” ’

text: Be it known therefore unto you , that the salvation of God is sent unto the Gentiles , and that they will hear it .
text2: “ Ngakho - ke makwazeke kini ukuthi le nsindiso kaNkulunkulu ithunyelwe kwabezizwe ; bona - ke bayakuzwa . ”

text: And when he had said these words , the Jews departed , and had great reasoning among themselves .
text2: Kwathi eseshilo lokho , abaJuda baphuma benokuphikisana okukhulu phakathi kwabo .

text: And Paul dwelt two whole years in his own hired house , and received all that came in unto him ,
text2: Kepha uPawulu wahlala iminyaka emibili egcwele endlini yakhe ayiqashileyo , wamukela bonke abeza kuye ,

text: Preaching the kingdom of God , and teaching those things which concern the Lord Jesus Christ , with all confidence , no man forbidding him .
text2: washumayela umbuso kaNkulunkulu , wafundisa ngaso sonke isibindi izindaba zeNkosi uJesu Kristu , enganqatshelwa muntu .

text: Paul , a servant of Jesus Christ , called to be an apostle , separated unto the gospel of God ,
text2: UPawulu , inceku kaKristu Jesu , umphostoli obiziweyo nowahlukaniselwe ivangeli likaNkulunkulu ,

text: ( Which he had promised afore by his prophets in the holy scriptures , )
text2: alethembisa ngaphambili ngabaprofethi bakhe emibhalweni engcwele

text: Concerning his Son Jesus Christ our Lord , which was made of the seed of David according to the flesh ;
text2: mayelana neNdodana yakhe eyavela enzalweni kaDavide ngokwenyama ,

text: And declared to be the Son of God with power , according to the spirit of holiness , by the resurrection from the dead :
text2: eyabonakaliswa ngamandla ukuthi iyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu ngokoMoya wobungcwele ngokuvuka kwabafileyo , uJesu Kristu iNkosi yethu

text: By whom we have received grace and apostleship , for obedience to the faith among all nations , for his name :
text2: esamukela ngaye umusa nobuphostoli kube ngukulalela kokukholwa ezizweni zonke ngenxa yegama lakhe ,

text: Among whom are ye also the called of Jesus Christ :
text2: enikuzo nani eningababiziweyo bakaJesu Kristu ,

text: To all that be in Rome , beloved of God , called to be saints : Grace to you and peace from God our Father , and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: kubo bonke abathandiweyo bakaNkulunkulu abaseRoma , ababiziweyo , abangcwele : Makube kini umusa nokuthula okuvela kuNkulunkulu uBaba wethu naseNkosini uJesu Kristu .

text: First , I thank my God through Jesus Christ for you all , that your faith is spoken of throughout the whole world .
text2: Kuqala - ke ngibonga uNkulunkulu wami ngoJesu Kristu ngani nonke , ngokuba ukukholwa kwenu kunconywa ezweni lonke .

text: For God is my witness , whom I serve with my spirit in the gospel of his Son , that without ceasing I make mention of you always in my prayers ;
text2: Ngokuba uNkulunkulu , engimkhonza emoyeni wami ngevangeli leNdodana yakhe , ungufakazi wami wokuthi ngokungaphezi ngiyanikhumbula

text: Making request , if by any means now at length I might have a prosperous journey by the will of God to come unto you .
text2: njalo emikhulekweni yami , nginxusa ukuba , uma kungenzeka ngentando kaNkulunkulu , ngiphumelele ukufika kini .

text: For I long to see you , that I may impart unto you some spiritual gift , to the end ye may be established ;
text2: Ngokuba ngilangazelela ukunibona ukuze nginabele isipho esithile somusa sokomoya ukuba niqiniswe ,

text: That is , that I may be comforted together with you by the mutual faith both of you and me .
text2: okungukuthi siduduzane kanye nani phakathi kwenu ngokukholwa kwethu okwenu nokwami .

text: Now I would not have you ignorant , brethren , that oftentimes I purposed to come unto you , ( but was let hitherto , ) that I might have some fruit among you also , even as among other Gentiles .
text2: Angithandi , bazalwane , ukuba ningazi ukuthi ngazimisela kaningi ukuza kini , kepha ngathiyeka kuze kube manje ukuba nakini ngibe nezithelo njengakwezinye izizwe .

text: I am debtor both to the Greeks , and to the Barbarians ; both to the wise , and to the unwise .
text2: Nginecala kumaGreki nakwabezizwe , kwabahlakaniphileyo nakwabangaqondiyo ;

text: So , as much as in me is , I am ready to preach the gospel to you that are at Rome also .
text2: kanjalo mina ngokwami nginesifiso sokushumayela ivangeli nakinina baseRoma .

text: For I am not ashamed of the gospel of Christ : for it is the power of God unto salvation to every one that believeth ; to the Jew first , and also to the Greek .
text2: Ngokuba anginamahloni ngevangeli ; ngokuba lingamandla kaNkulunkulu , kube yinsindiso kulowo nalowo okholwayo , kumJuda kuqala , nakumGreki .

text: For therein is the righteousness of God revealed from faith to faith : as it is written , The just shall live by faith .
text2: Ngokuba ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu kwambulwa kulo , kuvela ekukholweni , kuyisa ekukholweni , njengokulotshiweyo ukuthi : “ Olungileyo uzakuphila ngokukholwa . ”

text: For the wrath of God is revealed from heaven against all ungodliness and unrighteousness of men , who hold the truth in unrighteousness ;
text2: Ngokuba intukuthelo kaNkulunkulu yambulwa ivela ezulwini phezu kwakho konke ukungamesabi uNkulunkulu nokungalungi kwabantu abathiya iqiniso ngokungalungi ,

text: Because that which may be known of God is manifest in them ; for God hath shewed it unto them .
text2: ngokuba lokho okwazekayo ngoNkulunkulu kusobala phakathi kwabo ; ngokuba uNkulunkulu ukubonakalisile kubo .

text: For the invisible things of him from the creation of the world are clearly seen , being understood by the things that are made , even his eternal power and Godhead ; so that they are without excuse :
text2: Ngokuba okungabonwayo kwakhe , kuthi amandla akhe aphakade nobuNkulunkulu bakhe kubonakala kwasekudalweni kwezwe , ngokuba kuqondakala ngezenzo zakhe , ukuze bangabi nakuzilandulela ,

text: Because that , when they knew God , they glorified him not as God , neither were thankful ; but became vain in their imaginations , and their foolish heart was darkened .
text2: ngokuba kuthe bemazi uNkulunkulu , kabamdumisanga , kabambonganga njengoNkulunkulu , kodwa balutheka ekuzindleni kwabo ; inhliziyo yabo engaqondiyo yaba mnyama .

text: Professing themselves to be wise , they became fools ,
text2: Bezisho ukuthi bahlakaniphile baba yiziwula ,

text: And changed the glory of the uncorruptible God into an image made like to corruptible man , and to birds , and fourfooted beasts , and creeping things .
text2: nenkazimulo kaNkulunkulu ongabhubhiyo bayiguqula ifane nomfanekiso womuntu obhubhayo , owezinyoni , nowezilwane ezinezinyawo ezine nezinwabuzelayo .

text: Wherefore God also gave them up to uncleanness through the lusts of their own hearts , to dishonour their own bodies between themselves :
text2: Ngalokho uNkulunkulu wabanikela ezinkanukweni zezinhliziyo zabo kukho ukungcola , bahlazisane imizimba yabo ,

text: Who changed the truth of God into a lie , and worshipped and served the creature more than the Creator , who is blessed for ever . Amen .
text2: baguqule iqiniso likaNkulunkulu , balenza amanga ; bahlonipha , bakhonza okudaliweyo kunoMdali ongobongekayo kuze kube phakade . Amen .

text: For this cause God gave them up unto vile affections : for even their women did change the natural use into that which is against nature :
text2: Ngenxa yalokho uNkulunkulu wabanikela ekuhuhekeni okuyihlazo ; ngokuba abesifazane babo baguqula ukwenza okwemvelo kwaba ngokuphambene nemvelo ;

text: And likewise also the men , leaving the natural use of the woman , burned in their lust one toward another ; men with men working that which is unseemly , and receiving in themselves that recompence of their error which was meet .
text2: ngokunjalo nabesilisa bayeka ukwenza kwemvelo kowesifazane , basha ngokukhanukelana , abesilisa benza okuyichilo kwabesilisa , bezitholela umvuzo ofanele ukuduka kwabo .

text: And even as they did not like to retain God in their knowledge , God gave them over to a reprobate mind , to do those things which are not convenient ;
text2: Nanjengalokho bengakunakanga ukumazi uNkulunkulu , uNkulunkulu wabanikela engqondweni yokunganaki ukwenza okungafanele ,

text: Being filled with all unrighteousness , fornication , wickedness , covetousness , maliciousness ; full of envy , murder , debate , deceit , malignity ; whisperers ,
text2: begcwele konke ukungalungi , nokonakala , nesangabe , nobubi ; begcwele umhawu , nokubulala , nokuphikisana , nenkohliso , nobuqili , nokuhleba ;

text: Backbiters , haters of God , despiteful , proud , boasters , inventors of evil things , disobedient to parents ,
text2: beyizinyevuzi , nabazonda uNkulunkulu , nezidlova , nabazidlayo , nabazigabisayo , nabaqambi bokubi , nabangalaleli abazali ,

text: Without understanding , covenantbreakers , without natural affection , implacable , unmerciful :
text2: nabangenangqondo , nabangathembekile , nabangenaluthando , nabangenasihawu ,

text: Who knowing the judgment of God , that they which commit such things are worthy of death , not only do the same , but have pleasure in them that do them .
text2: abathi besazi isimiso sokulunga sikaNkulunkulu sokuthi abenza okunjalo bafanele ukufa , abenzi lokho kuphela , kodwa babuye bavumelana nabakwenzayo .

text: Therefore thou art inexcusable , O man , whosoever thou art that judgest : for wherein thou judgest another , thou condemnest thyself ; for thou that judgest doest the same things .
text2: Ngakho awunakuzilandulela wena muntu , noma ungubani owahlulelayo , ngokuba ngalokho owahlulela ngakho omunye uyazilahla wena , ngokuba wena owahlulelayo uyakwenza khona lokho nawe .

text: But we are sure that the judgment of God is according to truth against them which commit such things .
text2: Siyazi ukuthi ukwahlulela kukaNkulunkulu ngokweqiniso kubehlela abenza okunjalo .

text: And thinkest thou this , O man , that judgest them which do such things , and doest the same , that thou shalt escape the judgment of God ?
text2: Ucabanga lokho yini wena muntu owahlulela abenza okunjalo , ubukwenza nawe , ukuthi uyakubalekela ukwahlulela kukaNkulunkulu na ?

text: Or despisest thou the riches of his goodness and forbearance and longsuffering ; not knowing that the goodness of God leadeth thee to repentance ?
text2: Kumbe uyayidelela yini ingcebo yobumnene , neyokubekezela , neyenyewe yakhe , ungazi ukuthi ubumnene bukaNkulunkulu bukuyisa ekuphendukeni na ?

text: But after thy hardness and impenitent heart treasurest up unto thyself wrath against the day of wrath and revelation of the righteous judgment of God ;
text2: Kepha ngobulukhuni bakho nangenhliziyo engaphendukiyo uzibekelela ulaka ngosuku lolaka nolokwambulwa kokwahlulela okulungileyo kukaNkulunkulu

text: Who will render to every man according to his deeds :
text2: oyakuvuza yilowo nalowo ngokwemisebenzi yakhe :

text: To them who by patient continuance in well doing seek for glory and honour and immortality , eternal life :
text2: labo abafuna ngokukhuthazela ekwenzeni okuhle inkazimulo nodumo nokungabhubhi bothola ukuphila okuphakade ;

text: But unto them that are contentious , and do not obey the truth , but obey unrighteousness , indignation and wrath ,
text2: kepha labo abanombango bengalaleli iqiniso , belalela ukungalungi , bothola ulaka nentukuthelo .

text: Tribulation and anguish , upon every soul of man that doeth evil , of the Jew first , and also of the Gentile ;
text2: Usizi nokubandezeka kuyakwehlela imiphefumulo yabantu bonke abenza okubi , umJuda kuqala , nomGreki futhi ;

text: But glory , honour , and peace , to every man that worketh good , to the Jew first , and also to the Gentile :
text2: kepha inkazimulo nodumo nokuthula kubo bonke abenza okuhle , kumJuda kuqala , nakumGreki futhi .

text: For there is no respect of persons with God .
text2: Ngokuba akukho ukukhetha umuntu kuNkulunkulu .

text: For as many as have sinned without law shall also perish without law : and as many as have sinned in the law shall be judged by the law ;
text2: Ngokuba bonke abonileyo bengenamthetho bayakubhubha bengenamthetho ; kepha bonke abonileyo benomthetho bayakwahlulelwa ngomthetho ;

text: ( For not the hearers of the law are just before God , but the doers of the law shall be justified .
text2: ngokuba akusibo abezwayo umthetho abangabalungile phambi kukaNkulunkulu , kepha abenzayo umthetho yibona abayakulungisiswa .

text: For when the Gentiles , which have not the law , do by nature the things contained in the law , these , having not the law , are a law unto themselves :
text2: Ngokuba nxa abezizwe abangenawo umthetho ngokwemvelo benza okomthetho , laba , bengenawo umthetho , bangumthetho wabo ngokwabo ,

text: Which shew the work of the law written in their hearts , their conscience also bearing witness , and their thoughts the mean while accusing or else excusing one another ; )
text2: babonakalisa ukuthi umsebenzi womthetho ulotshiwe ezinhliziyweni zabo , nonembeza wabo uyafakaza naye , imicabango yabo imangalelana noma ivunana ,

text: In the day when God shall judge the secrets of men by Jesus Christ according to my gospel .
text2: ngosuku uNkulunkulu ayakwahlulela ngalo okufihliweyo kwabantu ngokwevangeli lami ngoKristu Jesu .

text: Behold , thou art called a Jew , and restest in the law , and makest thy boast of God ,
text2: Kepha uma uthiwa ungumJuda , wethemba umthetho , uzibonga ngoNkulunkulu ,

text: And knowest his will , and approvest the things that are more excellent , being instructed out of the law ;
text2: wazi intando yakhe , ukhetha okungcono , ungofundisiwe emithethweni ,

text: And art confident that thou thyself art a guide of the blind , a light of them which are in darkness ,
text2: uzethembile wena ukuthi ungumholi wezimpumputhe , ungukukhanya kwabasebumnyameni ,

text: An instructor of the foolish , a teacher of babes , which hast the form of knowledge and of the truth in the law .
text2: umyali weziwula nomfundisi wezingane , unakho ukuma kokwazi nokweqiniso emthethweni ,

text: Thou therefore which teachest another , teachest thou not thyself ? thou that preachest a man should not steal , dost thou steal ?
text2: wena - ke ofundisa omunye , awuzifundisi wena na ? Wena oshumayela ukuthi akungebiwa , uyeba na ?

text: Thou that sayest a man should not commit adultery , dost thou commit adultery ? thou that abhorrest idols , dost thou commit sacrilege ?
text2: Wena othi akungaphingwa , uyaphinga na ? Wena owenyanya isithombe , uphanga ithempeli na ?

text: Thou that makest thy boast of the law , through breaking the law dishonourest thou God ?
text2: Wena ozibonga ngomthetho , udumaza uNkulunkulu ngokweqa umthetho na ?

text: For the name of God is blasphemed among the Gentiles through you , as it is written .
text2: Ngokuba igama likaNkulunkulu liyahlanjalazwa phakathi kwabezizwe ngenxa yenu , njengalokho kulotshiwe .

text: For circumcision verily profiteth , if thou keep the law : but if thou be a breaker of the law , thy circumcision is made uncircumcision .
text2: Ngokuba ukusoka kuyasiza kambe , uma ugcina umthetho ; kepha uma ungumeqi womthetho , ukusoka kwakho kuphenduka ukungasoki .

text: Therefore if the uncircumcision keep the righteousness of the law , shall not his uncircumcision be counted for circumcision ?
text2: Ngakho - ke uma ongasokile egcina izimiso zomthetho , ukungasoki kwakhe akuyikubalwa ukuthi kungukusoka na ?

text: And shall not uncircumcision which is by nature , if it fulfil the law , judge thee , who by the letter and circumcision dost transgress the law ?
text2: Khona ongasokile ngokwemvelo , egcina umthetho , uzakwahlulela wena othi unombhalo nokusoka , weqe umthetho .

text: For he is not a Jew , which is one outwardly ; neither is that circumcision , which is outward in the flesh :
text2: Ngokuba umJuda kakusiye onguye ngokubonwayo , nokusoka akusikho okubonwa enyameni ;

text: But he is a Jew , which is one inwardly ; and circumcision is that of the heart , in the spirit , and not in the letter ; whose praise is not of men , but of God .
text2: kodwa umJuda yilowo onguye ngaphakathi , nokusoka kungokwenhliziyo , ngomoya kungengegama , okutuswa kwakhe kungaveli kubantu kepha kuNkulunkulu .

text: What advantage then hath the Jew ? or what profit is there of circumcision ?
text2: Ngalokho kuyini umJuda adlula abanye ngakho na ? Kukho , ukusoka kunokusiza kuni na ?

text: Much every way : chiefly , because that unto them were committed the oracles of God .
text2: Kukhulu ngezindlela zonke . Kuqala ngokuba baphathisiwe amazwi kaNkulunkulu .

text: For what if some did not believe ? shall their unbelief make the faith of God without effect ?
text2: Kunjani pho ? Uma abanye bengakholwanga , ukungakholwa kwabo kuyakwenza ize ukukholeka kukaNkulunkulu na ?

text: God forbid : yea , let God be true , but every man a liar ; as it is written , That thou mightest be justified in thy sayings , and mightest overcome when thou art judged .
text2: Qha nakanye ; kepha makube ngukuthi : UNkulunkulu uqinisile , wonke umuntu ungumqambimanga , njengokuba kulotshiwe ukuthi : “ Ukuze uthiwe ungolungileyo emazwini akho , unqobe ekwahlulelweni kwakho . ”

text: But if our unrighteousness commend the righteousness of God , what shall we say ? Is God unrighteous who taketh vengeance ? ( I speak as a man )
text2: Kepha uma ukungalungi kwethu kubonakalisa ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu , siyakuthini na ? Imbala uNkulunkulu ungongalungile yini owehlisa ulaka na ? Ngikhulumisa okomuntu .

text: God forbid : for then how shall God judge the world ?
text2: Qha nakanye , ngokuba uNkulunkulu uyakulahlulela kanjani izwe , pho , na ?

text: For if the truth of God hath more abounded through my lie unto his glory ; why yet am I also judged as a sinner ?
text2: Kepha uma iqiniso likaNkulunkulu lavama ngamanga ami , kube yinkazimulo yakhe , ngisahlulelelwani futhi mina njengesoni na ?

text: And not rather , ( as we be slanderously reported , and as some affirm that we say , ) Let us do evil , that good may come ? whose damnation is just .
text2: Kungabi ngukuthi , njengalokhu sihlanjalazwayo nanjengalokhu abanye bathi siyasho ukuthi asenze okubi , ukuze kuvele okuhle na ? Ukulahlwa kwabo kubafanele .

text: What then ? are we better than they ? No , in no wise : for we have before proved both Jews and Gentiles , that they are all under sin ;
text2: Kunjani kanti ? Siyabadlula na ? Qha nakanye , ngokuba bese sibamangalele abaJuda namaGreki ngokuthi bonke baphansi kwesono ,

text: As it is written , There is none righteous , no , not one :
text2: njengokuba kulotshiwe ukuthi : “ Akakho olungileyo , akakho noyedwa ;

text: There is none that understandeth , there is none that seeketh after God .
text2: akakho oqondayo , akakho ofuna uNkulunkulu ;

text: They are all gone out of the way , they are together become unprofitable ; there is none that doeth good , no , not one .
text2: bonke baphambukile , baphenduke imbuqa bonkana ; akakho owenza okuhle , akakho noyedwa .

text: Their throat is an open sepulchre ; with their tongues they have used deceit ; the poison of asps is under their lips :
text2: Umphimbo wabo uyiliba elivulekileyo , ngezilimi zabo bayakhohlisa , isihlungu sezinyoka siphansi kwezindebe zabo ;

text: Whose mouth is full of cursing and bitterness :
text2: umlomo wabo ugcwele ukuthuka nokubaba ;

text: Their feet are swift to shed blood :
text2: izinyawo zabo zishesha ukuchitha igazi ,

text: Destruction and misery are in their ways :
text2: incithakalo nosizi kusezindleleni zabo ,

text: And the way of peace have they not known :
text2: indlela yokuthula abayazi .

text: There is no fear of God before their eyes .
text2: Ukwesaba uNkulunkulu akukho phambi kwamehlo abo . ”

text: Now we know that what things soever the law saith , it saith to them who are under the law : that every mouth may be stopped , and all the world may become guilty before God .
text2: Kepha siyazi ukuthi lokhu okushoyo umthetho ukukhuluma kubo abasemthethweni ukuba yonke imilomo ivinjwe , izwe lonke libe necala kuNkulunkulu ,

text: Therefore by the deeds of the law there shall no flesh be justified in his sight : for by the law is the knowledge of sin .
text2: ngokuba ngemisebenzi yomthetho akukho nyama eyakulungisiswa phambi kwakhe ; ngokuba ngomthetho kukhona ukwazi isono .

text: But now the righteousness of God without the law is manifested , being witnessed by the law and the prophets ;
text2: Kepha manje kubonakalisiwe ukulunga okuvela kuNkulunkulu ngaphandle komthetho , kufakazelwa ngumthetho nabaprofethi ,

text: Even the righteousness of God which is by faith of Jesus Christ unto all and upon all them that believe : for there is no difference :
text2: ngisho ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu ngokukholwa nguJesu Kristu kubo bonke abakholwayo ; ngokuba akukho mahluko ;

text: For all have sinned , and come short of the glory of God ;
text2: ngokuba bonke bonile , basilalelwe inkazimulo kaNkulunkulu ;

text: Being justified freely by his grace through the redemption that is in Christ Jesus :
text2: balungisisiwe ngesihle ngomusa wakhe ngokuhlengwa okukuKristu Jesu ,

text: Whom God hath set forth to be a propitiation through faith in his blood , to declare his righteousness for the remission of sins that are past , through the forbearance of God ;
text2: ammisileyo uNkulunkulu abe yinhlawulo ngokukholwa egazini lakhe , kubonakaliswe ukulunga kwakhe ngokuyekelwa kwezono ezenziwe ngaphambili

text: To declare , I say , at this time his righteousness : that he might be just , and the justifier of him which believeth in Jesus .
text2: ekubekezeleni kukaNkulunkulu , ukuba kubonakaliswe ukulunga kwakhe esikhathini samanje , ukuze yena abe ngolungileyo , abe ngumlungisisi walowo okholwa nguJesu .

text: Where is boasting then ? It is excluded . By what law ? of works ? Nay : but by the law of faith .
text2: Ngakho kuphi ukuzibonga na ? Kuvalelwe phandle . Ngamthetho muni na ? Ngowemisebenzi na ? Qhabo , kodwa ngomthetho wokukholwa .

text: Therefore we conclude that a man is justified by faith without the deeds of the law .
text2: Ngakho - ke sithi umuntu ulungisiswa ngokukholwa ngaphandle kwemisebenzi yomthetho .

text: Is he the God of the Jews only ? is he not also of the Gentiles ? Yes , of the Gentiles also :
text2: Kumbe uNkulunkulu ungowabaJuda kuphela na ? Kasiye nowabezizwe na ? Yebo , nowabezizwe ,

text: Seeing it is one God , which shall justify the circumcision by faith , and uncircumcision through faith .
text2: uma impela uNkulunkulu emunye oyakulungisisa abasokileyo ngokukholwa nabangasokile ngokukholwa .

text: Do we then make void the law through faith ? God forbid : yea , we establish the law .
text2: Ngakho - ke umthetho siwenza ize ngenxa yokukholwa na ? Qha nakanye , kodwa siyawuqinisa umthetho .

text: What shall we say then that Abraham our father , as pertaining to the flesh , hath found ?
text2: Ngakho - ke siyakuthi uzuzeni u - Abrahama , ukhokho wethu , ngokwenyama na ?

text: For if Abraham were justified by works , he hath whereof to glory ; but not before God .
text2: Ngokuba uma u - Abrahama walungisiswa ngemisebenzi , unakho ukuzibonga ; kodwa phambi kukaNkulunkulu qha .

text: For what saith the scripture ? Abraham believed God , and it was counted unto him for righteousness .
text2: Ngokuba umbhalo uthini na ? Uthi : “ Kepha u - Abrahama wakholwa nguNkulunkulu , kwambalelwa ukuthi kungukulunga . ”

text: Now to him that worketh is the reward not reckoned of grace , but of debt .
text2: Kepha kosebenzayo umvuzo awubalelwa ngokomusa kodwa ngokwemfanelo ;

text: But to him that worketh not , but believeth on him that justifieth the ungodly , his faith is counted for righteousness .
text2: kepha kongasebenziyo , kodwa ekholwa nguye olungisisa ongamesabi uNkulunkulu , ukukholwa kwakhe kubalelwa yena ukuthi kungukulunga ,

text: Even as David also describeth the blessedness of the man , unto whom God imputeth righteousness without works ,
text2: njengalokhu noDavide esho ngokubusiswa komuntu uNkulunkulu ambalela ukulunga ngaphandle kwemisebenzi , ethi :

text: Saying , Blessed are they whose iniquities are forgiven , and whose sins are covered .
text2: “ Babusisiwe abathethelelwe izeqo zabo , nabazono zabo zisitshekelwe ;

text: Blessed is the man to whom the Lord will not impute sin .
text2: ubusisiwe umuntu iNkosi engayikumbalela isono . U - Abrahama wamukeliswa isithembiso ngokukholwa . ”

text: Cometh this blessedness then upon the circumcision only , or upon the uncircumcision also ? for we say that faith was reckoned to Abraham for righteousness .
text2: Ngakho - ke lokhu kubusiswa kuqondene nabasokile noma nabangasokile na ? Ngokuba sithi : Ukukholwa kwabalelwa u - Abrahama ukuthi kungukulunga .

text: How was it then reckoned ? when he was in circumcision , or in uncircumcision ? Not in circumcision , but in uncircumcision .
text2: Pho , kwabalelwa kanjani na ? Esesokile yini noma engakasoki na ? Akubanga esesokile , kodwa engakasoki .

text: And he received the sign of circumcision , a seal of the righteousness of the faith which he had yet being uncircumcised : that he might be the father of all them that believe , though they be not circumcised ; that righteousness might be imputed unto them also :
text2: Wasamukela isibonakaliso sokusoka , sibe luphawu lokulunga kokukholwa ayenakho engakasoki , ukuba abe nguyise wabo bonke abakholwayo bengasokile , ukuze ukulunga kubalelwe kubona ,

text: And the father of circumcision to them who are not of the circumcision only , but who also walk in the steps of that faith of our father Abraham , which he had being yet uncircumcised .
text2: futhi abe nguyise wabasokileyo , kungabi ngowabasokileyo kuphela , kepha nowabo abahamba emkhondweni wokukholwa ubaba u - Abrahama ayenakho engakasoki .

text: For the promise , that he should be the heir of the world , was not to Abraham , or to his seed , through the law , but through the righteousness of faith .
text2: Ngokuba isithembiso sokuthi uyakuba yindlalifa yezwe asinikwanga u - Abrahama nenzalo yakhe ngawo umthetho kodwa ngokulunga kokukholwa .

text: For if they which are of the law be heirs , faith is made void , and the promise made of none effect :
text2: Ngokuba uma izindlalifa ziyizo ngawo umthetho , ukukholwa kwenziwe ize , nesithembiso asiselutho ;

text: Because the law worketh wrath : for where no law is , there is no transgression .
text2: ngokuba umthetho ubanga intukuthelo , kepha lapho kungekho khona umthetho , akukho nakweqa .

text: Therefore it is of faith , that it might be by grace ; to the end the promise might be sure to all the seed ; not to that only which is of the law , but to that also which is of the faith of Abraham ; who is the father of us all ,
text2: Ngalokho kuya ngokukholwa ukuba kube ngokomusa , ukuze isithembiso siqiniseke enzalweni yonke , kungabi kweyomthetho yodwa kodwa nakuleyo engeyokukholwa kuka - Abrahama ongubaba wethu sonke ,

text: ( As it is written , I have made thee a father of many nations , ) before him whom he believed , even God , who quickeneth the dead , and calleth those things which be not as though they were .
text2: njengokulotshiweyo ukuthi : “ Ngikumisile ube nguyise wezizwe eziningi ” phambi kwalowo Nkulunkulu akholwa nguye , yena ophilisa abafileyo nobiza okungekho ngokungathi kukhona ,

text: Who against hope believed in hope , that he might become the father of many nations ; according to that which was spoken , So shall thy seed be .
text2: owathi kungekho themba wakholwa ngethemba , ukuze abe nguyise wezizwe eziningi , njengalokho okwashiwo ukuthi : “ Yoba njalo inzalo yakho ; ”

text: And being not weak in faith , he considered not his own body now dead , when he was about an hundred years old , neither yet the deadness of Sara ' s womb :
text2: engabanga buthakathaka ekukholweni wabona umzimba wakhe obusufa , eneminyaka engaba ngeyikhulu , nesizalo sikaSara sifile ;

text: He staggered not at the promise of God through unbelief ; but was strong in faith , giving glory to God ;
text2: akangabazanga ngesithembiso sikaNkulunkulu ngokungakholwa , kodwa waqina ekukholweni , enika uNkulunkulu udumo ,

text: And being fully persuaded that , what he had promised , he was able also to perform .
text2: eqinisekile ukuthi lokho akwethembisile unamandla nokukwenza .

text: And therefore it was imputed to him for righteousness .
text2: Ngalokho - ke kwabalelwa yena ukuthi kungukulunga .

text: Now it was not written for his sake alone , that it was imputed to him ;
text2: Kepha akulotshwanga ngenxa yakhe yedwa ukuthi kwabalelwa yena ,

text: But for us also , to whom it shall be imputed , if we believe on him that raised up Jesus our Lord from the dead ;
text2: kodwa nangenxa yethu esiyakubalelwa khona , thina esikholwa nguye owavusa uJesu iNkosi yethu kwabafileyo ,

text: Who was delivered for our offences , and was raised again for our justification .
text2: owanikelwa ngenxa yeziphambeko zethu , wavuswa ngenxa yokulungisiswa kwethu .

text: Therefore being justified by faith , we have peace with God through our Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: Ngakho lokhu sesilungisisiwe ngokukholwa , sinokuthula kuNkulunkulu ngeNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu ,

text: By whom also we have access by faith into this grace wherein we stand , and rejoice in hope of the glory of God .
text2: okungaye sinokungena ngokukholwa kulo musa esimi kuwo , siyazibonga ekwethembeni inkazimulo kaNkulunkulu .

text: And not only so , but we glory in tribulations also : knowing that tribulation worketh patience ;
text2: Kepha akusikho lokho kuphela , kodwa sizibonga nangezinhlupheko ngokwazi ukuthi ukuhlupheka kuveza ukukhuthazela ,

text: And patience , experience ; and experience , hope :
text2: ukukhuthazela kuveza ukuqiniseka , ukuqiniseka kuveza ithemba ;

text: And hope maketh not ashamed ; because the love of God is shed abroad in our hearts by the Holy Ghost which is given unto us .
text2: ithemba alijabhisi , ngokuba uthando lukaNkulunkulu lutheliwe ezinhliziyweni zethu ngoMoya oNgcwele esimuphiweyo .

text: For when we were yet without strength , in due time Christ died for the ungodly .
text2: Ngokuba sisebuthakathaka , uKristu wafela abangamesabi uNkulunkulu ngesikhathi esifaneleyo ;

text: For scarcely for a righteous man will one die : yet peradventure for a good man some would even dare to die .
text2: ngokuba cishe kungenzeki ukuba umuntu afele olungileyo , kodwa mhlawumbe kungase kube khona ongaba nesibindi sokufela omuhle ;

text: But God commendeth his love toward us , in that , while we were yet sinners , Christ died for us .
text2: kepha uNkulunkulu uyabonakalisa ukusithanda kwakhe ngalokhu ukuthi , siseyizoni , uKristu wasifela .

text: Much more then , being now justified by his blood , we shall be saved from wrath through him .
text2: Ngakho kakhulu sesilungisisiwe ngegazi lakhe , siyakusindiswa ngaye olakeni .

text: For if , when we were enemies , we were reconciled to God by the death of his Son , much more , being reconciled , we shall be saved by his life .
text2: Ngokuba uma sathola ukubuyisana noNkulunkulu ngokufa kweNdodana yakhe sise yizitha , ikakhulu siyakusindiswa ngokuphila kwayo sesitholile ukubuyisana ;
