text2: okufihliweyo kwenhliziyo yakhe kuyadalulwa ; njalo uyakuwa ngobuso , akhuleke kuNkulunkulu , aqinise athi : “ Impela uNkulunkulu ukhona phakathi kwenu . ”

text: How is it then , brethren ? when ye come together , everyone of you hath a psalm , hath a doctrine , hath a tongue , hath a revelation , hath an interpretation . Let all things be done unto edifying .
text2: Kunjani , pho , bazalwane ? Uma nibuthana , yilowo nalowo uba nehubo , noma isifundiso , noma ukwambula , noma izilimi , noma ukuhumusha . Konke akwenzelwe ukwakhiwa kwebandla .

text: If any man speak in an unknown tongue , let it be by two , or at the most by three , and that by course ; and let one interpret .
text2: Uma - ke umuntu ekhuluma ngezilimi , akube ngababili , bangadluli kwabathathu , badedelane , omunye ahumushe ;

text: But if there be no interpreter , let him keep silence in the church ; and let him speak to himself , and to God .
text2: kepha uma kungekho ohumushayo , kathule ebandleni , azikhulumele yena yedwa nakuNkulunkulu .

text: Let the prophets speak two or three , and let the other judge .
text2: Abaprofethi - ke , kukhulume ababili noma babe bathathu , abanye bakuhlole .

text: If any thing be revealed to another that sitteth by , let the first hold his peace .
text2: Kepha uma kwambulwa utho komunye ohlezi khona , kathule owokuqala .

text: For ye may all prophesy one by one , that all may learn , and all may be comforted .
text2: Ngokuba ningaprofetha nonke abanye ngabanye , ukuze bafunde bonke , balulekwe bonke ;

text: And the spirits of the prophets are subject to the prophets .
text2: imimoya yabaprofethi ithobela abaprofethi ;

text: For God is not the author of confusion , but of peace , as in all churches of the saints .
text2: ngokuba uNkulunkulu kasiye owesiyaluyalu kepha ngowokuthula . Njengokuba kunjalo emabandleni onke abangcwele ,

text: Let your women keep silence in the churches : for it is not permitted unto them to speak ; but they are commanded to be under obedience , as also saith the law .
text2: abesifazane mabathule emabandleni ; ngokuba kabavunyelwe ukuba bakhulume , kepha mabazithobe , njengokuba usho njalo nomthetho .

text: And if they will learn any thing , let them ask their husbands at home : for it is a shame for women to speak in the church .
text2: Uma - ke bethanda ukufunda utho , mababuze emadodeni abo emakhaya ; ngokuba kuyihlazo ukuba owesifazane akhulume ebandleni .

text: What ? came the word of God out from you ? or came it unto you only ?
text2: Konje izwi likaNkulunkulu laphuma kinina na ? Nokuba lafika kinina nodwa na ?

text: If any man think himself to be a prophet , or spiritual , let him acknowledge that the things that I write unto you are the commandments of the Lord .
text2: Uma umuntu ethi ungumprofethi , noma ethi ungowomoya , makaqonde ukuthi lokhu enginilobela khona kungumyalo weNkosi .

text: But if any man be ignorant , let him be ignorant .
text2: Kepha uma umuntu engazi , makahlale engazi .

text: Wherefore , brethren , covet to prophesy , and forbid not to speak with tongues .
text2: Ngakho - ke , bazalwane bami , zondelelani ukuprofetha , ningakuvimbeli ukukhuluma ngezilimi .

text: Let all things be done decently and in order .
text2: Kepha konke makwenziwe ngemfanelo nangenhlelo .

text: Moreover , brethren , I declare unto you the gospel which I preached unto you , which also ye have received , and wherein ye stand ;
text2: Kepha , bazalwane , ngiyanikhumbuza ivangeli enganishumayeza lona nenalamukelayo nenimi kulo ,

text: By which also ye are saved , if ye keep in memory what I preached unto you , unless ye have believed in vain .
text2: nenisindiswa ngalo , nxa nibambelela ezwini enganishumayeza lona , uma kambe ukukholwa kwenu kungabanga yize .

text: For I delivered unto you first of all that which I also received , how that Christ died for our sins according to the scriptures ;
text2: Ngokuba okokuqala nganinika lokho engakwamukela nami ukuthi uKristu wafa ngenxa yezono zethu njengokwemibhalo ,

text: And that he was buried , and that he rose again the third day according to the scriptures :
text2: nokuthi wembelwa , nokuthi wavuswa kwabafileyo ngosuku lwesithathu njengokwemibhalo ,

text: And that he was seen of Cephas , then of the twelve :
text2: nokuthi wabonwa nguKhefase ; wayesebonwa ngabayishumi nambili ;

text: After that , he was seen of above five hundred brethren at once ; of whom the greater part remain unto this present , but some are fallen asleep .
text2: emva kwalokho wabonwa ngasikhathi sinye ngabazalwane abadlula amakhulu ayisihlanu , iningi labo lisekhona nakalokhu , kepha abanye sebelele ;

text: After that , he was seen of James ; then of all the apostles .
text2: emva kwalokho wabonwa nguJakobe ; ngasemuva wabonwa ngabaphostoli bonke ;

text: And last of all he was seen of me also , as of one born out of due time .
text2: ekugcineni kwabo bonke wabonwa nayimina enginjengozelwe kungakabi yisikhathi .

text: For I am the least of the apostles , that am not meet to be called an apostle , because I persecuted the church of God .
text2: Ngokuba mina ngingomncinyane kubaphostoli , engingafanele ukuthiwa umphostoli , ngokuba ngazingela ibandla likaNkulunkulu .

text: But by the grace of God I am what I am : and his grace which was bestowed upon me was not in vain ; but I laboured more abundantly than they all : yet not I , but the grace of God which was with me .
text2: Kepha ngomusa kaNkulunkulu ngiyikho engiyikho , nomusa wakhe kimi awubanga yize , kodwa ngasebenza kakhulu kunabo bonke ; kepha akusimina kodwa ngumusa kaNkulunkulu okimi .

text: Therefore whether it were I or they , so we preach , and so ye believed .
text2: Ngakho - ke noma kuyimina noma kuyibona , sishumayela kanjalo , nakholwa kanjalo .

text: Now if Christ be preached that he rose from the dead , how say some among you that there is no resurrection of the dead ?
text2: Kepha - ke uma uKristu eshunyayelwa ukuthi uvusiwe kwabafileyo , basho kanjani abanye phakathi kwenu ukuthi akukho ukuvuka kwabafileyo na ?

text: But if there be no resurrection of the dead , then is Christ not risen :
text2: Kepha uma kungekho ukuvuka kwabafileyo , akavuswanga naye uKristu .

text: And if Christ be not risen , then is our preaching vain , and your faith is also vain .
text2: Kepha uma uKristu engavuswanga kwabafileyo , ukushumayela kwethu kuyize , nokukholwa kwenu kuyize .

text: Yea , and we are found false witnesses of God ; because we have testified of God that he raised up Christ : whom he raised not up , if so be that the dead rise not .
text2: Yebo , sifunyanwa singofakazi bamanga ngoNkulunkulu , ngokuba safakaza ngoNkulunkulu ukuthi wamvusa uKristu , angamvusanga kambe , uma kanti abafileyo bengavuswa .

text: For if the dead rise not , then is not Christ raised :
text2: Ngokuba uma abafileyo bengavuswa , akavuswanga naye uKristu .

text: And if Christ be not raised , your faith is vain ; ye are yet in your sins .
text2: Kepha uma uKristu engavuswanga , ukukholwa kwenu akusizi lutho , nisesezonweni zenu .

text: Then they also which are fallen asleep in Christ are perished .
text2: Khona - ke nalabo asebalala bekuKristu babhubhile .

text: If in this life only we have hope in Christ , we are of all men most miserable .
text2: Uma singabathembela kuKristu kulokhu kuphila kuphela , singabokukhalelwa kunabantu bonke .

text: But now is Christ risen from the dead , and become the firstfruits of them that slept .
text2: Kepha kalokhu uKristu uvusiwe kwabafileyo , engulibo lwabaleleyo .

text: For since by man came death , by man came also the resurrection of the dead .
text2: Ngokuba lokhu ukufa kweza ngomuntu , ukuvuka kwabafileyo nakho kweza ngomuntu .

text: For as in Adam all die , even so in Christ shall all be made alive .
text2: Ngokuba njengalokhu ku - Adamu bonke bayafa , ngokunjalo futhi kuKristu bonke bayakuphiliswa .

text: But every man in his own order : Christ the firstfruits ; afterward they that are Christ ' s at his coming .
text2: Kepha yilowo nalowo ngesigaba sakhe : uKristu kuqala , bese kuba ngabangabakaKristu ekufikeni kwakhe ,

text: Then cometh the end , when he shall have delivered up the kingdom to God , even the Father ; when he shall have put down all rule and all authority and power .
text2: andukuba kufike ukuphela , nxa enikela umbuso kuNkulunkulu uYise , lapho esechithile ukubusa konke , nobukhosi bonke , namandla .

text: For he must reign , till he hath put all enemies under his feet .
text2: Ngokuba umelwe ukubusa , aze abeke izitha zonke phansi kwezinyawo zakhe .

text: The last enemy that shall be destroyed is death .
text2: Isitha sokugcina esiyakuchithwa singukufa .

text: For he hath put all things under his feet . But when he saith , all things are put under him , it is manifest that he is excepted , which did put all things under him .
text2: Ngokuba izinto zonke uzithobisele phansi kwezinyawo zakhe . Kepha nxa ethi : “ Izinto zonke zithotshisiwe , ” kusobala ukuthi ungaphandle kwazo yena ozithobisele phansi kwakhe .

text: And when all things shall be subdued unto him , then shall the Son also himself be subject unto him that put all things under him , that God may be all in all .
text2: Kodwa nxa izinto zonke sezithotshiselwe phansi kwakhe , lapho - ke nayo iNdodana iyakuzithoba phansi kwalowo owathobisa zonke izinto phansi kwayo , ukuze uNkulunkulu abe yikho konke kukho konke .

text: Else what shall they do which are baptized for the dead , if the dead rise not at all ? why are they then baptized for the dead ?
text2: Pho , bayakwenze njani ababhapathizelwa abafileyo na ? Uma abafileyo bengavuki nempela , babhapathizelwani ngenxa yabo na ?

text: And why stand we in jeopardy every hour ?
text2: Futhi sizifakelani thina engozini imizuzu yonke na ?

text: I protest by your rejoicing which I have in Christ Jesus our Lord , I die daily .
text2: Bazalwane , ngiyaqinisa ngokubongwa enginakho ngenxa yenu kuKristu Jesu iNkosi yethu , ngiyafa mihla yonke .

text: If after the manner of men I have fought with beasts at Ephesus , what advantageth it me , if the dead rise not ? let us eat and drink ; for to morrow we die .
text2: Uma ngalwa nezilo e - Efesu ngokwabantu , nginanzuzoni ? Uma abafileyo bengavuki , masidle , siphuze , ngokuba ngomuso sizakufa .

text: Be not deceived : evil communications corrupt good manners .
text2: Ningakhohliswa ; ukujwayelana nababi konakalisa ukuziphatha okuhle .

text: Awake to righteousness , and sin not ; for some have not the knowledge of God : I speak this to your shame .
text2: Phaphamani ngokufaneleyo , ningoni ; ngokuba abanye kabamazi uNkulunkulu ; ngisho lokhu ukuba nibe namahloni .

text: But some man will say , How are the dead raised up ? and with what body do they come ?
text2: Kepha omunye uyakuthi : “ Abafileyo bavuswa kanjani na ? Beza benamzimba muni na ? ”

text: Thou fool , that which thou sowest is not quickened , except it die :
text2: Wena ongaqondiyo , lokho okuhlwanyelayo wena akutholi ukuphila kungafanga ;

text: And that which thou sowest , thou sowest not that body that shall be , but bare grain , it may chance of wheat , or of some other grain :
text2: futhi lokho okuhlwanyelayo awuhlwanyeli umzimba ozakuba khona kepha uhlamvu oluze , noma kungaba ngolukakolweni , noma kungaba ngolokunye ;

text: But God giveth it a body as it hath pleased him , and to every seed his own body .
text2: kepha uNkulunkulu ulunika umzimba njengokuthanda kwakhe , yileyo naleyo mbewu owayo umzimba .

text: All flesh is not the same flesh : but there is one kind of flesh of men , another flesh of beasts , another of fishes , and another of birds .
text2: Inyama yonke ayinhlobonye , kepha enye ngeyabantu , enye yinyama yezilwane , enye yinyama yezinyoni , enye ngeyezinhlanzi .

text: There are also celestial bodies , and bodies terrestrial : but the glory of the celestial is one , and the glory of the terrestrial is another .
text2: Ikhona nemizimba yasezulwini nemizimba yasemhlabeni ; kepha inkazimulo yeyasezulwini iyodwa , neyasemhlabeni iyodwa .

text: There is one glory of the sun , and another glory of the moon , and another glory of the stars : for one star differeth from another star in glory .
text2: Iyodwa inkazimulo yelanga , iyodwa inkazimulo yenyanga , iyodwa inkazimulo yezinkanyezi ; yebo , enye inkanyezi yahlukile kwenye inkanyezi ngokukhazimula .

text: So also is the resurrection of the dead . It is sown in corruption ; it is raised in incorruption :
text2: Kunjalo nokuvuka kwabafileyo . Kuhlwanyelwa kunokubola , kuvuswa kungenakubola ;

text: It is sown in dishonour ; it is raised in glory : it is sown in weakness ; it is raised in power :
text2: kuhlwanyelwa kunokudelwa , kuvuswa kunenkazimulo ; kuhlwanyelwa kunobuthakathaka , kuvuswa kunamandla .

text: It is sown a natural body ; it is raised a spiritual body . There is a natural body , and there is a spiritual body .
text2: Kuhlwanyelwa kungumzimba wemvelo , kuvuswa kungumzimba womoya . Uma ukhona umzimba wemvelo , ukhona nowomoya .

text: And so it is written , The first man Adam was made a living soul ; the last Adam was made a quickening spirit .
text2: Kanjalo futhi kulotshiwe ukuthi umuntu wokuqala u - Adamu waba ngumphefumulo ophilayo ; u - Adamu wokugcina waba ngumoya ophilisayo .

text: Howbeit that was not first which is spiritual , but that which is natural ; and afterward that which is spiritual .
text2: Kepha okokuqala akusikho okomoya kodwa okwemvelo ; bese kuba ngokomoya .

text: The first man is of the earth , earthy : the second man is the Lord from heaven .
text2: Umuntu wokuqala wavela emhlabeni , engowenhlabathi ; umuntu wesibili uvela ezulwini .

text: As is the earthy , such are they also that are earthy : and as is the heavenly , such are they also that are heavenly .
text2: Njengokuba enjalo owayengowenhlabathi , banjalo nalabo abangabenhlabathi ; nanjengokuba enjalo ongowasezulwini , banjalo nabo abangabasezulwini .

text: And as we have borne the image of the earthy , we shall also bear the image of the heavenly .
text2: Futhi njengokuba besinesimo songowenhlabathi , siyakuba nesimo songowasezulwini futhi .

text: Now this I say , brethren , that flesh and blood cannot inherit the kingdom of God ; neither doth corruption inherit incorruption .
text2: Kepha ngisho lokhu , bazalwane , ukuthi inyama negazi akunakulidla ifa elingumbuso kaNkulunkulu ; nokubola akulidli ifa elingukungaboli .

text: Behold , I shew you a mystery ; We shall not all sleep , but we shall all be changed ,
text2: Bhekani , ngiyanitshela imfihlakalo ; asiyikulala sonke , kepha siyakuguqulwa sonke ,

text: In a moment , in the twinkling of an eye , at the last trump : for the trumpet shall sound , and the dead shall be raised incorruptible , and we shall be changed .
text2: ngesikhashanyana , ngokuphazima kweso , ngecilongo lokugcina ; ngokuba icilongo liyakukhala , abafileyo bavuswe bengenakubola , thina siguqulwe .

text: For this corruptible must put on incorruption , and this mortal must put on immortality .
text2: Ngokuba lokhu okubolayo kumelwe ukwembatha ukungaboli , nalokhu okufayo kumelwe ukwembatha ukungafi .

text: So when this corruptible shall have put on incorruption , and this mortal shall have put on immortality , then shall be brought to pass the saying that is written , Death is swallowed up in victory .
text2: Kepha nxa lokhu okubolayo sekwembethe ukungaboli , nalokhu okufayo sekwembethe ukungafi , kuzakugcwaliseka izwi elilotshiweyo lokuthi : “ Ukufa kugingiwe kwaba ngukunqoba . ”

text: O death , where is thy sting ? O grave , where is thy victory ?
text2: “ Kufa , kuphi ukunqoba kwakho na ? Kufa , luphi udosi lwakho na ? ”

text: The sting of death is sin ; and the strength of sin is the law .
text2: Udosi lokufa yisono ; amandla esono ngumthetho .

text: But thanks be to God , which giveth us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Kepha makabongwe uNkulunkulu osinika ukunqoba ngeNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu .

text: Therefore , my beloved brethren , be ye stedfast , unmoveable , always abounding in the work of the Lord , forasmuch as ye know that your labour is not in vain in the Lord .
text2: Ngakho - ke , bazalwane bami abathandekayo , yibani ngabagxilile , abangaxegiyo , abavame njalo emsebenzini weNkosi , nazi ukuthi ukusebenza kwenu akusilo ize eNkosini .

text: Now concerning the collection for the saints , as I have given order to the churches of Galatia , even so do ye .
text2: Maqondana nomnikelo obuthelwa abangcwele , njengalokho ngayala amabandla aseGalathiya , yenzani kanjalo nani .

text: Upon the first day of the week let every one of you lay by him in store , as God hath prospered him , that there be no gatherings when I come .
text2: Ngosuku lokuqala lweviki akube yilowo nalowo azibekelele eqongelela njengenhlanhla yakhe , ukuze kuthi nxa ngifika , kungabi yikhathi kwenziwa umnikelo .

text: And when I come , whomsoever ye shall approve by your letters , them will I send to bring your liberality unto Jerusalem .
text2: Ekufikeni kwami labo enibakhethayo ngizakubathuma , bephethe izincwadi , ukuba bayise izipho zenu zothando eJerusalema ;

text: And if it be meet that I go also , they shall go with me .
text2: uma kufanele ukuba nami ngihambe , bayakuhamba kanye nami .

text: Now I will come unto you , when I shall pass through Macedonia : for I do pass through Macedonia .
text2: Kepha ngiyakuza kini , nxa sengidabulile iMakedoniya ; ngokuba ngiyakudabula iMakedoniya ;

text: And it may be that I will abide , yea , and winter with you , that ye may bring me on my journey whithersoever I go .
text2: kepha ngingahle ngihlale isikhathi kini , noma ngidlulise nobusika , ukuze ningiqhube lapho ngisuka ngiya khona .

text: For I will not see you now by the way ; but I trust to tarry a while with you , if the Lord permit .
text2: Ngokuba angizukunibona manje nxa ngidlula ; ngokuba ngithemba ukuhlala kini isikhathi , uma iNkosi ivuma .

text: But I will tarry at Ephesus until Pentecost .
text2: Kepha ngizakuhlala e - Efesu , kuze kufike iPhentekoste ;

text: For a great door and effectual is opened unto me , and there are many adversaries .
text2: ngokuba ngivulelwe umnyango omkhulu wethuba lokusebenza ; nabamelene nami baningi .

text: Now if Timotheus come , see that he may be with you without fear : for he worketh the work of the Lord , as I also do .
text2: Kepha nxa kufika uThimothewu , anobheka ukuba ahlale kini engenalo uvalo , ngokuba usebenza umsebenzi weNkosi njengami ;

text: Let no man therefore despise him : but conduct him forth in peace , that he may come unto me : for I look for him with the brethren .
text2: ngakho makungabikho omdelelayo . Nize nimphelekezele endleleni ngokuthula ukuba eze kimi , ngokuba ngimbhekile kanye nabazalwane .

text: As touching our brother Apollos , I greatly desired him to come unto you with the brethren : but his will was not at all to come at this time ; but he will come when he shall have convenient time .
text2: Maqondana nomzalwane u - Apholo , ngamncenga kakhulu ukuba eze kini kanye nabazalwane ; kepha kwakungesiyo intando yakhe neze ukuba eze manje ; kodwa uyakuza nxa enethuba .

text: Watch ye , stand fast in the faith , quit you like men , be strong .
text2: Lindani nigxile ekukholweni , nibe ngamadoda , nibe namandla .

text: Let all your things be done with charity .
text2: Konke enikwenzayo akwenziwe ngothando .

text: I beseech you , brethren , ( ye know the house of Stephanas , that it is the firstfruits of Achaia , and that they have addicted themselves to the ministry of the saints , )
text2: Ngiyanincenga , bazalwane , niyayazi indlu kaStefana ukuthi ingulibo lwase - Akhaya nokuthi bazimisele ukukhonza abangcwele

text: That ye submit yourselves unto such , and to every one that helpeth with us , and laboureth .
text2: ukuba nibathobele abanjalo nabo bonke abasebenzisana nabo bekhandleka .

text: I am glad of the coming of Stephanas and Fortunatus and Achaicus : for that which was lacking on your part they have supplied .
text2: Ngiyathokoza ngokufika kukaStefana noFortunatu no - Akhayiku , ngokuba bakufezile obekusilele ngakini .

text: For they have refreshed my spirit and yours : therefore acknowledge ye them that are such .
text2: Ngokuba bawuhlumelele umoya wami nowenu ; ngakho baziseni abanjalo .

text: The churches of Asia salute you . Aquila and Priscilla salute you much in the Lord , with the church that is in their house .
text2: Amabandla ase - Asiya ayakhonza kini . O - Akwila noPriska bakhonza kakhulu kini eNkosini , kanye nebandla elisendlini yabo .

text: All the brethren greet you . Greet ye one another with an holy kiss .
text2: Abazalwane bonke bayakhonza kini . Bingelelanani ngokwanga okungcwele .

text: The salutation of me Paul with mine own hand .
text2: Nakhu ukukhonza kwami mina Pawulu ngesandla sami .

text: If any man love not the Lord Jesus Christ , let him be Anathema Maranatha .
text2: Uma umuntu engayithandi iNkosi , makabe ngoqalekisiweyo . Woza , Nkosi !

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you .
text2: Umusa weNkosi uJesu mawube nani .

text: My love be with you all in Christ Jesus . Amen .
text2: Uthando lwami alube nani nonke kuKristu Jesu .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God , and Timothy our brother , unto the church of God which is at Corinth , with all the saints which are in all Achaia :
text2: UPawulu , umphostoli kaKristu Jesu ngentando kaNkulunkulu , noThimothewu umzalwane kulo ibandla likaNkulunkulu eliseKorinte nakubo abangcwele bonke abakulo lonke lase - Akhaya :

text: Grace be to you and peace from God our Father , and from the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Makube kini umusa nokuthula okuvela kuNkulunkulu uBaba wethu naseNkosini uJesu Kristu .

text: Blessed be God , even the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , the Father of mercies , and the God of all comfort ;
text2: Makabongwe uNkulunkulu noYise weNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu , uYise wobubele , uNkulunkulu wenduduzo yonke ,

text: Who comforteth us in all our tribulation , that we may be able to comfort them which are in any trouble , by the comfort wherewith we ourselves are comforted of God .
text2: osiduduza osizini lwethu lonke , ukuze nathi sibe namandla okududuza abasosizini , nolunjani , ngenduduzo esiduduzwa ngayo nathi nguNkulunkulu .

text: For as the sufferings of Christ abound in us , so our consolation also aboundeth by Christ .
text2: Ngokuba njengalokho izinhlupheko zikaKristu zivamile kithi , kanjalo nokududuzeka kwethu kuvamile ngoKristu .

text: And whether we be afflicted , it is for your consolation and salvation , which is effectual in the enduring of the same sufferings which we also suffer : or whether we be comforted , it is for your consolation and salvation .
text2: Kepha noma sikhathazeka , kungenxa yokududuzwa nokusindiswa kwenu , noma siduduzeka , kungenxa yokududuzwa kwenu okusebenza ukukhuthazela ezinhluphekweni zona lezi esihlupheka ngazo nathi .

text: And our hope of you is stedfast , knowing , that as ye are partakers of the sufferings , so shall ye be also of the consolation .
text2: Nethemba lethu ngani liqinile , sazi ukuthi njengalokhu ningabahlanganyeli bezinhlupheko , kanjalo ningabahlanganyeli nabenduduzo .

text: For we would not , brethren , have you ignorant of our trouble which came to us in Asia , that we were pressed out of measure , above strength , insomuch that we despaired even of life :
text2: Ngokuba asithandi , bazalwane , ukuba ningazi ngosizi lwethu olwasehlela e - Asiya ukuthi sasindwa kakhulu impela ngaphezu kwamandla ethu , saze salahlekelwa nayithemba lokuphila .

text: But we had the sentence of death in ourselves , that we should not trust in ourselves , but in God which raiseth the dead :
text2: Yebo , thina ngokwethu sasizizwele ukuthi sinqunyelwe ukufa , ukuze singazethembi thina , kodwa sethembe uNkulunkulu ovusa abafileyo ,

text: Who delivered us from so great a death , and doth deliver : in whom we trust that he will yet deliver us ;
text2: owasihlangulisa ekufeni okungaka noyakusihlangulisa , esethemba kuye ukuthi usayakusihlangulisa .

text: Ye also helping together by prayer for us , that for the gift bestowed upon us by the means of many persons thanks may be given by many on our behalf .
text2: Nani nisizana nathi ngokusinxusela , ukuze umusa esiwuphiweyo ngokucela kwabaningi siwubongelwe ngabaningi .

text: For our rejoicing is this , the testimony of our conscience , that in simplicity and godly sincerity , not with fleshly wisdom , but by the grace of God , we have had our conversation in the world , and more abundantly to you - ward .
text2: Ngokuba ukuzibonga kwethu yilokhu , okungubufakazi bukanembeza wethu , ukuthi sahamba ezweni kakhulu maqondana nani ngobungcwele nangobuqotho bukaNkulunkulu , kungengokuhlakanipha kwenyama kodwa ngomusa kaNkulunkulu .

text: For we write none other things unto you , than what ye read or acknowledge ; and I trust ye shall acknowledge even to the end ;
text2: Ngokuba asinilobeli okunye , kuphela lokho enikufundayo nenikuqonda kahle ; ngiyethemba futhi ukuthi niyakukuqonda kahle kuze kube sekugcineni ,

text: As also ye have acknowledged us in part , that we are your rejoicing , even as ye also are ours in the day of the Lord Jesus .
text2: njengalokho nisiqondile okwenxenye ukuthi siyiqholo lenu , njengalokhu nani ningelethu ngosuku lweNkosi yethu uJesu .

text: And in this confidence I was minded to come unto you before , that ye might have a second benefit ;
text2: Nginalelo themba ngangifuna ukuza kini kuqala , ukuze nithole umusa ngokwesibili ,

text: And to pass by you into Macedonia , and to come again out of Macedonia unto you , and of you to be brought on my way toward Judaea .
text2: ngidlule ngakini , ngiye eMakedoniya , ngibuye ngize kini sengivela eMakedoniya , ngiphelekezelwe yinina sengiya eJudiya .

text: When I therefore was thus minded , did I use lightness ? or the things that I purpose , do I purpose according to the flesh , that with me there should be yea yea , and nay nay ?
text2: Pho - ke , bengidlala nje ngisahlose lokho na ? Lokho engikuhlosayo ngikuhlosa ngokwenyama yini , ukuze kimina kube nguyebo yebo , kanye noqhabo qhabo , na ?

text: But as God is true , our word toward you was not yea and nay .
text2: Kepha njengokuba uNkulunkulu ethembekile , nezwi lethu kini alisiye uyebo kanye noqhabo .

text: For the Son of God , Jesus Christ , who was preached among you by us , even by me and Silvanus and Timotheus , was not yea and nay , but in him was yea .
text2: Ngokuba iNdodana kaNkulunkulu uKristu Jesu owashunyayelwa kini yithina , mina , noSilvanu , noThimothewu , wayengesiye uyebo kanye noqhabo , kepha kuyena kunguyebo .

text: For all the promises of God in him are yea , and in him Amen , unto the glory of God by us .
text2: Ngokuba noma izithembiso zikaNkulunkulu ziziningi kangakanani , kuyena zinguyebo , ngakho - ke ngaye zingu - Amen futhi , kudunyiswe uNkulunkulu ngathi .

text: Now he which stablisheth us with you in Christ , and hath anointed us , is God ;
text2: Kepha osiqinisayo kanye nani kuKristu , nowasigcobayo , nguNkulunkulu ,

text: Who hath also sealed us , and given the earnest of the Spirit in our hearts .
text2: owasibeka nophawu nowasipha isibambiso esinguMoya ezinhliziyweni zethu .

text: Moreover I call God for a record upon my soul , that to spare you I came not as yet unto Corinth .
text2: Kepha mina ngibiza uNkulunkulu abe ngufakazi emphefumulweni wami ukuthi ngenziwa ukuniphephisa ukuba ngingaphindanga ngize eKorinte ,

text: Not for that we have dominion over your faith , but are helpers of your joy : for by faith ye stand .
text2: kungesikho ukuthi siyabusa phezu kokukholwa kwenu , kodwa siyizisebenzi zokuthokoza kwenu kanye nani , ngokuba nimi ekukholweni .

text: But I determined this with myself , that I would not come again to you in heaviness .
text2: Kepha ngazimisela lokhu nami ngokwami ukuthi angisayikuza kini nginokudabuka .

text: For if I make you sorry , who is he then that maketh me glad , but the same which is made sorry by me ?
text2: Ngokuba uma mina nginidabukisa , pho , ngubani ongithokozisayo , uma kungesiye odabukiswa yimi , na ?

text: And I wrote this same unto you , lest , when I came , I should have sorrow from them of whom I ought to rejoice ; having confidence in you all , that my joy is the joy of you all .
text2: Ngakuloba khona lokho , funa kuthi ekufikeni kwami ngithole ukudabuka ngalabo ebengifanele ukuthokoza ngabo , nginethemba ngani nonke ukuthi okwami ukuthokoza kungokwenu nonke .

text: For out of much affliction and anguish of heart I wrote unto you with many tears ; not that ye should be grieved , but that ye might know the love which I have more abundantly unto you .
text2: Ngokuba ngosizi olukhulu nangobuhlungu benhliziyo nganilobela nginezinyembezi eziningi , kungabi ngukuba nidabukiswe , kodwa ukuze nazi uthando enginithanda kakhulu ngalo .

text: But if any have caused grief , he hath not grieved me , but in part : that I may not overcharge you all .
text2: Kepha uma kukhona odabukisileyo , akangidabukisanga mina , kodwa , ukuze ngingeqisi , ngokwenxenye unidabukisile nonke .

text: Sufficient to such a man is this punishment , which was inflicted of many .
text2: Kumanele onjalo lokho kujeziswa ajeziswa ngakho ngabaningi ;

text: So that contrariwise ye ought rather to forgive him , and comfort him , lest perhaps such a one should be swallowed up with overmuch sorrow .
text2: kepha okungcono kunalokho , nimthethelele , nimduduze , funa onjalo ahlulwe ngukudabuka okukhulu .

text: Wherefore I beseech you that ye would confirm your love toward him .
text2: Ngalokho ngiyanincenga ukuba nimphathe ngothando ;

text: For to this end also did I write , that I might know the proof of you , whether ye be obedient in all things .
text2: ngokuba ngaloba futhi ngenxa yalokho , ukuze ngokuhlolwa kwenu ngazi ukuba ningabalalelayo ezintweni zonke yini .

text: To whom ye forgive any thing , I forgive also : for if I forgave any thing , to whom I forgave it , for your sakes forgave I it in the person of Christ ;
text2: Kepha lowo enimthethelela utho , nami ngiyamthethelela ngokuba lokho esengikuthethelele , uma kukhona into engiyithetheleleyo , ngikuthethelela ngenxa yenu phambi kobuso bukaKristu ,

text: Lest Satan should get an advantage of us : for we are not ignorant of his devices .
text2: ukuze singehlulwa nguSathane ; ngokuba asisibo abangawazi amacebo akhe .

text: Furthermore , when I came to Troas to preach Christ ' s gospel , and a door was opened unto me of the Lord ,
text2: Kepha mhla ngifika eTrowa ukuba ngishumayele ivangeli likaKristu , ngivulelwe umnyango eNkosini ,

text: I had no rest in my spirit , because I found not Titus my brother : but taking my leave of them , I went from thence into Macedonia .
text2: angibanga nakuthula emoyeni wami , ngokuba ngingamfumananga uThithu umzalwane wami , kodwa ngavalelisa kubo , ngaya eMakedoniya .

text: Now thanks be unto God , which always causeth us to triumph in Christ , and maketh manifest the savour of his knowledge by us in every place .
text2: Kodwa makabongwe uNkulunkulu osihola njalo odwendweni lokunqoba kuKristu nobonakalisa ngathi iphunga lokwazi kwakhe ezindaweni zonke ;

text: For we are unto God a sweet savour of Christ , in them that are saved , and in them that perish :
text2: ngokuba siyiphunga elimnandi likaKristu kuNkulunkulu kubo abasindiswayo nakubo abalahlwayo ,

text: To the one we are the savour of death unto death ; and to the other the savour of life unto life . And who is sufficient for these things ?
text2: kulaba siyiphunga lokufa kube ngukufa , kodwa kulabo siyiphunga lokuphila kube ngukuphila . Ngubani ongangalokho na ?

text: For we are not as many , which corrupt the word of God : but as of sincerity , but as of God , in the sight of God speak we in Christ .
text2: Ngokuba asinjengabaningi abonakalisa izwi likaNkulunkulu ngenxa yenzuzo , kodwa njengabaqotho , njengabavela kuNkulunkulu sikhuluma phambi kukaNkulunkulu sikuKristu .

text: Do we begin again to commend ourselves ? or need we , as some others , epistles of commendation to you , or letters of commendation from you ?
text2: Sesiqala futhi ukuzincoma na ? Kumbe siyadinga yini njengabanye izincwadi zokusincoma eziza kini noma ezivela kini na ?

text: Ye are our epistle written in our hearts , known and read of all men :
text2: Nina niyincwadi yethu elotshwe ezinhliziyweni zethu , eyaziwa ifundwa ngabantu bonke ,

text: Forasmuch as ye are manifestly declared to be the epistle of Christ ministered by us , written not with ink , but with the Spirit of the living God ; not in tables of stone , but in fleshy tables of the heart .
text2: nibonakala ukuthi niyincwadi kaKristu eyenziwe ngokukhonza kwethu , ilotshiwe kungengoyinki kodwa ngoMoya kaNkulunkulu ophilayo , kungabi sezibhebheni zamatshe kodwa ezibhebheni eziyizinhliziyo zenyama .

text: And such trust have we through Christ to God - ward :
text2: Kepha sinethemba elinjalo ngoKristu kuNkulunkulu ,

text: Not that we are sufficient of ourselves to think any thing as of ourselves ; but our sufficiency is of God ;
text2: kungesikho ukuthi singaba namandla ngokwethu okucabanga ngotho ukuthi luvela kithi , kodwa amandla ethu avela kuNkulunkulu ,

text: Who also hath made us able ministers of the new testament ; not of the letter , but of the spirit : for the letter killeth , but the spirit giveth life .
text2: oyena futhi osenzela amandla okuba yizikhonzi zesivumelwano esisha , singesiso esegama kodwa esikaMoya ; ngokuba igama liyabulala , kodwa uMoya uyaphilisa .

text: But if the ministration of death , written and engraven in stones , was glorious , so that the children of Israel could not stedfastly behold the face of Moses for the glory of his countenance ; which glory was to be done away :
text2: Kepha uma inkonzo yokufa , enamagama aqoshiwe ematsheni , yafika inenkazimulo , ngangokuba abantwana bakwa - Israyeli babengenakubuka ubuso bukaMose ngenxa yenkazimulo yobuso bakhe eyayingephelayo ,

text: How shall not the ministration of the spirit be rather glorious ?
text2: pho , inkonzo kaMoya ayiyikuba nenkazimulo kakhulu kunayo na ?

text: For if the ministration of condemnation be glory , much more doth the ministration of righteousness exceed in glory .
text2: Ngokuba uma inkonzo yokulahlwa ibinenkazimulo , ikakhulu inkonzo yokulunga inenkazimulo enkulu kakhulu .

text: For even that which was made glorious had no glory in this respect , by reason of the glory that excelleth .
text2: Ngokuba nalokho okwakhazimuliswayo kwakungenankazimulo , uma kulinganiswa nenkazimulo lena edluleleyo .

text: For if that which is done away was glorious , much more that which remaineth is glorious .
text2: Ngokuba uma lokho obekuzakuphela kwaba nenkazimulo , ikakhulu okumiyo njalo kunenkazimulo .

text: Seeing then that we have such hope , we use great plainness of speech :
text2: Ngakho - ke , lokhu sinethemba elinjalo , sinesibindi sonke ,

text: And not as Moses , which put a vail over his face , that the children of Israel could not stedfastly look to the end of that which is abolished :
text2: asenzi njengoMose owamboza ubuso bakhe ngendwangu , ukuze abantwana bakwa - Israyeli bangakubuki ukugcina kwalokho obekuzakuphela .

text: But their minds were blinded : for until this day remaineth the same vail untaken away in the reading of the old testament ; which vail is done away in Christ .
text2: Kodwa ingqondo yabo yaba lukhuni . Ngokuba kuze kube sosukwini lwanamuhla , nxa kufundwa isivumelwano esidala , leyo ndwangu isahlezi ingambuliwe , ngokuba iyapheliswa kuKristu ;

text: But even unto this day , when Moses is read , the vail is upon their heart .
text2: yebo , kuze kube namuhla , nxa kufundwa uMose , indwangu isayimbozile inhliziyo yabo ;

text: Nevertheless when it shall turn to the Lord , the vail shall be taken away .
text2: kepha nxa iphendukela eNkosini , indwangu iyasuswa .

text: Now the Lord is that Spirit : and where the Spirit of the Lord is , there is liberty .
text2: INkosi inguye uMoya ; kepha lapho uMoya weNkosi ekhona , kukhona inkululeko .

text: But we all , with open face beholding as in a glass the glory of the Lord , are changed into the same image from glory to glory , even as by the Spirit of the Lord .
text2: Kepha thina sonke esibuka ngobuso obambuliwe inkazimulo yeNkosi njengasesibukweni siyaguqulwa , sibe njengalowo mfanekiso ngokuya enkazimulweni , njengalokhu kumi ngeNkosi enguMoya .

text: Therefore seeing we have this ministry , as we have received mercy , we faint not ;
text2: Ngakho lokhu sinale nkonzo , njengokuba sahawukelwa , asidangali ,

text: But have renounced the hidden things of dishonesty , not walking in craftiness , nor handling the word of God deceitfully ; but by manifestation of the truth commending ourselves to every man ' s conscience in the sight of God .
text2: kodwa sizilahlile izinto ezifihliwe zehlazo , asihambi ngobuqili , asiliphambanisi izwi likaNkulunkulu , kepha ngokuveza obala iqiniso sizincoma kunembeza wabantu bonke phambi kukaNkulunkulu .

text: But if our gospel be hid , it is hid to them that are lost :
text2: Kepha uma ivangeli lethu lifihlakele , lifihlakele kwabalahlwayo ,

text: In whom the god of this world hath blinded the minds of them which believe not , lest the light of the glorious gospel of Christ , who is the image of God , should shine unto them .
text2: okukubona abangakholwa unkulunkulu waleli zwe uphuphuthekisile ingqondo yabo , ukuze kungasi kubo ukukhanya kwevangeli lenkazimulo kaKristu ongumfanekiso kaNkulunkulu .

text: For we preach not ourselves , but Christ Jesus the Lord ; and ourselves your servants for Jesus ' sake .
text2: Ngokuba asizishumayeli thina , kodwa sishumayela uKristu Jesu eyiNkosi nokuthi siyizikhonzi zenu ngenxa kaJesu .

text: For God , who commanded the light to shine out of darkness , hath shined in our hearts , to give the light of the knowledge of the glory of God in the face of Jesus Christ .
text2: Ngokuba uNkulunkulu owathi : “ Akuvele ukukhanya ebumnyameni , kukhanye , ” nguyena owakhanyisa ezinhliziyweni zethu ukuba kukhanye ukwazi inkazimulo kaNkulunkulu ebusweni bukaKristu .

text: But we have this treasure in earthen vessels , that the excellency of the power may be of God , and not of us .
text2: Kepha le ngcebo sinayo ezitsheni zebumba , ukuze ubukhulu bamandla obukhulu kakhulu bube ngobukaNkulunkulu , bungabi ngobuvela kithi .

text: We are troubled on every side , yet not distressed ; we are perplexed , but not in despair ;
text2: Siyacindezelwa nxazonke , kodwa asinyinyekile ; siyaxakeka , kodwa asidikibali ;

text: Persecuted , but not forsaken ; cast down , but not destroyed ;
text2: siyazingelwa , kodwa asidelwa ; siwiswa phansi , kodwa asibhujiswa ;

text: Always bearing about in the body the dying of the Lord Jesus , that the life also of Jesus might be made manifest in our body .
text2: sithwele njalonjalo emzimbeni wethu ukufa kukaJesu , ukuze nokuphila kukaJesu kubonakaliswe emzimbeni wethu .

text: For we which live are alway delivered unto death for Jesus ' sake , that the life also of Jesus might be made manifest in our mortal flesh .
text2: Ngokuba sisaphila sinikelwa njalo ekufeni ngenxa kaJesu , ukuze nokuphila kukaJesu kubonakaliswe enyameni yethu efayo .

text: So then death worketh in us , but life in you .
text2: Kanjalo kusebenza ukufa kithina , kepha kinina ukuphila .

text: We having the same spirit of faith , according as it is written , I believed , and therefore have I spoken ; we also believe , and therefore speak ;
text2: Lokhu sinawo lo moya wokukholwa , njengokulotshiweyo ukuthi : “ Ngakholwa , ngakho ngakhuluma , ” nathi siyakholwa , ngakho - ke siyakhuluma ,

text: Knowing that he which raised up the Lord Jesus shall raise up us also by Jesus , and shall present us with you .
text2: sazi ukuthi yena owavusa iNkosi uJesu uyakusivusa nathi kanye noJesu , asethule kanye nani .

text: For all things are for your sakes , that the abundant grace might through the thanksgiving of many redound to the glory of God .
text2: Ngokuba konke kwenziwa ngenxa yenu , ukuze umusa ngokwandiswa kubo abaningi uvamise ukubonga , kube ludumo kuNkulunkulu .

text: For which cause we faint not ; but though our outward man perish , yet the inward man is renewed day by day .
text2: Ngakho asidangali , kodwa noma kubhubha umuntu wethu wangaphandle , owangaphakathi wenziwa musha imihla ngemihla .

text: For our light affliction , which is but for a moment , worketh for us a far more exceeding and eternal weight of glory ;
text2: Ngokuba usizi lwethu olululana olungolomzuzwana luyasisebenzela isilinganiso esikhulu kakhulu senkazimulo emiyo phakade ,

text: While we look not at the things which are seen , but at the things which are not seen : for the things which are seen are temporal ; but the things which are not seen are eternal .
text2: thina esingabheki okubonwayo kodwa okungabonwayo ; ngokuba okubonwayo kungokwesikhashana , kepha okungabonwayo kungokwaphakade .

text: For we know that if our earthly house of this tabernacle were dissolved , we have a building of God , an house not made with hands , eternal in the heavens .
text2: Ngokuba siyazi ukuthi uma indlu yethu yasemhlabeni eyidokodo idilizwa , sinesakhiwo esivela kuNkulunkulu , indlu engenziwanga ngezandla , eyaphakade , esezulwini .

text: For in this we groan , earnestly desiring to be clothed upon with our house which is from heaven :
text2: Ngenxa yalokho siyabubula , silangazelela ukwelakanyiswa ngendlu yethu yasezulwini ,

text: If so be that being clothed we shall not be found naked .
text2: ngokuba sembethe yona , asiyikufunyanwa sihamba ze .

text: For we that are in this tabernacle do groan , being burdened : not for that we would be unclothed , but clothed upon , that mortality might be swallowed up of life .
text2: Ngokuba thina esisekhona kuleli dokodo sibubula , sisindwa , ngokuba asithandi ukwambulwa kodwa ukwelakanyiswa , ukuze okufayo kugingwe ngukuphila .

text: Now he that hath wrought us for the selfsame thing is God , who also hath given unto us the earnest of the Spirit .
text2: Kepha owasenzela khona lokho nguNkulunkulu owasipha isibambiso esinguMoya .

text: Therefore we are always confident , knowing that , whilst we are at home in the body , we are absent from the Lord :
text2: Ngakho simi isibindi ngesikhathi sonke , sazi ukuthi , nxa ikhaya lethu lise semzimbeni , sahlukene nekhaya eliseNkosini ;

text: ( For we walk by faith , not by sight : )
text2: ngokuba sihamba ngokukholwa , asihambi ngokubona ;

text: We are confident , I say , and willing rather to be absent from the body , and to be present with the Lord .
text2: simi isibindi , singathanda kakhulu ukwahlukana nekhaya elisemzimbeni , sihlale ekhaya eliseNkosini .

text: Wherefore we labour , that , whether present or absent , we may be accepted of him .
text2: Ngalokho futhi , noma sisekhaya noma sahlukene nalo , sihlose ukuba sibe ngabathandeka kuye .

text: For we must all appear before the judgment seat of Christ ; that every one may receive the things done in his body , according to that he hath done , whether it be good or bad .
text2: Ngokuba thina sonke simelwe ukubonakaliswa phambi kwesihlalo sokwahlulela sikaKristu , ukuze yilowo nalowo amukele njengalokho akwenzileyo esesemzimbeni , noma okuhle noma okubi .

text: Knowing therefore the terror of the Lord , we persuade men ; but we are made manifest unto God ; and I trust also are made manifest in your consciences .
text2: Ngakho lokhu sikwazi ukwesaba iNkosi , siyabancenga abantu ; kepha sibonakalisiwe kuNkulunkulu ; ngiyethemba ukuthi nakuye unembeza wenu sibonakalisiwe .

text: For we commend not ourselves again unto you , but give you occasion to glory on our behalf , that ye may have somewhat to answer them which glory in appearance , and not in heart .
text2: Asizincomi futhi kini , kodwa sininika ithuba lokuzibonga ngathi , ukuze nibe nakho okokuphendula abazibongayo ngokusemehlweni kungesikho okusenhliziyweni .

text: For whether we be beside ourselves , it is to God : or whether we be sober , it is for your cause .
text2: Ngokuba noma sigcwaneka , kungenxa kaNkulunkulu ; noma sisangulukile , kungenxa yenu .

text: For the love of Christ constraineth us ; because we thus judge , that if one died for all , then were all dead :
text2: Ngokuba uthando lukaKristu luyasiqhubezela , sikubona lokhu ukuthi munye owafela bonke ; ngakho - ke bonke sebafa ;

text: And that he died for all , that they which live should not henceforth live unto themselves , but unto him which died for them , and rose again .
text2: wafela bonke , ukuze abaphilayo bangabe besaziphilela bona , kodwa baphilele yena owabafelayo , wabuye wavuka .

text: Wherefore henceforth know we no man after the flesh : yea , though we have known Christ after the flesh , yet now henceforth know we him no more .
text2: Kanjalo thina asisayikwazi umuntu ngokwenyama ; nokuba besimazi uKristu ngokwenyama , nokho manje asisamazi .

text: Therefore if any man be in Christ , he is a new creature : old things are passed away ; behold , all things are become new .
text2: Kanjalo uma umuntu ekuKristu , uyisidalwa esisha ; okwakuqala kudlulile ; bheka , sekuvele okusha .

text: And all things are of God , who hath reconciled us to himself by Jesus Christ , and hath given to us the ministry of reconciliation ;
text2: Kepha konke kuvela kuNkulunkulu owenza ukuba sibuyisane naye ngoKristu , wasinika inkonzo yokubuyisana ,

text: To wit , that God was in Christ , reconciling the world unto himself , not imputing their trespasses unto them ; and hath committed unto us the word of reconciliation .
text2: ngokuba uNkulunkulu ekuKristu wenza ukuba izwe libuyisane naye , engababaleli iziphambeko zabo , ebeka kithi izwi lokubuyisana .

text: Now then we are ambassadors for Christ , as though God did beseech you by us : we pray you in Christ ' s stead , be ye reconciled to God .
text2: Ngakho singamanxusa kaKristu ngokungathi uNkulunkulu unxusa ngathi ; siyanincenga esikhundleni sikaKristu , sithi : “ Buyisanani noNkulunkulu . ”

text: For he hath made him to be sin for us , who knew no sin ; that we might be made the righteousness of God in him .
text2: Ongasazanga isono wamenza isono ngenxa yethu , ukuze kuyena senziwe sibe ngukulunga kukaNkulunkulu .

text: We then , as workers together with him , beseech you also that ye receive not the grace of God in vain .
text2: Kepha thina esisebenza kanye naye siyanincenga ukuba ningawamukeleli ize umusa kaNkulunkulu —

text: ( For he saith , I have heard thee in a time accepted , and in the day of salvation have I succoured thee : behold , now is the accepted time ; behold , now is the day of salvation . )
text2: ngokuba uthi : “ Ngesikhathi esihle ngikuzwile , nangosuku lwensindiso ngakuhlangulisa ; ” bheka , manje kuyisikhathi esihle kakhulu ; bheka , manje kulusuku lwensindiso ; —

text: Giving no offence in any thing , that the ministry be not blamed :
text2: asibekeli muntu nasinye isikhubekiso nangokukodwa , funa inkonzo yethu isolwe ,

text: But in all things approving ourselves as the ministers of God , in much patience , in afflictions , in necessities , in distresses ,
text2: kepha kukho konke sizibonakalisa njengezikhonzi zikaNkulunkulu ekubekezeleni okukhulu , nasosizini , nasekusweleni , nasekubandezekeni ,

text: In stripes , in imprisonments , in tumults , in labours , in watchings , in fastings ;
text2: nasekushayweni , nasekuboshweni , naseziyaluyalwini , nasekukhandlekeni , nasekuqwasheni , nasekuzileni ukudla ,

text: By pureness , by knowledge , by longsuffering , by kindness , by the Holy Ghost , by love unfeigned ,
text2: nangenhlanzeko , nangokwazi , nangokubekezela , nangobumnene , nangoMoya oNgcwele , nangothando olungazenzisi ,

text: By the word of truth , by the power of God , by the armour of righteousness on the right hand and on the left ,
text2: nangezwi leqiniso , nangamandla kaNkulunkulu , nangezikhali zokulunga zesokunene nezesokhohlo ,

text: By honour and dishonour , by evil report and good report : as deceivers , and yet true ;
text2: ngodumo nangehlazo , ngokuhletshwa nangokutuswa , njengabakhohlisi kanti singabeqiniso ,

text: As unknown , and yet well known ; as dying , and , behold , we live ; as chastened , and not killed ;
text2: njengabangaziwayo kanti saziwa kakhulu , njengabafayo kanti bheka , siyaphila , njengabalaywayo kanti asibulawa ,

text: As sorrowful , yet alway rejoicing ; as poor , yet making many rich ; as having nothing , and yet possessing all things .
text2: njengabadabukileyo kepha siyathokoza njalo , njengabampofu kepha sicebisa abaningi , njengabangenalutho kanti sinakho konke .

text: O ye Corinthians , our mouth is open unto you , our heart is enlarged .
text2: Umlomo wethu uvulekele ngakini nina baseKorinte , inhliziyo yethu yanulekile ;

text: Ye are not straitened in us , but ye are straitened in your own bowels .
text2: aninyinyekile kithi , kodwa ninyinyekile ezinhliziyweni zenu ;

text: Now for a recompence in the same , ( I speak as unto my children , ) be ye also enlarged .
text2: kepha ukuze kube khona ukwenanana , ngikhuluma njengakubantwana , yanulekani nani .

text: Be ye not unequally yoked together with unbelievers : for what fellowship hath righteousness with unrighteousness ? and what communion hath light with darkness ?
text2: Maningaboshelwa ejokeni linye nabangakholwayo , ngokuba kunakuhlanganyela kuni ukulunga nokungalungi na ? Kunabudlelwane buni ukukhanya nobumnyama na ?

text: And what concord hath Christ with Belial ? or what part hath he that believeth with an infidel ?
text2: Unakuzwana kuni uKristu noBeliyali na ? Unasabelo sini okholwayo nongakholwayo na ?

text: And what agreement hath the temple of God with idols ? for ye are the temple of the living God ; as God hath said , I will dwell in them , and walk in them ; and I will be their God , and they shall be my people .
text2: Linakuvumelana kuni ithempeli likaNkulunkulu nezithombe na ? Ngokuba thina siyithempeli likaNkulunkulu ophilayo , njengokuba washo uNkulunkulu ukuthi : “ Ngiyakuhlala phakathi kwabo , ngihambe phakathi kwabo ; ngiyakuba nguNkulunkulu wabo , bona babe ngabantu bami . ”

text: Wherefore come out from among them , and be ye separate , saith the Lord , and touch not the unclean thing ; and I will receive you ,
text2: “ Ngakho - ke phumani phakathi kwabo , nahlukane nabo , isho iNkosi ; ningathinti okungcolileyo ; khona ngiyakunamukela ,

text: And will be a Father unto you , and ye shall be my sons and daughters , saith the Lord Almighty .
text2: ngibe nguYihlo kini , nina nibe ngamadodana namadodakazi kimi , isho iNkosi uSomandla . ”

text: Having therefore these promises , dearly beloved , let us cleanse ourselves from all filthiness of the flesh and spirit , perfecting holiness in the fear of God .
text2: Lokhu sinalezo zithembiso , bathandwa , masizihlambulule ekungcoleni konke kwenyama nokomoya , siphelelise ubungcwele ngokumesaba uNkulunkulu .

text: Receive us ; we have wronged no man , we have corrupted no man , we have defrauded no man .
text2: Sivuleleni indawo ezinhliziyweni zenu ; asonanga muntu , asonakalisanga muntu , asidlanga muntu .

text: I speak not this to condemn you : for I have said before , that ye are in our hearts to die and live with you .
text2: Angikusho ngokunilahla ; ngokuba ngasho ngaphambili ukuthi nisezinhliziyweni zethu ukuba sife kanye nani , siphile kanye nani .

text: Great is my boldness of speech toward you , great is my glorying of you : I am filled with comfort , I am exceeding joyful in all our tribulation .
text2: Nginesibindi esikhulu ngani , nginokuzibonga okukhulu ngani ; ngigcwele induduzo , nginentokozo enkulu kakhulu phezu kosizi lonke esinalo .

text: For , when we were come into Macedonia , our flesh had no rest , but we were troubled on every side ; without were fightings , within were fears .
text2: Ngokuba nasekufikeni kwethu eMakedoniya inyama yethu ayibanga nakuphumula , kodwa sakhathazeka nxazonke ; ngaphandle kwakukhona ukulwa , ngaphakathi ukwesaba .

text: Nevertheless God , that comforteth those that are cast down , comforted us by the coming of Titus ;
text2: Nokho uNkulunkulu oduduza abadanileyo usiduduzile thina ngokufika kukaThithu ,

text: And not by his coming only , but by the consolation wherewith he was comforted in you , when he told us your earnest desire , your mourning , your fervent mind toward me ; so that I rejoiced the more .
text2: kungabi ngokufika kwakhe kuphela , kodwa nangenduduzo aduduzwa ngayo ngani , esilandisa ngokungilangazelela kwenu , nangokungililela kwenu , nangokungishisekela kwenu , ngaze ngathokoza kakhulu .

text: For though I made you sorry with a letter , I do not repent , though I did repent : for I perceive that the same epistle hath made you sorry , though it were but for a season .
text2: Nakuba nganidabukisa ngencwadi yami , angizisoli ; nakuba ngangizisola — ngiyabona ukuthi leyo ncwadi yanidabukisa noma kwaba yisikhathi nje —

text: Now I rejoice , not that ye were made sorry , but that ye sorrowed to repentance : for ye were made sorry after a godly manner , that ye might receive damage by us in nothing .
text2: manje ngiyathokoza , kungengokuba nadabukiswa , kodwa ngokuba nadabukiswa kwaba ngukuphenduka ; ngokuba nadabukiswa ngokukaNkulunkulu , ukuze ningalahlekelwa lutho ngathi .

text: For godly sorrow worketh repentance to salvation not to be repented of : but the sorrow of the world worketh death .
text2: Ngokuba ukudabuka okuya ngokukaNkulunkulu kuveza ukuphenduka angezisole ngakho umuntu , kube ngukusindiswa , kepha ukudabuka okuya ngokwezwe kuveza ukufa .

text: For behold this selfsame thing , that ye sorrowed after a godly sort , what carefulness it wrought in you , yea , what clearing of yourselves , yea , what indignation , yea , what fear , yea , what vehement desire , yea , what zeal , yea , what revenge ! In all things ye have approved yourselves to be clear in this matter .
text2: Ngokuba bhekani , khona lokho kudabukiswa kwenu ngokukaNkulunkulu kwaveza kini ukukhuthala okungaka , yebo , nokuziphendulela , nokuthukuthela , nokwesaba , nokulangazela , nokushiseka , nokuphindisela . Kukho konke nazibonakalisa ukuthi nimhlophe kule ndaba .

text: Wherefore , though I wrote unto you , I did it not for his cause that had done the wrong , nor for his cause that suffered wrong , but that our care for you in the sight of God might appear unto you .
text2: Ngakho nakuba nganilobela , angilobanga ngenxa yowonileyo nokuba ngenxa yowoniweyo kodwa ukuze ukukhuthala kwenu ngenxa yethu kubonakaliswe kini phambi kukaNkulunkulu .

text: Therefore we were comforted in your comfort : yea , and exceedingly the more joyed we for the joy of Titus , because his spirit was refreshed by you all .
text2: Ngalokho siduduzekile . Nasekududuzekeni kwethu sathokoza impela , ikakhulu ngokuthokoza kukaThithu , ngokuba umoya wakhe uhlunyelelwe yinina nonke ;

text: For if I have boasted any thing to him of you , I am not ashamed ; but as we spake all things to you in truth , even so our boasting , which I made before Titus , is found a truth .
text2: ngokuba uma ngake ngazincoma ngento kuyena ngani , angijabhiswanga ; kepha njengokuba konke esakukhuluma kini kwakuyiqiniso , kanjalo nokuzibonga kwethu kuThithu kwaba yiqiniso .

text: And his inward affection is more abundant toward you , whilst he remembereth the obedience of you all , how with fear and trembling ye received him .
text2: Yebo , isihe sakhe sivamile kakhulu ngakini , lapho ekhumbula ukulalela kwenu nonke ukuthi namamukela ngokwesaba nangokuthuthumela .

text: I rejoice therefore that I have confidence in you in all things .
text2: Ngiyathokoza , ngokuba ezintweni zonke nginethemba ngani .

text: Moreover , brethren , we do you to wit of the grace of God bestowed on the churches of Macedonia ;
text2: Kepha siyanazisa , bazalwane , ngomusa kaNkulunkulu awuphiweyo amabandla aseMakedoniya

text: How that in a great trial of affliction the abundance of their joy and their deep poverty abounded unto the riches of their liberality .
text2: ukuthi ekuvivinyweni okukhulu kosizi ukuthokoza kwawo okuvamileyo nobumpofu bawo obukhulu kwenza ukuba avame kakhulu ekuphaneni okupheleleyo ;

text: For to their power , I bear record , yea , and beyond their power they were willing of themselves ;
text2: ngokuba ngokwawo anikela njengamandla awo , yebo , ngiyafakaza ngithi , nangaphezu kwamandla awo ;

text: Praying us with much intreaty that we would receive the gift , and take upon us the fellowship of the ministering to the saints .
text2: asinxusa kakhulu ecela umusa wokuhlanganyela ekukhonzeni abangcwele ;

text: And this they did , not as we hoped , but first gave their own selves to the Lord , and unto us by the will of God .
text2: futhi akubanga njengokwethemba kwethu kuphela , kepha bazinikela bona uqobo kuqala eNkosini nakithi futhi ngentando kaNkulunkulu ,

text: Insomuch that we desired Titus , that as he had begun , so he would also finish in you the same grace also .
text2: saze samncenga uThithu ukuba , njengalokho wayeseqalile ngaphambili , kanjalo afeze futhi kini lowo msebenzi womusa .

text: Therefore , as ye abound in every thing , in faith , and utterance , and knowledge , and in all diligence , and in your love to us , see that ye abound in this grace also .
text2: Kepha njengalokho nivamile kukho konke : ukukholwa , namazwi , nokwazi , nokukhuthala konke , nothando enisithanda ngalo , manivame nakuwo lowo msebenzi womusa .

text: I speak not by commandment , but by occasion of the forwardness of others , and to prove the sincerity of your love .
text2: Angikusho njengomyalo , kodwa ukuze ngokukhuthala kwabanye ngivivinye ubuqotho bothando lwenu ;

text: For ye know the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ , that , though he was rich , yet for your sakes he became poor , that ye through his poverty might be rich .
text2: ngokuba niyawazi umusa weNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu ukuthi , nakuba ecebile , waba mpofu ngenxa yenu , ukuze ngobumpofu bakhe nicebe nina .

text: And herein I give my advice : for this is expedient for you , who have begun before , not only to do , but also to be forward a year ago .
text2: Kulokhu nginitshela ukubona kwami ; ngokuba lokhu kulungele nina enaqala nyakenye , kungekwenza kuphela kepha nokuthanda ;

text: Now therefore perform the doing of it ; that as there was a readiness to will , so there may be a performance also out of that which ye have .
text2: kepha manje fezani nokwenza , ukuze njengalokho kwaba khona inhliziyo ethandayo , kanjalo kube khona nokufeza njengeninakho .

text: For if there be first a willing mind , it is accepted according to that a man hath , and not according to that he hath not .
text2: Ngokuba uma uthando lukhona , kwamukeleka njengalokho umuntu anakho , kungenjengalokho angenakho .

text: For I mean not that other men be eased , and ye burdened :
text2: Ngokuba angikusho lokhu ukuba abanye bakhululeke , nina nikhathazeke , kodwa kube ngokulinganayo ,

text: But by an equality , that now at this time your abundance may be a supply for their want , that their abundance also may be a supply for your want : that there may be equality :
text2: ukuze kuthi ngalesi sikhathi inala yenu isize bona ekusweleni kwabo ukuba nenala yabo isize nina ekusweleni kwenu , kube khona ukulingana ,

text: As it is written , He that had gathered much had nothing over ; and he that had gathered little had no lack .
text2: njengalokho kulotshiwe ukuthi : “ Kowaba nokuningi kakusalanga , nowaba nokuncane kantulanga . ”

text: But thanks be to God , which put the same earnest care into the heart of Titus for you .
text2: Kepha makabongwe uNkulunkulu obeka enhliziyweni kaThithu le nkuthalo ngani ,

text: For indeed he accepted the exhortation ; but being more forward , of his own accord he went unto you .
text2: ngokuba wamukela umyalo wethu , kepha naye ekhuthele kakhulu waphuma eza kini ngokuzithandela .

text: And we have sent with him the brother , whose praise is in the gospel throughout all the churches ;
text2: Sithumele kanye naye umzalwane oludumo lwakhe ngevangeli lwandile kuwo onke amabandla ,

text: And not that only , but who was also chosen of the churches to travel with us with this grace , which is administered by us to the glory of the same Lord , and declaration of your ready mind :
text2: kungesikho lokho kuphela , kodwa ukhethiwe futhi yiwo amabandla ukuba ahambisane nathi ngendaba yalo mnikelo osetshenzwe yithi , kube ludumo kuyo iNkosi , kubonakalise ukukhuthala kwethu ,

text: Avoiding this , that no man should blame us in this abundance which is administered by us :
text2: sigwemele lokhu ukuthi kungaba khona osisolayo ngalesi sipho esikhulu esisetshenzwe yithi ;

text: Providing for honest things , not only in the sight of the Lord , but also in the sight of men .
text2: ngokuba sinakekela okuhle , kungesemehlweni eNkosi kuphela kodwa nasemehlweni abantu .

text: And we have sent with them our brother , whom we have oftentimes proved diligent in many things , but now much more diligent , upon the great confidence which I have in you .
text2: Kepha sithumele kanye nabo umzalwane wethu esimfumene kaningi ekhuthele ezintweni eziningi , kepha manje ukhuthele kakhulu ngenxa yokunethemba kwakhe okukhulu .

text: Whether any do inquire of Titus , he is my partner and fellowhelper concerning you : or our brethren be inquired of , they are the messengers of the churches , and the glory of Christ .
text2: Uma kubuzwa ngoThithu , yena ungumhlanganyeli nesisebenzi kanye nami kini ; noma kubuzwa ngabazalwane bethu , bayizithunywa zamabandla , bayinkazimulo kaKristu .

text: Wherefore shew ye to them , and before the churches , the proof of your love , and of our boasting on your behalf .
text2: Ngakho manibonakalise kubo phambi kwamabandla ubufakazi bothando lwenu nokuzincoma kwethu ngani .

text: For as touching the ministering to the saints , it is superfluous for me to write to you :
text2: Ngokuba maqondana nokukhonza abangcwele akuswelekile ukuba nginilobele ,

text: For I know the forwardness of your mind , for which I boast of you to them of Macedonia , that Achaia was ready a year ago ; and your zeal hath provoked very many .
text2: ngokuba ngiyalwazi uthando lwenu engizincoma ngalo ngani kwabaseMakedoniya , uma ngithi i - Akhaya lase lizilungisele kwanyakenye nokuthi ukushisekela kwenu kuvusile iningi labo .

text: Yet have I sent the brethren , lest our boasting of you should be in vain in this behalf ; that , as I said , ye may be ready :
text2: Kepha ngithumile abazalwane ukuba ukuzincoma kwethu ngani kungenziwa ize maqondana nalokhu , ukuze kuthi njengokusho kwami nibe senilungisele ,

text: Lest haply if they of Macedonia come with me , and find you unprepared , we ( that we say not , ye ) should be ashamed in this same confident boasting .
text2: funa uma ngabe kufika kanye nami abaseMakedoniya , banifumane ningakabi nilungisele , sijabhe thina — singasaniphathi nina — ngaleli themba .

text: Therefore I thought it necessary to exhort the brethren , that they would go before unto you , and make up beforehand your bounty , whereof ye had notice before , that the same might be ready , as a matter of bounty , and not as of covetousness .
text2: Ngalokho - ke bengithi kudingeka ukuba ngincenge abazalwane ukuba bandulele ukuza kini , balungisele ngaphambili isipho senu esathenjiswa ngaphambili , sona sihlale silungisiwe , sibe njengesesibusiso , singabi njengesokuncishana .

text: But this I say , He which soweth sparingly shall reap also sparingly ; and he which soweth bountifully shall reap also bountifully .
text2: Kepha nakhu : ohlwanyela ingcosana uyakuvuna ingcosana , nohlwanyela kakhulu uyakuvuna kakhulu .

text: Every man according as he purposeth in his heart , so let him give ; not grudgingly , or of necessity : for God loveth a cheerful giver .
text2: Yilowo nalowo anikele njengalokho azikhethele khona enhliziyweni , kungabi ngokudabuka nangokucindezelwa , ngokuba uNkulunkulu uyamthanda onikelayo ethokoza .

text: And God is able to make all grace abound toward you ; that ye , always having all sufficiency in all things , may abound to every good work :
text2: Kepha uNkulunkulu unamandla okunipha umusa wonke uvame , ukuze kuthi ninokwanela konke ezintweni zonke ngezikhathi zonke , nivame imisebenzi yonke emihle ,

text: ( As it is written , He hath dispersed abroad ; he hath given to the poor : his righteousness remaineth for ever .
text2: njengokuba kulotshiwe ukuthi : “ Wahlaphaza , wapha abampofu ; ukulunga kwakhe kuhlala kuze kube phakade . ”

text: Now he that ministereth seed to the sower both minister bread for your food , and multiply your seed sown , and increase the fruits of your righteousness ; )
text2: Kepha yena onika ohlwanyelayo inhlwanyelo nesinkwa sokudliwa uyakulungisela evise imbewu yenu , andise izithelo zokulunga kwenu ,

text: Being enriched in every thing to all bountifulness , which causeth through us thanksgiving to God .
text2: ukuze ezintweni zonke nicetshiswe kukho ukuphana konke okuveza ngathi ukubonga uNkulunkulu .

text: For the administration of this service not only supplieth the want of the saints , but is abundant also by many thanksgivings unto God ;
text2: Ngokuba ukukhonza ngale nkonzo akuqedi kuphela ukuswela kwabangcwele , kepha futhi kuvamisa kakhulu ukumbonga uNkulunkulu ngabaningi ,

text: Whiles by the experiment of this ministration they glorify God for your professed subjection unto the gospel of Christ , and for your liberal distribution unto them , and unto all men ;
text2: lokhu ngokuvivinyeka kwale nkonzo badumisa uNkulunkulu ngenxa yokulalela kokuvuma kwenu ivangeli likaKristu nangenxa yobuqotho bobudlelwane benu nabo , yebo , nabo bonke ,

text: And by their prayer for you , which long after you for the exceeding grace of God in you .
text2: banilangazelele futhi ngokunikhulekela ngenxa yomusa omkhulu kakhulu kaNkulunkulu okini .

text: Thanks be unto God for his unspeakable gift .
text2: Makabongwe uNkulunkulu ngenxa yesipho sakhe esingakhulumekiyo .

text: Now I Paul myself beseech you by the meekness and gentleness of Christ , who in presence am base among you , but being absent am bold toward you :
text2: Kepha mina Pawulu uqobo ngiyanincenga ngobumnene nangokuva kukaKristu , mina engithobile phambi kwenu nxa ngikhona , kepha nginesibindi kini nxa ngingekho ,

text: But I beseech you , that I may not be bold when I am present with that confidence , wherewith I think to be bold against some , which think of us as if we walked according to the flesh .
text2: ngiyacela ukuba , nxa ngikhona , kungasweleki ukuba ngibasukele ngesibindi engiqonde ukuba naso kwabanye abasho ngathi ukuthi sihamba ngokwenyama .

text: For though we walk in the flesh , we do not war after the flesh :
text2: Ngokuba noma sihamba sisenyameni kasilwi ngokwenyama ,

text: ( For the weapons of our warfare are not carnal , but mighty through God to the pulling down of strong holds ; )
text2: ngokuba izikhali zethu zokulwa kasizo ezenyama , kodwa ngaye uNkulunkulu zinamandla okubhidliza izinqaba , sichitha izizindlo ,

text: Casting down imaginations , and every high thing that exalteth itself against the knowledge of God , and bringing into captivity every thought to the obedience of Christ ;
text2: nakho konke okudephileyo okuziphakamisela ukuthiyana nokumazi uNkulunkulu , namacebo onke siwathumbela ukumlalela uKristu ;

text: And having in a readiness to revenge all disobedience , when your obedience is fulfilled .
text2: futhi silungele ukujezisa ukungalaleli konke , nxa sekuphelele ukulalela kwenu .

text: Do ye look on things after the outward appearance ? If any man trust to himself that he is Christ ' s , let him of himself think this again , that , as he is Christ ' s , even so are we Christ ' s .
text2: Bhekani lokhu okuphambi kobuso . Uma umuntu ezethemba yena ukuthi ungokaKristu , makabuye aqonde lokhu ngokwakhe ukuthi , njengokuba yena engokaKristu , sinjalo nathi .

text: For though I should boast somewhat more of our authority , which the Lord hath given us for edification , and not for your destruction , I should not be ashamed :
text2: Ngokuba noma ngingaze ngizibonge ngaphezulwana ngamandla ethu eyasipha wona iNkosi ukuba nakhiwe kungengukuba nibhidlizwe , angiyikujabhiswa ,

text: That I may not seem as if I would terrify you by letters .
text2: ukuze ngingabi njengokungathi benginethusa nje ngezincwadi .

text: For his letters , say they , are weighty and powerful ; but his bodily presence is weak , and his speech contemptible .
text2: Ngokuba izincwadi - ke bathi zinzima , zibukhali , kepha nxa ekhona ngomzimba , ubuthakathaka , ukukhuluma kwakhe kudelelekile .

text: Let such an one think this , that , such as we are in word by letters when we are absent , such will we be also in deed when we are present .
text2: Onjalo makaqonde lokhu ukuthi lokhu esiyikho ngamazwi ezincwadi nxa singekho , siyakuba yikho ngesenzo nxa sikhona .

text: For we dare not make ourselves of the number , or compare ourselves with some that commend themselves : but they measuring themselves by themselves , and comparing themselves among themselves , are not wise .
text2: Ngokuba asinasibindi sokuzilinganisa nokuzifanisa nabathile babo abazincomayo . Kodwa bona , nxa bezilinganisa ngezingqobo zabo , bezifanisa nezingqobo zabo , kaba namqondo .

text: But we will not boast of things without our measure , but according to the measure of the rule which God hath distributed to us , a measure to reach even unto you .
text2: Kepha thina asiyikuzibonga ngaphezu kokulinganisa , kodwa ngesilinganiso sendawo esiyisilinganiso asilinganisele sona uNkulunkulu , ukuze sifinyelele nakini .

text: For we stretch not ourselves beyond our measure , as though we reached not unto you : for we are come as far as to you also in preaching the gospel of Christ :
text2: Ngokuba asizeluli ngokweqisa ngokungathi asifinyeleli kini , ngokuba sifikile kwaze kwaba nakini ngevangeli likaKristu ,

text: Not boasting of things without our measure , that is , of other men ' s labours ; but having hope , when your faith is increased , that we shall be enlarged by you according to our rule abundantly ,
text2: singazibongi ngemisebenzi yabanye ngaphezu kokulinganisa , kepha sinethemba lokuthi ngokukhula kokukholwa kwenu , siyakukhuliswa kakhulu impela kini endaweni yethu ,

text: To preach the gospel in the regions beyond you , and not to boast in another man ' s line of things made ready to our hand .
text2: size sishumayele ivangeli nasezindaweni ezingaphambi kwakini , singazibongi ngezinto esezenziwe endaweni yomunye .

text: But he that glorieth , let him glory in the Lord .
text2: Kepha ozibongayo makazibonge eNkosini .

text: For not he that commendeth himself is approved , but whom the Lord commendeth .
text2: Ngokuba akusiye ozincomayo ovunywa abongwe , kepha yilowo iNkosi emncomayo .

text: Would to God ye could bear with me a little in my folly : and indeed bear with me .
text2: Sengathi ningangibekezelela ebuwuleni obuyingcosana , yebo , ngibekezeleleni .

text: For I am jealous over you with godly jealousy : for I have espoused you to one husband , that I may present you as a chaste virgin to Christ .
text2: Ngokuba ngiyanishisekela ngokushisekela kukaNkulunkulu , ngokuba nganendisela endodeni eyodwa ukuba nginiyise kuKristu niyintombi emhlophe .

text: But I fear , lest by any means , as the serpent beguiled Eve through his subtilty , so your minds should be corrupted from the simplicity that is in Christ .
text2: Kepha nginovalo lokuthi njengalokho inyoka yamkhohlisa u - Eva ngobuqili bayo , kanjalo izingqondo zenu mhlawumbe zingadukiswa , ziyeke ubuqotho nobumhlophe ngakuKristu .

text: For if he that cometh preacheth another Jesus , whom we have not preached , or if ye receive another spirit , which ye have not received , or another gospel , which ye have not accepted , ye might well bear with him .
text2: Ngokuba uma kufika umuntu eshumayela omunye uJesu esingamshumayelanga , noma namukela omunye umoya eningawamukelanga , noma elinye ivangeli eningalamukelanga , nikubekezelela kakhulu .

text: For I suppose I was not a whit behind the very chiefest apostles .
text2: Ngokuba ngithi angisilele ngalutho kubaphostoli abaqhamileyo kakhulu .

text: But though I be rude in speech , yet not in knowledge ; but we have been throughly made manifest among you in all things .
text2: Noma ngiyibhimbi lokukhuluma , nokho angisilo ngokwazi ; lokhu sikubonakalisile kinina ngezindlela zonke ezintweni zonke .

text: Have I committed an offence in abasing myself that ye might be exalted , because I have preached to you the gospel of God freely ?
text2: Kumbe ngonile yini ngokuzithoba ukuba niphakanyiswe nina , lokhu nganishumayeza ngesihle ivangeli likaNkulunkulu na ?

text: I robbed other churches , taking wages of them , to do you service .
text2: Ngaphanga amanye amabandla , ngithatha iholo kuwo , ukuba ngikhonze nina ;

text: And when I was present with you , and wanted , I was chargeable to no man : for that which was lacking to me the brethren which came from Macedonia supplied : and in all things I have kept myself from being burdensome unto you , and so will I keep myself .
text2: nalapho ngikhona kini ngiswele , angibanga mthwalo kumuntu , ngokuba abazalwane abavela eMakedoniya bakuqeda ukuswela kwami ; ezintweni zonke ngazilinda ukuba nginganisindi , futhi ngisezakuzilinda .

text: As the truth of Christ is in me , no man shall stop me of this boasting in the regions of Achaia .
text2: Njengalokhu iqiniso likaKristu likimi , angiyikwaphucwa lolo dumo ezigodini zase - Akhaya .

text: Wherefore ? because I love you not ? God knoweth .
text2: Ngani na ? Ngokuba nginganithandi na ? UNkulunkulu uyazi .

text: But what I do , that I will do , that I may cut off occasion from them which desire occasion ; that wherein they glory , they may be found even as we .
text2: Kepha engikwenzayo ngizakukwenza futhi , ukuze ngibaphuce ithuba abafuna ithuba lokuba bafunyanwe benjengathi kulokho abazibonga ngakho .

text: For such are false apostles , deceitful workers , transforming themselves into the apostles of Christ .
text2: Ngokuba abanjalo bangabaphostoli bamanga , izisebenzi ezikhohlisayo , beziguqula abaphostoli bakaKristu .

text: And no marvel ; for Satan himself is transformed into an angel of light .
text2: Akumangalisi , ngokuba uSathane uqobo uziguqula ingelosi yokukhanya .

text: Therefore it is no great thing if his ministers also be transformed as the ministers of righteousness ; whose end shall be according to their works .
text2: Ngakho akuyinto enkulu , uma nezikhonzi zakhe ziziguqula izikhonzi zokulunga ezikuphela kwazo kuyakuba njengokwemisebenzi yazo .

text: I say again , Let no man think me a fool ; if otherwise , yet as a fool receive me , that I may boast myself a little .
text2: Ngiyaphinda ngithi : Makungasho muntu ngami ukuthi ngiyisiwula ; kepha noma kungaba njalo , nokho ngamukeleni njengesiwula , ukuze nami ngizibonge kancane .

text: That which I speak , I speak it not after the Lord , but as it were foolishly , in this confidence of boasting .
text2: Lokho engikushoyo ngalesi sibindi sokuzibonga , angikusho ngokweNkosi , kodwa ngikusho kungathi ngobuwula .

text: Seeing that many glory after the flesh , I will glory also .
text2: Lokhu abaningi bezibonga ngokwenyama , nami ngiyakuzibonga .

text: For ye suffer fools gladly , seeing ye yourselves are wise .
text2: Ngokuba abayiziwula nibabekezelela ngenjabulo , lokhu ningabahlakaniphileyo ,

text: For ye suffer , if a man bring you into bondage , if a man devour you , if a man take of you , if a man exalt himself , if a man smite you on the face .
text2: ngokuba niyabekezela , uma umuntu enenza izigqila , uma enidla , uma enibamba , uma ezikhukhumeza , uma enishaya ebusweni .

text: I speak as concerning reproach , as though we had been weak . Howbeit whereinsoever any is bold , ( I speak foolishly , ) I am bold also .
text2: Ngisho ngamahloni ukuthi kade sibuthakathaka . Kepha kulokho umuntu anesibindi ngakho — ngikhuluma ngobuwula — nami nginesibindi ngakho .

text: Are they Hebrews ? so am I . Are they Israelites ? so am I . Are they the seed of Abraham ? so am I .
text2: BangamaHeberu na ? Nami . Bangaba - Israyeli na ? Nami . Bayinzalo ka - Abrahama na ? Nami .

text: Are they ministers of Christ ? ( I speak as a fool ) I am more ; in labours more abundant , in stripes above measure , in prisons more frequent , in deaths oft .
text2: Bayizikhonzi zikaKristu na ? Ngikhulumisa okohlanya — ngiyiso kakhulu kunabo ; ekukhandlekeni kakhulu kunabo , nasekuboshweni kaningi kunabo , nasekushayweni okukhulu impela , nasezingozini zokufa ngezikhathi eziningi .

text: Of the Jews five times received I forty stripes save one .
text2: KubaJuda ngathola kahlanu imivimbo , kushiywa munye emashumini amane ;

text: Thrice was I beaten with rods , once was I stoned , thrice I suffered shipwreck , a night and a day I have been in the deep ;
text2: ngashaywa kathathu ngezinduku , ngakhandwa kanye ngamatshe , kathathu ngalinyalelwa umkhumbi , ngaba semanzini olwandle ubusuku bunye nemini ;

text: In journeyings often , in perils of waters , in perils of robbers , in perils by mine own countrymen , in perils by the heathen , in perils in the city , in perils in the wilderness , in perils in the sea , in perils among false brethren ;
text2: ngangisekuhambeni kaningi , nasezingozini zemifula , nasezingozini zabaphangi , nasezingozini kwabakithi , nasezingozini kwabezizwe , nasezingozini emzini , nasezingozini ehlane , nasezingozini elwandle , nasezingozini kubazalwane bamanga ,

text: In weariness and painfulness , in watchings often , in hunger and thirst , in fastings often , in cold and nakedness .
text2: ngokukhandleka nangokukhathazeka , kaningi ngokuqwasha ebusuku , ngokulamba nangokoma , kaningi ngokuzila ukudla , nasemakhazeni nangokuhambaze ;

text: Beside those things that are without , that which cometh upon me daily , the care of all the churches .
text2: ngaphandle kwezinye izinto kukhona okungicindezelayo imihla yonke : ukukhathalela onke amabandla .

text: Who is weak , and I am not weak ? who is offended , and I burn not ?
text2: Ngubani obuthakathaka ngingebuthakathaka nami na ? Ngubani okhubekiswayo kungavuthi kimi na ?

text: If I must needs glory , I will glory of the things which concern mine infirmities .
text2: Uma ngimelwe ukuzibonga , ngiyakuzibonga ngobuthakathaka bami .

text: The God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , which is blessed for evermore , knoweth that I lie not .
text2: UNkulunkulu noYise weNkosi uJesu , obongekayo phakade naphakade , uyazi ukuthi angiqambi amanga .

text: In Damascus the governor under Aretas the king kept the city of the Damascenes with a garrison , desirous to apprehend me :
text2: EDamaseku induna yenkosi u - Aretha yalinda umuzi wamaDamaseku ukuba ingibambe ;

text: And through a window in a basket was I let down by the wall , and escaped his hands .
text2: ngehliswa efasiteleni ngesilulu ogangeni , ngaphepha ezandleni zayo .

text: It is not expedient for me doubtless to glory . I will come to visions and revelations of the Lord .
text2: Kumelwe ukuba ngizibonge noma kungasizi ; kepha sengizakuphatha imibono nezambulo zeNkosi .

text: I knew a man in Christ above fourteen years ago , ( whether in the body , I cannot tell ; or whether out of the body , I cannot tell : God knoweth ; ) such an one caught up to the third heaven .
