text: Even as it is meet for me to think this of you all , because I have you in my heart ; inasmuch as both in my bonds , and in the defence and confirmation of the gospel , ye all are partakers of my grace .
text2: njengalokhu kufanele ukuba ngibe nomqondo onjalo ngani nonke , njengokuba nginithwele enhliziyweni yami , lokhu ekuboshweni kwami nasekulivikeleni nasekuliqiniseni ivangeli nina nonke nihlanganyele nami emseni .

text: For God is my record , how greatly I long after you all in the bowels of Jesus Christ .
text2: Ngokuba uNkulunkulu ungufakazi wami wokuthi nginilangazelela kangakanani nonke ngesihe sikaJesu Kristu .

text: And this I pray , that your love may abound yet more and more in knowledge and in all judgment ;
text2: Ngikhulekela lokhu ukuba uthando lwenu luvame kakhulu njalo ekwazini nasekuqondeni konke ,

text: That ye may approve things that are excellent ; that ye may be sincere and without offence till the day of Christ ;
text2: ukuze nikwazi ukwahlukanisa , nize nibe mhlophe nabangakhubekisiyo kuze kube lusuku lukaKristu ,

text: Being filled with the fruits of righteousness , which are by Jesus Christ , unto the glory and praise of God .
text2: nigcwaliswe ngezithelo zokulunga ezingaye uJesu Kristu , kube yinkazimulo nodumo kuNkulunkulu .

text: But I would ye should understand , brethren , that the things which happened unto me have fallen out rather unto the furtherance of the gospel ;
text2: Kepha ngithanda ukuba nazi , bazalwane , ukuthi lokho okwangehlelayo kugcine kwaveza ukuqhubeka kwevangeli ,

text: So that my bonds in Christ are manifest in all the palace , and in all other places ;
text2: kwaze kwathi izibopho zami zabonakala enqabeni yonke nakubo bonke abanye ukuthi zingenxa kaKristu

text: And many of the brethren in the Lord , waxing confident by my bonds , are much more bold to speak the word without fear .
text2: nokuthi iningi labazalwane eNkosini betholile ithemba ngezibopho zami bazuzile kakhulu isibindi sokukhuluma izwi likaNkulunkulu ngokungesabi .

text: Some indeed preach Christ even of envy and strife ; and some also of good will :
text2: Abanye kambe bashumayela uKristu ngomhawu nangombango kepha abanye ngenhliziyo enhle ;

text: The one preach Christ of contention , not sincerely , supposing to add affliction to my bonds :
text2: laba bashumayela ngothando , bazi ukuthi ngimiselwe ukuvikela ivangeli ,

text: But the other of love , knowing that I am set for the defence of the gospel .
text2: kepha labo bamemezela uKristu ngombango kungenganhliziyo emhlophe , bethi bazakungivusela ukukhathazeka ekuboshweni kwami .

text: What then ? notwithstanding , every way , whether in pretence , or in truth , Christ is preached ; and I therein do rejoice , yea , and will rejoice .
text2: Kunani pho ? Nokho uKristu uyamenyezelwa ngezindlela zonke , noma ngokuzenzisa noma ngesiminya ; kulokho - ke ngiyathokoza , yebo , ngiyakuthokoza ,

text: For I know that this shall turn to my salvation through your prayer , and the supply of the Spirit of Jesus Christ ,
text2: ngokuba ngiyazi ukuthi lokhu kuyakungenzela ukusindiswa ngokunxusa kwenu nangokusiza kukaMoya kaJesu Kristu ,

text: According to my earnest expectation and my hope , that in nothing I shall be ashamed , but that with all boldness , as always , so now also Christ shall be magnified in my body , whether it be by life , or by death .
text2: njengokulangazela nokwethemba kwami ukuthi ayikho into engizakujabhiswa kuyo , kepha ngesibindi sonke , njengasezikhathini zonke namanje , uKristu uyakwenziwa mkhulu emzimbeni wami , nokuba kungokuphila nokuba kungokufa .

text: For to me to live is Christ , and to die is gain .
text2: Ngokuba kimina ukuphila kunguKristu , ukufa kuyinzuzo .

text: But if I live in the flesh , this is the fruit of my labour : yet what I shall choose I wot not .
text2: Kepha uma ukuphila enyameni kuyisithelo somsebenzi kimi , angisakwazi engizakukukhetha .

text: For I am in a strait betwixt two , having a desire to depart , and to be with Christ ; which is far better :
text2: Kepha ngiphakathi kokubili ; nginesifiso sokumuka ngibe noKristu , ngokuba yikhona okuhle kakhulu ;

text: Nevertheless to abide in the flesh is more needful for you .
text2: kanti - ke ukuhlala enyameni kuswelekile kakhulu ngenxa yenu .

text: And having this confidence , I know that I shall abide and continue with you all for your furtherance and joy of faith ;
text2: Lokhu nginalo leli themba , ngiyazi ukuthi ngiyakuhlala , yebo , ngihlale nani nonke , kube ngukuqhubeka nokuthokoza kwenu ekukholweni ,

text: That your rejoicing may be more abundant in Jesus Christ for me by my coming to you again .
text2: ukuze ukuzibonga kwenu ngami kuvame kuKristu Jesu ngokufika kwami futhi kini .

text: Only let your conversation be as it becometh the gospel of Christ : that whether I come and see you , or else be absent , I may hear of your affairs , that ye stand fast in one spirit , with one mind striving together for the faith of the gospel ;
text2: Kuphela hambani ngokufanele ivangeli likaKristu , kuze kuthi , noma ngiza nginibona noma ngingekho , ngizwe izindaba zenu zokuthi nimi niqinile emoyeni munye , nangomphefumulo munye nilwela inkolo yevangeli ,

text: And in nothing terrified by your adversaries : which is to them an evident token of perdition , but to you of salvation , and that of God .
text2: ningethuswa ngalutho ngabamelene nani , okuyisiboniso sokubhubha kubona kepha ngesokusindiswa kwenu ; lokhu - ke kuvela kuNkulunkulu .

text: For unto you it is given in the behalf of Christ , not only to believe on him , but also to suffer for his sake ;
text2: Ngokuba ngenxa kaKristu nina nabelwa ngomusa , angisho ukukholwa kuye kuphela kepha nokuhlupheka ngenxa yakhe ,

text: Having the same conflict which ye saw in me , and now hear to be in me .
text2: nikukho khona lokho kulwa enakubona kimina , nakalokhu nizwa ukuthi kukimina .

text: If there be therefore any consolation in Christ , if any comfort of love , if any fellowship of the Spirit , if any bowels and mercies ,
text2: Ngakho - ke uma kukhona induduzo kuKristu , uma kukhona ukududuzeka kothando , uma kukhona inhlangano kaMoya , uma kukhona isisa nesihawu ,

text: Fulfil ye my joy , that ye be likeminded , having the same love , being of one accord , of one mind .
text2: gcwalisani ukuthokoza kwami ukuba nibe nomqondo munye , ninothando lunye , nibe nhliziyonye , niqonde into inye ;

text: Let nothing be done through strife or vainglory ; but in lowliness of mind let each esteem other better than themselves .
text2: ningenzi lutho ngombango nangodumo lwezwe ; kepha ngokuthobeka nishaye sengathi abanye bakhulu kunani ,

text: Look not every man on his own things , but every man also on the things of others .
text2: yilowo nalowo angabheki okwakhe , kepha yilowo abheke nokwabanye .

text: Let this mind be in you , which was also in Christ Jesus :
text2: Mawube kini lowo mqondo owawukhona nakuKristu Jesu

text: Who , being in the form of God , thought it not robbery to be equal with God :
text2: owathi enesimo sikaNkulunkulu , akaze asho ukuthi kuyinto yokuphangwa ukulingana noNkulunkulu ,

text: But made himself of no reputation , and took upon him the form of a servant , and was made in the likeness of men :
text2: kepha wazidela ethabatha isimo senceku , enziwe ngomfanekiso wabantu ;

text: And being found in fashion as a man , he humbled himself , and became obedient unto death , even the death of the cross .
text2: wathi efunyenwe enjengomuntu ngesimilo , wazithobisa , elalela kwaze kwaba sekufeni , yebo , ekufeni kwesiphambano .

text: Wherefore God also hath highly exalted him , and given him a name which is above every name :
text2: Ngalokho - ke uNkulunkulu wamphakamisa kakhulu , wamnika igama eliphezu kwamagama onke ,

text: That at the name of Jesus every knee should bow , of things in heaven , and things in earth , and things under the earth ;
text2: ukuze kuthi ngegama likaJesu amadolo onke aguqe , awabasezulwini , nawabasemhlabeni , nawabangaphansi komhlaba ,

text: And that every tongue should confess that Jesus Christ is Lord , to the glory of God the Father .
text2: nezilimi zonke zivume ngokuthi UJESU KRISTU UYINKOSI , kube yinkazimulo kuNkulunkulu uYise .

text: Wherefore , my beloved , as ye have always obeyed , not as in my presence only , but now much more in my absence , work out your own salvation with fear and trembling .
text2: Ngakho - ke , bathandiweyo bami , njengalokho nilalele ngezikhathi zonke , kungesikho nxa ngikhona kuphela , kodwa ikakhulu manje nxa ngingekho , fezani ukusindiswa kwenu ngokwesaba nangokuthuthumela ,

text: For it is God which worketh in you both to will and to do of his good pleasure .
text2: ngokuba nguNkulunkulu osebenza kini nokuthanda nokwenza njengentando yakhe .

text: Do all things without murmurings and disputings :
text2: Yenzani konke ngokungakhononi nokungangabazi ,

text: That ye may be blameless and harmless , the sons of God , without rebuke , in the midst of a crooked and perverse nation , among whom ye shine as lights in the world ;
text2: ukuze nibe ngabangasolekiyo nabangenacala , abantwana bakaNkulunkulu abangenasici phakathi kwesizukulwane esiyisigwegwe nesiphambeneyo , enikhanya phakathi kwaso njengezinkanyiso ezweni ,

text: Holding forth the word of life ; that I may rejoice in the day of Christ , that I have not run in vain , neither laboured in vain .
text2: nibambelele ezwini lokuphila , ngize ngibe nokuzibonga ngosuku lukaKristu ngokuthi angigijimelanga ize , angisebenzelanga ize .

text: Yea , and if I be offered upon the sacrifice and service of your faith , I joy , and rejoice with you all .
text2: Yebo , nokuba nginikelwa emhlatshelweni nasenkonzweni yokukholwa kwenu , ngiyathokoza , ngithokoza kanye nani nonke ;

text: For the same cause also do ye joy , and rejoice with me .
text2: ngokunjalo - ke thokozani nani , nithokoze kanye nami .

text: But I trust in the Lord Jesus to send Timotheus shortly unto you , that I also may be of good comfort , when I know your state .
text2: Kepha ngiyethemba eNkosini uJesu ukuthuma uThimothewu kini masinyane , ukuze nami ngename nxa sengazi izindaba zenu .

text: For I have no man likeminded , who will naturally care for your state .
text2: Ngokuba anginamuntu onenhliziyo enjengeyakhe , onganakekela izindaba zenu ngobuqotho ;

text: For all seek their own , not the things which are Jesus Christ ' s .
text2: ngokuba bonke bafuna okwabo , abafuni okukaJesu Kristu .

text: But ye know the proof of him , that , as a son with the father , he hath served with me in the gospel .
text2: Kepha niyakwazi ukuthembeka kwakhe ukuthi ukhonzile kanye nami ngenxa yevangeli njengomntwana kuyise .

text: Him therefore I hope to send presently , so soon as I shall see how it will go with me .
text2: Yena - ke ngiyethemba ukumthuma masinyane , uma sengibonile ukuthi okuqondene nami kophelelaphi ;

text: But I trust in the Lord that I also myself shall come shortly .
text2: kepha ngiyethemba eNkosini ukuthi nami ngizakuza eduzane .

text: Yet I supposed it necessary to send to you Epaphroditus , my brother , and companion in labour , and fellowsoldier , but your messenger , and he that ministered to my wants .
text2: Kodwa ngibone ukuthi kudingekile ukuba ngithume kinina u - Ephafrodithu , umzalwane nesisebenzi nebutho kanye nami , nesithunywa senu , isikhonzi ekusweleni kwami ,

text: For he longed after you all , and was full of heaviness , because that ye had heard that he had been sick .
text2: lokhu wayenilangazelela nonke , eyaluza ngokuba nizwile ukuthi wayegula .

text: For indeed he was sick nigh unto death : but God had mercy on him ; and not on him only , but on me also , lest I should have sorrow upon sorrow .
text2: Ngokuba nempela wayegula ephansi kokufa ; kepha uNkulunkulu wamhawukela , kungeyena yedwa , wangihawukela nami , ukuze ngingabi nalusizi phezu kosizi .

text: I sent him therefore the more carefully , that , when ye see him again , ye may rejoice , and that I may be the less sorrowful .
text2: Ngalokho ngakhuthalela kakhulu ukumthuma , ukuze kuthi nxa senimbona futhi nithokoze , kimi kunciphe usizi .

text: Receive him therefore in the Lord with all gladness ; and hold such in reputation :
text2: Ngakho - ke mamukeleni eNkosini ngokuthokoza konke , abanjalo - ke nibaphathe ngokubatusa ,

text: Because for the work of Christ he was nigh unto death , not regarding his life , to supply your lack of service toward me .
text2: ngokuba ngenxa yomsebenzi kaKristu wacishe wafa ezidela amathambo , ukuze agcwalise okusileleyo ekungikhonzeni kwenu .

text: Finally , my brethren , rejoice in the Lord . To write the same things to you , to me indeed is not grievous , but for you it is safe .
text2: Elokugcina , bazalwane bami , thokozani eNkosini . Ukunilobela khona lokho angikwenqeni , kepha nina kuyanigcina .

text: Beware of dogs , beware of evil workers , beware of the concision .
text2: Xwayani izinja , nixwaye izisebenzi ezimbi , nixwaye abokusika .

text: For we are the circumcision , which worship God in the spirit , and rejoice in Christ Jesus , and have no confidence in the flesh .
text2: Ngokuba singukusoka thina esikhonza ngoMoya kaNkulunkulu , sizibonga kuKristu Jesu , singethembi enyameni ,

text: Though I might also have confidence in the flesh . If any other man thinketh that he hath whereof he might trust in the flesh , I more :
text2: nakuba nami bengingaba nokwethemba enyameni . Uma omunye umuntu ecabanga ukuthi unokwethemba enyameni , mina kakhulu ;

text: Circumcised the eighth day , of the stock of Israel , of the tribe of Benjamin , an Hebrew of the Hebrews ; as touching the law , a Pharisee ;
text2: ngasokwa ngosuku lwesishiyagalombili ngingowohlanga luka - Israyeli , owesizwe sakwaBenjamini , umHeberu wamaHeberu , ngokomthetho umFarisi ;

text: Concerning zeal , persecuting the church ; touching the righteousness which is in the law , blameless .
text2: ngokokushisekela ngingowazingela ibandla , ngokokulunga okusemthethweni ngingongasolekiyo .

text: But what things were gain to me , those I counted loss for Christ .
text2: Kanti - ke lokho okwakuyinzuzo kimi ngakushaya indiva ngenxa kaKristu .

text: Yea doubtless , and I count all things but loss for the excellency of the knowledge of Christ Jesus my Lord : for whom I have suffered the loss of all things , and do count them but dung , that I may win Christ ,
text2: Yebo impela , konke ngikushaya indiva ngobukhulu bokumazi uKristu Jesu iNkosi yami , engilahlekelwe yikho konke ngenxa yakhe , ngikushaya izibi , ukuze ngizuze uKristu ,

text: And be found in him , not having mine own righteousness , which is of the law , but that which is through the faith of Christ , the righteousness which is of God by faith :
text2: ngifunyanwe kuyena , ngingenakho ukulunga okungokwami okuya ngomthetho kodwa lokho okuya ngokukholwa nguKristu , ngisho ukulunga okuvela kuNkulunkulu ngokukholwa ,

text: That I may know him , and the power of his resurrection , and the fellowship of his sufferings , being made conformable unto his death ;
text2: ukuze ngimazi yena , namandla okuvuka kwakhe , nokuhlanganyela ezinhluphekweni zakhe , ngimfuze ngokufa kwakhe ,

text: If by any means I might attain unto the resurrection of the dead .
text2: uma mhlawumbe ngingaze ngifinyelele ekuvukeni kwabafileyo ,

text: Not as though I had already attained , either were already perfect : but I follow after , if that I may apprehend that for which also I am apprehended of Christ Jesus .
text2: kungesikho ukuthi sengibambile nokuthi sengiphelelisiwe , kepha ngijonga ukuba kumbe ngingakubamba yini lokho nami engabanjelwa khona nguKristu Jesu .

text: Brethren , I count not myself to have apprehended : but this one thing I do , forgetting those things which are behind , and reaching forth unto those things which are before ,
text2: Bazalwane , angisho ukuthi mina uqobo sengikubambile ; kepha kunye engikwenzayo : ngikhohlwa okungasemuva , ngizelulela kokungaphambili ,

text: I press toward the mark for the prize of the high calling of God in Christ Jesus .
text2: ngijonge emgomeni , emklomelweni wokubizwa okukhulu kwaphezulu nguNkulunkulu kuJesu Kristu .

text: Let us therefore , as many as be perfect , be thus minded : and if in any thing ye be otherwise minded , God shall reveal even this unto you .
text2: Ngakho - ke thina sonke esiphelele masibe nokuqonda okunjalo ; kepha uma kokuthile niqonda ngokunye , nalokho uNkulunkulu uyakunambulela khona ,

text: Nevertheless , whereto we have already attained , let us walk by the same rule , let us mind the same thing .
text2: kuphela ukuthi kwesesifinyelele kukho , sihambe ngawo lowo mkhondo .

text: Brethren , be followers together of me , and mark them which walk so as ye have us for an ensample .
text2: Ngilingiseni , bazalwane , nibabhekisise abahamba njengathi esiyisibonelo kini .

text: ( For many walk , of whom I have told you often , and now tell you even weeping , that they are the enemies of the cross of Christ :
text2: Ngokuba abaningi , enganitshela kaningi ngabo namanje nginitshela nangezinyembezi , bahamba beyizitha zesiphambano sikaKristu ,

text: Whose end is destruction , whose God is their belly , and whose glory is in their shame , who mind earthly things . )
text2: abakuphela kwabo ngukubhujiswa , abankulunkulu wabo yisisu , nodumo lwabo lusehlazweni labo , abangabanaka okomhlaba .

text: For our conversation is in heaven ; from whence also we look for the Saviour , the Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: Kepha thina singabombuso wasezulwini , lapho futhi silindela khona ukuba kuvele uMsindisi , iNkosi uJesu Kristu ,

text: Who shall change our vile body , that it may be fashioned like unto his glorious body , according to the working whereby he is able even to subdue all things unto himself .
text2: oyakuguqula isimo somzimba wethu wokuthotshiswa , ufane nomzimba wakhe wenkazimulo , ngamandla angazihlelela ngawo konke phansi kwakhe .

text: Therefore , my brethren dearly beloved and longed for , my joy and crown , so stand fast in the Lord , my dearly beloved .
text2: Ngalokho , bazalwane bami abathandekayo nabalangazelelwayo , ntokozo yami nomqhele wami , yimani niqinile kanjalo eNkosini , bathandwa .

text: I beseech Euodias , and beseech Syntyche , that they be of the same mind in the Lord .
text2: Ngiyamyala u - Evodiya , ngiyamyala noSintike ukuba babe nokuqonda kunye eNkosini .

text: And I intreat thee also , true yokefellow , help those women which laboured with me in the gospel , with Clement also , and with other my fellowlabourers , whose names are in the book of life .
text2: Yebo , ngiyakunxusa nawe mana wami oqotho , yelekelela labo besifazane , lokhu babambisana nami evangelini , kanye noKlemente nezinye izisebenzi zami abamagama abo asencwadini yokuphila .

text: Rejoice in the Lord alway : and again I say , Rejoice .
text2: Thokozani eNkosini njalonjalo ; ngiyaphinda ngithi : Thokozani !

text: Let your moderation be known unto all men . The Lord is at hand .
text2: Ukubekezela kwenu akwaziwe ngabantu bonke ; iNkosi iseduze .

text: Be careful for nothing ; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God .
text2: Ningakhathazeki ngalutho , kepha kukho konke izicelo zenu mazaziwe nguNkulunkulu ngokukhuleka nokunxusa kanye nokubonga .

text: And the peace of God , which passeth all understanding , shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus .
text2: Ukuthula kukaNkulunkulu okudlula ukuqonda konke kuyakulondoloza izinhliziyo zenu nemicabango yenu kuKristu Jesu .

text: Finally , brethren , whatsoever things are true , whatsoever things are honest , whatsoever things are just , whatsoever things are pure , whatsoever things are lovely , whatsoever things are of good report ; if there be any virtue , and if there be any praise , think on these things .
text2: Elokugcina , bazalwane , konke okuyiqiniso , konke okuhloniphekayo , konke okulungileyo , konke okumhlophe , konke okuthandekayo , konke okutusekayo , noma kukhona okuhle , noma kukhona okubongekayo , zindlani ngalokho ;

text: Those things , which ye have both learned , and received , and heard , and seen in me , do : and the God of peace shall be with you .
text2: enakufunda , nakwamukela , nakuzwa , nakubona kimi , kwenzeni lokho ; khona uNkulunkulu wokuthula uyakuba nani .

text: But I rejoiced in the Lord greatly , that now at the last your care of me hath flourished again ; wherein ye were also careful , but ye lacked opportunity .
text2: Kepha - ke ngathokoza kakhulu eNkosini , ngokuba manje senize navuselela ukunginakekela kwenu ; beninginakekela kambe , kepha anibanga nathuba .

text: Not that I speak in respect of want : for I have learned , in whatsoever state I am , therewith to be content .
text2: Akusikho ukuthi ngisho maqondana nokuswela , ngokuba mina ngifundile ukuba nganeliswe noma ngihlezi kanjani .

text: I know both how to be abased , and I know how to abound : every where and in all things I am instructed both to be full and to be hungry , both to abound and to suffer need .
text2: Ngiyakwazi ukuba phansi , ngiyakwazi nokubusa ; kukho konke nasezintweni zonke ngifundisiwe : ukusutha , nokulamba , nokubusa , nokuswela .

text: I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me .
text2: Nginamandla ukwenza konke ngaye ongiqinisayo .

text: Notwithstanding ye have well done , that ye did communicate with my affliction .
text2: Nokho nenze kahle ngokuhlanganyela nami ekuhluphekeni kwami .

text: Now ye Philippians know also , that in the beginning of the gospel , when I departed from Macedonia , no church communicated with me as concerning giving and receiving , but ye only .
text2: Niyazi nani nina baseFilipi ukuthi ekuqaleni kwevangeli ekuphumeni kwami eMakedoniya kwakungekho bandla nelilodwa elahlanganyela nami endabeni yokupha nokwamukela , kuphela nina nodwa ,

text: For even in Thessalonica ye sent once and again unto my necessity .
text2: ngokuba naseThesalonika nathumela kanye nakabili ngokuswela kwami .

text: Not because I desire a gift : but I desire fruit that may abound to your account .
text2: Akusikho ukuthi ngifuna isipho , kodwa ngifuna isithelo esiyakwandisa okubalelwa nina .

text: But I have all , and abound : I am full , having received of Epaphroditus the things which were sent from you , an odour of a sweet smell , a sacrifice acceptable , wellpleasing to God .
text2: Kepha nginakho konke ngokweqileyo ; nganelisiwe sengamukelisiwe ngu - Ephafrodithu okuvela kinina , iphunga elimnandi , umhlatshelo omuhle nothokozisayo kuNkulunkulu .

text: But my God shall supply all your need according to his riches in glory by Christ Jesus .
text2: UNkulunkulu wami uzakugcwalisa ukuswela konke kwenu njengokwengcebo yakhe ekukhazimuleni kuKristu Jesu .

text: Now unto God and our Father be glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: KuNkulunkulu noBaba wethu makube ludumo kuze kube phakade naphakade . Amen .

text: Salute every saint in Christ Jesus . The brethren which are with me greet you .
text2: Ngikhonzeleni kwabangcwele bonke abakuKristu Jesu . Abazalwane abanami bakhonza kinina .

text: All the saints salute you , chiefly they that are of Caesar ' s household .
text2: Abangcwele bonke bayakhonza kini , ikakhulu abendlu kaKesari .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all . Amen .
text2: Umusa weNkosi uJesu Kristu mawube nomoya wenu .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God , and Timotheus our brother ,
text2: UPawulu , umphostoli kaKristu Jesu ngentando kaNkulunkulu , noThimothewu umzalwane

text: To the saints and faithful brethren in Christ which are at Colosse : Grace be unto you , and peace , from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: kubo abaseKolose , abangcwele nabazalwane abakholwayo kuKristu ; makube kini umusa nokuthula okuvela kuNkulunkulu uBaba wethu .

text: We give thanks to God and the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , praying always for you ,
text2: Simbonga njalonjalo uNkulunkulu uYise weNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu , nxa sinikhulekela ,

text: Since we heard of your faith in Christ Jesus , and of the love which ye have to all the saints ,
text2: lokhu sizwile ngokukholwa kwenu kuKristu Jesu nangothando eninalo kubo bonke abangcwele ,

text: For the hope which is laid up for you in heaven , whereof ye heard before in the word of the truth of the gospel ;
text2: ngenxa yethemba enibekelwe lona ezulwini , enezwa ngalo ngaphambili ngezwi leqiniso levangeli

text: Which is come unto you , as it is in all the world ; and bringeth forth fruit , as it doth also in you , since the day ye heard of it , and knew the grace of God in truth :
text2: elifikile kini , njengalokhu likhona ezweni lonke lithela izithelo , landa , njengokuba kunjalo naphakathi kwenu , kusukela osukwini enezwa ngalo , nazi umusa kaNkulunkulu ngeqiniso ,

text: As ye also learned of Epaphras our dear fellowservant , who is for you a faithful minister of Christ ;
text2: njengalokho nafunda ku - Ephafra othandekayo oyinceku kanye nathi , oyisikhonzi esithembekayo sikaKristu ngenxa yenu ;

text: Who also declared unto us your love in the Spirit .
text2: okunguyena futhi wasitshela ngothando lwenu ngoMoya .

text: For this cause we also , since the day we heard it , do not cease to pray for you , and to desire that ye might be filled with the knowledge of his will in all wisdom and spiritual understanding ;
text2: Ngalokho nathi , kusukela osukwini esezwa ngalo , asiyeki ukunikhulekela nokuninxusela ukuba nigcwaliswe ngokwazi intando yakhe ngokuhlakanipha konke nokuqonda okungomoya ,

text: That ye might walk worthy of the Lord unto all pleasing , being fruitful in every good work , and increasing in the knowledge of God ;
text2: nihambe ngokufanele iNkosi , niyithokozise ngakho konke , nithela izithelo emisebenzini yonke elungileyo , nikhula ekumazini uNkulunkulu ,

text: Strengthened with all might , according to his glorious power , unto all patience and longsuffering with joyfulness ;
text2: niqiniswe nokuqiniswa konke ngokwamandla enkazimulo yakhe , kuze kube ngukubekezela konke nokubheka kade ngokujabula ;

text: Giving thanks unto the Father , which hath made us meet to be partakers of the inheritance of the saints in light :
text2: nibonga uYise owanenza nifanele isabelo sefa labangcwele ekukhanyeni ,

text: Who hath delivered us from the power of darkness , and hath translated us into the kingdom of his dear Son :
text2: owasikhulula emandleni obumnyama nowasibeka embusweni weNdodana yothando lwakhe ;

text: In whom we have redemption through his blood , even the forgiveness of sins :
text2: okukuyo sinokuhlengwa , ukuthethelelwa kwezono ,

text: Who is the image of the invisible God , the firstborn of every creature :
text2: yona ingumfanekiso kaNkulunkulu ongenakubonwa , izibulo lezidalwa zonke ,

text: For by him were all things created , that are in heaven , and that are in earth , visible and invisible , whether they be thrones , or dominions , or principalities , or powers : all things were created by him , and for him :
text2: ngokuba kwadalelwa kuyo konke okusezulwini nasemhlabeni , okubonwayo nokungenakubonwa , nokuba kuyizihlalo zobukhosi , nokuba kuyimibuso , nokuba kuyizikhulu , nokuba kuyiziphathimandla ; konke kwadalwa ngayo , kwadalelwa yona ;

text: And he is before all things , and by him all things consist .
text2: yona ingaphambi kwakho konke , nezinto zonke zimi ngayo ;

text: And he is the head of the body , the church : who is the beginning , the firstborn from the dead ; that in all things he might have the preeminence .
text2: yona iyinhloko yomzimba , ngisho ibandla , engukuqala , izibulo kwabafileyo , ukuze yona ibe ngowokuqala ezintweni zonke ,

text: For it pleased the Father that in him should all fulness dwell ;
text2: ngokuba kwaba kuhle kuye ukuba ukugcwala konke kuhlale kuyo

text: And , having made peace through the blood of his cross , by him to reconcile all things unto himself ; by him , I say , whether they be things in earth , or things in heaven .
text2: nokuba ngayo abuyisane nakho konke esenzile ukuthula ngegazi lesiphambano sayo , yebo ngayo , nokuba kuyizinto ezisemhlabeni nokuba ngezisezulwini .

text: And you , that were sometime alienated and enemies in your mind by wicked works , yet now hath he reconciled
text2: Nani ekade ningabafokazi nezitha engqondweni ngemisebenzi emibi ,

text: In the body of his flesh through death , to present you holy and unblameable and unreproveable in his sight :
text2: nokho manje usebuyisene nani emzimbeni wenyama yayo ngokufa ukuba animise ningcwele , ningenasisihla nacala phambi kwakhe ,

text: If ye continue in the faith grounded and settled , and be not moved away from the hope of the gospel , which ye have heard , and which was preached to every creature which is under heaven ; whereof I Paul am made a minister ;
text2: uma kambe nihlala ekukholweni , nisekeliwe nigxilile , ningagudluzwa ethembeni levangeli enalizwayo , elashunyayelwa kukho konke okudaliweyo okuphansi kwezulu , engenziwa isikhonzi salo mina Pawulu .

text: Who now rejoice in my sufferings for you , and fill up that which is behind of the afflictions of Christ in my flesh for his body ' s sake , which is the church :
text2: Kalokhu ngiyathokoza ezinhluphekweni zami ngenxa yenu ngokugcwalisa okusileleyo osizini lukaKristu enyameni yami ngenxa yomzimba wakhe , oyibandla ;

text: Whereof I am made a minister , according to the dispensation of God which is given to me for you , to fulfil the word of God ;
text2: engenziwa isikhonzi salo ngokwesimiso sikaNkulunkulu enganikwa sona maqondana nani ukuba ligcwaliswe izwi likaNkulunkulu ,

text: Even the mystery which hath been hid from ages and from generations , but now is made manifest to his saints :
text2: ngisho imfihlakalo ebifihlakele selokhu kwaqala izikhathi nezizukulwane , kepha kalokhu yambuliwe kwabangcwele bakhe ;

text: To whom God would make known what is the riches of the glory of this mystery among the Gentiles ; which is Christ in you , the hope of glory :
text2: okubona uNkulunkulu athanda ukubazisa ukuthi iyini ingcebo yenkazimulo yaleyo mfihlakalo phakathi kwabezizwe , enguKristu phakathi kwenu , ithemba lenkazimulo ;

text: Whom we preach , warning every man , and teaching every man in all wisdom ; that we may present every man perfect in Christ Jesus :
text2: okunguye esimshumayelayo , siluleka wonke umuntu , sifundisa wonke umuntu ngokuhlakanipha konke , ukuze simise wonke umuntu ephelele kuKristu ,

text: Whereunto I also labour , striving according to his working , which worketh in me mightily .
text2: engikusebenzelayo futhi , ngilwa ngokusebenza kwakhe okusebenza kimi ngamandla .

text: For I would that ye knew what great conflict I have for you , and for them at Laodicea , and for as many as have not seen my face in the flesh ;
text2: Ngokuba ngiyathanda ukuba nazi ukuthi kukhulu kangakanani ukulwa enginakho ngenxa yenu nabaseLawodikeya nabo bonke abangabonanga ubuso bami ngamehlo ,

text: That their hearts might be comforted , being knit together in love , and unto all riches of the full assurance of understanding , to the acknowledgement of the mystery of God , and of the Father , and of Christ ;
text2: ukuze izinhliziyo zabo ziduduzwe , behlanganisiwe othandweni babe nengcebo yonke yokwazi okuphelele , bazisise imfihlakalo kaNkulunkulu enguKristu ,

text: In whom are hid all the treasures of wisdom and knowledge .
text2: okufihlwe kuye amagugu onke okuhlakanipha nowokwazi .

text: And this I say , lest any man should beguile you with enticing words .
text2: Ngikusho lokhu , ukuze kungabikho muntu onikhohlisa ngamazwi okuyenga .

text: For though I be absent in the flesh , yet am I with you in the spirit , joying and beholding your order , and the stedfastness of your faith in Christ .
text2: Ngokuba noma ngingekho ngomzimba , nokho ngikhona kini ngomoya ngithokoza , ngibona inhlelo yenu nokuqina kokukholwa kwenu kuKristu .

text: As ye have therefore received Christ Jesus the Lord , so walk ye in him :
text2: Ngakho - ke njengalokho nimamukele uKristu Jesu iNkosi , hambani nikuye ,

text: Rooted and built up in him , and stablished in the faith , as ye have been taught , abounding therein with thanksgiving .
text2: nigxilile , nakhiwe kuye , niqinisiwe ekukholweni , njengalokho nifundisiwe , nivame ukubonga .

text: Beware lest any man spoil you through philosophy and vain deceit , after the tradition of men , after the rudiments of the world , and not after Christ .
text2: Xwayani funa kube khona onithumbayo ngokuhlakanipha nangenkohliso eyize njengokwemvelo yabantu , njengezifundiso zokucathula kwezwe , kungenjengokukaKristu .

text: For in him dwelleth all the fulness of the Godhead bodily .
text2: Ngokuba kuhlala kuye ngokomzimba ukugcwala konke kobuNkulunkulu ;

text: And ye are complete in him , which is the head of all principality and power :
text2: nigcwalisiwe kuye , yena oyinhloko yemibuso yonke namandla ,

text: In whom also ye are circumcised with the circumcision made without hands , in putting off the body of the sins of the flesh by the circumcision of Christ :
text2: enasokela kuye futhi ngokusoka okungenziwanga ngezandla ngokukhumula umzimba wenyama , ngokusoka kukaKristu ;

text: Buried with him in baptism , wherein also ye are risen with him through the faith of the operation of God , who hath raised him from the dead .
text2: nimbelwe kanye naye ngombhapathizo , okungawo futhi navuswa kanye naye ngokukholwa ngamandla kaNkulunkulu owamvusa kwabafileyo .

text: And you , being dead in your sins and the uncircumcision of your flesh , hath he quickened together with him , having forgiven you all trespasses ;
text2: Nani - ke ebenifile ngeziphambeko nangokungasoki kwenyama yenu wanenza nibe ngabaphilayo kanye naye esithethelela zonke izono zethu ;

text: Blotting out the handwriting of ordinances that was against us , which was contrary to us , and took it out of the way , nailing it to his cross ;
text2: esehlangule incwadi yecala lethu , emelana nathi ngemiyalo yayo , wayeyisusa ngokuyibethela esiphambanweni ;

text: And having spoiled principalities and powers , he made a shew of them openly , triumphing over them in it .
text2: ebaphucile ababusi nabanamandla izikhali wabathela ngehlazo obala , ebanqoba ngaso .

text: Let no man therefore judge you in meat , or in drink , or in respect of an holyday , or of the new moon , or of the sabbath days :
text2: Ngakho makungabikho muntu onilahla ngokudla nesiphuzo , noma ngemikhosi , noma ukwethwasa kwenyanga , noma amasabatha ,

text: Which are a shadow of things to come ; but the body is of Christ .
text2: okuyisithunzi nje salokhu obekuzakuza ; kepha umzimba ngokaKristu .

text: Let no man beguile you of your reward in a voluntary humility and worshipping of angels , intruding into those things which he hath not seen , vainly puffed up by his fleshly mind ,
text2: Makungabikho muntu onamuka umvuzo wenu , othanda ukuzenza othobile ekhonza izingelosi , ephike ngemibono yakhe , ezikhukhumeza ngeze ngengqondo yakhe yenyama ,

text: And not holding the Head , from which all the body by joints and bands having nourishment ministered , and knit together , increaseth with the increase of God .
text2: engabambeleli kuye oyinhloko , okungaye umzimba wonke usizwa , uhlanganiswa ngamalungu nemisipha , ukhula ngokukhula kukaNkulunkulu .

text: Wherefore if ye be dead with Christ from the rudiments of the world , why , as though living in the world , are ye subject to ordinances ,
text2: Uma nifile kanye noKristu nakhululwa ezifundisweni zokucathula kwezwe , yini ukuba okungathi nisaphila ngokwezwe nithobele izifundiso zokuthi :

text: ( Touch not ; taste not ; handle not ;
text2: “ Ungaphathi , ungezwa ngolimi , ungathinti , ”

text: Which all are to perish with the using ; ) after the commandments and doctrines of men ?
text2: okuphela konke ngokudliwa ngokweziyalezo nezifundiso zabantu

text: Which things have indeed a shew of wisdom in will worship , and humility , and neglecting of the body ; not in any honour to the satisfying of the flesh .
text2: ezinegama lokuhlakanipha kambe ngokuzikhethela inkonzo , nangokuzithoba , nangokuhlupha umzimba ; akusizi lutho maqondana nokuzithiba kwenyama .

text: If ye then be risen with Christ , seek those things which are above , where Christ sitteth on the right hand of God .
text2: Ngakho uma navuswa kanye noKristu , funani okwaphezulu , lapho ekhona uKristu , ehlezi ngakwesokunene sikaNkulunkulu ;

text: Set your affection on things above , not on things on the earth .
text2: nakani okwaphezulu , ninganaki okusemhlabeni .

text: For ye are dead , and your life is hid with Christ in God .
text2: Ngokuba nafa , ukuphila kwenu kufihliwe noKristu kuNkulunkulu ;

text: When Christ , who is our life , shall appear , then shall ye also appear with him in glory .
text2: nxa ebonakaliswa uKristu ongukuphila kwethu , khona - ke nani niyakubonakaliswa kanye naye ekukhazimuleni .

text: Mortify therefore your members which are upon the earth ; fornication , uncleanness , inordinate affection , evil concupiscence , and covetousness , which is idolatry :
text2: Ngakho - ke bulalani amalungu enu asemhlabeni , ubufebe , nokungcola , nokuhuheka , nokukhanuka , nesangabe , okungukukhonza izithombe ,

text: For which things ' sake the wrath of God cometh on the children of disobedience :
text2: okuza ngakho ulaka lukaNkulunkulu ,

text: In the which ye also walked some time , when ye lived in them .
text2: ekade nihamba kukho nani , lapho nisahlezi kukho ;

text: But now ye also put off all these ; anger , wrath , malice , blasphemy , filthy communication out of your mouth .
text2: kepha kalokhu nani manilahle konke lokho , ulaka , nokuthukuthela , nobubi , nokuhlambalaza , nokukhuluma amahlazo aphuma emlonyeni wenu ;

text: Lie not one to another , seeing that ye have put off the old man with his deeds ;
text2: ningaqambelani amanga , lokhu nikhumule umuntu omdala kanye nezenzo zakhe ,

text: And have put on the new man , which is renewed in knowledge after the image of him that created him :
text2: nembethe omusha , owenziwa musha abe nokwazi ngokomfanekiso walowo owamdalayo ,

text: Where there is neither Greek nor Jew , circumcision nor uncircumcision , Barbarian , Scythian , bond nor free : but Christ is all , and in all .
text2: lapho kungekho mGreki namJuda , ukusoka nokungasoki , owezizwe noma umSkithe , isigqila noma okhululekileyo , kepha uKristu uyikho konke , ukubo bonke .

text: Put on therefore , as the elect of God , holy and beloved , bowels of mercies , kindness , humbleness of mind , meekness , longsuffering ;
text2: Ngakho - ke njengabakhethiweyo bakaNkulunkulu , abangcwele nabathandekayo , yembathani ububele benhliziyo , nesisa , nokuzithoba , nobumnene , nokubheka kade ,

text: Forbearing one another , and forgiving one another , if any man have a quarrel against any : even as Christ forgave you , so also do ye .
text2: nibekezelelane , nithethelelane , uma umuntu enensolo komunye ; njengokuba neNkosi yanithethelela , yenzani njalo nani .

text: And above all these things put on charity , which is the bond of perfectness .
text2: Kepha phezu kwakho konke lokho yembathani uthando oluyisibopho sokuphelela .

text: And let the peace of God rule in your hearts , to the which also ye are called in one body ; and be ye thankful .
text2: Ukuthula kukaKristu makubuse ezinhliziyweni zenu , enabizelwa futhi kukho emzimbeni munye ; futhi yibani ngababongayo .

text: Let the word of Christ dwell in you richly in all wisdom ; teaching and admonishing one another in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs , singing with grace in your hearts to the Lord .
text2: Izwi likaKristu alihlale phakathi kwenu , livame , nifundisane ngokuhlakanipha konke , niyalane ngamahubo , nangezihlabelelo , nangamaculo okomoya , nimhubele uNkulunkulu ezinhliziyweni zenu ngokubonga .

text: And whatsoever ye do in word or deed , do all in the name of the Lord Jesus , giving thanks to God and the Father by him .
text2: Konke enikwenzayo , noma kungezwi noma kungomsebenzi , kwenzeni konke egameni leNkosi uJesu , nimbonge uNkulunkulu uYise ngaye .

text: Wives , submit yourselves unto your own husbands , as it is fit in the Lord .
text2: Bafazi , thobelani amadoda enu njengokufanele eNkosini .

text: Husbands , love your wives , and be not bitter against them .
text2: Madoda , thandani omkenu , ningabacasukeli .

text: Children , obey your parents in all things : for this is well pleasing unto the Lord .
text2: Bantwana , lalelani abazali benu ezintweni zonke , ngokuba lokho kuyathandeka eNkosini .

text: Fathers , provoke not your children to anger , lest they be discouraged .
text2: Boyise , ningabathukuthelisi abantwana benu ukuba bangadangali .

text: Servants , obey in all things your masters according to the flesh ; not with eyeservice , as menpleasers ; but in singleness of heart , fearing God :
text2: Zinceku , lalelani ezintweni zonke labo abangamakhosi enu ngokwenyama , kungengokuthenga amehlo njengabathokozisa abantu kodwa ngobuqotho benhliziyo , niyesabe iNkosi .

text: And whatsoever ye do , do it heartily , as to the Lord , and not unto men ;
text2: Konke enikwenzayo kwenzeni ngenhliziyo , kungathi kwenzelwa iNkosi , qha abantu ,

text: Knowing that of the Lord ye shall receive the reward of the inheritance : for ye serve the Lord Christ .
text2: nazi ukuthi niyakwamukela umvuzo wefa eNkosini . Khonzani iNkosi uKristu .

text: But he that doeth wrong shall receive for the wrong which he hath done : and there is no respect of persons .
text2: Ngokuba lowo owenza ukungalungi uyakwamukeliswa ukungalungi akwenzileyo ; akukho ukukhetha umuntu .

text: Masters , give unto your servants that which is just and equal ; knowing that ye also have a Master in heaven .
text2: Makhosi , zenzeleni izinceku zenu okulungileyo nokufaneleyo ; nazi ukuthi nani nineNkosi ezulwini .

text: Continue in prayer , and watch in the same with thanksgiving ;
text2: Qiniselani ekukhulekeni , nilinde kukho ninokubonga .

text: Withal praying also for us , that God would open unto us a door of utterance , to speak the mystery of Christ , for which I am also in bonds :
text2: Nathi nisikhulekele , ukuze uNkulunkulu asivulele umnyango wezwi ukuba sikhulume imfihlakalo kaKristu engiboshwe ngenxa yayo ,

text: That I may make it manifest , as I ought to speak .
text2: ukuze ngiyibonakalise njengalokhu ngifanele ukukhuluma .

text: Walk in wisdom toward them that are without , redeeming the time .
text2: Hambani ngokuhlakanipha kubo abangaphandle , nithengisise isikhathi .

text: Let your speech be alway with grace , seasoned with salt , that ye may know how ye ought to answer every man .
text2: Ukukhuluma kwenu makube nomusa njalo , kuyolisiwe ngosawoti , ukuze nazi enifanele ukubaphendula ngakho bonke abantu .

text: All my state shall Tychicus declare unto you , who is a beloved brother , and a faithful minister and fellowservant in the Lord :
text2: Konke okuqondene nami uyakunazisa khona uThikhiku , umzalwane othandekayo nesikhonzi esikholekileyo oyinceku kanye nami eNkosini ,

text: Whom I have sent unto you for the same purpose , that he might know your estate , and comfort your hearts ;
text2: engimthumile kini ngakho lokhu ukuba nazi ukuthi sihlezi kanjani , aduduze izinhliziyo zenu ,

text: With Onesimus , a faithful and beloved brother , who is one of you . They shall make known unto you all things which are done here .
text2: kanye no - Onesimu , umzalwane okholekileyo nothandekayo , ongomunye wakini ; bazakunazisa konke okwalapha .

text: Aristarchus my fellowprisoner saluteth you , and Marcus , sister ' s son to Barnabas , ( touching whom ye received commandments : if he come unto you , receive him ; )
text2: Uyakhonza kini u - Aristarku oyisiboshwa kanye nami , noMarku umzala kaBarnaba , enayalezwa ngaye — uma efika kini mamukeleni —

text: And Jesus , which is called Justus , who are of the circumcision . These only are my fellowworkers unto the kingdom of God , which have been a comfort unto me .
text2: noJesu othiwa uJustu ; yibo bodwa abangabokusoka abasebenzela umbuso kaNkulunkulu kanye nami , abakade beyinduduzo kimi .

text: Epaphras , who is one of you , a servant of Christ , saluteth you , always labouring fervently for you in prayers , that ye may stand perfect and complete in all the will of God .
text2: Uyakhonza kini u - Ephafra ongomunye wakini , inceku kaKristu Jesu , enilwela njalo emikhulekweni , ukuze nime niphelele niqinisekile entandweni yonke kaNkulunkulu .

text: For I bear him record , that he hath a great zeal for you , and them that are in Laodicea , and them in Hierapolis .
text2: Ngokuba ngingufakazi wakhe wokuthi uyanisebenzela kakhulu nina , nabaseLawodikeya , nabaseHiyerapholi .

text: Luke , the beloved physician , and Demas , greet you .
text2: Uyakhonza kini uLuka inyanga ethandekayo , noDema .

text: Salute the brethren which are in Laodicea , and Nymphas , and the church which is in his house .
text2: Khonzani kubazalwane abaseLawodikeya , nakuNimfa , nasebandleni lakwakhe .

text: And when this epistle is read among you , cause that it be read also in the church of the Laodiceans ; and that ye likewise read the epistle from Laodicea .
text2: Nxa le ncwadi isifundiwe kini , bhekani ukuba ifundwe nasebandleni labaseLawodikeya ; nani niyifunde leyo evela eLawodikeya .

text: And say to Archippus , Take heed to the ministry which thou hast received in the Lord , that thou fulfil it .
text2: Nimtshele u - Arkiphu , nithi : “ Qaphela inkonzo oyitholile eNkosini , ukuze uyifeze . ”

text: The salutation by the hand of me Paul . Remember my bonds . Grace be with you . Amen .
text2: Yilokhu ukukhonza kwami ngesandla sami , mina Pawulu . Khumbulani izibopho zami . Umusa mawube nani .

text: Paul , and Silvanus , and Timotheus , unto the church of the Thessalonians which is in God the Father and in the Lord Jesus Christ : Grace be unto you , and peace , from God our Father , and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: OPawulu , noSilvanu , noThimothewu kulo ibandla labaseTheselonika elikuNkulunkulu uBaba , naseNkosini uJesu Kristu : Makube kini umusa nokuthula .

text: We give thanks to God always for you all , making mention of you in our prayers ;
text2: Sibonga uNkulunkulu njalo ngani nonke , siniphatha emikhulekweni yethu ,

text: Remembering without ceasing your work of faith , and labour of love , and patience of hope in our Lord Jesus Christ , in the sight of God and our Father ;
text2: sikhumbula ngokungayeki isenzo senu sokukholwa , nomsebenzi wothando , nokukhuthazela kwethemba lenu eliseNkosini yethu uJesu Kristu phambi kukaNkulunkulu noBaba wethu ,

text: Knowing , brethren beloved , your election of God .
text2: sikwazi , bazalwane abathandiwe nguNkulunkulu , ukukhethwa kwenu

text: For our gospel came not unto you in word only , but also in power , and in the Holy Ghost , and in much assurance ; as ye know what manner of men we were among you for your sake .
text2: ukuthi ivangeli lethu alizanga kini ngezwi kuphela kodwa nangamandla , nangoMoya oNgcwele , nangokwethemba okukhulu , njengokuba nazi ukuthi saba ngabantu abanjani phakathi kwenu ngenxa yenu .

text: And ye became followers of us , and of the Lord , having received the word in much affliction , with joy of the Holy Ghost :
text2: Nani naba ngabalingisi bethu , nabeNkosi senilamukele izwi ekukhathazekeni okukhulu ngokuthokoza kukaMoya oNgcwele ,

text: So that ye were ensamples to all that believe in Macedonia and Achaia .
text2: naze naba yisibonelo kubo bonke abakholwayo eMakedoniya nase - Akhaya .

text: For from you sounded out the word of the Lord not only in Macedonia and Achaia , but also in every place your faith to God - ward is spread abroad ; so that we need not to speak any thing .
text2: Ngokuba udumo lwezwi leNkosi lwaphuma kinina , lwafika , angisho eMakedoniya nase - Akhaya kuphela , kepha ezindaweni zonke lapho ukukholwa kwenu nguNkulunkulu kuphumele khona ; ngakho asisadingi ukukhuluma lutho .

text: For they themselves shew of us what manner of entering in we had unto you , and how ye turned to God from idols to serve the living and true God ;
text2: Ngokuba bona uqobo balanda ngathi ukuthi kwaba njani ukungena kwethu kinina nokuthi naphendukela kanjani kuNkulunkulu , nishiya izithombe , ukuba nikhonze uNkulunkulu ophilayo oweqiniso ,

text: And to wait for his Son from heaven , whom he raised from the dead , even Jesus , which delivered us from the wrath to come .
text2: nilindele iNdodana yakhe ivela ezulwini , ayivusa kwabafileyo , uJesu osihlangulisa olakeni oluzayo .

text: For yourselves , brethren , know our entrance in unto you , that it was not in vain :
text2: Ngokuba niyazi nina bazalwane ukuthi ukungena kwethu kinina akubanga yize .

text: But even after that we had suffered before , and were shamefully entreated , as ye know , at Philippi , we were bold in our God to speak unto you the gospel of God with much contention .
text2: Kepha noma sasihlushiwe kuqala saphathwa kabi eFilipi , njengokuba nazi , saba nesibindi kuNkulunkulu wethu sokunishumayeza ivangeli likaNkulunkulu ngokulwa okukhulu .

text: For our exhortation was not of deceit , nor of uncleanness , nor in guile :
text2: Ngokuba ukuyala kwethu akusikho okokuduka nokokungcola nangenkohliso ,

text: But as we were allowed of God to be put in trust with the gospel , even so we speak ; not as pleasing men , but God , which trieth our hearts .
text2: kepha njengokuba sivunyiwe nguNkulunkulu ukuba siphathiswe ivangeli , siyakhuluma ngokunjalo , singenzeli ukuthokozisa abantu kepha uNkulunkulu ovivinya izinhliziyo zethu .

text: For neither at any time used we flattering words , as ye know , nor a cloke of covetousness ; God is witness :
text2: Ngokuba asizange sibe namazwi okuthopha , njengokuba nazi ; asizange futhi sibe nobuqili bokufisa , uNkulunkulu ungufakazi ,

text: Nor of men sought we glory , neither of you , nor yet of others , when we might have been burdensome , as the apostles of Christ .
text2: singafunanga nokutuswa ngabantu , nakinina nakwabanye ,

text: But we were gentle among you , even as a nurse cherisheth her children :
text2: ingani sasingaba namandla okunisinda njengabaphostoli bakaKristu , nokho saba mnene phakathi kwenu njengokuba umdlezane ondla abantwana bakhe .

text: So being affectionately desirous of you , we were willing to have imparted unto you , not the gospel of God only , but also our own souls , because ye were dear unto us .
text2: Ngokunjalo lokhu besinilangazelele , sasifuna ukuninika kungesilo ivangeli likaNkulunkulu kuphela , kepha nokuphila kwethu uqobo , ngokuba nase ningabathandekayo kithina .

text: For ye remember , brethren , our labour and travail : for labouring night and day , because we would not be chargeable unto any of you , we preached unto you the gospel of God .
text2: Ngokuba niyakhumbula , bazalwane , ukukhandleka nokushikashikeka kwethu ; sisebenza ubusuku nemini , ukuze singasindi noyedwa kinina , sanishumayeza ivangeli likaNkulunkulu .

text: Ye are witnesses , and God also , how holily and justly and unblameably we behaved ourselves among you that believe :
text2: Nina ningofakazi , naye uNkulunkulu , bokuthi sahlala kanjani phakathi kwenu nina enikholwayo ngobungcwele , nangokulunga , nangokungasoleki ,

text: As ye know how we exhorted and comforted and charged every one of you , as a father doth his children ,
text2: njengokuba nazi ukuthi saniphatha abanye ngabanye njengoyise ephatha abantwana bakhe ,

text: That ye would walk worthy of God , who hath called you unto his kingdom and glory .
text2: siniyala , sinimisa isibindi , sifakazela ukuba nihambe ngokufaneleyo phambi kukaNkulunkulu onibizela embusweni nasebukhosini bakhe .

text: For this cause also thank we God without ceasing , because , when ye received the word of God which ye heard of us , ye received it not as the word of men , but as it is in truth , the word of God , which effectually worketh also in you that believe .
text2: Ngalokho nathi sibonga uNkulunkulu singaphezi , ngokuba , kuthe lapho namukela izwi likaNkulunkulu enalizwa ngathi , anilamukelanga njengezwi labantu kepha njengezwi likaNkulunkulu , njengokuba liyilo isibili , elona lisebenza futhi phakathi kwenu nina enikholwayo .

text: For ye , brethren , became followers of the churches of God which in Judaea are in Christ Jesus : for ye also have suffered like things of your own countrymen , even as they have of the Jews :
text2: Ngokuba nina bazalwane naba ngabalingisi bamabandla kaNkulunkulu aseJudiya akuKristu Jesu , ngokuba nani nahlushwa ngabesizwe sakini , njengalokho nawo ahlushwa ngabaJuda

text: Who both killed the Lord Jesus , and their own prophets , and have persecuted us ; and they please not God , and are contrary to all men :
text2: ababulala neNkosi uJesu nabaprofethi , basixosha nathi , bengamthokozisi uNkulunkulu , bemelana nabantu bonke ,

text: Forbidding us to speak to the Gentiles that they might be saved , to fill up their sins alway : for the wrath is come upon them to the uttermost .
text2: besivimbela ukukhuluma nabezizwe ukuba basindiswe , ukuze bagcwalise njalo izono zabo ; kepha ulaka selufinyelele phezu kwabo ngokupheleleyo .

text: But we , brethren , being taken from you for a short time in presence , not in heart , endeavoured the more abundantly to see your face with great desire .
text2: Kepha thina , bazalwane , lokhu besahlukanisiwe nani isikhashana ngobuso kungenganhliziyo , kwaba yikhona sikhuthalela kakhulu ukubona ubuso benu ngokunxanela okukhulu .

text: Wherefore we would have come unto you , even I Paul , once and again ; but Satan hindered us .
text2: Ngakho besithanda ukuza kinina , mina Pawulu ngokwami kanye nakabili , kepha uSathane wasivimbela .

text: For what is our hope , or joy , or crown of rejoicing ? Are not even ye in the presence of our Lord Jesus Christ at his coming ?
text2: Ngokuba liyini ithemba lethu , nokuthokoza , nomqhele wokuzibonga phambi kweNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu ekufikeni kwakhe , kungeyinina na ?

text: For ye are our glory and joy .
text2: Ngokuba nina niludumo lwethu nokuthokoza kwethu .

text: Wherefore when we could no longer forbear , we thought it good to be left at Athens alone ;
text2: Ngalokho kwathi singasenakubekezela , sathi kuhle ukuba sisale sodwa e - Athene ,

text: And sent Timotheus , our brother , and minister of God , and our fellowlabourer in the gospel of Christ , to establish you , and to comfort you concerning your faith :
text2: sathuma uThimothewu umzalwane wethu , isikhonzi sikaNkulunkulu evangelini likaKristu , ukuba aniqinise , anivuse maqondana nokukholwa kwenu

text: That no man should be moved by these afflictions : for yourselves know that we are appointed thereunto .
text2: ukuba kunganyakaziswa muntu ngalezo zinhlupheko ; ngokuba niyazi nina ukuthi simiselwe lokho .

text: For verily , when we were with you , we told you before that we should suffer tribulation ; even as it came to pass , and ye know .
text2: Ngokuba kuthe sisekhona kini , sanitshela ngaphambili ukuthi siyakuhlushwa , njengokuba kwaba njalo , nani nikwazi .

text: For this cause , when I could no longer forbear , I sent to know your faith , lest by some means the tempter have tempted you , and our labour be in vain .
text2: Ngalokho nami , lapho ngingasenakubekezela , ngathumela ukuba ngiqonde ukukholwa kwenu , ingabe mhlawumbe umlingi unilingile yini , ukukhandleka kwethu kube yize .

text: But now when Timotheus came from you unto us , and brought us good tidings of your faith and charity , and that ye have good remembrance of us always , desiring greatly to see us , as we also to see you :
text2: Kepha kalokhu uThimothewu esefikile kithi evela kini , esibikela izindaba ezinhle zokukholwa nothando lwenu , nokuthi nisikhumbula kahle njalo , nokuthi nilangazelela ukusibona , njengokuba nathi silangazelela ukubona nina ,

text: Therefore , brethren , we were comforted over you in all our affliction and distress by your faith :
text2: ngalokho , bazalwane , saduduzeka ngani ngokukholwa kwenu ekusweleni nasosizini lwethu lonke ,

text: For now we live , if ye stand fast in the Lord .
text2: ngokuba kalokhu siyaphila , uma nina nimi niqinile eNkosini .

text: For what thanks can we render to God again for you , for all the joy wherewith we joy for your sakes before our God ;
text2: Ngokuba ngukubonga okunjani esingakubuyisela kuNkulunkulu ngani ngokuthokoza konke esithokoza ngakho ngenxa yenu phambi kukaNkulunkulu wethu na ?

text: Night and day praying exceedingly that we might see your face , and might perfect that which is lacking in your faith ?
text2: Ubusuku nemini sinxusa nokunxusa ukuba sibone ubuso benu , siphelelise okusileleyo ekukholweni kwenu .

text: Now God himself and our Father , and our Lord Jesus Christ , direct our way unto you .
text2: Sengathi uNkulunkulu noBaba wethu uqobo neNkosi yethu uJesu angayiqondisa indlela yethu yokuza kini ,

text: And the Lord make you to increase and abound in love one toward another , and toward all men , even as we do toward you :
text2: iNkosi ininike ukwanda nokuchichima othandweni , omumye komunye nakubo bonke , njengokuba sinjalo kinina ,

text: To the end he may stablish your hearts unblameable in holiness before God , even our Father , at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ with all his saints .
text2: ukuze iqinise izinhliziyo zenu , zingabi nakusoleka ebungcweleni phambi kukaNkulunkulu noBaba wethu ekufikeni kweNkosi yethu uJesu kanye nabangcwele bakhe bonke .

text: Furthermore then we beseech you , brethren , and exhort you by the Lord Jesus , that as ye have received of us how ye ought to walk and to please God , so ye would abound more and more .
text2: Elokugcina - ke , bazalwane , siyaninxusa , siyaniyala ngeNkosi uJesu ukuba njengalokho nakwamukela kithi ukuthi nifanele ukuhamba nokumthokozisa kanjani uNkulunkulu , njengalokho nihamba kanjalo , manivame kakhulu kulokho .

text: For ye know what commandments we gave you by the Lord Jesus .
text2: Ngokuba niyayazi imiyalo esaninika yona ngayo iNkosi uJesu .

text: For this is the will of God , even your sanctification , that ye should abstain from fornication :
text2: Ngokuba lokhu kuyintando kaNkulunkulu , ukungcweliswa kwenu , ukuba nidede ebufebeni

text: That every one of you should know how to possess his vessel in sanctification and honour ;
text2: ukuba yilowo nalowo kini akwazi ukuhlala nomkakhe ngobungcwele nangokuhlonipha ,

text: Not in the lust of concupiscence , even as the Gentiles which know not God :
text2: kungabi ngokushisa kwenkanuko njengabezizwe abangamazi uNkulunkulu

text: That no man go beyond and defraud his brother in any matter : because that the Lord is the avenger of all such , as we also have forewarned you and testified .
text2: ukuba kungabikho noyedwa omonayo , aphambe umfowabo ngento , ngokuba iNkosi ingumphindiseli kukho konke lokho , njengokuba sanitshela phambili , saqinisa .

text: For God hath not called us unto uncleanness , but unto holiness .
text2: Ngokuba uNkulunkulu kasibizelanga amanyala , kepha wasibizela ebungcweleni .

text: He therefore that despiseth , despiseth not man , but God , who hath also given unto us his holy Spirit .
text2: Ngakho - ke owalayo akali umuntu , kepha wala uNkulunkulu , yena oninika uMoya wakhe oNgcwele .

text: But as touching brotherly love ye need not that I write unto you : for ye yourselves are taught of God to love one another .
text2: Kepha maqondana nothando lobuzalwane anisweli ukuba umuntu anilobele , ngokuba nina uqobo ningabafundisiwe nguNkulunkulu ukuba nithandane ;

text: And indeed ye do it toward all the brethren which are in all Macedonia : but we beseech you , brethren , that ye increase more and more ;
text2: nempela niyakwenza lokho kubo bonke abazalwane abaseMakedoniya lonke . Kepha siyaniyala , bazalwane , ukuba nivame nokuvama kulokho ,

text: And that ye study to be quiet , and to do your own business , and to work with your own hands , as we commanded you ;
text2: nikhuthalele ukuhlala ngokuthula , nokwenza okwenu , nokusebenza ngezandla zenu , njengokuba saniyala ,

text: That ye may walk honestly toward them that are without , and that ye may have lack of nothing .
text2: ukuze nihambe ngokufaneleyo kwabangaphandle , ningasweli lutho .

text: But I would not have you to be ignorant , brethren , concerning them which are asleep , that ye sorrow not , even as others which have no hope .
text2: Kepha asithandi , bazalwane , ukuba ningabi nakwazi ngabalalayo , ukuze ningadabuki njengabanye abangenalo ithemba .

text: For if we believe that Jesus died and rose again , even so them also which sleep in Jesus will God bring with him .
text2: Ngokuba uma sikholwa ukuthi uJesu wafa , wavuka , ngokunjalo - ke uNkulunkulu uyakubaletha nabaleleyo kuJesu kanye naye .

text: For this we say unto you by the word of the Lord , that we which are alive and remain unto the coming of the Lord shall not prevent them which are asleep .
text2: Ngokuba lokho sikusho kini ngezwi leNkosi ukuthi thina , esisekhona sisasele kuze kube sekufikeni kweNkosi , asiyikubandulela nempela abaleleyo ,

text: For the Lord himself shall descend from heaven with a shout , with the voice of the archangel , and with the trump of God : and the dead in Christ shall rise first :
text2: ngokuba iNkosi uqobo iyakwehla ezulwini ngezwi lenhlokomo , ngephimbo lengelosi enkulu nangecilongo likaNkulunkulu , nabafileyo kuKristu bayakuvuka kuqala ,

text: Then we which are alive and remain shall be caught up together with them in the clouds , to meet the Lord in the air : and so shall we ever be with the Lord .
text2: khona thina , esisekhona sisasele siyakuhlwithwa kanye nabo emafwini , sihlangabeze iNkosi emoyeni ; kanjalo - ke siyakuba nayo iNkosi njalo .

text: Wherefore comfort one another with these words .
text2: Ngakho - ke duduzanani ngalawo mazwi .

text: But of the times and the seasons , brethren , ye have no need that I write unto you .
text2: Kepha ngezikhathi nangemizuzu , bazalwane , anisweli ukulotshelwa ,

text: For yourselves know perfectly that the day of the Lord so cometh as a thief in the night .
text2: ngokuba nina uqobo niyazi kahle ukuthi usuku lweNkosi luza njengesela ebusuku .

text: For when they shall say , Peace and safety ; then sudden destruction cometh upon them , as travail upon a woman with child ; and they shall not escape .
text2: Nxa bethi : “ Ngukuthula nokuhlala kahle , ” khona ukubhujiswa kuyabazuma njengemihelo ifikela okhulelweyo , abasoze baphunyuka .

text: But ye , brethren , are not in darkness , that that day should overtake you as a thief .
text2: Kepha nina bazalwane anikho ebumnyameni , ukuze lolo suku lunifice njengesela ,

text: Ye are all the children of light , and the children of the day : we are not of the night , nor of darkness .
text2: ngokuba nina nonke ningabantwana bokukhanya , ningabantwana bemini . Asisibo abobusuku noma abobumnyama ;

text: Therefore let us not sleep , as do others ; but let us watch and be sober .
text2: ngalokho - ke masingalali njengabanye , kodwa masiqwashe , siqonde .

text: For they that sleep sleep in the night ; and they that be drunken are drunken in the night .
text2: Ngokuba abalalayo balala ebusuku , nabadakwayo badakwa ebusuku ;

text: But let us , who are of the day , be sober , putting on the breastplate of faith and love ; and for an helmet , the hope of salvation .
text2: kepha thina esingabemini masiqonde , sifake isivikelo sesifuba sokukholwa nesothando , isigqoko sibe yithemba lokusindiswa ;

text: For God hath not appointed us to wrath , but to obtain salvation by our Lord Jesus Christ ,
text2: ngokuba uNkulunkulu kasimiselanga ulaka kepha ukuba sizuze ukusindiswa ngeNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu

text: Who died for us , that , whether we wake or sleep , we should live together with him .
text2: owasifelayo ukuba , noma siqwashile noma silele , siphile kanye naye .

text: Wherefore comfort yourselves together , and edify one another , even as also ye do .
text2: Ngalokho - ke vuselelanani , nakhane njengokuba futhi nikwenza .

text: And we beseech you , brethren , to know them which labour among you , and are over you in the Lord , and admonish you ;
text2: Kepha siyanincenga , bazalwane , ukuba nibazi abakhandlekayo phakathi kwenu , nabaniphetheyo eNkosini , nabanilulekayo ,

text: And to esteem them very highly in love for their work ' s sake . And be at peace among yourselves .
text2: nibazisise kakhulu othandweni ngenxa yomsebenzi wabo . Hlalisanani ngokuthula .

text: Now we exhort you , brethren , warn them that are unruly , comfort the feebleminded , support the weak , be patient toward all men .
text2: Kepha siyaniyala , bazalwane , ukuba niluleke abangahambi ngomthetho , nithokozise abadanileyo , nisekele ababuthakathaka , nibabekezelele bonke .

text: See that none render evil for evil unto any man ; but ever follow that which is good , both among yourselves , and to all men .
text2: Qaphelani ukuba kungabikho ophindisela omunye okubi ngokubi ; kepha jongani njalo ukwenza okuhle , omunye komunye nakubo bonke .

text: Rejoice evermore .
text2: Thokozani njalo ;

text: Pray without ceasing .
text2: khulekani ningaphezi ;

text: In every thing give thanks : for this is the will of God in Christ Jesus concerning you .
text2: kukho konke bongani ; ngokuba lokhu kuyintando kaNkulunkulu kuKristu Jesu ngani .

text: Quench not the Spirit .
text2: Ningamcimi uMoya ;

text: Despise not prophesyings .
text2: ningakudeleli ukuprofetha ;

text: Prove all things ; hold fast that which is good .
text2: vivinyani konke , nibambisise okuhle ;

text: Abstain from all appearance of evil .
text2: dedani kukho konke okubonakala kukubi .

text: And the very God of peace sanctify you wholly ; and I pray God your whole spirit and soul and body be preserved blameless unto the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Kepha uNkulunkulu wokuthula , yena uqobo , makaningcwelise ngokupheleleyo , kulondolozwe umoya wenu wonke nomphefumulo nomzimba , kungabi nacala ekufikeni kweNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu .

text: Faithful is he that calleth you , who also will do it .
text2: Uthembekile yena onibizayo , oyakukwenza futhi .

text: Brethren , pray for us .
text2: Bazalwane , sikhulekeleni .

text: Greet all the brethren with an holy kiss .
text2: Khonzani kubazalwane bonke ngokwanga okungcwele .

text: I charge you by the Lord that this epistle be read unto all the holy brethren .
text2: Ngiyanifungisa iNkosi ukuba le ncwadi ifundwe kubo bonke abazalwane .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you . Amen .
text2: Umusa weNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu mawube nani .

text: Paul , and Silvanus , and Timotheus , unto the church of the Thessalonians in God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: OPawulu , noSilvanu , noThimothewu kulo ibandla labaseThesalonika elikuNkulunkulu , uBaba wethu , naseNkosini uJesu Kristu :

text: Grace unto you , and peace , from God our Father and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Makube kini umusa nokuthula okuvela kuNkulunkulu uBaba naseNkosini uJesu Kristu .

text: We are bound to thank God always for you , brethren , as it is meet , because that your faith groweth exceedingly , and the charity of every one of you all toward each other aboundeth ;
text2: Simelwe ukumbonga njalo uNkulunkulu ngani bazalwane , njengokuba kufanele , ngokuba inkolo yenu iyanda kakhulu , nothando lwenu nonke omunye komunye luyakhula ,

text: So that we ourselves glory in you in the churches of God for your patience and faith in all your persecutions and tribulations that ye endure :
text2: kuze kuthi thina ngokwethu sizincome ngani emabandleni kaNkulunkulu ngenxa yokukhuthazela kwenu nokukholwa ekuzingelweni kwenu konke nasezinhluphekweni enibekezela kuzo ,

text: Which is a manifest token of the righteous judgment of God , that ye may be counted worthy of the kingdom of God , for which ye also suffer :
text2: okuyisiboniso sokwahlulela okulungileyo kukaNkulunkulu , ukuze kuthiwe ningabalungele umbuso kaNkulunkulu enihlupheka ngenxa yawo ,

text: Seeing it is a righteous thing with God to recompense tribulation to them that trouble you ;
text2: uma kambe kuyinto elungile kuNkulunkulu ukuba abuyisele ukuhlupheka kubo abanihluphayo ,

text: And to you who are troubled rest with us , when the Lord Jesus shall be revealed from heaven with his mighty angels ,
text2: aniphe nina enihluphekayo ukuphumula kanye nathi ekwambulweni kweNkosi uJesu , evela ezulwini , enezingelosi zamandla akhe ,

text: In flaming fire taking vengeance on them that know not God , and that obey not the gospel of our Lord Jesus Christ :
text2: elangabini lomlilo , ephindisela kwabangamazi uNkulunkulu nakwabangalaleli ivangeli leNkosi yethu uJesu ,

text: Who shall be punished with everlasting destruction from the presence of the Lord , and from the glory of his power ;
text2: abazakunikwa isijeziso esingukubhujiswa okuphakade , basuke phambi kobuso beNkosi naphambi kwenkazimulo yamandla akhe ,

text: When he shall come to be glorified in his saints , and to be admired in all them that believe ( because our testimony among you was believed ) in that day .
text2: nxa efika ukuba akhazimuliswe kubo abangcwele bakhe , abe ngomangalisayo kubo bonke abakholwa ngalowo muhla , ngokuba nakholwa ngukufakaza kwethu .

text: Wherefore also we pray always for you , that our God would count you worthy of this calling , and fulfil all the good pleasure of his goodness , and the work of faith with power :
text2: Ngenxa yalokho siyanikhulekela njalo , ukuze uNkulunkulu wethu anenze nibe ngabafanele ukubizwa kwenu , agcwalise ngamandla konke okuhle enikuthandayo nomsebenzi wokukholwa ,

text: That the name of our Lord Jesus Christ may be glorified in you , and ye in him , according to the grace of our God and the Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: ukuze igama leNkosi yethu uJesu likhazimuliswe kini , nani kuye , ngokomusa kaNkulunkulu wethu noweNkosi uJesu Kristu .

text: Now we beseech you , brethren , by the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ , and by our gathering together unto him ,
text2: Kepha siyanxusa , bazalwane , mayelana nokufika kweNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu nokubuthanela kwethu kuyo ,

text: That ye be not soon shaken in mind , or be troubled , neither by spirit , nor by word , nor by letter as from us , as that the day of Christ is at hand .
text2: ukuba ningasheshi ninyakaziswe engqondweni yenu , ningethuswa noma ngomoya , noma ngezwi , noma ngencwadi ngokungathi ivela kithi , sengathi usuku lukaKristu selufikile .

text: Let no man deceive you by any means : for that day shall not come , except there come a falling away first , and that man of sin be revealed , the son of perdition ;
text2: Makungabikho muntu onikhohlisayo nangayiphi indlela ; ngokuba aluyikufika , kungaveli kuqala ukuhlubuka , kwambulwe umuntu ongenamthetho , indodana yokulahlwa ,

text: Who opposeth and exalteth himself above all that is called God , or that is worshipped ; so that he as God sitteth in the temple of God , shewing himself that he is God .
text2: omelana nakho konke , nozikhukhumeza phezu kwakho konke okuthiwa uNkulunkulu noma into ekhonzwayo , aze azihlalise ethempelini likaNkulunkulu ezishaya uNkulunkulu .

text: Remember ye not , that , when I was yet with you , I told you these things ?
text2: Anikhumbuli yini ukuthi ngisekhona kini nganitshela lokho na ?

text: And now ye know what withholdeth that he might be revealed in his time .
text2: Senikwazi okumbambezelayo , ukuze ambulwe ngesikhathi sakhe .

text: For the mystery of iniquity doth already work : only he who now letteth will let , until he be taken out of the way .
text2: Ngokuba imfihlakalo yokungabi namthetho isiyasebenza , kuphela ukuze kudediswe yena obambezelayo manje .

text: And then shall that Wicked be revealed , whom the Lord shall consume with the spirit of his mouth , and shall destroy with the brightness of his coming :
text2: Lapho - ke uzakwambulwa lowo ongenamthetho , eyakumqeda iNkosi uJesu Kristu ngomoya womlomo wayo , imchithe ngokubonakala kokufika kwayo ,

text: Even him , whose coming is after the working of Satan with all power and signs and lying wonders ,
text2: lowo okufika kwakhe kungokokusebenza kukaSathane ngawo onke amandla , nezibonakaliso , nezimangaliso zamanga ,

text: And with all deceivableness of unrighteousness in them that perish ; because they received not the love of the truth , that they might be saved .
text2: nangayo yonke inkohliso yokungalungi kwababhubhayo , ngenxa yokuba bengavumanga ukuthanda iqiniso , ukuze basindiswe .

text: And for this cause God shall send them strong delusion , that they should believe a lie :
text2: Ngalokho - ke uNkulunkulu ubathumela amandla okuduka , baze bakholwe ngamanga ,

text: That they all might be damned who believed not the truth , but had pleasure in unrighteousness .
text2: ukuba bonke abangakholwanga yiqiniso benamela ukungalungi balahlwe .

text: But we are bound to give thanks alway to God for you , brethren beloved of the Lord , because God hath from the beginning chosen you to salvation through sanctification of the Spirit and belief of the truth :
text2: Kepha thina simelwe ukubonga uNkulunkulu njalo ngani bazalwane abathandwa yiNkosi , ngokuba kwasekuqaleni uNkulunkulu wanikhethela ukusindiswa ngokungcwelisa kukaMoya nangokukholwa yiqiniso

text: Whereunto he called you by our gospel , to the obtaining of the glory of our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: anibizela kukho ngevangeli lethu , nize nizuze inkazimulo yeNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu .

text: Therefore , brethren , stand fast , and hold the traditions which ye have been taught , whether by word , or our epistle .
text2: Ngalokho - ke , bazalwane , yimani niqinile , nibambelele kuwo amasiko enawafundiswa noma ngezwi noma ngencwadi yethu .

text: Now our Lord Jesus Christ himself , and God , even our Father , which hath loved us , and hath given us everlasting consolation and good hope through grace ,
text2: Kepha iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu uqobo , noNkulunkulu uBaba wethu owasithanda nowasipha ngomusa induduzo yaphakade nethemba elihle ,

text: Comfort your hearts , and stablish you in every good word and work .
text2: makaduduze izinhliziyo zenu , aniqinise emisebenzini yonke nasemazwini onke amahle .

text: Finally , brethren , pray for us , that the word of the Lord may have free course , and be glorified , even as it is with you :
text2: Elokugcina , bazalwane , sikhulekeleni ukuba izwi leNkosi likhawuleze , lidunyiswe , njengalokhu kunjalo nakini ,

text: And that we may be delivered from unreasonable and wicked men : for all men have not faith .
text2: nokuba sikhululwe kubantu abadukileyo nababi ; ngokuba ukukholwa akusikho okwabo bonke .

text: But the Lord is faithful , who shall stablish you , and keep you from evil .
text2: Kepha iNkosi ithembekile , eyakuniqinisa , inilondoloze komubi .

text: And we have confidence in the Lord touching you , that ye both do and will do the things which we command you .
text2: Siyethemba eNkosini ngani ukuthi lokhu esiniyala ngakho niyakwenza nokuthi nizakukwenza .

text: And the Lord direct your hearts into the love of God , and into the patient waiting for Christ .
text2: Kepha iNkosi mayiqondise izinhliziyo zenu othandweni lukaNkulunkulu nasekubekezeleni kukaKristu .

text: Now we command you , brethren , in the name of our Lord Jesus Christ , that ye withdraw yourselves from every brother that walketh disorderly , and not after the tradition which he received of us .
text2: Kodwa siyaniyala , bazalwane , egameni leNkosi uJesu Kristu ukuba nizahlukanise nabazalwane bonke abahamba ngokungafanele , bengahambi ngomyalo eniwamukele kithina .

text: For yourselves know how ye ought to follow us : for we behaved not ourselves disorderly among you ;
text2: Ngokuba nani niyazi ngokwenu ukuthi kufanele ukuba nisilingise kanjani , ngokuba asihambanga ngokungafanele phakathi kwenu ,

text: Neither did we eat any man ' s bread for nought ; but wrought with labour and travail night and day , that we might not be chargeable to any of you :
text2: asidlanga sinkwa samuntu ngesihle , kodwa sadla ngokukhandleka nangokukhathazeka , sisebenza ubusuku nemini ukuba singasindi muntu kini ,

text: Not because we have not power , but to make ourselves an ensample unto you to follow us .
text2: kungengokuba singenalo ilungelo , kodwa ukuze sizinikele sibe yisibonelo kini sokuba nisilingise .

text: For even when we were with you , this we commanded you , that if any would not work , neither should he eat .
text2: Ngokuba nalapho sisekini , saniyala ngalokhu ukuthi : “ Uma umuntu engathandi ukusebenza , makangadli . ”

text: For we hear that there are some which walk among you disorderly , working not at all , but are busybodies .
text2: Ngokuba sizwa ukuthi abanye phakathi kwenu bahamba ngokungafanele , bengasebenzi lutho , kepha benza okuyize nje ;

text: Now them that are such we command and exhort by our Lord Jesus Christ , that with quietness they work , and eat their own bread .
text2: abanjalo siyabayala sibaluleka eNkosini uJesu Kristu ukuba basebenze ngokuthula , badle esabo isinkwa .

text: But ye , brethren , be not weary in well doing .
text2: Kepha nina bazalwane , ningadinwa ngukwenza okuhle .

text: And if any man obey not our word by this epistle , note that man , and have no company with him , that he may be ashamed .
text2: Uma ekhona ongalaleli izwi lethu kule ncwadi , mphawuleni lowo , ningahlanganyeli naye , ukuze abe namahloni ;

text: Yet count him not as an enemy , but admonish him as a brother .
text2: kepha ningamphathisi okwesitha , kodwa mlulekeni njengomzalwane .

text: Now the Lord of peace himself give you peace always by all means . The Lord be with you all .
text2: Kepha iNkosi yokuthula uqobo mayiniphe ukuthula ngezikhathi zonke nangezindlela zonke . INkosi mayibe nani nonke .

text: The salutation of Paul with mine own hand , which is the token in every epistle : so I write .
text2: Ngiyakhonza ngesandla sami mina Pawulu , okuluphawu ezincwadini zonke ; ngiloba kanjalo .

text: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all . Amen .
text2: Umusa weNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu mawube nani nonke .

text: Paul , an apostle of Jesus Christ by the commandment of God our Saviour , and Lord Jesus Christ , which is our hope ;
text2: UPawulu , umphostoli kaKristu Jesu ngomyalo kaNkulunkulu uMsindisi wethu noKristu Jesu ithemba lethu ,

text: Unto Timothy , my own son in the faith : Grace , mercy , and peace , from God our Father and Jesus Christ our Lord .
text2: kuThimothewu , umntanami ngesiminya ekukholweni : Makube kuwe umusa , nesihawu , nokuthula okuvela kuNkulunkulu uBaba nakuKristu Jesu iNkosi yethu .

text: As I besought thee to abide still at Ephesus , when I went into Macedonia , that thou mightest charge some that they teach no other doctrine ,
text2: Njengokuba ngakutshela mhla ngiya eMakedoniya ukuthi wohlala e - Efesu , ukuze uyale abathile ngokuthi bangafundisi okwahlukileyo ,

text: Neither give heed to fables and endless genealogies , which minister questions , rather than godly edifying which is in faith : so do .
text2: futhi banganaki izinganekwane nezindaba zolibo olokuzalana ezingapheliyo , ezibanga ukuphikisana kunokuba ziqhube isimiso sikaNkulunkulu esisekukholweni , ngenza njalo namanje ;

text: Now the end of the commandment is charity out of a pure heart , and of a good conscience , and of faith unfeigned :
text2: kepha umgomo womyalo uluthando oluvela enhliziyweni emhlophe , nakunembeza omuhle , nasekukholweni okungazenzisiyo ,

text: From which some having swerved have turned aside unto vain jangling ;
