text: As he saith also in another place , Thou art a priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec .
text2: njengokuba esho nakwenye indawo ngokuthi : “ Wena ungumpristi kuze kube phakade ngokokuma kukaMelkisedeki , ”

text: Who in the days of his flesh , when he had offered up prayers and supplications with strong crying and tears unto him that was able to save him from death , and was heard in that he feared ;
text2: owathi esenikele emihleni yenyama yakhe ngemikhuleko , nokunxusa , nokudazuluka okukhulu , nezinyembezi kuyena onamandla okumsindisa ekufeni , wezwiwa ngenxa yokumesaba uNkulunkulu .

text: Though he were a Son , yet learned he obedience by the things which he suffered ;
text2: Noma eyiNdodana , wafunda ukulalela ngalokho ahlupheka ngakho ;

text: And being made perfect , he became the author of eternal salvation unto all them that obey him ;
text2: esephelelisiwe waba yisisusa sokusindiswa okuphakade kubo bonke abamlalelayo ,

text: Called of God an high priest after the order of Melchisedec .
text2: ebizwa nguNkulunkulu ukuthi umpristi omkhulu ngokokuma kukaMelkisedeki .

text: Of whom we have many things to say , and hard to be uttered , seeing ye are dull of hearing .
text2: Sinokuningi esingakusho ngalokho , okulukhuni ukuchasisela , lokhu senaba buthuntu ekuzweni .

text: For when for the time ye ought to be teachers , ye have need that one teach you again which be the first principles of the oracles of God ; and are become such as have need of milk , and not of strong meat .
text2: Ngokuba noma benifanele ukuba nibe ngabafundisi , uma kuya ngesikhathi , nisadinga futhi ukuba kube khona onifundisa iziqalo zezifundiso zamazwi kaNkulunkulu ; senaba ngabadinga ubisi , kungesikho ukudla okuqinileyo .

text: For every one that useth milk is unskilful in the word of righteousness : for he is a babe .
text2: Ngokuba lowo odla ubisi akakaqondi lutho lwezwi lokulunga , ngokuba uyingane .

text: But strong meat belongeth to them that are of full age , even those who by reason of use have their senses exercised to discern both good and evil .
text2: Kepha ukudla okuqinileyo kungokwabakhulileyo , abathi ngokujwayela ukuwusebenzisa umqondo , sebenawo osulungele ukwahlukanisa okuhle nokubi .

text: Therefore leaving the principles of the doctrine of Christ , let us go on unto perfection ; not laying again the foundation of repentance from dead works , and of faith toward God ,
text2: Ngakho - ke masidlule esifundisweni sokuqala ngoKristu , siqhubekele kokupheleleyo , singabuyi sibeke isisekelo sokuphenduka emisebenzini efileyo , nokukholwa nguNkulunkulu ,

text: Of the doctrine of baptisms , and of laying on of hands , and of resurrection of the dead , and of eternal judgment .
text2: nesifundiso sombhapathizo nokubeka izandla , nokuvuka kwabafileyo nokwahlulelwa okuphakade .

text: And this will we do , if God permit .
text2: Siyakukwenza lokho , uma uNkulunkulu evuma .

text: For it is impossible for those who were once enlightened , and have tasted of the heavenly gift , and were made partakers of the Holy Ghost ,
text2: Ngokuba akunakwenzeka ukuba labo asebake bakhanyiswa banambitha isiphiwo sasezulwini , benziwa abahlanganyeli kuMoya oNgcwele ,

text: And have tasted the good word of God , and the powers of the world to come ,
text2: banambitha izwi elihle likaNkulunkulu namandla ezwe elizayo ,

text: If they shall fall away , to renew them again unto repentance ; seeing they crucify to themselves the Son of God afresh , and put him to an open shame .
text2: babuye bahlubuka — akunakwenzeka ukuba babuye bavuswe , baphenduke , lokhu sebezibethelela iNdodana kaNkulunkulu , bayithela ngehlazo obala .

text: For the earth which drinketh in the rain that cometh oft upon it , and bringeth forth herbs meet for them by whom it is dressed , receiveth blessing from God :
text2: Ngokuba umhlabathi , ophuze imvula efika kaningi phezu kwawo , umilisa imifino ebasizayo abawulinyelwayo , uyabusiswa nguNkulunkulu ;

text: But that which beareth thorns and briers is rejected , and is nigh unto cursing ; whose end is to be burned .
text2: kepha uma uveza ameva nekhakhasi , uyaleka , useduze nokuqalekiswa , ukuphela kwawo ngukushiswa .

text: But , beloved , we are persuaded better things of you , and things that accompany salvation , though we thus speak .
text2: Kepha siyethemba ngani bathandekayo okuhle kunalokho , ngisho okuqondene nokusindiswa , noma sikhuluma kanje .

text: For God is not unrighteous to forget your work and labour of love , which ye have shewed toward his name , in that ye have ministered to the saints , and do minister .
text2: Ngokuba uNkulunkulu kasiye ongalungile ukuba akhohlwe umsebenzi wenu nothando enalubonakalisa ngakulo igama lakhe , lokhu nibakhonzile abangcwele , nisabakhonza .

text: And we desire that every one of you do shew the same diligence to the full assurance of hope unto the end :
text2: Kepha sinxanela ukuba yilowo nalowo kini abonakalise lokho kukhuthalela , lize liphelele ithemba kuze kube sekupheleni ,

text: That ye be not slothful , but followers of them who through faith and patience inherit the promises .
text2: ukuba ningabi buthuntu , kodwa nibalingise labo abadla ifa lesithembiso ngokukholwa nangokubekezela .

text: For when God made promise to Abraham , because he could swear by no greater , he sware by himself ,
text2: Ngokuba lapho uNkulunkulu wamthembisa u - Abrahama , wazifunga yena , lokhu kungekho omkhulu kunaye angamfunga ,

text: Saying , Surely blessing I will bless thee , and multiplying I will multiply thee .
text2: wathi : “ Impela ngiyakukubusisa nokukubusisa , ngiyakukwandisa nokukwandisa , ”

text: And so , after he had patiently endured , he obtained the promise .
text2: kanjalo kwathi esebekezele , wakuzuza okwathenjiswayo .

text: For men verily swear by the greater : and an oath for confirmation is to them an end of all strife .
text2: Ngokuba abantu bafunga omkhulu kunabo ; kubona isifungo siyaqeda ukuphikisana konke , siqinise .

text: Wherein God , willing more abundantly to shew unto the heirs of promise the immutability of his counsel , confirmed it by an oath :
text2: Kulokhu - ke uNkulunkulu , ethanda kakhulu impela ukubonisa izindlalifa zesithembiso ukungaguquleki kwecebo lakhe , walamula ngesifungo ,

text: That by two immutable things , in which it was impossible for God to lie , we might have a strong consolation , who have fled for refuge to lay hold upon the hope set before us :
text2: ukuze ngezinto ezimbili ezingeguquleke , uNkulunkulu angeqambe amanga ngazo , sibe nenduduzo enamandla thina esibalekele ekulibambeni ithemba esilimiselweyo ,

text: Which hope we have as an anchor of the soul , both sure and stedfast , and which entereth into that within the veil ;
text2: esinalo njengehange lomphefumulo , liqinile , ligxilile , lingena kokungaphakathi kwesihenqo ,

text: Whither the forerunner is for us entered , even Jesus , made an high priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec .
text2: lapho uJesu eyisigijimi sokusandulela wangena khona , esewaba ngumpristi omkhulu kuze kube phakade ngokokuma kukaMelkisedeki .

text: For this Melchisedec , king of Salem , priest of the most high God , who met Abraham returning from the slaughter of the kings , and blessed him ;
text2: Ngokuba uMelkisedeki lo , inkosi yaseSalema , umpristi kaNkulunkulu oPhezukonke , owahlangabeza u - Abrahama mhla ebuya ekubulaleni amakhosi , wambusisa ;

text: To whom also Abraham gave a tenth part of all ; first being by interpretation King of righteousness , and after that also King of Salem , which is , King of peace ;
text2: u - Abrahama wamabela okweshumi kukho konke yena ogama lakhe lithi kuqala ukuhunyushwa kwalo inkosi yokulunga , bese kuba yinkosi yaseSalema , okungukuthi inkosi yokuthula ,

text: Without father , without mother , without descent , having neither beginning of days , nor end of life ; but made like unto the Son of God ; abideth a priest continually .
text2: engenayise , engenanina , engenaluzalo , engenakuqala kwezinsuku nakuphela kokuphila , kepha efaniswe neNdodana kaNkulunkulu , uhlala engumpristi njalonjalo .

text: Now consider how great this man was , unto whom even the patriarch Abraham gave the tenth of the spoils .
text2: Qondani - ke ukuthi ungakanani yena owanikwa okweshumi kwempango ngu - Abrahama ukhokho .

text: And verily they that are of the sons of Levi , who receive the office of the priesthood , have a commandment to take tithes of the people according to the law , that is , of their brethren , though they come out of the loins of Abraham :
text2: Nalabo bamadodana kaLevi abamukeliswa ubupristi banomyalo wokuthatha okweshumi kubantu ngokomthetho , okungukuthi kubafowabo , ingani baphume okhalweni luka - Abrahama ;

text: But he whose descent is not counted from them received tithes of Abraham , and blessed him that had the promises .
text2: kepha yena ongabalwa ozalweni lwabo uthathile okweshumi ku - Abrahama , wambusisa lowo onezithembiso .

text: And without all contradiction the less is blessed of the better .
text2: Kepha akunakuphikwa ukuthi omncinyane ubusiswa ngomkhulu .

text: And here men that die receive tithes ; but there he receiveth them , of whom it is witnessed that he liveth .
text2: Lapha - ke abantu abafayo bamukeliswa okweshumi , kepha lapho ngofakazelwa ukuthi uyaphila .

text: And as I may so say , Levi also , who receiveth tithes , payed tithes in Abraham .
text2: Futhi kungathiwa noLevi owamukela okweshumi watheliswa okweshumi ngaye u - Abrahama ,

text: For he was yet in the loins of his father , when Melchisedec met him .
text2: ngokuba wayesesokhalweni lukayise mzukwana uMelkisedeki emhlangabeza .

text: If therefore perfection were by the Levitical priesthood , ( for under it the people received the law , ) what further need was there that another priest should rise after the order of Melchisedec , and not be called after the order of Aaron ?
text2: Uma - ke kwakukhona ukuphelela ngobupristi bukaLevi ngokuba isizwe samiselwa bona ngomthetho — kwakusaswelekelani ukuba kuvele omunye umpristi ngokukaMelkisedeki engabizwa ngokokuma kuka - Aroni na ?

text: For the priesthood being changed , there is made of necessity a change also of the law .
text2: Ngokuba uma ubupristi buguquliwe , kuyadingeka ukuba kuguqulwe nomthetho .

text: For he of whom these things are spoken pertaineth to another tribe , of which no man gave attendance at the altar .
text2: Kepha lowo okushiwo lokho ngaye ungowesinye isizwe okungabanga bikho kuso umuntu owake wakhonza e - altare .

text: For it is evident that our Lord sprang out of Juda ; of which tribe Moses spake nothing concerning priesthood .
text2: Ngokuba kusobala ukuthi iNkosi yethu ivele kuJuda , isizwe uMose angakhulumanga lutho ngaso ngobupristi .

text: And it is yet far more evident : for that after the similitude of Melchisedec there ariseth another priest ,
text2: Ikakhulu kusobala lokho , uma kumiswa omunye umpristi ofana noMelkisedeki ,

text: Who is made , not after the law of a carnal commandment , but after the power of an endless life .
text2: ongamiswanga ngomthetho womyalo wenyama kodwa ngamandla okuphila okungabhubhiyo .

text: For he testifieth , Thou art a priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec .
text2: Ngokuba kufakazwa ngaye ukuthi : “ Wena ungumpristi kuze kube phakade ngokokuma kukaMelkisedeki . ”

text: For there is verily a disannulling of the commandment going before for the weakness and unprofitableness thereof .
text2: Ngokuba umthetho wokuqala uyachithwa ngenxa yobuthakathaka bawo nokungasizi kwawo ,

text: For the law made nothing perfect , but the bringing in of a better hope did ; by the which we draw nigh unto God .
text2: lokhu umthetho awuphelelisanga lutho , kepha sekungeniswa ithemba elingcono , esisondela ngalo kuNkulunkulu .

text: And inasmuch as not without an oath he was made priest :
text2: Futhi ngalokho ukuthi akubanga ngaphandle kokufunga — ngokuba labo kambe babekwa babe ngabapristi ngaphandle kokufunga ,

text: ( For those priests were made without an oath ; but this with an oath by him that said unto him , The Lord sware and will not repent , Thou art a priest for ever after the order of Melchisedec : )
text2: kepha yena wabekwa ngokufunga nguye owasho kuye ukuthi : “ INkosi yafunga , ayiyikuzisola , yathi : ‘ Wena ungumpristi kuze kube phakade . ’ ”

text: By so much was Jesus made a surety of a better testament .
text2: Ngokungakho - ke uJesu waba yisiboniso sesivumelwano esingcono .

text: And they truly were many priests , because they were not suffered to continue by reason of death :
text2: Kulabo - ke baba baningi ababekwa babe ngabapristi , ngokuba bathiyeka ngenxa yokufa ukuba baqhube njalo ;

text: But this man , because he continueth ever , hath an unchangeable priesthood .
text2: kepha yena , ngenxa yokuba ehlala phakade , unobupristi obungenakuguquka ;

text: Wherefore he is able also to save them to the uttermost that come unto God by him , seeing he ever liveth to make intercession for them .
text2: ngakho - ke unamandla okusindisa ngokupheleleyo abeza kuNkulunkulu ngaye , lokhu ephilela njalo ukubamela .

text: For such an high priest became us , who is holy , harmless , undefiled , separate from sinners , and made higher than the heavens ;
text2: Ngokuba umpristi omkhulu onjalo usifanele thina , ongcwele , ongenacala , ongenabala , owahlukanisiwe nezoni , owenziwa aphakame phezu kwamazulu ,

text: Who needeth not daily , as those high priests , to offer up sacrifice , first for his own sins , and then for the people ' s : for this he did once , when he offered up himself .
text2: ongadingi imihla ngemihla njengalabo bapristi abakhulu ukunikela ngemihlatshelo ngenxa yezakhe izono kuqala nangasemuva ngenxa yezabantu ; ngokuba wenza lokho kanye mhla ezinikela yena .

text: For the law maketh men high priests which have infirmity ; but the word of the oath , which was since the law , maketh the Son , who is consecrated for evermore .
text2: Ngokuba umthetho umisa abantu babe ngabapristi abakhulu abanobuthakathaka , kepha izwi lesifungo elalandela umthetho limisa iNdodana epheleliswe kuze kube phakade .

text: Now of the things which we have spoken this is the sum : We have such an high priest , who is set on the right hand of the throne of the Majesty in the heavens ;
text2: Kepha okuyindikimba kwesikushoyo yilokhu : sinompristi omkhulu onjalo osewahlala ngakwesokunene sesihlalo sobukhosi soMkhulu emazulwini ,

text: A minister of the sanctuary , and of the true tabernacle , which the Lord pitched , and not man .
text2: isikhonzi sokungcwele nesetabernakele lempela elamiswa yiNkosi kungemuntu .

text: For every high priest is ordained to offer gifts and sacrifices : wherefore it is of necessity that this man have somewhat also to offer .
text2: Ngokuba yilowo nalowo mpristi omkhulu umiselwa ukunikela ngeminikelo nemihlatshelo ; ngakho - ke kuyadingeka ukuba naye lo abe nakho okuthile kokunikela .

text: For if he were on earth , he should not be a priest , seeing that there are priests that offer gifts according to the law :
text2: Ngokuba uma ebesemhlabeni , ubengayikuba ngumpristi nakanye , ngokuba bakhona abapristi abanikela ngeminikelo ngomthetho ,

text: Who serve unto the example and shadow of heavenly things , as Moses was admonished of God when he was about to make the tabernacle : for , See , saith he , that thou make all things according to the pattern shewed to thee in the mount .
text2: bekhonza okungumfanekiso nesithunzi sokwasezulwini , njengokuba uMose wayalwa esezakwenza itabernakele ngokuthi : “ Bheka , wokwenza konke ngesifanekiso owaboniswa sona entabeni , ”

text: But now hath he obtained a more excellent ministry , by how much also he is the mediator of a better covenant , which was established upon better promises .
text2: kepha kalokhu unikiwe inkonzo enhle kakhulu , njengalokhu engumlamuleli wesivumelwano esihle kakhulu , esimisiwe ngokwezithembiso ezinhle kakhulu .

text: For if that first covenant had been faultless , then should no place have been sought for the second .
text2: Ngokuba uma leso sivumelwano sokuqala besingasoleki , bekungayikufunwa indawo yesibili .

text: For finding fault with them , he saith , Behold , the days come , saith the Lord , when I will make a new covenant with the house of Israel and with the house of Judah :
text2: Ngokuba lapho ebasolayo , uthi kubo : “ Bhekani , izinsuku ziyeza , isho iNkosi , lapho ngiyakwenza isivumelwano esisha nendlu ka - Israyeli , nendlu kaJuda ,

text: Not according to the covenant that I made with their fathers in the day when I took them by the hand to lead them out of the land of Egypt ; because they continued not in my covenant , and I regarded them not , saith the Lord .
text2: kungenjengesivumelwano engasenzayo nawoyise mhla ngibabamba ngesandla ukubakhipha ezweni laseGibithe , ngokuba abahlalanga esivumelwaneni sami , nami angibanakanga , isho iNkosi .

text: For this is the covenant that I will make with the house of Israel after those days , saith the Lord ; I will put my laws into their mind , and write them in their hearts : and I will be to them a God , and they shall be to me a people :
text2: Ngokuba yilesi esiyisivumelwano engiyakusenza nendlu ka - Israyeli emva kwalezo zinsuku , isho iNkosi : ngiyakufaka imithetho yami engqondweni yabo , ngiyilobe ezinhliziyweni zabo , ngibe nguNkulunkulu wabo , bona babe ngabantu bami .

text: And they shall not teach every man his neighbour , and every man his brother , saying , Know the Lord : for all shall know me , from the least to the greatest .
text2: Abasayikufundisa kube yilowo nalowo owakubo , nalowo umfowabo , ngokuthi : ‘ Yazi INkosi ; ’ ngokuba bonke bayakungazi , kusukela komncane kuze kufike komkhulu wabo .

text: For I will be merciful to their unrighteousness , and their sins and their iniquities will I remember no more .
text2: Ngokuba ngiyakuba nesihawu ngokungalungi kwabo , nezono zabo angisayikuzikhumbula . ”

text: In that he saith , A new covenant , he hath made the first old . Now that which decayeth and waxeth old is ready to vanish away .
text2: Ngokusho lokho ukuthi : “ Esisha , ” uthe esokuqala sigugile ; kepha okugugayo osekukudala kuseduze nokunyamalala .

text: Then verily the first covenant had also ordinances of divine service , and a worldly sanctuary .
text2: Kepha nesivumelwano sokuqala kambe sasinezimiso zenkonzo nendlu engcwele yasezweni .

text: For there was a tabernacle made ; the first , wherein was the candlestick , and the table , and the shewbread ; which is called the sanctuary .
text2: Ngokuba kwakhiwa itabernakele lokuqala okwakukhona kulo uthi lwezibani , netafula , nezinkwa zokubukwa , okuthiwa elingcwele ;

text: And after the second veil , the tabernacle which is called the Holiest of all ;
text2: ngasemva kwesihenqo sesibili kwakukhona itabernakele elithiwa elingcwelengcwele ,

text: Which had the golden censer , and the ark of the covenant overlaid round about with gold , wherein was the golden pot that had manna , and Aaron ' s rod that budded , and the tables of the covenant ;
text2: eline - altare legolide lokuthunqisa nomphongolo wesivumelwano umboziwe ngegolide nxazonke , okwakukhona kuwo isitsha segolide esiphethe imana , nenduku ka - Aroni eyahlumayo , nezibhebhe zesivumelwano ;

text: And over it the cherubims of glory shadowing the mercyseat ; of which we cannot now speak particularly .
text2: phezu kwawo kwakukhona amakherubi enkazimulo engamele isihlalo somusa , okungenakukhulunywa ngakho ngakunye manje .

text: Now when these things were thus ordained , the priests went always into the first tabernacle , accomplishing the service of God .
text2: Kepha lezo zinto zilungisiwe ngokunjalo , abapristi bangena njalo etabernakele lokuqala befeza izinkonzo ,

text: But into the second went the high priest alone once every year , not without blood , which he offered for himself , and for the errors of the people :
text2: kodwa kwelesibili kungena umpristi omkhulu yedwa kanye ngomnyaka , kungengaphandle kwegazi anikela ngalo ngenxa yakhe uqobo nangenxa yezono zabantu ,

text: The Holy Ghost this signifying , that the way into the holiest of all was not yet made manifest , while as the first tabernacle was yet standing :
text2: uMoya oNgcwele etshengisa lokhu ukuthi ayikabonakaliswa indlela eya endaweni engcwele , lisemi itabernakele lokuqala ,

text: Which was a figure for the time then present , in which were offered both gifts and sacrifices , that could not make him that did the service perfect , as pertaining to the conscience ;
text2: elona lingumfanekiso kulesi sikhathi samanje , okulethwa ngawo iminikelo nemihlatshelo engenakumenza okhonzayo aphelele maqondana nonembeza ,

text: Which stood only in meats and drinks , and divers washings , and carnal ordinances , imposed on them until the time of reformation .
text2: kodwa yona kanye nokudla nokuphuza nokugeza okuyizinhlobonhlobo iyizimiso zenyama kuphela ezibekiweyo , kuze kufike isikhathi sokupheleliswa kwezinto .

text: But Christ being come an high priest of good things to come , by a greater and more perfect tabernacle , not made with hands , that is to say , not of this building ;
text2: Kepha lokhu uKristu esefikile , engumpristi omkhulu wezinto ezinhle ezizayo , wadabula itabernakele elikhulu neliphelele kunalelo , elingenziwanga ngezandla , okungukuthi elingesilo lalokhu kudalwa ,

text: Neither by the blood of goats and calves , but by his own blood he entered in once into the holy place , having obtained eternal redemption for us .
text2: wangena kanye kuphela endaweni engcwele , kungengegazi lezimbuzi nelamathole kepha ngegazi lakhe , ezuzile ukukhululwa okuphakade .

text: For if the blood of bulls and of goats , and the ashes of an heifer sprinkling the unclean , sanctifieth to the purifying of the flesh :
text2: Ngokuba uma igazi lezimbuzi nelezinkunzi nomlotha wesithole kufafaza abangcolileyo , kuhlambulula kube ngukuhlanzeka kwenyama ,

text: How much more shall the blood of Christ , who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without spot to God , purge your conscience from dead works to serve the living God ?
text2: kakhulu kangakanani igazi likaKristu owazinikela kuNkulunkulu ngoMoya ophakade engenacala lizakuhlanza unembeza wethu emisebenzini efileyo , ukuze sikhonze uNkulunkulu ophilayo .

text: And for this cause he is the mediator of the new testament , that by means of death , for the redemption of the transgressions that were under the first testament , they which are called might receive the promise of eternal inheritance .
text2: Ngalokho - ke ungumlamuleli wesivumelwano esisha , kuze kuthi ngokufa okungenxa yokukhululwa eziphambekweni zesivumelwano sokuqala ababiziweyo bazuze ifa eliphakade elathenjiswayo .

text: For where a testament is , there must also of necessity be the death of the testator .
text2: Ngokuba lapho kukhona itestamente , kufuneka ukuba kubikwe ukufa kowalenzayo ;

text: For a testament is of force after men are dead : otherwise it is of no strength at all while the testator liveth .
text2: ngokuba itestamente lisebenza sekufiwe , ngokuba alize lingaba namandla esekhona owalenzayo .

text: Whereupon neither the first testament was dedicated without blood .
text2: Ngalokho - ke isivumelwano sokuqala asimiswanga ngaphandle kwegazi .

text: For when Moses had spoken every precept to all the people according to the law , he took the blood of calves and of goats , with water , and scarlet wool , and hyssop , and sprinkled both the book , and all the people ,
text2: Ngokuba isikhulunyiwe imiyalelo yonke ngokomthetho nguMose kubantu bonke , wayesethatha igazi lamathole nelezimbuzi kanye namanzi noboya obubomvu nehisopi , wafafaza incwadi nabantu bonke ,

text: Saying , This is the blood of the testament which God hath enjoined unto you .
text2: ethi : “ Lokhu kuyigazi lesivumelwano aniyale ngaso uNkulunkulu . ”

text: Moreover he sprinkled with blood both the tabernacle , and all the vessels of the ministry .
text2: Netabernakele futhi , nezitsha zonke zenkonzo wakufafaza kanjalo ngegazi .

text: And almost all things are by the law purged with blood ; and without shedding of blood is no remission .
text2: Yebo , cishe zonke izinto zihlanjululwa ngegazi ngokomthetho ; ngaphandle kokuchitha igazi akukho ukuthethelelwa .

text: It was therefore necessary that the patterns of things in the heavens should be purified with these ; but the heavenly things themselves with better sacrifices than these .
text2: Njalo - ke kwakudingekile ukuba imifanekiso yokusezulwini ihlanzwe ngalokho , kepha okusezulwini uqobo lwakho kuhlanzwe ngeminikelo emihle kunalena .

text: For Christ is not entered into the holy places made with hands , which are the figures of the true ; but into heaven itself , now to appear in the presence of God for us :
text2: Ngokuba uKristu kangenanga endaweni engcwele eyenziwe ngezandla , engumfanekiso waleyo okuyiyo ngempela , kepha wangena ezulwini uqobo ukuba manje abonakale ebusweni bukaNkulunkulu ngenxa yethu ,

text: Nor yet that he should offer himself often , as the high priest entereth into the holy place every year with blood of others ;
text2: kungesikho futhi ukuba azinikele kaningi , njengalokhu umpristi omkhulu engena endaweni engcwele iminyaka ngeminyaka , ephethe igazi elingesilo elakhe ;

text: For then must he often have suffered since the foundation of the world : but now once in the end of the world hath he appeared to put away sin by the sacrifice of himself .
text2: uma kwakunjalo wayemelwe ukuhlupheka kaningi selokhu kwasekelwa izwe ; kodwa kalokhu ubonakalisiwe kanye ekupheleni kwezikhathi ukuba asuse izono ngokuzinikela kwakhe .

text: And as it is appointed unto men once to die , but after this the judgment :
text2: Futhi njengalokhu kumiselwe abantu ukuba bafe kanye , emva kwalokhu ukwahlulelwa ,

text: So Christ was once offered to bear the sins of many ; and unto them that look for him shall he appear the second time without sin unto salvation .
text2: kunjalo noKristu , esenikelwe kanye ukuba athwale izono zabaningi , uyakubonakala ngokwesibili ngaphandle kwesono kulabo abamlindeleyo , kube ngukusindiswa .

text: For the law having a shadow of good things to come , and not the very image of the things , can never with those sacrifices which they offered year by year continually make the comers thereunto perfect .
text2: Ngokuba lokhu umthetho unesithunzi sezinto ezinhle ezizayo , ungesiwo umfanekiso wazo uqobo , ungeze waba namandla ngemihlatshelo enikelwa njalonjalo iminyaka ngeminyaka ukubenza baphelele labo abasondelayo ;

text: For then would they not have ceased to be offered ? because that the worshippers once purged should have had no more conscience of sins .
text2: uma kwakungenjalo , nga ingayekwanga ukunikelwa na ? lokhu phela abakhonzayo sebehlanjululwe kanye babengasayikuba novalo ngezono .

text: But in those sacrifices there is a remembrance again made of sins every year .
text2: Kodwa kuleyo mihlatshelo kukhona ukukhunjulwa kwezono iminyaka ngeminyaka ;

text: For it is not possible that the blood of bulls and of goats should take away sins .
text2: ngokuba akunakwenzeka ukuba igazi lezinkunzi nelezimbuzi lisuse izono .

text: Wherefore when he cometh into the world , he saith , Sacrifice and offering thou wouldest not , but a body hast thou prepared me :
text2: Ngalokho - ke esefika ezweni uthi : “ Umhlatshelo nomnikelo awuwuthandanga , kodwa ungilungisele umzimba .

text: In burnt offerings and sacrifices for sin thou hast had no pleasure .
text2: Iminikelo yokushiswa nemihlatshelo ngenxa yesono awuyithokozelanga .

text: Then said I , Lo , I come ( in the volume of the book it is written of me , ) to do thy will , O God .
text2: Ngase ngithi : ‘ Bheka , ngiyeza — emqulwini wencwadi kulotshiwe ngami — ukuba ngiyenze , Nkulunkulu , intando yakho . ’ ”

text: Above when he said , Sacrifice and offering and burnt offerings and offering for sin thou wouldest not , neither hadst pleasure therein ; which are offered by the law ;
text2: Eseshilo ngasenhla ukuthi : “ Imihlatshelo , neminikelo , neminikelo yokushiswa , nemihlatshelo ngenxa yezono awuyithandanga , awuyithokozelanga , ” eyona ilethwa ngokomthetho ,

text: Then said he , Lo , I come to do thy will , O God . He taketh away the first , that he may establish the second .
text2: ubuye wathi : “ Bheka , ngiyeza ukwenza intando yakho . ” Ususa okokuqala , ukuze amise okwesibili .

text: By the which will we are sanctified through the offering of the body of Jesus Christ once for all .
text2: Ngaleyo ntando singcwelisiwe ngokunikelwa komzimba kaJesu Kristu kanye kuphela .

text: And every priest standeth daily ministering and offering oftentimes the same sacrifices , which can never take away sins :
text2: Abapristi bonke kambe bemi bekhonza imihla ngemihla , benikela kaningi ngayona leyo mihlatshelo engasoze yaba namandla okususa izono ;

text: But this man , after he had offered one sacrifice for sins for ever , sat down on the right hand of God ;
text2: kepha yena , esenikele ngomhlatshelo waba munye ngenxa yezono , wahlala phakade ngakwesokunene sikaNkulunkulu ,

text: From henceforth expecting till his enemies be made his footstool .
text2: usalindele izitha zakhe zize zenziwe isenabelo sezinyawo zakhe .

text: For by one offering he hath perfected for ever them that are sanctified .
text2: Ngokuba ngomnikelo munye uphelelise njalonjalo labo abangcwelisiweyo .

text: Whereof the Holy Ghost also is a witness to us : for after that he had said before ,
text2: Kepha noMoya oNgcwele uyafakaza kithina , ngokuba emva kokusho kwakhe ukuthi :

text: This is the covenant that I will make with them after those days , saith the Lord , I will put my laws into their hearts , and in their minds will I write them ;
text2: “ Yilesi sivumelwano engizakusenza nabo , emva kwalezo zinsuku , isho iNkosi : Ngiyakufaka imithetho yami ezinhliziyweni zabo , ngiyilobe engqondweni yabo ,

text: And their sins and iniquities will I remember no more .
text2: nezono zabo nobubi babo angisoze ngakukhumbula futhi . ”

text: Now where remission of these is , there is no more offering for sin .
text2: Kepha lapho kukhona ukuthethelelwa kwalokho , akusadingeki ukunikela ngenxa yesono .

text: Having therefore , brethren , boldness to enter into the holiest by the blood of Jesus ,
text2: Ngakho - ke , bazalwane , njengokuba sinesibindi sokungena endaweni engcwele ngegazi likaJesu

text: By a new and living way , which he hath consecrated for us , through the veil , that is to say , his flesh ;
text2: ngendlela asivulela yona , indlela entsha ephilayo , edabula isihenqo , okungukuthi inyama yakhe ,

text: And having an high priest over the house of God ;
text2: sinompristi omkhulu wendlu kaNkulunkulu ,

text: Let us draw near with a true heart in full assurance of faith , having our hearts sprinkled from an evil conscience , and our bodies washed with pure water .
text2: masisondele ngenhliziyo eqinisileyo ngokwethemba okupheleleyo kokukholwa , zifafaziwe izinhliziyo zethu kungasekho valo lokubi , umzimba wethu ugeziwe ngamanzi acwebileyo ;

text: Let us hold fast the profession of our faith without wavering ; ( for he is faithful that promised ; )
text2: masibambisise isivumo sethemba lethu singaxegi , ngokuba ukholekile lowo owethembisayo ;

text: And let us consider one another to provoke unto love and to good works :
text2: masiqaphelane , ukuze kuvuswe uthando nemisebenzi emihle ,

text: Not forsaking the assembling of ourselves together , as the manner of some is ; but exhorting one another : and so much the more , as ye see the day approaching .
text2: singakuyeki ukuhlangana kwethu njengomkhuba wabanye , kepha masivuselelane , ikakhulu njengokuba nibona usuku lusondela .

text: For if we sin wilfully after that we have received the knowledge of the truth , there remaineth no more sacrifice for sins ,
text2: Ngokuba uma sona ngamabomu emva kokuba sesamukele ukwazi kweqiniso , akusekho umnikelo ngezono ,

text: But a certain fearful looking for of judgment and fiery indignation , which shall devour the adversaries .
text2: kepha kuphela ukulindela okwesabekayo ukwahlulelwa nomlilo oshisayo ozakuqeda amaphikankani .

text: He that despised Moses ' law died without mercy under two or three witnesses :
text2: Odelele umthetho kaMose uyakufa engahawukelwa ngezwi lawofakazi ababili noma bebathathu ;

text: Of how much sorer punishment , suppose ye , shall he be thought worthy , who hath trodden under foot the Son of God , and hath counted the blood of the covenant , wherewith he was sanctified , an unholy thing , and hath done despite unto the Spirit of grace ?
text2: pho , nithi ufanele ukushaywa kangakanani kunalokho lowo onyathele phansi iNdodana kaNkulunkulu , wadelela igazi lesivumelwano angcweliswa ngalo , wahlambalaza uMoya womusa , na ?

text: For we know him that hath said , Vengeance belongeth unto me , I will recompense , saith the Lord . And again , The Lord shall judge his people .
text2: Ngokuba siyamazi owathi : “ Ngeyami impindiselo , yimina engiyakubuyisela , ” futhi - ke : “ INkosi iyakubahlulela abantu bayo . ”

text: It is a fearful thing to fall into the hands of the living God .
text2: Kuyesabeka ukuwela ezandleni zikaNkulunkulu ophilayo .

text: But call to remembrance the former days , in which , after ye were illuminated , ye endured a great fight of afflictions ;
text2: Kepha khumbulani izinsuku zakuqala okwathi ngazo senikhanyisiwe nakhuthazela empini enkulu yezinhlupheko ,

text: Partly , whilst ye were made a gazingstock both by reproaches and afflictions ; and partly , whilst ye became companions of them that were so used .
text2: kokunye ngokuba ngumbukwane ngezinhlamba nangezimbandezeko , kokunye ngokuba ngabahlanganyeli nababephathwa kanjalo .

text: For ye had compassion of me in my bonds , and took joyfully the spoiling of your goods , knowing in yourselves that ye have in heaven a better and an enduring substance .
text2: Ngokuba nazwelana nababoshiweyo , navuma ngokuthokoza ukuphangwa kwempahla yenu , nazi ukuthi nina ninempahla enhle kunaleyo , nemiyo njalo .

text: Cast not away therefore your confidence , which hath great recompence of reward .
text2: Ngakho - ke maningalahli isibindi senu esinomvuzo omkhulu .

text: For ye have need of patience , that , after ye have done the will of God , ye might receive the promise .
text2: Ngokuba nidinga ukubekezela , ukuze seniyenzile intando kaNkulunkulu namukele isithembiso .

text: For yet a little while , and he that shall come will come , and will not tarry .
text2: Ngokuba kuse yisikhashana nje , ozayo uyeza , akayikulibala ;

text: Now the just shall live by faith : but if any man draw back , my soul shall have no pleasure in him .
text2: kepha olungileyo wami uyakuphila ngokukholwa ; kepha uma ehlehla nyovane , umphefumulo wami awunakuthokoza ngaye .

text: But we are not of them who draw back unto perdition ; but of them that believe to the saving of the soul .
text2: Kepha thina asisibo abokuhlehlela ekubhujisweni , kodwa singabokukholwa , kuze kube ngukusindiswa komphefumulo .

text: Now faith is the substance of things hoped for , the evidence of things not seen .
text2: Kepha ukukholwa kungukuqiniseka ngezinto ezithenjwayo , kuyiqiniso ngezinto ezingabonwayo .

text: For by it the elders obtained a good report .
text2: Ngokuba okhokho bafakazelwa ngakho .

text: Through faith we understand that the worlds were framed by the word of God , so that things which are seen were not made of things which do appear .
text2: Ngokukholwa siqonda ukuthi izwe lonke ladatshulwa ngezwi likaNkulunkulu , kuze kuthi okubonwayo akuvelanga kokubonwayo .

text: By faith Abel offered unto God a more excellent sacrifice than Cain , by which he obtained witness that he was righteous , God testifying of his gifts : and by it he being dead yet speaketh .
text2: Ngokukholwa u - Abela wanikela kuNkulunkulu ngomhlatshelo omuhle kunoKayini , athola ngakho ubufakazi bokuthi ulungile , uNkulunkulu uqobo efakaza ngezipho zakhe ; nangakho usakhuluma , noma efile .

text: By faith Enoch was translated that he should not see death ; and was not found , because God had translated him : for before his translation he had this testimony , that he pleased God .
text2: Ngokukholwa u - Enoke wathathwa , ukuze angaboni ukufa , akabe esafunyanwa , ngokuba uNkulunkulu wayemthabathile . Ngokuba engakathathwa ufakazelwe ukuthi wayethokozisa uNkulunkulu ;

text: But without faith it is impossible to please him : for he that cometh to God must believe that he is , and that he is a rewarder of them that diligently seek him .
text2: kepha - ke ngaphandle kokukholwa akwenzeki ukumthokozisa ; ngokuba ozayo kuNkulunkulu umelwe ukukholwa ukuthi ukhona nokuthi ungumvuzi walabo abamfunayo .

text: By faith Noah , being warned of God of things not seen as yet , moved with fear , prepared an ark to the saving of his house ; by the which he condemned the world , and became heir of the righteousness which is by faith .
text2: Ngokukholwa uNowa exwayisiwe ngezinto ebezingakabonwa , esaba uNkulunkulu , wakha umkhumbi wokusindisa indlu yakhe , okungakho walahla izwe , waba yindlalifa yokulunga okuvela ngokukholwa .

text: By faith Abraham , when he was called to go out into a place which he should after receive for an inheritance , obeyed ; and he went out , not knowing whither he went .
text2: Ngokukholwa u - Abrahama walalela ebizwa ukuba aphume aye endaweni abezakuyamukeliswa ibe yifa lakhe ; waphuma engazi lapho eya khona .

text: By faith he sojourned in the land of promise , as in a strange country , dwelling in tabernacles with Isaac and Jacob , the heirs with him of the same promise :
text2: Ngokukholwa waba ngumfokazi ezweni lesithembiso kwangathi ngelezizwe , ehlala ematendeni , beno - Isaka noJakobe , beyizindlalifa kanye naye zaleso sithembiso ,

text: For he looked for a city which hath foundations , whose builder and maker is God .
text2: ngokuba wayebheke umuzi onezisekelo , omakhi nomenzi wawo nguNkulunkulu .

text: Through faith also Sara herself received strength to conceive seed , and was delivered of a child when she was past age , because she judged him faithful who had promised .
text2: Ngokukholwa naye uSara uqobo wathola amandla okukhulelwa esedlulelwe yisikhathi , ngokuba wathi ukholekile owethembisayo .

text: Therefore sprang there even of one , and him as good as dead , so many as the stars of the sky in multitude , and as the sand which is by the sea shore innumerable .
text2: Ngakho - ke kwavela koyedwa , yena enjengosewafa , abangangezinkanyezi zezulu ngobuningi , bengangesihlabathi esisogwini lolwandle esingenakubalwa .

text: These all died in faith , not having received the promises , but having seen them afar off , and were persuaded of them , and embraced them , and confessed that they were strangers and pilgrims on the earth .
text2: Bonke laba bafa bekholiwe , bengazamukeliswanga izithembiso , kepha bezibonile , bezithakazele zikude , bevumile ukuthi bangabafokazi nezihambi emhlabeni .

text: For they that say such things declare plainly that they seek a country .
text2: Ngokuba abasho kanjalo babonakalisa ukuthi bafuna izwe lakubo .

text: And truly , if they had been mindful of that country from whence they came out , they might have had opportunity to have returned .
text2: Uma kambe bebecabanga ngalelo ababephuma kulo , bebeyakuba nethuba lokubuyela kulo ;

text: But now they desire a better country , that is , an heavenly : wherefore God is not ashamed to be called their God : for he hath prepared for them a city .
text2: kepha manje balangazelela elihle kunalelo , okungukuthi elasezulwini . Ngalokho uNkulunkulu akanamahloni ngabo ukuba abizwe ngokuthi uNkulunkulu wabo , ngokuba ubalungisele umuzi .

text: By faith Abraham , when he was tried , offered up Isaac : and he that had received the promises offered up his only begotten son ,
text2: Ngokukholwa u - Abrahama evivinywa wanikela ngo - Isaka , yebo , yena owayamukele izithembiso , wanikela ngozelwe yedwa wakhe ,

text: Of whom it was said , That in Isaac shall thy seed be called :
text2: okwathiwa kuye : “ Inzalo yakho iyakubizwa ngo - Isaka , ”

text: Accounting that God was able to raise him up , even from the dead ; from whence also he received him in a figure .
text2: ethi uNkulunkulu unamandla okuvusa nakwabafileyo ; ngokulinganisa wabuye wamthola futhi evela khona .

text: By faith Isaac blessed Jacob and Esau concerning things to come .
text2: Ngokukholwa u - Isaka wabusisa oJakobe no - Esawu ngezinto ebezizakuza .

text: By faith Jacob , when he was a dying , blessed both the sons of Joseph ; and worshipped , leaning upon the top of his staff .
text2: Ngokukholwa uJakobe esezakufa wabusisa leyo naleyo yamadodana kaJosefa , wakhuleka encikile esihlokweni sodondolo lwakhe .

text: By faith Joseph , when he died , made mention of the departing of the children of Israel ; and gave commandment concerning his bones .
text2: Ngokukholwa uJosefa esezakufa wakhuluma ngokuphuma kwabantwana bakwa - Israyeli , wayaleza ngamathambo akhe .

text: By faith Moses , when he was born , was hid three months of his parents , because they saw he was a proper child ; and they were not afraid of the king ' s commandment .
text2: Ngokukholwa uMose esezelwe wafihlwa ngabazali bakhe izinyanga ezintathu , ngokuba bembona engumntwana omuhle ; abawesabanga umyalo wenkosi .

text: By faith Moses , when he was come to years , refused to be called the son of Pharaoh ' s daughter ;
text2: Ngokukholwa uMose esekhulile wala ukubizwa ngokuthi indodana yendodakazi kaFaro ;

text: Choosing rather to suffer affliction with the people of God , than to enjoy the pleasures of sin for a season ;
text2: kunalokho wakhetha ukuphathwa kabi kanye nabantu bakaNkulunkulu kunokuba athokoze isikhashana esonweni ,

text: Esteeming the reproach of Christ greater riches than the treasures in Egypt : for he had respect unto the recompence of the reward .
text2: ethi ukuthukwa ngenxa kaKristu kuyimfuyo enkulu kunengcebo yaseGibithe , ngokuba wayebheke umvuzo .

text: By faith he forsook Egypt , not fearing the wrath of the king : for he endured , as seeing him who is invisible .
text2: Ngokukholwa washiya iGibithe engesabi ulaka lwenkosi ; ngokuba wakhuthazela sengathi uyambona ongabonwayo .

text: Through faith he kept the passover , and the sprinkling of blood , lest he that destroyed the firstborn should touch them .
text2: Ngokukholwa wamisa iPhasika nokufafaza ngegazi , ukuze umbhubhisi angathinti amazibulo abo .

text: By faith they passed through the Red sea as by dry land : which the Egyptians assaying to do were drowned .
text2: Ngokukholwa badabula uLwandle Olubomvu kungathi kusemhlabathini owomileyo , okwathi abaseGibithe bekulinga lokho , baminza .

text: By faith the walls of Jericho fell down , after they were compassed about seven days .
text2: Ngokukholwa izingange zaseJeriko zawa , sezizungeziwe izinsuku eziyisikhombisa .

text: By faith the harlot Rahab perished not with them that believed not , when she had received the spies with peace .
text2: Ngokukholwa , uRahabi isifebe , akabhubhanga kanye nabangalalelanga , esezamukele izinhloli ngokuthula .

text: And what shall I more say ? for the time would fail me to tell of Gedeon , and of Barak , and of Samson , and of Jephthae ; of David also , and Samuel , and of the prophets :
text2: Ngisezakuthini futhi na ? Isikhathi kambe sizakungishiya , uma ngibalisa ngoGideyoni , noBaraki , noSamsoni , noJefta , noDavide , noSamuweli nabaprofethi ,

text: Who through faith subdued kingdoms , wrought righteousness , obtained promises , stopped the mouths of lions ,
text2: abathi ngokukholwa banqoba imibuso , basebenza ukulunga , bazuza izithembiso , bavimba imilomo yezingonyama ,

text: Quenched the violence of fire , escaped the edge of the sword , out of weakness were made strong , waxed valiant in fight , turned to flight the armies of the aliens .
text2: bacima amandla omlilo , baphepha osikweni lwenkemba , baphiwa amandla ebuthakathakeni , baba yiziqhwaga empini , baxosha izimpi zabezizwe .

text: Women received their dead raised to life again : and others were tortured , not accepting deliverance ; that they might obtain a better resurrection :
text2: Abesifazane bamukeliswa abafileyo babo bevusiwe ; abanye bahlushwa , kabavuma ukukhululwa , ukuze bathole ukuvuka okuhle ;

text: And others had trial of cruel mockings and scourgings , yea , moreover of bonds and imprisonment :
text2: abanye balingwa ngokujivazwa nokushaywa , yebo , nokuboshwa nokufakwa etilongweni ;

text: They were stoned , they were sawn asunder , were tempted , were slain with the sword : they wandered about in sheepskins and goatskins ; being destitute , afflicted , tormented ;
text2: bakhandwa ngamatshe , banqunywa ngesaha , balingwa , babulawa ngenkemba , bazulazula bembethe izikhumba zezimvu nezezimbuzi , beswela , behlushwa , bephathwa kabi ,

text: ( Of whom the world was not worthy : ) they wandered in deserts , and in mountains , and in dens and caves of the earth .
text2: izwe elingabafanele bona , behamba emahlane , nasezintabeni , nasemihumeni , nasemigedeni yomhlaba .

text: And these all , having obtained a good report through faith , received not the promise :
text2: Labo bonke , befakazelwe ngokukholwa , abazuzanga isithembiso ,

text: God having provided some better thing for us , that they without us should not be made perfect .
text2: ngokuba uNkulunkulu wayesibonele okuhle kunalokho , ukuze bangapheleliswa ngaphandle kwethu .

text: Wherefore seeing we also are compassed about with so great a cloud of witnesses , let us lay aside every weight , and the sin which doth so easily beset us , and let us run with patience the race that is set before us ,
text2: Ngalokho - ke nathi , lokhu sinefu elingaka lawofakazi elisihaqileyo , masilahle konke okusindayo nesono esithandela kangaka kithi , sigijime ngokubekezela kulokhu kuncintisana esikumiselweyo ,

text: Looking unto Jesus the author and finisher of our faith ; who for the joy that was set before him endured the cross , despising the shame , and is set down at the right hand of the throne of God .
text2: sibhekile kuJesu , umqalisi nomphelelisi wokukholwa kwethu , owathi esikhundleni sentokozo ayibekelweyo wathwala isiphambano engalinaki ihlazo , wahlala ngakwesokunene sesihlalo sobukhosi sikaNkulunkulu .

text: For consider him that endured such contradiction of sinners against himself , lest ye be wearied and faint in your minds .
text2: Yebo , mqondeni yena owakhuthazela ephikwa kangaka yizoni , ukuze ningakhathali , niphele amandla emiphefumulweni yenu .

text: Ye have not yet resisted unto blood , striving against sin .
text2: Anikamelani nezono nilwa kuze kube segazini ;

text: And ye have forgotten the exhortation which speaketh unto you as unto children , My son , despise not thou the chastening of the Lord , nor faint when thou art rebuked of him :
text2: senikhohliwe umyalo okhuluma kinina njengakubantwana wokuthi : “ Ndodana yami , ungadeleli ukulaya kweNkosi , uphele amandla , nxa usolwa yiyo ,

text: For whom the Lord loveth he chasteneth , and scourgeth every son whom he receiveth .
text2: ngokuba iNkosi iyamlaya emthandayo ishaye yileyo naleyo ndodana eyamukelayo . ”

text: If ye endure chastening , God dealeth with you as with sons ; for what son is he whom the father chasteneth not ?
text2: Bekezelani ekulayweni ; uNkulunkulu uyaniphathisa okwabantwana , ngokuba yiyiphi indodana engalaywa nguyise na ?

text: But if ye be without chastisement , whereof all are partakers , then are ye bastards , and not sons .
text2: Kepha uma ningalaywa , abathe bonke benziwa abahlanganyeli kukho , khona - ke ningabesihlahla , anisiwo amadodana .

text: Furthermore we have had fathers of our flesh which corrected us , and we gave them reverence : shall we not much rather be in subjection unto the Father of spirits , and live ?
text2: Futhi - ke sasinawobaba bethu benyama abasilayayo , sabazisa ; pho , asiyikuthobela uYise wawomoya kakhulu kunalokho , siphile , na ?

text: For they verily for a few days chastened us after their own pleasure ; but he for our profit , that we might be partakers of his holiness .
text2: Ngokuba bona kambe basilaya izinsukwana njengokubona kwabo , kepha yena kube yinsizakalo , size sithole ukuhlanganyela ubungcwele bakhe .

text: Now no chastening for the present seemeth to be joyous , but grievous : nevertheless afterward it yieldeth the peaceable fruit of righteousness unto them which are exercised thereby .
text2: Ukulaya konke okwamanje kungathi akusikho okwentokozo , kepha kungokosizi , kodwa ngasemuva kuyabathelela isithelo esihle sokulunga labo abahlakahliswe yikho .

text: Wherefore lift up the hands which hang down , and the feeble knees ;
text2: Ngakho - ke qinisani izandla ezibuthakathaka namadolo axegayo ,

text: And make straight paths for your feet , lest that which is lame be turned out of the way ; but let it rather be healed .
text2: nenzele izinyawo zenu izindlela eziqondileyo ukuba okuqhugayo kungaphinyizeki , kepha kunalokho kuphulukiswe .

text: Follow peace with all men , and holiness , without which no man shall see the Lord :
text2: Zamelani ukuthula nabo bonke kanye nokungcweliswa , ongenakho angeyibone iNkosi ;

text: Looking diligently lest any man fail of the grace of God ; lest any root of bitterness springing up trouble you , and thereby many be defiled ;
text2: niqaphelisise kungabikho osilelayo emseni kaNkulunkulu , funa kumile impande imbe ebabayo , inixobise , kungcoliswe abaningi yiyo ,

text: Lest there be any fornicator , or profane person , as Esau , who for one morsel of meat sold his birthright .
text2: kungabikho oyisifebe noma odumazayo njengo - Esawu owathengisa ubuzibulo bakhe ngesidlo sinye nje .

text: For ye know how that afterward , when he would have inherited the blessing , he was rejected : for he found no place of repentance , though he sought it carefully with tears .
text2: Ngokuba niyazi ukuthi , nokuba ngasemuva ethanda ukudla ifa lesibusiso , waliwa , ngokuba akalitholanga ithuba lokuphenduka , noma ekufunisisa ngezinyembezi .

text: For ye are not come unto the mount that might be touched , and that burned with fire , nor unto blackness , and darkness , and tempest ,
text2: Ngokuba anizanga entabeni ephathekayo nesha umlilo , nasekufiphaleni , nasebumnyameni , nasesivunguvungwini ,

text: And the sound of a trumpet , and the voice of words ; which voice they that heard intreated that the word should not be spoken to them any more :
text2: nasekukhaleni kwecilongo , nasekuzwakaleni kwamazwi , abathe ukukuzwa , bancenga ukuba kungabe kusakhulunywa izwi kubo ,

text: ( For they could not endure that which was commanded , And if so much as a beast touch the mountain , it shall be stoned , or thrust through with a dart :
text2: ngokuba babengenakukuthwala lokho abayalwa ngakho kokuthi : “ Ngisho nesilwane , uma sithinta intaba , siyakukhandwa ngamatshe , ”

text: And so terrible was the sight , that Moses said , I exceedingly fear and quake : )
text2: yebo , umbono wesabeka kangaka , waze wathi uMose : “ Nginovalo olukhulu , ngiyathuthumela , ”

text: But ye are come unto mount Sion , and unto the city of the living God , the heavenly Jerusalem , and to an innumerable company of angels ,
text2: kodwa nize entabeni yaseSiyoni nasemzini kaNkulunkulu ophilayo , iJerusalema lasezulwini , nasezigidigidini zezingelosi ,

text: To the general assembly and church of the firstborn , which are written in heaven , and to God the Judge of all , and to the spirits of just men made perfect ,
text2: nasebandleni lamazibulo abhaliwe ezulwini , nakuNkulunkulu , uMahluleli wabo bonke , nakuyo imimoya yabalungileyo abaphelelisiweyo ,

text: And to Jesus the mediator of the new covenant , and to the blood of sprinkling , that speaketh better things than that of Abel .
text2: nakuJesu , umlamuleli wesivumelwano esisha , nasegazini lokufafaza elikhuluma okukhulu kunelika - Abela .

text: See that ye refuse not him that speaketh . For if they escaped not who refused him that spake on earth , much more shall not we escape , if we turn away from him that speaketh from heaven :
text2: Bhekani , ningamali okhulumayo ; ngokuba uma bengaphunyukanga labo ababemala lowo owabaxwayisa emhlabeni , kakhulu asiyikuphunyuka thina esimfulathelayo oxwayisa esezulwini ,

text: Whose voice then shook the earth : but now he hath promised , saying , Yet once more I shake not the earth only , but also heaven .
text2: ozwi lakhe lanyakazisa umhlaba ngaleso sikhathi , kepha manje uthembisile wathi : “ Kusezakuba kanye ngizamazamise kungabi ngumhlaba wodwa , kepha nezulu futhi . ”

text: And this word , Yet once more , signifieth the removing of those things that are shaken , as of things that are made , that those things which cannot be shaken may remain .
text2: Lokho kokuthi : “ Kusezakuba kanye ” kutshengisa ukuguqulwa kwezinto ezinyakaziswayo , njengokuba zenziwe , ukuze lezo ezinganyakaziswayo zime .

text: Wherefore we receiving a kingdom which cannot be moved , let us have grace , whereby we may serve God acceptably with reverence and godly fear :
text2: Ngakho - ke lokhu samukeliswa umbuso ongenakunyakaziswa , masibonge ngesingamkhonza ngakho uNkulunkulu ngokumthokozisa , nangokumhlonipha , nangokuthuthumela ,

text: For our God is a consuming fire .
text2: ngokuba uNkulunkulu wethu ungumlilo oqothulayo .

text: Let brotherly love continue .
text2: Malume njalo uthando lobuzalwane .

text: Be not forgetful to entertain strangers : for thereby some have entertained angels unawares .
text2: Ningakhohlwa ukungenisa izihambi ngokuba ngalokho abanye bangenisa izingelosi bengazi .

text: Remember them that are in bonds , as bound with them ; and them which suffer adversity , as being yourselves also in the body .
text2: Bakhumbuleni ababoshiweyo kungathi niboshiwe kanye nabo , nabaphethwe kabi , njengalokhu nani nisemzimbeni .

text: Marriage is honourable in all , and the bed undefiled : but whoremongers and adulterers God will judge .
text2: Ukuganana makuhlonishwe yibo bonke , umbhede ungabi nasisihla , ngokuba izifebe neziphingi uNkulunkulu uyakuzahlulela .

text: Let your conversation be without covetousness ; and be content with such things as ye have : for he hath said , I will never leave thee , nor forsake thee .
text2: Ukwenza kwenu makungabi ngokokufisa imali ; yaneliswani ngeninakho ; ngokuba yena ushilo wathi : “ Angisoze ngakuyeka , angisoze ngakushiya , ”

text: So that we may boldly say , The Lord is my helper , and I will not fear what man shall do unto me .
text2: ukuze sisho ngesibindi , sithi : “ INkosi ingumsizi wami , angiyikwesaba ; umuntu angangenzani na ? ”

text: Remember them which have the rule over you , who have spoken unto you the word of God : whose faith follow , considering the end of their conversation .
text2: Bakhumbuleni ababenihola bekhuluma izwi likaNkulunkulu kini , niqonda ukuphela kokuhamba kwabo , nilingise ukukholwa kwabo .

text: Jesus Christ the same yesterday , and to day , and for ever .
text2: UJesu Kristu nguyena izolo nanamuhla , yebo , naphakade .

text: Be not carried about with divers and strange doctrines . For it is a good thing that the heart be established with grace ; not with meats , which have not profited them that have been occupied therein .
text2: Ningadukiswa yizifundiso eziyizinhlobonhlobo nezingaziwayo ; ngokuba kuhle ukuba inhliziyo iqiniswe ngomusa , kungabi ngokudla , abangasizakalanga ngakho abahamba ngakho .

text: We have an altar , whereof they have no right to eat which serve the tabernacle .
text2: Sine - altare thina , abangenalungelo lokudla kulo abakhonza etabernakele .

text: For the bodies of those beasts , whose blood is brought into the sanctuary by the high priest for sin , are burned without the camp .
text2: Ngokuba izidumbu zalezo zilwane ezigazi lazo lingeniswa ngumpristi omkhulu endaweni engcwele ngenxa yezono zishiswa ngaphandle kwekamu .

text: Wherefore Jesus also , that he might sanctify the people with his own blood , suffered without the gate .
text2: Ngakho - ke naye uJesu , ukuze angcwelise abantu ngegazi lakhe , wahlupheka ngaphandle kwesango .

text: Let us go forth therefore unto him without the camp , bearing his reproach .
text2: Masiphumele kuye ngaphandle kwekamu , sithwale ihlazo lakhe .

text: For here have we no continuing city , but we seek one to come .
text2: Ngokuba lapha asinamuzi omiyo , kepha siyawufuna ozayo .

text: By him therefore let us offer the sacrifice of praise to God continually , that is , the fruit of our lips giving thanks to his name .
text2: Masinikele njalonjalo kuNkulunkulu ngaye umhlatshelo wokubonga , okungukuthi isithelo sezindebe ezivuma igama lakhe .

text: But to do good and to communicate forget not : for with such sacrifices God is well pleased .
text2: Kepha maningakhohlwa ukwenza okuhle nokuphana , ngokuba iminikelo enjalo uNkulunkulu uthokoziswa yiyo .

text: Obey them that have the rule over you , and submit yourselves : for they watch for your souls , as they that must give account , that they may do it with joy , and not with grief : for that is unprofitable for you .
text2: Lalelani abaniholayo , nibathobele , ngokuba balinda imiphefumulo yenu njengabazakulandiswa ngayo , ukuze bakwenze lokhu ngokujabula , bangabubuli , ngokuba lokhu akunakunisiza .

text: Pray for us : for we trust we have a good conscience , in all things willing to live honestly .
text2: Sikhulekeleni , ngokuba siyethemba ukuthi sinonembeza omuhle , sithanda ukuhamba kahle ezintweni zonke .

text: But I beseech you the rather to do this , that I may be restored to you the sooner .
text2: Ngiyaniyala kakhulu ukuba nenze lokho , ukuze ngibuyiselwe kini masinyane .

text: Now the God of peace , that brought again from the dead our Lord Jesus , that great shepherd of the sheep , through the blood of the everlasting covenant ,
text2: Kepha uNkulunkulu wokuthula owakhuphula kwabafileyo umalusi omkhulu wezimvu ngegazi lesivumelwano esimiyo njalo , iNkosi yethu uJesu ,

text: Make you perfect in every good work to do his will , working in you that which is wellpleasing in his sight , through Jesus Christ ; to whom be glory for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: makaniphelelise kukho konke okuhle , ukuze nenze intando yakhe , esebenza phakathi kwethu khona lokho okuthokozisayo emehlweni akhe ngoJesu Kristu ; makube kuye inkazimulo kuze kube phakade naphakade . Amen .

text: And I beseech you , brethren , suffer the word of exhortation : for I have written a letter unto you in few words .
text2: Ngiyaniyala , bazalwane , lamukeleni kahle izwi lokuyala , ngokuba nginilobele ngokufushane .

text: Know ye that our brother Timothy is set at liberty ; with whom , if he come shortly , I will see you .
text2: Yazini ukuthi umfowethu uThimothewu ukhululiwe ; uma efika masinyane , ngiyakunibona sinaye .

text: Salute all them that have the rule over you , and all the saints . They of Italy salute you .
text2: Khonzani kubo bonke abaniholayo nakubo bonke abangcwele . Abase - Italiya bayakhonza kini .

text: Grace be with you all . Amen .
text2: Umusa mawube nani nonke . Amen .

text: James , a servant of God and of the Lord Jesus Christ , to the twelve tribes which are scattered abroad , greeting .
text2: UJakobe , inceku kaNkulunkulu neyeNkosi uJesu Kristu , uyakhonza kuzo izizwe eziyishumi nambili ezihlakazekileyo .

text: My brethren , count it all joy when ye fall into divers temptations ;
text2: Bazalwane bami , nxa nehlelwa yizilingo ngezilingo , anothi kungukuthokoza kodwa ,

text: Knowing this , that the trying of your faith worketh patience .
text2: nazi ukuthi ukuvivinywa kokukholwa kwenu kuveza ukukhuthazela .

text: But let patience have her perfect work , that ye may be perfect and entire , wanting nothing .
text2: Kepha ukukhuthazela makube nomsebenzi opheleleyo , ukuze nibe ngabapheleleyo nabangenacala abangasweli lutho .

text: If any of you lack wisdom , let him ask of God , that giveth to all men liberally , and upbraideth not ; and it shall be given him .
text2: Uma - ke kukhona kini oswela ukuhlakanipha , makacele kuNkulunkulu obapha bonke ngobuhle engajakadi , khona uyakuphiwa .

text: But let him ask in faith , nothing wavering . For he that wavereth is like a wave of the sea driven with the wind and tossed .
text2: Kepha makacele ngokukholwa engangabazi ngalutho ; ngokuba ongabazayo unjengedlambi lolwandle eliqhutshwa , ligujiswa ngumoya .

text: For let not that man think that he shall receive any thing of the Lord .
text2: Ngakho makangasho lowo muntu ukuthi uyakwamukeliswa utho yiNkosi ,

text: A double minded man is unstable in all his ways .
text2: umuntu onhliziyombili oguquguqukayo ezindleleni zakhe zonke .

text: Let the brother of low degree rejoice in that he is exalted :
text2: Umzalwane ophansi makazincome ngokuphakama kwakhe ,

text: But the rich , in that he is made low : because as the flower of the grass he shall pass away .
text2: kepha oyisicebi makazincome ngobuphansi bakhe , ngokuba njengembali yotshani uyakudlula .

text: For the sun is no sooner risen with a burning heat , but it withereth the grass , and the flower thereof falleth , and the grace of the fashion of it perisheth : so also shall the rich man fade away in his ways .
text2: Ngokuba ilanga liphuma libalele , libunisa utshani , imbali yabo iwele phansi , nobuhle besimo sabo bunyamalale ; kanjalo nesicebi siyakudlula ezindleleni zaso .

text: Blessed is the man that endureth temptation : for when he is tried , he shall receive the crown of life , which the Lord hath promised to them that love him .
text2: Ubusisiwe umuntu okhuthazela ekulingweni ; ngokuba esevivinyekile uyakwamukeliswa umqhele wokuphila othenjisiwe yiNkosi kwabayithandayo .

text: Let no man say when he is tempted , I am tempted of God : for God cannot be tempted with evil , neither tempteth he any man :
text2: Umuntu oyengwayo makangasho ukuthi : “ Ngiyengwa nguNkulunkulu , ” ngokuba uNkulunkulu angeyengwe ngokubi , naye uqobo akayengi muntu .

text: But every man is tempted , when he is drawn away of his own lust , and enticed .
text2: Kepha yilowo nalowo uyengwa ehuhwa ngezakhe izinkanuko , ehungwa ;

text: Then when lust hath conceived , it bringeth forth sin : and sin , when it is finished , bringeth forth death .
text2: uma inkanuko isithathile , ibeletha isono ; nesono sesiphelelisiwe , sizala ukufa .

text: Do not err , my beloved brethren .
text2: Ningadukiswa , bazalwane bami abathandekayo .

text: Every good gift and every perfect gift is from above , and cometh down from the Father of lights , with whom is no variableness , neither shadow of turning .
text2: Izipho zonke ezinhle neziphiwo zonke ezipheleleyo zivela phezulu , zehla kuYise wokukhanya okungekho kuye ukuguquka nasithunzi sokuphenduka .

text: Of his own will begat he us with the word of truth , that we should be a kind of firstfruits of his creatures .
text2: Ngokuthanda kwakhe wasizala ngezwi leqiniso , ukuze sibe ngabokuqala bezidalwa zakhe .

text: Wherefore , my beloved brethren , let every man be swift to hear , slow to speak , slow to wrath :
text2: Niyakwazi lokho , bazalwane bami abathandekayo . Yilowo nalowo muntu makasheshe ukuzwa , aphuze ukukhuluma , aphuze ukuthukuthela ;

text: For the wrath of man worketh not the righteousness of God .
text2: ngokuba ulaka lomuntu alusebenzi ukulunga kukaNkulunkulu .

text: Wherefore lay apart all filthiness and superfluity of naughtiness , and receive with meekness the engrafted word , which is able to save your souls .
text2: Ngakho lahlani yonke insila nokubi okuvamileyo , namukele ngomoya omnene izwi elitshaliweyo elinamandla okusindisa imiphefumulo yenu .

text: But be ye doers of the word , and not hearers only , deceiving your own selves .
text2: Yibani ngabalenzayo izwi , ningabi ngabalizwayo kuphela , nizikhohlisa .

text: For if any be a hearer of the word , and not a doer , he is like unto a man beholding his natural face in a glass :
text2: Ngokuba uma umuntu engolizwayo izwi engesiye olenzayo , lowo ufana nomuntu obuka ubuso bakhe bemvelo esibukweni ;

text: For he beholdeth himself , and goeth his way , and straightway forgetteth what manner of man he was .
text2: ngokuba uyazibuka , amuke , akhohlwe masinyane ukuthi wayengonjani .

text: But whoso looketh into the perfect law of liberty , and continueth therein , he being not a forgetful hearer , but a doer of the work , this man shall be blessed in his deed .
text2: Kepha obukisisa emthethweni opheleleyo wenkululeko nohlala kuwo , engesiye ozwayo nje akhohlwe , kodwa engowenzayo asebenze , lowo uzakuba ngobusisiweyo ekwenzeni kwakhe .

text: If any man among you seem to be religious , and bridleth not his tongue , but deceiveth his own heart , this man ' s religion is vain .
text2: Uma umuntu esho ukuthi uyikholwa , engabophi ulimi lwakhe kungathi ngetomu kodwa ekhohlisa inhliziyo yakhe , ukukhonza kwalowo kuyize .

text: Pure religion and undefiled before God and the Father is this , To visit the fatherless and widows in their affliction , and to keep himself unspotted from the world .
text2: Ukukhonza okumhlophe okungenabala phambi kukaNkulunkulu uBaba yilokhu ukuhambela izintandane nabafelokazi osizini lwabo nokuzigcina kungabi yicala lokwezwe .

text: My brethren , have not the faith of our Lord Jesus Christ , the Lord of glory , with respect of persons .
text2: Bazalwane bami , ukukholwa kwenu yiNkosi yethu yenkazimulo uJesu Kristu makungabi nokukhetha abantu .

text: For if there come unto your assembly a man with a gold ring , in goodly apparel , and there come in also a poor man in vile raiment ;
text2: Ngokuba uma kungena esinagogeni lenu umuntu onendandatho yegolide nezingubo ezicwebezelayo , kungene nompofu onezingubo ezimbi ,

text: And ye have respect to him that weareth the gay clothing , and say unto him , Sit thou here in a good place ; and say to the poor , Stand thou there , or sit here under my footstool :
text2: nimbheke ogqokile izingubo ezicwebezelayo , nithi : “ Hlala lapha wena kulendawo enhle , ” besenithi kompofu : “ Yima lapho wena , ” noma : “ Hlala phansi kwesenabelo sezinyawo zami , ”

text: Are ye not then partial in yourselves , and are become judges of evil thoughts ?
text2: anikhethi yini , nibe ngabahluleli abanezizindlo ezimbi na ?

text: Hearken , my beloved brethren , Hath not God chosen the poor of this world rich in faith , and heirs of the kingdom which he hath promised to them that love him ?
text2: Yizwani , bazalwane bami abathandekayo . UNkulunkulu akakhethanga yini abampofu ezweni babe ngabacebileyo ekukholweni nezindlalifa zombuso awuthembisa bona abamthandayo na ?

text: But ye have despised the poor . Do not rich men oppress you , and draw you before the judgment seats ?
text2: Kepha nina namdumaza ompofu . Abacebileyo abanicindezeli yini , abanihuduleli emacaleni na ?

text: Do not they blaspheme that worthy name by the which ye are called ?
text2: Abahlambalazi igama elihle enibizwa ngalo na ?

text: If ye fulfil the royal law according to the scripture , Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself , ye do well :
text2: Kepha uma nigcina umthetho wobukhosi ngokombhalo wokuthi : “ Wothanda umakhelwane wakho njengalokhu uzithanda wena , ” nenza kahle ;

text: But if ye have respect to persons , ye commit sin , and are convinced of the law as transgressors .
text2: kodwa uma nikhetha abantu , nenza isono , nilahlwa ngumthetho njengabaweqayo .

text: For whosoever shall keep the whole law , and yet offend in one point , he is guilty of all .
text2: Ngokuba ogcina wonke umthetho kepha akhubeke kowodwa , unecala kuyo yonke .

text: For he that said , Do not commit adultery , said also , Do not kill . Now if thou commit no adultery , yet if thou kill , thou art become a transgressor of the law .
text2: Ngokuba yena owathi : “ Ungaphingi , ” wathi futhi : “ Ungabulali , ” uma - ke ungaphingi kepha ubulale , ungoweqa umthetho .

text: So speak ye , and so do , as they that shall be judged by the law of liberty .
text2: Khulumani kanjalo , nenze kanjalo njengokufanele abayakwahlulelwa ngomthetho wenkululeko .

text: For he shall have judgment without mercy , that hath shewed no mercy ; and mercy rejoiceth against judgment .
text2: Ngokuba ukwahlulelwa okungenasihawu kuyakumehlela ongenzi isihawu ; isihawu sizigabisa ekwahlulelweni .

text: What doth it profit , my brethren , though a man say he hath faith , and have not works ? can faith save him ?
text2: Kusizani , bazalwane bami , uma umuntu ethi unokukholwa , kepha engenayo imisebenzi na ? Ukukholwa kungamsindisa na ?

text: If a brother or sister be naked , and destitute of daily food ,
text2: Uma umzalwane noma umzalwanekazi behamba ze , beswela ukudla kwemihla ngemihla ,

text: And one of you say unto them , Depart in peace , be ye warmed and filled ; notwithstanding ye give them not those things which are needful to the body ; what doth it profit ?
text2: kusho omunye kini kubo ukuthi : “ Hambani nibe nokuthula , nifudumale ; nisuthe , ” kepha ningabaphi lokho okudingwa ngumzimba , lokhu kusizani na ?

text: Even so faith , if it hath not works , is dead , being alone .
text2: Kanjalo - ke nokukholwa , uma kungenayo imisebenzi , kufile ngokwakho .

text: Yea , a man may say , Thou hast faith , and I have works : shew me thy faith without thy works , and I will shew thee my faith by my works .
text2: Kepha omunye uyakuthi : “ Wena unokukholwa , mina nginemisebenzi , ” ngibonise ukukholwa kwakho ngaphandle kwemisebenzi , nami ngizakukukhombisa ukukholwa ngemisebenzi yami .

text: Thou believest that there is one God ; thou doest well : the devils also believe , and tremble .
text2: Wena uyakholwa ukuthi uNkulunkulu munye na ? Wenza kahle ; namademoni ayakholwa , athuthumele .

text: But wilt thou know , O vain man , that faith without works is dead ?
text2: Kepha wena muntu ongelutho uyathanda ukuqonda ukuthi ukukholwa ngaphandle kwemisebenzi kuyize na ?

text: Was not Abraham our father justified by works , when he had offered Isaac his son upon the altar ?
text2: U - Abrahama ubaba wayengalungisiswa yini ngemisebenzi enikela ngendodana yakhe u - Isaka e - altare na ?

text: Seest thou how faith wrought with his works , and by works was faith made perfect ?
text2: Uyabona ukuthi ukukholwa kwasebenza kanye nemisebenzi yakhe nokuthi ukukholwa kwapheleliswa ngemisebenzi ,

text: And the scripture was fulfilled which saith , Abraham believed God , and it was imputed unto him for righteousness : and he was called the Friend of God .
text2: kwagcwaliseka umbhalo othi : “ Kepha u - Abrahama wakholwa nguNkulunkulu , kwabalelwa kuye ukuthi kungukulunga , ” wabizwa ngokuthi umhlobo kaNkulunkulu .

text: Ye see then how that by works a man is justified , and not by faith only .
text2: Niyabona ukuthi umuntu uyalungisiswa ngemisebenzi , kungengokukholwa kuphela .

text: Likewise also was not Rahab the harlot justified by works , when she had received the messengers , and had sent them out another way ?
text2: Kanjalo - ke noRahabi isifebe wayengalungisiswa ngemisebenzi yini , ezamukele izithunywa eziphumisa ngenye indlela na ?

text: For as the body without the spirit is dead , so faith without works is dead also .
text2: Ngokuba njengalokhu umzimba ngaphandle komoya ufile , kanjalo nokukholwa ngaphandle kwemisebenzi kufile .

text: My brethren , be not many masters , knowing that we shall receive the greater condemnation .
text2: Ningabi ngabafundisi abaningi , bazalwane bami , nazi ukuthi siyakwamukeliswa ukwahlulelwa okukhulu .

text: For in many things we offend all . If any man offend not in word , the same is a perfect man , and able also to bridle the whole body .
text2: Ngokuba sonke siyakhubeka ngokuningi ; uma umuntu engakhubeki ngazwi , lowo uyindoda epheleleyo enamandla okubamba nomzimba wonke kungathi ngetomu .

text: Behold , we put bits in the horses ' mouths , that they may obey us ; and we turn about their whole body .
text2: Uma - ke sifaka amatomu emilonyeni yamahashi ukuba asilalele , siqondisa nomzimba wonke wawo .

text: Behold also the ships , which though they be so great , and are driven of fierce winds , yet are they turned about with a very small helm , whithersoever the governor listeth .
text2: Bhekani nemikhumbi , ingaka nje , iqhutshwa yimimoya enamandla , iqondiswa ngephini elincinyane , lapho umshayeli efuna ukuyiqondisa khona .

text: Even so the tongue is a little member , and boasteth great things . Behold , how great a matter a little fire kindleth !
text2: Lunjalo nolimi ; luyisitho esincane , kanti luyazigabisa kakhulu . Bhekani umlilo omncane uvuthisa ihlathi elingaka ;

text: And the tongue is a fire , a world of iniquity : so is the tongue among our members , that it defileth the whole body , and setteth on fire the course of nature ; and it is set on fire of hell .
text2: nolimi lungumlilo , ulimi lumi luyizwe lokungalungi phakathi kwezitho zethu , lungcolisa umzimba wonke , luthungela ukuphila konke , luthungelwa yisihogo .

text: For every kind of beasts , and of birds , and of serpents , and of things in the sea , is tamed , and hath been tamed of mankind :
text2: Ngokuba yonke imvelo yezilwane , neyezinyoni , neyezikhasayo , neyeziselwandle iyathanjiswa , yebo , yathanjiswa ngemvelo yabantu ;

text: But the tongue can no man tame ; it is an unruly evil , full of deadly poison .
text2: kepha ulimi akakho kubantu onamandla okuluthambisa ; lungububi obuyaluzayo , lugcwele isihlungu esibulalayo .

text: Therewith bless we God , even the Father ; and therewith curse we men , which are made after the similitude of God .
text2: Ngalo sibonga iNkosi uBaba , nangalo siqalekisa abantu abenziwe ngomfanekiso kaNkulunkulu ;

text: Out of the same mouth proceedeth blessing and cursing . My brethren , these things ought not so to be .
text2: emlonyeni munye kuphuma ukubusisa nokuqalekisa . Akufanele , bazalwane bami , ukuba lokho kube kanjalo .

text: Doth a fountain send forth at the same place sweet water and bitter ?
text2: Umthombo uyakhipha yini amnandi nababayo emgodini munye na ?

text: Can the fig tree , my brethren , bear olive berries ? either a vine , figs ? so can no fountain both yield salt water and fresh .
text2: Umkhiwane , bazalwane bami , ungaba namandla yini okuthela izithelo zomnqumo , noma umvini amakhiwane na ? Amanzi kasawoti angeveze amnandi .

text: Who is a wise man and endued with knowledge among you ? let him shew out of a good conversation his works with meekness of wisdom .
text2: Ngubani ohlakaniphileyo nowaziyo phakathi kwenu na ? Makakhombise ngenkambo enhle imisebenzi yakhe ngobumnene bokuhlakanipha .

text: But if ye have bitter envying and strife in your hearts , glory not , and lie not against the truth .
text2: Kepha uma ninomhawu obabayo nombango ezinhliziyweni zenu , ningazibongi , ningaliqambeli iqiniso .

text: This wisdom descendeth not from above , but is earthly , sensual , devilish .
text2: Lokhu kuhlakanipha akusikho okwaphezulu kodwa kungokomhlaba , kungokwemvelo , kungokwamademoni ;

text: For where envying and strife is , there is confusion and every evil work .
text2: ngokuba lapho kukhona umhawu nombango , kukhona isiyaluyalu nezenzo zonke ezimbi .

text: But the wisdom that is from above is first pure , then peaceable , gentle , and easy to be intreated , full of mercy and good fruits , without partiality , and without hypocrisy .
text2: Kepha ukuhlakanipha okwaphezulu okokuqala kumhlophe , andukuba kube nokuthula , nokuva , nokulalela , kugcwele isihawu nezithelo ezinhle ; akunakungabaza , akunakuzenzisa .

text: And the fruit of righteousness is sown in peace of them that make peace .
text2: Kepha isithelo sokulunga sihlwanyelwa ngokuthula kubo abakwenzayo ukuthula .

text: From whence come wars and fightings among you ? come they not hence , even of your lusts that war in your members ?
text2: Zivelaphi izimpi , nokulwa kuvelaphi phakathi kwenu na ? Akuveli yini lapho ezinkanukweni zenu ezilwayo ezithweni zenu na ?

text: Ye lust , and have not : ye kill , and desire to have , and cannot obtain : ye fight and war , yet ye have not , because ye ask not .
text2: Niyafisa , nokho aninalutho ; niyabulala ninomhawu , nokho anizuzi lutho ; niyalwa nenza impi . Aninalutho , ngokuba ningaceli ;

text: Ye ask , and receive not , because ye ask amiss , that ye may consume it upon your lusts .
text2: niyacela , nokho anamukeliswa , ngokuba nicela kabi , ukuze nikuchithele ezinkanukweni zenu .

text: Ye adulterers and adulteresses , know ye not that the friendship of the world is enmity with God ? whosoever therefore will be a friend of the world is the enemy of God .
text2: Ziphingi , anazi yini ukuthi ukuthanda izwe kungubutha kuNkulunkulu na ? Ngakho lowo othanda ukuba ngumhlobo wezwe , umi eyisitha sikaNkulunkulu .

text: Do ye think that the scripture saith in vain , The spirit that dwelleth in us lusteth to envy ?
text2: Niyacabanga yini ukuthi umbhalo usho ngeze ukuthi : “ Umoya awuhlalisa kithi unxanela ngokomhawu , ” na ?

text: But he giveth more grace . Wherefore he saith , God resisteth the proud , but giveth grace unto the humble .
text2: Kodwa unika umusa ngokwenezela ; ngakho uthi : “ UNkulunkulu umelana nabazidlayo , kepha abathobekileyo ubapha umusa . ”

text: Submit yourselves therefore to God . Resist the devil , and he will flee from you .
text2: Ngakho thobelani uNkulunkulu , kepha nimelane noSathane , khona uyakunibalekela ;

text: Draw nigh to God , and he will draw nigh to you . Cleanse your hands , ye sinners ; and purify your hearts , ye double minded .
text2: sondelani kuNkulunkulu , khona uyakusondela kinina . Hlanzani izandla nina zoni , nihlambulule izinhliziyo nina bonhliziyombili .

text: Be afflicted , and mourn , and weep : let your laughter be turned to mourning , and your joy to heaviness .
text2: Yibani lusizi , nidabuke , nikhale ; ukuhleka kwenu makuphenduke ukudabuka , nokujabula kube ngukujabha .

text: Humble yourselves in the sight of the Lord , and he shall lift you up .
text2: Zithobeni ebusweni beNkosi , khona iyakuniphakamisa .

text: Speak not evil one of another , brethren . He that speaketh evil of his brother , and judgeth his brother , speaketh evil of the law , and judgeth the law : but if thou judge the law , thou art not a doer of the law , but a judge .
text2: Ningahlebani , bazalwane . Ohleba umzalwane , noma ahlulele umzalwane wakhe , uhleba umthetho , ahlulele umthetho ; kepha uma wahlulela umthetho , awusiye owenza okomthetho kodwa ungumahluleli .

text: There is one lawgiver , who is able to save and to destroy : who art thou that judgest another ?
text2: Munye ongummisimthetho nomahluleli ; nguyena onamandla okusindisa nokubhubhisa ; kepha ungubani wena omahlulelayo umakhelwane na ?

text: Go to now , ye that say , To day or to morrow we will go into such a city , and continue there a year , and buy and sell , and get gain :
text2: Minani nina enithi : “ Namuhla noma ngomuso siyakuya kulona noma kulowaya muzi , siqede khona umnyaka , sithengiselane , sizuze , ”

text: Whereas ye know not what shall be on the morrow . For what is your life ? It is even a vapour , that appeareth for a little time , and then vanisheth away .
text2: anikwazi okwangomuso ; kuyini ukuphila kwenu na ? Ngokuba niyinkungu ebonakala isikhashana , ibisinyamalala .

text: For that ye ought to say , If the Lord will , we shall live , and do this , or that .
text2: Nga nisho nithi : “ Uma iNkosi ithanda , siphila , siyakwenza lokhu nalokho . ”

text: But now ye rejoice in your boastings : all such rejoicing is evil .
text2: Kepha manje niyazibonga ngokuzigabisa kwenu ; konke ukuzigabisa okunjalo kubi .
