text: Therefore to him that knoweth to do good , and doeth it not , to him it is sin .
text2: Ngakho owaziyo ukwenza okuhle engakwenzi kuyisono kuye .

text: Go to now , ye rich men , weep and howl for your miseries that shall come upon you .
text2: Minani nina bacebileyo ; khalani , nilile ngezinhlupheko eziyakunehlela .

text: Your riches are corrupted , and your garments are motheaten .
text2: Ingcebo yenu ibolile , nezingubo zenu zidliwe yizinundu ;

text: Your gold and silver is cankered ; and the rust of them shall be a witness against you , and shall eat your flesh as it were fire . Ye have heaped treasure together for the last days .
text2: igolide lenu nesiliva kugwalile , nokugwala kwakho kuyakuba ngufakazi ngakini , kudle inyama yenu njengomlilo . Niqongelele ingcebo ezinsukwini zokuphela .

text: Behold , the hire of the labourers who have reaped down your fields , which is of you kept back by fraud , crieth : and the cries of them which have reaped are entered into the ears of the Lord of sabaoth .
text2: Bhekani , umvuzo wezisebenzi ezavuna amasimu enu eniwugodlileyo uyakhala , nokukhala kwabavunileyo kungenile ezindlebeni zeNkosi Sebawoti .

text: Ye have lived in pleasure on the earth , and been wanton ; ye have nourished your hearts , as in a day of slaughter .
text2: Nibusile emhlabeni , natamasa ; ninonisile izinhliziyo zenu ngosuku lokuhlaba .

text: Ye have condemned and killed the just ; and he doth not resist you .
text2: Nilahlile , nabulala olungileyo ; akamelani nani .

text: Be patient therefore , brethren , unto the coming of the Lord . Behold , the husbandman waiteth for the precious fruit of the earth , and hath long patience for it , until he receive the early and latter rain .
text2: Ngakho bekezelani , bazalwane , ize ifike iNkosi . Bhekani , umlimi uyalindela isithelo somhlaba esiyigugu , ebekezelela sona , size sithole imvula yokuqala neyamuva .

text: Be ye also patient ; stablish your hearts : for the coming of the Lord draweth nigh .
text2: Bekezelani nani , niqinise izinhliziyo zenu , ngokuba ukufika kweNkosi kusondele .

text: Grudge not one against another , brethren , lest ye be condemned : behold , the judge standeth before the door .
text2: Ningavungamelani , bazalwane , ukuba ningahlulelwa ; bhekani , umahluleli umi ngaseminyango .

text: Take , my brethren , the prophets , who have spoken in the name of the Lord , for an example of suffering affliction , and of patience .
text2: Bazalwane , misani abaprofethi ababekhuluma egameni leNkosi babe yisibonelo sokuhlupheka nokubekezela .

text: Behold , we count them happy which endure . Ye have heard of the patience of Job , and have seen the end of the Lord ; that the Lord is very pitiful , and of tender mercy .
text2: Bhekani , babusisiwe abakhuthazelayo ; nizwile ngokukhuthazela kukaJobe , nibonile impetho yeNkosi ukuthi iNkosi inesihe esikhulu nesihawu .

text: But above all things , my brethren , swear not , neither by heaven , neither by the earth , neither by any other oath : but let your yea be yea ; and your nay , nay ; lest ye fall into condemnation .
text2: Kepha phezu kwakho konke , bazalwane bami , ningafungi ; ningafungi izulu noma umhlaba noma esinye isifungo ; kodwa uyebo wenu makabe nguyebo , noqhabo uqhabo , ukuze ningaweli ekwahlulelweni .

text: Is any among you afflicted ? let him pray . Is any merry ? let him sing psalms .
text2: Kukhona ohluphekayo phakathi kwenu na ? Makakhuleke ; kukhona owenamileyo na ? Makahube .

text: Is any sick among you ? let him call for the elders of the church ; and let them pray over him , anointing him with oil in the name of the Lord :
text2: Kukhona ogulayo phakathi kwenu na ? Makabize amalunga ebandla , amkhulekele , amgcobe ngamafutha egameni leNkosi .

text: And the prayer of faith shall save the sick , and the Lord shall raise him up ; and if he have committed sins , they shall be forgiven him .
text2: Umkhuleko wokukholwa uyakumsindisa ogulayo , iNkosi imvuse ; noma enzile izono , uzakuthethelelwa zona .

text: Confess your faults one to another , and pray one for another , that ye may be healed . The effectual fervent prayer of a righteous man availeth much .
text2: Ngakho , vumani izono omunye komunye , nikhulekelane ukuba niphulukiswe . Umkhuleko oqinileyo wolungileyo unamandla kakhulu .

text: Elias was a man subject to like passions as we are , and he prayed earnestly that it might not rain : and it rained not on the earth by the space of three years and six months .
text2: U - Eliya wayengumuntu efana nathi ; wakhuleka nokukhuleka ukuba lingani ; alinanga emhlabeni iminyaka emithathu nezinyanga eziyisithupha .

text: And he prayed again , and the heaven gave rain , and the earth brought forth her fruit .
text2: Wabuye wakhuleka ; izulu lana imvula , nomhlaba wathela izithelo zawo .

text: Brethren , if any of you do err from the truth , and one convert him ;
text2: Bazalwane bami , uma omunye kini eduka eqinisweni , omunye ambuyise ,

text: Let him know , that he which converteth the sinner from the error of his way shall save a soul from death , and shall hide a multitude of sins .
text2: yazini ukuthi obuyisile isoni ekudukeni kwendlela yaso uyakusindisa umphefumulo wakhe ekufeni , asibekele izono eziningi .

text: Peter , an apostle of Jesus Christ , to the strangers scattered throughout Pontus , Galatia , Cappadocia , Asia , and Bithynia ,
text2: UPetru , umphostoli kaJesu Kristu , kwabayizihambi abahlakazekile ePontu , naseGalathiya , naseKhaphadosiya , nase - Asiya , naseBithiniya ,

text: Elect according to the foreknowledge of God the Father , through sanctification of the Spirit , unto obedience and sprinkling of the blood of Jesus Christ : Grace unto you , and peace , be multiplied .
text2: bekhethiwe ngokwaziphambili kukaNkulunkulu uYise ngokungcwelisa kukaMoya kukho ukulalela nokufafazwa ngegazi likaJesu Kristu : Makwandiswe kinina umusa nokuthula .

text: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ , which according to his abundant mercy hath begotten us again unto a lively hope by the resurrection of Jesus Christ from the dead ,
text2: Makabongwe uNkulunkulu uYise weNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu owabuye wasizala kabusha ngokwesihawu sakhe esikhulu ukuba sibe nethemba eliphilileyo ngokuvuka kukaJesu Kristu kwabafileyo ,

text: To an inheritance incorruptible , and undefiled , and that fadeth not away , reserved in heaven for you ,
text2: sibe nefa elingapheliyo , nelingenasisihla , nelingabuniyo , eniligcinelwe ezulwini ;

text: Who are kept by the power of God through faith unto salvation ready to be revealed in the last time .
text2: nina enilondolozwa ngamandla kaNkulunkulu ngokukholwa ukuba nibe nokusindiswa okulungiselwe ukwambulwa ngesikhathi sokugcina ;

text: Wherein ye greatly rejoice , though now for a season , if need be , ye are in heaviness through manifold temptations :
text2: enithokoza ngakho , nokuba manje ngesikhashana , uma kudingeka , nidabukiswa ngezilingo eziyizinhlobonhlobo ,

text: That the trial of your faith , being much more precious than of gold that perisheth , though it be tried with fire , might be found unto praise and honour and glory at the appearing of Jesus Christ :
text2: ukuze ukuvivinywa kokukholwa kwenu okuyigugu kunegolide elibhubhayo noma livivinywa ngomlilo kufunyanwe kube ngukubongwa , nodumo , nokutuseka ekwambulweni kukaJesu Kristu ;

text: Whom having not seen , ye love ; in whom , though now ye see him not , yet believing , ye rejoice with joy unspeakable and full of glory :
text2: enimthanda ningambonanga , enithi ningamboni manje nikholwa nguye , nithokoza ngentokozo engakhulumekiyo netusekayo ,

text: Receiving the end of your faith , even the salvation of your souls .
text2: namukela isigcino sokukholwa kwenu esiyinsindiso yemiphefumulo .

text: Of which salvation the prophets have inquired and searched diligently , who prophesied of the grace that should come unto you :
text2: Ngayo leyo nsindiso babefunisisa bephenyisisa abaprofethi ababeprofetha ngomusa obuzakuza kinina ,

text: Searching what , or what manner of time the Spirit of Christ which was in them did signify , when it testified beforehand the sufferings of Christ , and the glory that should follow .
text2: bephenya ukuthi yisiphi nokuba sinjani isikhathi asikhombayo uMoya kaKristu owayekubo , efakaza ngaphambili ngezinhlupheko eziqondene noKristu nangenkazimulo eyakulandela zona ;

text: Unto whom it was revealed , that not unto themselves , but unto us they did minister the things , which are now reported unto you by them that have preached the gospel unto you with the Holy Ghost sent down from heaven ; which things the angels desire to look into .
text2: abambulelwe ukuba bangazikhonzi bona kepha nina ngalezo zinto enishunyayezwa zona manje ngabanishumayeza ivangeli ngoMoya oNgcwele othunywe evela ezulwini , izinto ezizifisayo izingelosi ukuzibona .

text: Wherefore gird up the loins of your mind , be sober , and hope to the end for the grace that is to be brought unto you at the revelation of Jesus Christ ;
text2: Ngalokho zibopheni izinkalo zengqondo yenu , nizithibe , nethembe ngokupheleleyo umusa enizakuwabelwa ekwambulweni kukaJesu Kristu .

text: As obedient children , not fashioning yourselves according to the former lusts in your ignorance :
text2: Njengabantwana abalalelayo ningalingisi izinkanuko zakuqala ekungazini kwenu ,

text: But as he which hath called you is holy , so be ye holy in all manner of conversation ;
text2: kodwa njengowanibizayo engcwele , manibe ngcwele nani ekuhambeni konke ,

text: Because it is written , Be ye holy ; for I am holy .
text2: ngokuba kulotshiwe ukuthi : “ Manibe ngcwele , ngokuba mina ngingcwele . ”

text: And if ye call on the Father , who without respect of persons judgeth according to every man ' s work , pass the time of your sojourning here in fear :
text2: Uma nimbiza ngokuthi Baba yena owahlulela yilowo nalowo ngokwemisebenzi yakhe engakhethi buso , anohamba ngokwesaba esikhathini sokuhlala kwenu ebufokazini ,

text: Forasmuch as ye know that ye were not redeemed with corruptible things , as silver and gold , from your vain conversation received by tradition from your fathers ;
text2: nazi ukuthi anihlengwanga ekuhambeni kwenu okuyize enakunikezwa ngawoyihlo ngezinto ezibhubhayo , isiliva negolide ,

text: But with the precious blood of Christ , as of a lamb without blemish and without spot :
text2: kodwa ngegazi elinqabileyo likaKristu kungathi elewundlu elingenacala , elingenabala ;

text: Who verily was foreordained before the foundation of the world , but was manifest in these last times for you ,
text2: owaziwa phakade , izwe lingakasekelwa , kepha wabonakaliswa ngezikhathi zokugcina ngenxa yenu

text: Who by him do believe in God , that raised him up from the dead , and gave him glory ; that your faith and hope might be in God .
text2: enikholwa nguNkulunkulu ngaye , owamvusa kwabafileyo nowamnika inkazimulo , ukuze ukukholwa kwenu kube nethemba kuNkulunkulu .

text: Seeing ye have purified your souls in obeying the truth through the Spirit unto unfeigned love of the brethren , see that ye love one another with a pure heart fervently :
text2: Senihlambululile imiphefumulo yenu ngokulalela iqiniso , nize nithande abazalwane ngokungazenzisi , thandanani ngokupheleleyo omunye nomunye ngenhliziyo ,

text: Being born again , not of corruptible seed , but of incorruptible , by the word of God , which liveth and abideth for ever .
text2: senizelwe kabusha kungengambewu ephelayo kodwa ngengapheliyo , ngezwi eliphilileyo nelimiyo likaNkulunkulu ,

text: For all flesh is as grass , and all the glory of man as the flower of grass . The grass withereth , and the flower thereof falleth away :
text2: ngokuba , “ Yonke inyama injengotshani , nobukhosi bayo bonke bunjengembali yotshani ; utshani buyabuna , nembali iyavuthuluka , kepha izwi leNkosi limi kuze kube phakade . ”

text: But the word of the Lord endureth for ever . And this is the word which by the gospel is preached unto you .
text2: Yilo leli zwi levangeli elashunyayelwa kinina .

text: Wherefore laying aside all malice , and all guile , and hypocrisies , and envies , and all evil speakings ,
text2: Ngakho lahlani ububi bonke , nobuqili bonke , nokuzenzisa , nomhawu , nokuhleba konke ;

text: As newborn babes , desire the sincere milk of the word , that ye may grow thereby :
text2: njengezingane ezisand ' ukuzalwa langazelelani ubisi olungokomoya olungenakonakala , ukuze nikhule ngalo kube ngukusindiswa ,

text: If so be ye have tasted that the Lord is gracious .
text2: uma seninambithile nezwa ukuthi iNkosi imnene .

text: To whom coming , as unto a living stone , disallowed indeed of men , but chosen of God , and precious ,
text2: Sondelani kuyo , iyitshe eliphilileyo , elinqatshwe ngabantu , kepha kuNkulunkulu likhethekile , liyigugu ,

text: Ye also , as lively stones , are built up a spiritual house , an holy priesthood , to offer up spiritual sacrifices , acceptable to God by Jesus Christ .
text2: nakhiwe njengamatshe aphilileyo , nibe yindlu yokomoya , ubupristi obungcwele , ninikele ngemihlatshelo yokomoya eyamukelekayo kuNkulunkulu ngaye uJesu Kristu .

text: Wherefore also it is contained in the scripture , Behold , I lay in Sion a chief corner stone , elect , precious : and he that believeth on him shall not be confounded .
text2: Ngokuba kukhona embhalweni ukuthi : “ Bhekani , ngibeka eSiyoni itshe legumbi elikhethekile , liyigugu ; okholwa yilo akasoze ajabhiswa . ”

text: Unto you therefore which believe he is precious : but unto them which be disobedient , the stone which the builders disallowed , the same is made the head of the corner ,
text2: Ngakho kini enikholwayo liyigugu ; kepha kwabangakholwayo itshe abalinqabayo abakhi yilona elaba yinhloko yegumbi ,

text: And a stone of stumbling , and a rock of offence , even to them which stumble at the word , being disobedient : whereunto also they were appointed .
text2: netshe lokuqhuzula , nedwala lokukhubekisa ; baqhuzuka bengalaleli izwi , okuyikhona bekumiselweyo ;

text: But ye are a chosen generation , a royal priesthood , an holy nation , a peculiar people ; that ye should shew forth the praises of him who hath called you out of darkness into his marvellous light :
text2: kepha nina niluhlanga olukhethiweyo , ubupristi obobukhosi , isizwe esingcwele , abantu abazuziweyo , ukuze nishumayele ubukhosi balowo owanibiza niphume ebumnyameni , ningene ekukhanyeni kwakhe okumangalisayo ;

text: Which in time past were not a people , but are now the people of God : which had not obtained mercy , but now have obtained mercy .
text2: ekade naningesiso isizwe , kepha manje niyisizwe sikaNkulunkulu , enaningahawukelwanga , kepha manje nihawukelwe .

text: Dearly beloved , I beseech you as strangers and pilgrims , abstain from fleshly lusts , which war against the soul ;
text2: Bathandekayo , nginincenga njengabafokazi nezihambi ukuba nidede ezinkanukweni zenyama ezilwa nomphefumulo ,

text: Having your conversation honest among the Gentiles : that , whereas they speak against you as evildoers , they may by your good works , which they shall behold , glorify God in the day of visitation .
text2: nibe nenkambo enhle phakathi kwabezizwe , ukuze kuthi lapho benihleba ngokungathi ningabenzi bokubi , ngokubona imisebenzi yenu emihle badumise uNkulunkulu ngosuku lokuhanjelwa .

text: Submit yourselves to every ordinance of man for the Lord ' s sake : whether it be to the king , as supreme ;
text2: Thobelani izimiso zonke zabantu ngenxa yeNkosi , nokuba kuyinkosi njengokuba ingomkhulu ,

text: Or unto governors , as unto them that are sent by him for the punishment of evildoers , and for the praise of them that do well .
text2: nokuba kungababusi njengokuba bethunywa yiyo , ukuze bajezise abenza okubi , babonge abenza okuhle ,

text: For so is the will of God , that with well doing ye may put to silence the ignorance of foolish men :
text2: ngokuba injalo intando kaNkulunkulu ukuba ngokwenza okuhle nithulise ukungazi kwabantu abayiziwula

text: As free , and not using your liberty for a cloke of maliciousness , but as the servants of God .
text2: njengabakhululekileyo , kodwa kungabi njengabenza ukukhululeka kube yisigubuzelo sokubi kepha njengezinceku zikaNkulunkulu .

text: Honour all men . Love the brotherhood . Fear God . Honour the king .
text2: Baziseni bonke , nithande abazalwane ; mesabeni uNkulunkulu , niyazise inkosi .

text: Servants , be subject to your masters with all fear ; not only to the good and gentle , but also to the froward .
text2: Nina zinceku , thobelani amakhosi ngokwesaba konke , kungabi ngamahle navileyo kuphela kodwa nayizixhwanguxhwangu .

text: For this is thankworthy , if a man for conscience toward God endure grief , suffering wrongfully .
text2: Ngokuba kuyabongeka lokho , uma umuntu ngenxa kanembeza ngakuNkulunkulu ethwala izinsizi , ehlushwa ngokungafanele .

text: For what glory is it , if , when ye be buffeted for your faults , ye shall take it patiently ? but if , when ye do well , and suffer for it , ye take it patiently , this is acceptable with God .
text2: Ngokuba kuludumo luni , uma nibekezela nishaywa lapho nonile na ? Kepha uma nibekezela lapho nenze okuhle nihlushwa , lokho kuyabongeka kuNkulunkulu .

text: For even hereunto were ye called : because Christ also suffered for us , leaving us an example , that ye should follow his steps :
text2: Ngokuba nabizelwa khona lokho , ngokuba uKristu wahlushwa ngenxa yenu , enishiyela isibonelo sokuba nilandele ezinyathelweni zakhe .

text: Who did no sin , neither was guile found in his mouth :
text2: “ Ongenzanga isono , akufunyanwanga nankohliso emlonyeni wakhe , ”

text: Who , when he was reviled , reviled not again ; when he suffered , he threatened not ; but committed himself to him that judgeth righteously :
text2: owathi ethukwa , akaphindisanga athuke ; ehlushwa akasongelanga kepha wakunikela kuye owahlulela ngokulunga ;

text: Who his own self bare our sins in his own body on the tree , that we , being dead to sins , should live unto righteousness : by whose stripes ye were healed .
text2: yena owathwala izono zethu emzimbeni wakhe emthini , ukuze kuthi sesifile ezonweni siphile ekulungeni , oyena imivimbo yakhe naphulukiswa ngayo ;

text: For ye were as sheep going astray ; but are now returned unto the Shepherd and Bishop of your souls .
text2: ngokuba beninjengezimvu ezidukileyo , kodwa manje seniphendukele kuMalusi noMbonisi wemiphefumulo yenu .

text: Likewise , ye wives , be in subjection to your own husbands ; that , if any obey not the word , they also may without the word be won by the conversation of the wives ;
text2: Kanjalo , bafazi , thobelani amadoda enu , ukuze kuthi , uma ekhona ongakholwa yizwi , azuzwe ngaphandle kwezwi ngenkambo yabafazi bawo ,

text: While they behold your chaste conversation coupled with fear .
text2: ebona inkambo yenu emhlophe esekwesabeni .

text: Whose adorning let it not be that outward adorning of plaiting the hair , and of wearing of gold , or of putting on of apparel ;
text2: Ukuhloba kwenu makungabi ngokungaphandle , okokwaluka izinwele , nokokufaka igolide , noma okokugqoka izingubo ,

text: But let it be the hidden man of the heart , in that which is not corruptible , even the ornament of a meek and quiet spirit , which is in the sight of God of great price .
text2: kepha makube ngumuntu osithekileyo wenhliziyo ohloba ngokungabhubhiyo komoya omnene onokuthula , okuyigugu phambi kukaNkulunkulu .

text: For after this manner in the old time the holy women also , who trusted in God , adorned themselves , being in subjection unto their own husbands :
text2: Ngokuba kade babezihlobisa kanjalo abesifazane abangcwele abamethembayo uNkulunkulu , bethobela amadoda abo ,

text: Even as Sara obeyed Abraham , calling him lord : whose daughters ye are , as long as ye do well , and are not afraid with any amazement .
text2: njengalokho uSara wamlalela u - Abrahama embiza ngokuthi inkosi , eningabantwana bakhe , uma nenza okuhle , ningesatshiswa nokukodwa okwesabisayo .

text: Likewise , ye husbands , dwell with them according to knowledge , giving honour unto the wife , as unto the weaker vessel , and as being heirs together of the grace of life ; that your prayers be not hindered .
text2: Kanjalo , madoda , hlalani nabo ngokokwazi , njengalokhu owesifazane eyisitsha esibuthakathaka , nibanike udumo , lokhu beyizindlalifa zomusa wokuphila kanye nani , ukuze imikhuleko yenu ingathiywa .

text: Finally , be ye all of one mind , having compassion one of another , love as brethren , be pitiful , be courteous :
text2: Okokugcina , manibe nhliziyonye nonke , nihawukelane , nithandane ngokwabazalwane , nibe nobubele nokuthobeka ,

text: Not rendering evil for evil , or railing for railing : but contrariwise blessing ; knowing that ye are thereunto called , that ye should inherit a blessing .
text2: ningaphindisi okubi ngokubi nokuthuka ngokuthuka , kepha kakhulu manibusise , ngokuba nabizelwa lokho ukuba nidle ifa lokubusiswa .

text: For he that will love life , and see good days , let him refrain his tongue from evil , and his lips that they speak no guile :
text2: “ Ngokuba osuka ethanda ukuphila nokubona izinsuku ezinhle , makanqande ulimi lwakhe kokubi , nezindebe zakhe zingakhulumi inkohliso ,

text: Let him eschew evil , and do good ; let him seek peace , and ensue it .
text2: adede ebubini , enze okuhle , afune ukuthula , akujonge ,

text: For the eyes of the Lord are over the righteous , and his ears are open unto their prayers : but the face of the Lord is against them that do evil .
text2: ngokuba amehlo eNkosi aphezu kwabalungileyo , izindlebe zayo zisekunxuseni kwabo , kepha ubuso beNkosi buphezu kwabenza okubi . ”

text: And who is he that will harm you , if ye be followers of that which is good ?
text2: Pho , ubani onganilimaza , uma nishisekela okuhle na ?

text: But and if ye suffer for righteousness ' sake , happy are ye : and be not afraid of their terror , neither be troubled ;
text2: Kepha noma nihlupheka ngenxa yokulunga , nibusisiwe . Ningesabi ukwesabisa kwabo , ningakhathazeki ,

text: But sanctify the Lord God in your hearts : and be ready always to give an answer to every man that asketh you a reason of the hope that is in you with meekness and fear :
text2: kepha mngcweliseni uKristu abe yiNkosi ezinhliziyweni zenu , nihlale ningabalungele ukubaphendula bonke abanibuza isizathu sethemba elikini ,

text: Having a good conscience ; that , whereas they speak evil of you , as of evildoers , they may be ashamed that falsely accuse your good conversation in Christ .
text2: kodwa kube ngobumnene nangokwesaba , nibe nonembeza omuhle , ukuze kuthi kulokho abanihleba ngakho bajabhiswe labo abathuka ukuhamba kwenu okuhle kuKristu .

text: For it is better , if the will of God be so , that ye suffer for well doing , than for evil doing .
text2: Ngokuba kuhle ukuhlupheka ngokwenza okuhle , uma kuyintando kaNkulunkulu , kunokwenza okubi .

text: For Christ also hath once suffered for sins , the just for the unjust , that he might bring us to God , being put to death in the flesh , but quickened by the Spirit :
text2: Ngokuba naye uKristu wahlupheka kwaba kanye ngezono , olungileyo ngenxa yabangalungile , ukuba asiyise kuNkulunkulu , ebulawa enyameni kepha ephiliswa emoyeni ,

text: By which also he went and preached unto the spirits in prison ;
text2: ehamba ngawo ukushumayeza omoya abasekuboshweni

text: Which sometime were disobedient , when once the longsuffering of God waited in the days of Noah , while the ark was a preparing , wherein few , that is , eight souls were saved by water .
text2: abakade bengalaleli , lapho ukubekezela kukaNkulunkulu kubalindele ezinsukwini zikaNowa umkhumbi usakhiwa , abasindiswa ngawo abayingcosana , okungukuthi abayisishiyagalombili ngawo amanzi ;

text: The like figure whereunto even baptism doth also now save us ( not the putting away of the filth of the flesh , but the answer of a good conscience toward God , ) by the resurrection of Jesus Christ :
text2: enisindiswa ngawo manje nani ngokomfanekiso , okungukuthi ngombhapathizo , kungesikho ukususa insila yenyama kepha ukucela kuNkulunkulu unembeza omuhle , ngokuvuka kukaJesu Kristu

text: Who is gone into heaven , and is on the right hand of God ; angels and authorities and powers being made subject unto him .
text2: okhona ngakwesokunene sikaNkulunkulu esenyukele ezulwini , sekubekwe phansi kwakhe izingelosi , negunya , namandla .

text: Forasmuch then as Christ hath suffered for us in the flesh , arm yourselves likewise with the same mind : for he that hath suffered in the flesh hath ceased from sin ;
text2: Njengokuba uKristu wahlupheka enyameni , hlomani nani ukuqonda okunjalo , ngokuba ohluphekile enyameni uyekile ukona ,

text: That he no longer should live the rest of his time in the flesh to the lusts of men , but to the will of God .
text2: ukuze ngesikhathi esiseleyo nisesenyameni ningabe nisahlala ngezinkanuko zabantu kodwa ngentando kaNkulunkulu .

text: For the time past of our life may suffice us to have wrought the will of the Gentiles , when we walked in lasciviousness , lusts , excess of wine , revellings , banquetings , and abominable idolatries :
text2: Ngokuba isikhathi esidlulileyo sasanele ukwenza okuthandwa ngabezizwe ngokuhamba ngamanyala , nangezinkanuko , nangokudakwa , nangokuminza , nangokuxokozela , nangokukhonza izithombe okuyichilo .

text: Wherein they think it strange that ye run not with them to the same excess of riot , speaking evil of you :
text2: Bayamangala ngokungagijimeli kwenu kulowo msindo wokushinga kwabo , behlambalaza ;

text: Who shall give account to him that is ready to judge the quick and the dead .
text2: bayakuziphendulela kulowo olungele ukwahlulela abahambayo nabafileyo .

text: For for this cause was the gospel preached also to them that are dead , that they might be judged according to men in the flesh , but live according to God in the spirit .
text2: Ngokuba ngalokho ivangeli lashunyayelwa nakwabafileyo , ukuze bahlulelwe ngokwabantu enyameni kepha baphile ngokukaNkulunkulu emoyeni .

text: But the end of all things is at hand : be ye therefore sober , and watch unto prayer .
text2: Kepha ukuphela kwezinto zonke sekusondele . Ngakho zikhuzeni , nizithibe , ukuze nikhuleke ;

text: And above all things have fervent charity among yourselves : for charity shall cover the multitude of sins .
text2: kunakho konke yibani nokuthandana okunganqamukiyo , ngokuba uthando lusibekela inqwaba yezono ;

text: Use hospitality one to another without grudging .
text2: anongenisana ngenjabulo , ningakhononi ,

text: As every man hath received the gift , even so minister the same one to another , as good stewards of the manifold grace of God .
text2: nikhonzane , kube yilowo nalowo ngesipho asiphiweyo njengabaphathi abahle bomusa omninginingi kaNkulunkulu ;

text: If any man speak , let him speak as the oracles of God ; if any man minister , let him do it as of the ability which God giveth : that God in all things may be glorified through Jesus Christ , to whom be praise and dominion for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: uma umuntu ekhuluma , makakhulume njengokwamazwi kaNkulunkulu ; uma umuntu ekhonza , makakhonze ngamandla awanikwa nguNkulunkulu , ukuze uNkulunkulu adunyiswe kukho konke ngoJesu Kristu okukuye inkazimulo namandla kuze kube phakade naphakade . Amen .

text: Beloved , think it not strange concerning the fiery trial which is to try you , as though some strange thing happened unto you :
text2: Bathandekayo , ningamangali ngomlilo ophakathi kwenu enifikelwa yiwo ukuba nilingwe ngokungathi nehlelwe yinto engaziwayo ,

text: But rejoice , inasmuch as ye are partakers of Christ ' s sufferings ; that , when his glory shall be revealed , ye may be glad also with exceeding joy .
text2: kodwa njengalokhu ningabahlanganyeli bezinhlupheko zikaKristu , thokozani , ukuze kuthi nasekwambulweni kwenkazimulo yakhe nithokoze , nethabe nokwethaba .

text: If ye be reproached for the name of Christ , happy are ye ; for the spirit of glory and of God resteth upon you : on their part he is evil spoken of , but on your part he is glorified .
text2: Uma nithukwa ngenxa yegama likaKristu , nibusisiwe , ngokuba uMoya wenkazimulo nokaNkulunkulu uhlezi phezu kwenu .

text: But let none of you suffer as a murderer , or as a thief , or as an evildoer , or as a busybody in other men ' s matters .
text2: Ngokuba makungabikho kini ohlupheka ngokuba engumbulali , noma eyisela , noma engowenza okubi , noma engozigaxa ezindabeni zabanye ;

text: Yet if any man suffer as a Christian , let him not be ashamed ; but let him glorify God on this behalf .
text2: kepha uma ehlupheka ngokuba engumKristu , makangabi namahloni , kepha makadumise uNkulunkulu ngenxa yalelo gama .

text: For the time is come that judgment must begin at the house of God : and if it first begin at us , what shall the end be of them that obey not the gospel of God ?
text2: Ngokuba sekuyisikhathi sokuba ukwahlulela kuqale endlini kaNkulunkulu ; kepha uma kuthathela kithina , kuyakuba yini ukuphela kwabangalaleli ivangeli likaNkulunkulu na ?

text: And if the righteous scarcely be saved , where shall the ungodly and the sinner appear ?
text2: Uma olungileyo esindiswa kalukhuni , uyakubonakalaphi ongamesabi uNkulunkulu noyisoni na ?

text: Wherefore let them that suffer according to the will of God commit the keeping of their souls to him in well doing , as unto a faithful Creator .
text2: Ngakho abahluphekayo ngokwentando kaNkulunkulu mababeke imiphefumulo yabo kuMdali othembekayo ngokwenza okuhle .

text: The elders which are among you I exhort , who am also an elder , and a witness of the sufferings of Christ , and also a partaker of the glory that shall be revealed :
text2: Ngakho ngiyawancenga amalunga aphakathi kwenu mina engiyilunga kanye nawo , nofakazi wezinhlupheko zikaKristu , nomhlanganyeli wenkazimulo ezakwambulwa , ngithi :

text: Feed the flock of God which is among you , taking the oversight thereof , not by constraint , but willingly ; not for filthy lucre , but of a ready mind ;
text2: Yalusani umhlambi kaNkulunkulu ophakathi kwenu , kungabi ngokucindezelwa kodwa ngokwentando kaNkulunkulu , kungabi ngenxa yenzuzo eyihlazo kodwa ngenhliziyo evumayo ,

text: Neither as being lords over God ' s heritage , but being ensamples to the flock .
text2: kungabi njengabazenza amakhosi phezu kwamabandla enabelwa wona , kodwa nibe yizibonelo zomhlambi ;

text: And when the chief Shepherd shall appear , ye shall receive a crown of glory that fadeth not away .
text2: kuyakuthi , nxa esebonakaliswa uMalusi omkhulu , niyakuzuza umqhele wenkazimulo ongabuniyo .

text: Likewise , ye younger , submit yourselves unto the elder . Yea , all of you be subject one to another , and be clothed with humility : for God resisteth the proud , and giveth grace to the humble .
text2: Ngokunjalo , nina basha , thobelani amalunga ; kepha nonke yembathani ukuthobeka , nithobelane , ngokuba uNkulunkulu umelana nabazidlayo , kepha abathobekileyo ubapha umusa .

text: Humble yourselves therefore under the mighty hand of God , that he may exalt you in due time :
text2: Ngalokho zithobeni phansi kwesandla sikaNkulunkulu esinamandla , ukuze aniphakamise ngesikhathi esifaneleyo ,

text: Casting all your care upon him ; for he careth for you .
text2: niphonse izinkathazo zenu zonke phezu kwakhe , ngokuba uyanikhathalela .

text: Be sober , be vigilant ; because your adversary the devil , as a roaring lion , walketh about , seeking whom he may devour :
text2: Qondani , nilinde . Isitha senu , uSathane , siyahamba njengebhubesi elibhodlayo sifuna esingamgwinya ;

text: Whom resist stedfast in the faith , knowing that the same afflictions are accomplished in your brethren that are in the world .
text2: melanani naye niqinile ekukholweni , nazi ukuthi zona lezo zinhlupheko zehlela abazalwane benu abasezweni .

text: But the God of all grace , who hath called us unto his eternal glory by Christ Jesus , after that ye have suffered a while , make you perfect , stablish , strengthen , settle you .
text2: Kepha uNkulunkulu womusa wonke owanibizela enkazimulweni yakhe yaphakade ngoKristu , senihluphekile isikhashana , yena uqobo uyakuniphelelisa , aniqinise , aninike amandla , anisekele .

text: To him be glory and dominion for ever and ever . Amen .
text2: Makube kuye amandla kuze kube phakade naphakade . Amen .

text: By Silvanus , a faithful brother unto you , as I suppose , I have written briefly , exhorting , and testifying that this is the true grace of God wherein ye stand .
text2: NgoSilvanu umfowethu othembekayo ngokubona kwami nginilobele ngokufushane , ngincenga , ngifakaza ukuthi lo yiwo umusa oqinisekileyo kaNkulunkulu ; yimani kuwo .

text: The church that is at Babylon , elected together with you , saluteth you ; and so doth Marcus my son .
text2: Liyakhonza kini ibandla elikhethiweyo , kanye nani eliseBabiloni , noMarku indodana yami .

text: Greet ye one another with a kiss of charity . Peace be with you all that are in Christ Jesus . Amen .
text2: Bingelelanani ngokwanga kothando . Ukuthula makube kini nonke enikuKristu .

text: Simon Peter , a servant and an apostle of Jesus Christ , to them that have obtained like precious faith with us through the righteousness of God and our Saviour Jesus Christ :
text2: USimeyoni Petru , inceku nomphostoli kaJesu Kristu , kubo abazuzile ukukholwa okuyigugu ngokufana nokwethu ngokulunga kukaNkulunkulu wethu noMsindisi uJesu Kristu :

text: Grace and peace be multiplied unto you through the knowledge of God , and of Jesus our Lord ,
text2: Makwandiswe kini umusa nokuthula ngokumazi uNkulunkulu noJesu iNkosi yethu .

text: According as his divine power hath given unto us all things that pertain unto life and godliness , through the knowledge of him that hath called us to glory and virtue :
text2: Njengokuba amandla akhe obuNkulunkulu esinikile konke okuqondene nokuphila nokumesaba uNkulunkulu ngokumazi yena owasibiza ngenkazimulo nobuhle bakhe ,

text: Whereby are given unto us exceeding great and precious promises : that by these ye might be partakers of the divine nature , having escaped the corruption that is in the world through lust .
text2: esiphiwe ngakho izithembiso eziyigugu nezikhulukazi , ukuze ngazo nibe ngabahlanganyeli nesimo sobuNkulunkulu , nibalekele ukubhubha okusezweni ngezinkanuko ,

text: And beside this , giving all diligence , add to your faith virtue ; and to virtue knowledge ;
text2: ngalokho nengezela inkuthalo yonke nelekele ubuhle ekukholweni , nasebuhleni ukwazi ,

text: And to knowledge temperance ; and to temperance patience ; and to patience godliness ;
text2: nasekwazini ukuzithiba , nasekuzithibeni ukukhuthazela , nasekukhuthazeleni ukumesaba uNkulunkulu ,

text: And to godliness brotherly kindness ; and to brotherly kindness charity .
text2: nasekumesabeni uNkulunkulu ukuthanda abazalwane , nasekuthandeni abazalwane uthando .

text: For if these things be in you , and abound , they make you that ye shall neither be barren nor unfruitful in the knowledge of our Lord Jesus Christ .
text2: Ngokuba uma lezo zinto zikhona kini zivama , ziyanenza ningabi ngabavilaphayo nabangenazithelo ekwazini iNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu ,

text: But he that lacketh these things is blind , and cannot see afar off , and hath forgotten that he was purged from his old sins .
text2: ngokuba okungekho kuye lezo zinto uyimpumputhe , ebona kalufifi , ekhohliwe ukuhlanjululwa ezonweni zakhe zokuqala .

text: Wherefore the rather , brethren , give diligence to make your calling and election sure : for if ye do these things , ye shall never fall :
text2: Ngakho - ke , bazalwane , khuthalelani kakhulu ukwenza kuqiniseke ukubizwa nokukhethwa kwenu ; ngokuba uma nenza lokho , anisoze nakhubeka .

text: For so an entrance shall be ministered unto you abundantly into the everlasting kingdom of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ .
text2: Ngokuba ngokwenze njalo niyakuphiwa ngokwengcebo ukungena embusweni waphakade weNkosi yethu noMsindisi uJesu Kristu .

text: Wherefore I will not be negligent to put you always in remembrance of these things , though ye know them , and be established in the present truth .
text2: Ngakho - ke ngiyakuba yilokhu nginikhumbuza njalo ngalezo zinto , nakuba nizazi , nime niqinile eqinisweni elikhona .

text: Yea , I think it meet , as long as I am in this tabernacle , to stir you up by putting you in remembrance ;
text2: Ngithi kufanele , nxa ngisekhona kuleli dokodo , nginivuse ngokunikhumbuza ,

text: Knowing that shortly I must put off this my tabernacle , even as our Lord Jesus Christ hath shewed me .
text2: ngazi ukuthi kuseduze ukususwa kwedokodo lami , njengalokho neNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu yangitshengisa ;

text: Moreover I will endeavour that ye may be able after my decease to have these things always in remembrance .
text2: kepha ngizakukhuthalela ukuba ngezikhathi zonke emva kokumuka kwami nisale nizikhumbule lezo zinto .

text: For we have not followed cunningly devised fables , when we made known unto you the power and coming of our Lord Jesus Christ , but were eyewitnesses of his majesty .
text2: Ngokuba sasingalandeli izinganekwane zobuqili , lapho sanazisa amandla nokufika kweNkosi yethu uJesu Kristu , kodwa sasingababonayo amandla obukhosi bakhe .

text: For he received from God the Father honour and glory , when there came such a voice to him from the excellent glory , This is my beloved Son , in whom I am well pleased .
text2: Ngokuba wamukela kuNkulunkulu uYise udumo nenkazimulo , lapho kwafika kuye izwi elinje , livela enkazimulweni yobukhosi , lithi : “ Lo uyiNdodana yami ethandekayo engithokozile ngayo ” —

text: And this voice which came from heaven we heard , when we were with him in the holy mount .
text2: lelo zwi salizwa thina livela ezulwini , sikanye naye entabeni engcwele .

text: We have also a more sure word of prophecy ; whereunto ye do well that ye take heed , as unto a light that shineth in a dark place , until the day dawn , and the day star arise in your hearts :
text2: Sesinalo izwi lesiprofetho eliqinisekile kakhulu , enenza kahle ukuliqaphela kungathi liyisibani esikhanyayo endaweni emnyama kuze kuse , ikhwezi liphumele ezinhliziyweni zenu ,

text: Knowing this first , that no prophecy of the scripture is of any private interpretation .
text2: nazi lokhu kuqala ukuthi kasikho isiprofetho sombhalo esingachasiselwa ngumuntu ngokwakhe ;

text: For the prophecy came not in old time by the will of man : but holy men of God spake as they were moved by the Holy Ghost .
text2: ngokuba akuzange kuvezwe isiprofetho ngentando yomuntu , kepha abantu beqhutshwa nguMoya oNgcwele bakhuluma okukaNkulunkulu .

text: But there were false prophets also among the people , even as there shall be false teachers among you , who privily shall bring in damnable heresies , even denying the Lord that bought them , and bring upon themselves swift destruction .
text2: Kepha kwavela nabaprofethi bamanga phakathi kwesizwe , njengokuba nakinina kuzakuba khona abafundisi bamanga abazakungenisa ngasese izifundiso zamanga ezibhubhisayo , bephika noMbusi owabathengayo , bezilethela ukubhujiswa okusheshayo ;

text: And many shall follow their pernicious ways ; by reason of whom the way of truth shall be evil spoken of .
text2: nabaningi bayakulandela amanyala abo ; ngenxa yabo indlela yeqiniso iyakuhlanjalazwa ;

text: And through covetousness shall they with feigned words make merchandise of you : whose judgment now of a long time lingereth not , and their damnation slumbereth not .
text2: nangokufisa bayakuthengiselana ngani ngamazwi obuqili , abakulahlwa kwabo kwamandulo akulibali nokubhujiswa kwabo akozeli .

text: For if God spared not the angels that sinned , but cast them down to hell , and delivered them into chains of darkness , to be reserved unto judgment ;
text2: Ngokuba uma uNkulunkulu engayekanga izingelosi ezonileyo , kodwa wazinikela ukuba ziphonswe esihogweni , emigodini yobumnyama , ukuba zigcinelwe ukwahlulelwa ,

text: And spared not the old world , but saved Noah the eighth person , a preacher of righteousness , bringing in the flood upon the world of the ungodly ;
text2: nezwe lamandulo engaliyekanga , kodwa wamlondoloza uNowa , umshumayeli wokulunga , engowesishiyagalombili , mhla eletha uzamcolo ezweni elingamesabi uNkulunkulu ;

text: And turning the cities of Sodom and Gomorrha into ashes condemned them with an overthrow , making them an ensample unto those that after should live ungodly ;
text2: nemizi yaseSodoma neGomora wayahlulela wayichitha ngokuyiphendula umlotha , eyenza ibe yisiboniso kubo abangayikumesaba uNkulunkulu ;

text: And delivered just Lot , vexed with the filthy conversation of the wicked :
text2: noLoti olungileyo , ehlushwa ngukuhamba ngamanyala kwabangenamthetho , wamhlangulisa —

text: ( For that righteous man dwelling among them , in seeing and hearing , vexed his righteous soul from day to day with their unlawful deeds ; )
text2: ngokuba ngokubona nangokuzwa lona olungileyo , ehlala phakathi kwabo , wezwisa ubuhlungu umphefumulo wakhe olungileyo imihla ngemihla ngenxa yezenzo ezingenamthetho —

text: The Lord knoweth how to deliver the godly out of temptations , and to reserve the unjust unto the day of judgment to be punished :
text2: iNkosi iyakwazi ukuhlangulisa ekulingweni abamesabayo uNkulunkulu , kepha abangalungile iyabagcinela usuku lokwahlulelwa , bajeziswe ,

text: But chiefly them that walk after the flesh in the lust of uncleanness , and despise government . Presumptuous are they , selfwilled , they are not afraid to speak evil of dignities .
text2: ikakhulu labo abahamba ngokwenyama enkanukweni yokuzingcolisa , bedelela ubukhosi ; bengamaphikankani nabaziqhenyayo abesabi nokuhlambalaza abenkazimulo ,

text: Whereas angels , which are greater in power and might , bring not railing accusation against them before the Lord .
text2: kanti izingelosi , nokuba zizinkulu ngobuqhwaga namandla , azibamangaleli ngenhlamba phambi kweNkosi .

text: But these , as natural brute beasts , made to be taken and destroyed , speak evil of the things that they understand not ; and shall utterly perish in their own corruption ;
text2: Kepha laba behlambalaza , benjengezidalwa ezingenangqondo , ngemvelo zizalelwe ukubanjwa nokubhujiswa , nabo bazakubhujiswa ekubhujisweni kwazo , behlambalaza abangakwaziyo ,

text: And shall receive the reward of unrighteousness , as they that count it pleasure to riot in the day time . Spots they are and blemishes , sporting themselves with their own deceivings while they feast with you ;
text2: bamukele umvuzo wokungalungi . Labo bathi ukutamasa emini kungukujabula ; bayizisihla nezinsolo , bezitika ekukhohliseni kwabo bedla nani ;

text: Having eyes full of adultery , and that cannot cease from sin ; beguiling unstable souls : an heart they have exercised with covetous practices ; cursed children :
text2: benamehlo agcwele ukuphinga nangayeki izono , bayenga imiphefumulo engaqinile , benenhliziyo ejwayele ukufisa , abantwana bokuqalekiswa ,

text: Which have forsaken the right way , and are gone astray , following the way of Balaam the son of Bosor , who loved the wages of unrighteousness ;
text2: beshiya indlela eqondileyo beduka , belandela indlela kaBalami kaBeyori owathanda umvuzo wokungalungi ,

text: But was rebuked for his iniquity : the dumb ass speaking with man ' s voice forbad the madness of the prophet .
text2: kepha waba nokusolwa ngenxa yokweqa kwakhe umthetho : imbongolo eyisimungulu yakhuluma ngezwi lomuntu , yanqabela ukuhlanya komprofethi .

text: These are wells without water , clouds that are carried with a tempest ; to whom the mist of darkness is reserved for ever .
text2: Labo bayimithombo engenamanzi nezinkungu eziqhutshwa yisiphepho , abagcinelwe ubumnyama bobumnyama .

text: For when they speak great swelling words of vanity , they allure through the lusts of the flesh , through much wantonness , those that were clean escaped from them who live in error .
text2: Ngokuba bekhuluma udwadwa , amazwi ayize , babayenga ngezinkanuko zenyama nangamanyala labo abasaphephayo abahamba ngokuduka ;

text: While they promise them liberty , they themselves are the servants of corruption : for of whom a man is overcome , of the same is he brought in bondage .
text2: bebathembisa inkululeko , kanti bona uqobo lwabo bayizigqila zokubhubha ; ngokuba lokho umuntu ahlulwa yikho uyisigqila sakho .

text: For if after they have escaped the pollutions of the world through the knowledge of the Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ , they are again entangled therein , and overcome , the latter end is worse with them than the beginning .
text2: Ngokuba uma bebuye bahilelwe , bahlulwe yikho , sebebalekele ukungcola kwezwe ngokuyazi iNkosi noMsindisi uJesu Kristu , khona ukugcina kwabo kubi kunokuqala .

text: For it had been better for them not to have known the way of righteousness , than , after they have known it , to turn from the holy commandment delivered unto them .
text2: Ngokuba ngabe kwaba ngcono kubo ukuba babengayazanga indlela yokulunga kunokuba kuthi sebayazile bafulathele umyalo ongcwele ababewunikeziwe .

text: But it is happened unto them according to the true proverb , The dog is turned to his own vomit again ; and the sow that was washed to her wallowing in the mire .
text2: Kubehlele njengokwesaga esiqinisileyo esithi : “ Inja yabuyela ebuhlanzweni bayo , ” nokuthi : “ Ingulube igezwe qede yaphindela ukuzibhixa odakeni . ”

text: This second epistle , beloved , I now write unto you ; in both which I stir up your pure minds by way of remembrance :
text2: Le ncwadi , bathandekayo , isingeyesibili enginilobele yona , engivusa ngazo ingqondo yenu emhlophe ngokunikhumbuza ,

text: That ye may be mindful of the words which were spoken before by the holy prophets , and of the commandment of us the apostles of the Lord and Saviour :
text2: ukuze nikhumbule amazwi ashunyayelwa phambili yibo abaprofethi abangcwele nomyalo weNkosi noMsindisi owashunyayelwa ngabaphostoli benu ,

text: Knowing this first , that there shall come in the last days scoffers , walking after their own lusts ,
text2: nazi kuqala lokhu ukuthi ngezinsuku zokugcina kuyakufika abahleki abahleka usulu , behamba ngezinkanuko zabo ,

text: And saying , Where is the promise of his coming ? for since the fathers fell asleep , all things continue as they were from the beginning of the creation .
text2: bethi : “ Siphi isithembiso sokufika kwakhe na ? Ngokuba kuselokhu obaba balala , konke kumi kunjalo njengakwasekuqaleni kokudalwa . ”

text: For this they willingly are ignorant of , that by the word of God the heavens were of old , and the earth standing out of the water and in the water :
text2: Ngokuba bathanda ukukhohlwa lokhu ukuthi kwaphakade izulu lalikhona kanye nomhlaba owavela emanzini nangawo amanzi , umi ngezwi likaNkulunkulu ,

text: Whereby the world that then was , being overflowed with water , perished :
text2: okwathi ngawo izwe elalikhona labhubha ngokukhukhula kwamanzi ;

text: But the heavens and the earth , which are now , by the same word are kept in store , reserved unto fire against the day of judgment and perdition of ungodly men .
text2: kepha izulu nomhlaba okukhona manje kubekelelwe umlilo ngalo lona leli zwi , kulindele usuku lokwahlulela nolokubhubha kwabantu abangamesabi uNkulunkulu .

text: But , beloved , be not ignorant of this one thing , that one day is with the Lord as a thousand years , and a thousand years as one day .
text2: Kodwa , bathandekayo , maningakhohlwa lento inye yokuthi kuyo iNkosi usuku lunye lunjengeminyaka eyinkulungwane nokuthi iminyaka eyinkulungwane injengosuku lunye .

text: The Lord is not slack concerning his promise , as some men count slackness ; but is longsuffering to us - ward , not willing that any should perish , but that all should come to repentance .
text2: INkosi ayilibali ngesithembiso sayo , njengalokhu abanye bathi kungukulibala , kepha iyanibekezelela , ingathandi ukuba kubhubhe namunye , kodwa ukuba bonke beze ekuphendukeni .

text: But the day of the Lord will come as a thief in the night ; in the which the heavens shall pass away with a great noise , and the elements shall melt with fervent heat , the earth also and the works that are therein shall be burned up .
text2: Kepha usuku lweNkosi luyakufika njengesela mhla amazulu eyakudlula ngokuhlokoma ; kuyakusha konke , kubhidlike ; nomhlaba nemisebenzi yawo kuyakusha .

text: Seeing then that all these things shall be dissolved , what manner of persons ought ye to be in all holy conversation and godliness ,
text2: Njengokuba konke kuyakubhidlika kanjalo , kumelwe ukuba nibe ngabantu abanjani ekuhambeni okungcwele nase kumesabeni uNkulunkulu ,

text: Looking for and hasting unto the coming of the day of God , wherein the heavens being on fire shall be dissolved , and the elements shall melt with fervent heat ?
text2: nibheka nilangazelela ukufika kosuku lukaNkulunkulu ayakubhidlika ngalo amazulu , ashe , konke kushe , kuncibilike , na ?

text: Nevertheless we , according to his promise , look for new heavens and a new earth , wherein dwelleth righteousness .
text2: Kepha siyalindela ngesithembiso sakhe amazulu amasha nomhlaba omusha okukhona kuwo ukulunga .

text: Wherefore , beloved , seeing that ye look for such things , be diligent that ye may be found of him in peace , without spot , and blameless .
text2: Ngakho , bathandekayo , lokhu nibheka lezo zinto , khuthalelani ukuba nifunyanwe ninokuthula , ningenabala , ningenacala kuye ,

text: And account that the longsuffering of our Lord is salvation ; even as our beloved brother Paul also according to the wisdom given unto him hath written unto you ;
text2: nithi ukubekezela kweNkosi yethu kungukusindiswa , njengalokho nomzalwane wethu othandekayo uPawulu wanilobela njengokuhlakanipha ayekuphiweyo ,

text: As also in all his epistles , speaking in them of these things ; in which are some things hard to be understood , which they that are unlearned and unstable wrest , as they do also the other scriptures , unto their own destruction .
text2: njengalokhu nasezincwadini zonke ekhuluma kuzo ngalezo zinto , okukhona kuzo okunye okulukhuni ukuzwisiswa , okuthi abangafundile nabangaqinile bakuhlanekezela , njengalokhu benze njalo nangezinye izincwadi , kube ngukubhujiswa kwabo .

text: Ye therefore , beloved , seeing ye know these things before , beware lest ye also , being led away with the error of the wicked , fall from your own stedfastness .
text2: Ngakho , bathandekayo , njengokuba nazi lokhu ngaphambili , xwayani , ukuze ningadukiswa ngokukhohlisa kwabangenamthetho , niwe ekuqineni kwenu ,

text: But grow in grace , and in the knowledge of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ . To him be glory both now and for ever . Amen .
text2: kepha khulani emseni nasekwazini iNkosi noMsindisi wethu uJesu Kristu . Inkazimulo mayibe kuye namanje nakuze kube lusuku lwaphakade .

text: That which was from the beginning , which we have heard , which we have seen with our eyes , which we have looked upon , and our hands have handled , of the Word of life ;
text2: Lokho okwakukhona kwasekuqaleni , esakuzwa , sakubona ngamehlo ethu , sakubheka , nezandla zethu zakuphatha , okwezwi lokuphila —

text: ( For the life was manifested , and we have seen it , and bear witness , and shew unto you that eternal life , which was with the Father , and was manifested unto us ; )
text2: lokho kuphila kwabonakaliswa , sakubona , siyaqinisa sinishumayeza lokho kuphila okuphakade okwakukhona kuYise , kwabonakaliswa kithina —

text: That which we have seen and heard declare we unto you , that ye also may have fellowship with us : and truly our fellowship is with the Father , and with his Son Jesus Christ .
text2: lokho esikubonileyo , sakuzwa , sinishumayeza khona nani , ukuze nani nibe nenhlanganyelo nathi . Kepha thina sinenhlanganyelo noYise naneNdodana yakhe uJesu Kristu .

text: And these things write we unto you , that your joy may be full .
text2: Sesiyanilobela lokhu , ukuze intokozo yenu iphelele .

text: This then is the message which we have heard of him , and declare unto you , that God is light , and in him is no darkness at all .
text2: Nanti izwi esalizwa kuye , sinishumayeza lona lokuthi uNkulunkulu ungukukhanya , ubumnyama abukho kuye nakanye .

text: If we say that we have fellowship with him , and walk in darkness , we lie , and do not the truth :
text2: Uma sithi sinenhlanganyelo naye sibe sisahamba ebumnyameni , sinamanga , asenzi iqiniso ;

text: But if we walk in the light , as he is in the light , we have fellowship one with another , and the blood of Jesus Christ his Son cleanseth us from all sin .
text2: kepha uma sihamba ekukhanyeni , njengalokhu yena uqobo esekukhanyeni , khona sinenhlanganyelo omunye nomunye , negazi likaJesu iNdodana yakhe liyasihlambulula ezonweni zonke .

text: If we say that we have no sin , we deceive ourselves , and the truth is not in us .
text2: Uma sithi asinasono , siyazikhohlisa , neqiniso alikho kithi .

text: If we confess our sins , he is faithful and just to forgive us our sins , and to cleanse us from all unrighteousness .
text2: Uma sizivuma izono zethu , uthembekile , ulungile ukuba asithethelele izono , asihlambulule kukho konke ukungalungi .

text: If we say that we have not sinned , we make him a liar , and his word is not in us .
text2: Uma sithi asonanga , simenza umqambimanga , nezwi lakhe alikho kithi .

text: My little children , these things write I unto you , that ye sin not . And if any man sin , we have an advocate with the Father , Jesus Christ the righteous :
text2: Bantwana bami , nginilobela lokhu ukuba ningoni . Kepha uma umuntu ona , sinoMmeli kuYise , uJesu Kristu olungileyo ;

text: And he is the propitiation for our sins : and not for ours only , but also for the sins of the whole world .
text2: yena uyinhlawulo ngezono zethu , kungengezethu zodwa kodwa nangezezwe lonke .

text: And hereby we do know that we know him , if we keep his commandments .
text2: Ngalokho siyazi ukuthi siyamazi yena , uma sigcina imiyalo yakhe .

text: He that saith , I know him , and keepeth not his commandments , is a liar , and the truth is not in him .
text2: Lowo othi : “ Ngiyamazi , ” engagcini imiyalo yakhe , ungumqambimanga , iqiniso alikho kuye ;

text: But whoso keepeth his word , in him verily is the love of God perfected : hereby know we that we are in him .
text2: kepha ogcina izwi lakhe , uthando lukaNkulunkulu luphelelisiwe kuye impela . Ngalokho siyazi ukuthi sikuye ;

text: He that saith he abideth in him ought himself also so to walk , even as he walked .
text2: lowo othi uhlala kuye , yena umelwe ukuhamba njengalokho ahamba yena .

text: Brethren , I write no new commandment unto you , but an old commandment which ye had from the beginning . The old commandment is the word which ye have heard from the beginning .
text2: Bathandekayo , anginilobeli umyalo omusha , kodwa umyalo omdala enaninawo kwasekuqaleni ; umyalo omdala uyizwi enalizwayo .

text: Again , a new commandment I write unto you , which thing is true in him and in you : because the darkness is past , and the true light now shineth .
text2: Futhi nginilobela umyalo omusha owona uyiqiniso kuye nakini , ngokuba ubumnyama buyadlula nokukhanya kweqiniso sekuyakhanya .

text: He that saith he is in the light , and hateth his brother , is in darkness even until now .
text2: Lowo othi usekukhanyeni , abe ezonda umzalwane wakhe , usesebumnyameni kuze kube kalokhu .

text: He that loveth his brother abideth in the light , and there is none occasion of stumbling in him .
text2: Othanda umzalwane wakhe uhlala ekukhanyeni , akukho sikhubekiso kuye ;

text: But he that hateth his brother is in darkness , and walketh in darkness , and knoweth not whither he goeth , because that darkness hath blinded his eyes .
text2: kepha ozonda umzalwane wakhe usebumnyameni , uhamba ebumnyameni , akazi lapho eya khona , ngokuba ubumnyama buwaphuphuthekisile amehlo akhe .

text: I write unto you , little children , because your sins are forgiven you for his name ' s sake .
text2: Ngilobela nina bantwanyana , ngokuba nithethelelwe izono ngenxa yegama lakhe .

text: I write unto you , fathers , because ye have known him that is from the beginning . I write unto you , young men , because ye have overcome the wicked one . I write unto you , little children , because ye have known the Father .
text2: Ngilobela nina boyise , ngokuba niyamazi yena okhona kwasekuqaleni . Ngilobela nina zinsizwa , ngokuba nimnqobile omubi .

text: I have written unto you , fathers , because ye have known him that is from the beginning . I have written unto you , young men , because ye are strong , and the word of God abideth in you , and ye have overcome the wicked one .
text2: Nginilobele , bantwanyana , ngokuba niyamazi uYise . Nginilobele , boyise , ngokuba niyamazi yena okhona kwasekuqaleni . Nginilobele , zinsizwa , ngokuba ninamandla , izwi likaNkulunkulu lihlala kini , nimnqobile omubi .

text: Love not the world , neither the things that are in the world . If any man love the world , the love of the Father is not in him .
text2: Ningathandi izwe nezinto ezisezweni . Uma umuntu ethanda izwe , uthando lukaYise alukho kuye ,

text: For all that is in the world , the lust of the flesh , and the lust of the eyes , and the pride of life , is not of the Father , but is of the world .
text2: ngokuba konke okusezweni , inkanuko yenyama , nenkanuko yamehlo , nokuzigabisa ngalokhu kuphila , akuveli kuYise , kodwa kuvela ezweni .

text: And the world passeth away , and the lust thereof : but he that doeth the will of God abideth for ever .
text2: Izwe liyadlula kanye nenkanuko yalo ; kepha owenza intando kaNkulunkulu uhlala kuze kube phakade .

text: Little children , it is the last time : and as ye have heard that antichrist shall come , even now are there many antichrists ; whereby we know that it is the last time .
text2: Bantwanyana , sekuyisikhathi sokugcina , njengalokho nezwa ukuthi umphikukristu uyeza , nakalokhu sekukhona abaphikukristu abaningi ; ngalokho siyazi ukuthi sekuyisikhathi sokugcina .

text: They went out from us , but they were not of us ; for if they had been of us , they would no doubt have continued with us : but they went out , that they might be made manifest that they were not all of us .
text2: Baphuma kithi , kodwa babengesibo abakithi ; ngokuba uma bebengabakithi , babeyakuhlala nathi ; kodwa baphuma , ukuze babonakaliswe ukuthi bonke abasibo abakithi .

text: But ye have an unction from the Holy One , and ye know all things .
text2: Nina ninokugcotshwa okuvela koNgcwele , niyazi nonke .

text: I have not written unto you because ye know not the truth , but because ye know it , and that no lie is of the truth .
text2: Anginilobelanga ngokuba ningalazi iqiniso , kodwa ngokuba niyalazi nangokuba akukho manga avela eqinisweni .

text: Who is a liar but he that denieth that Jesus is the Christ ? He is antichrist , that denieth the Father and the Son .
text2: Ngubani ongumqambimanga , uma kungesiye ophika ukuthi uJesu unguKristu na ? Nguye ongumphikukristu ophika uYise neNdodana .

text: Whosoever denieth the Son , the same hath not the Father : ( but ) he that acknowledgeth the Son hath the Father also .
text2: Yilowo nalowo ophika iNdodana akanaye uYise ; ovuma iNdodana unaye noYise .

text: Let that therefore abide in you , which ye have heard from the beginning . If that which ye have heard from the beginning shall remain in you , ye also shall continue in the Son , and in the Father .
text2: Lokho enakuzwayo kwasekuqaleni , makuhlale kinina . Uma kuhlala kini enakuzwayo kwasekuqaleni , nani niyakuhlala kuyo iNdodana nakuye uYise .

text: And this is the promise that he hath promised us , even eternal life .
text2: Yilesi isithembiso yena asethembisa sona : ukuphila okuphakade .

text: These things have I written unto you concerning them that seduce you .
text2: Nganilobela lokho ngabo abanidukisayo .

text: But the anointing which ye have received of him abideth in you , and ye need not that any man teach you : but as the same anointing teacheth you of all things , and is truth , and is no lie , and even as it hath taught you , ye shall abide in him .
text2: Nina - ke , ukugcoba enakwamukela kuye kuhlala kini , anidingi ukuba nobani anifundise ; kodwa lokhu ukugcoba kwakhe okunifundisa khona ngakho konke kuyiqiniso , akusiwo amanga , nanjengokuba kunifundisile , hlalani kuye .

text: And now , little children , abide in him ; that , when he shall appear , we may have confidence , and not be ashamed before him at his coming .
text2: Nakalokhu , bantwanyana , hlalani kuye , ukuze , nxa ebonakala , sibe nesibindi , singabi namahloni sinyibe kuye ekubonakaleni kwakhe .

text: If ye know that he is righteous , ye know that every one that doeth righteousness is born of him .
text2: Uma nazi ukuthi ulungile , yazini ukuthi yilowo nalowo owenza ukulunga uzelwe nguye .

text: Behold , what manner of love the Father hath bestowed upon us , that we should be called the sons of God : therefore the world knoweth us not , because it knew him not .
text2: Bhekani uthando olungaka asinike lona uBaba lokuba sithiwe singabantwana bakaNkulunkulu ; futhi siyibo . Ngalokho izwe alisazi , ngokuba alimazanga yena .

text: Beloved , now are we the sons of God , and it doth not yet appear what we shall be : but we know that , when he shall appear , we shall be like him ; for we shall see him as he is .
text2: Bathandekayo , manje singabantwana bakaNkulunkulu , kepha akukabonakali esiyakuba yikho . Siyazi ukuthi , nxa ebonakaliswa , siyakuba njengaye , ngokuba siyakumbona njengokuba enjalo .

text: And every man that hath this hope in him purifieth himself , even as he is pure .
text2: Bonke abanalo lelo themba kuye bayazihlambulula , njengokuba yena ehlambulukile .

text: Whosoever committeth sin transgresseth also the law : for sin is the transgression of the law .
text2: Bonke abenza isono bayeqa nomthetho , ngokuba isono singukweqa umthetho .

text: And ye know that he was manifested to take away our sins ; and in him is no sin .
text2: Senazi ukuthi yena wabonakaliswa , ukuze asuse izono ; akukho sono kuye .

text: Whosoever abideth in him sinneth not : whosoever sinneth hath not seen him , neither known him .
text2: Lowo ohlala kuye akoni ; lowo owonayo akambonanga , futhi akamazi .

text: Little children , let no man deceive you : he that doeth righteousness is righteous , even as he is righteous .
text2: Bantwanyana , maningadukiswa muntu ; owenza ukulunga ulungile , njengokuba yena elungile ;

text: He that committeth sin is of the devil ; for the devil sinneth from the beginning . For this purpose the Son of God was manifested , that he might destroy the works of the devil .
text2: owenza isono ungokaSathane , ngokuba uSathane uyona kwasekuqaleni . INdodana kaNkulunkulu yabonakaliswa ngalokhu , ukuze ichithe imisebenzi kaSathane .

text: Whosoever is born of God doth not commit sin ; for his seed remaineth in him : and he cannot sin , because he is born of God .
text2: Lowo ozelwe nguNkulunkulu akenzi isono , ngokuba imbewu yakhe ihlala kuye ; futhi akanakona , ngokuba uzelwe nguNkulunkulu .

text: In this the children of God are manifest , and the children of the devil : whosoever doeth not righteousness is not of God , neither he that loveth not his brother .
text2: Ngalokho kubonakala abantwana bakaNkulunkulu nabantwana bakaSathane ; lowo ongenzi ukulunga akasiye okaNkulunkulu , naye ongamthandi umzalwane wakhe .

text: For this is the message that ye heard from the beginning , that we should love one another .
text2: Nanti izwi enalizwayo kwasekuqaleni lokuba sithandane ,

text: Not as Cain , who was of that wicked one , and slew his brother . And wherefore slew he him ? Because his own works were evil , and his brother ' s righteous .
text2: kungabi njengoKayini owaba ngowomubi , wabulala umfowabo ; wambulalelani na ? Ngokuba imisebenzi yakhe yayimibi , kepha eyomfowabo yayilungile .

text: Marvel not , my brethren , if the world hate you .
text2: Ningamangali , bazalwane , uma izwe linizonda .

text: We know that we have passed from death unto life , because we love the brethren . He that loveth not his brother abideth in death .
text2: Siyazi ukuthi sidlulile ekufeni , sangena ekuphileni , ngokuba sithanda abazalwane ; ongathandiyo uhlezi ekufeni .

text: Whosoever hateth his brother is a murderer : and ye know that no murderer hath eternal life abiding in him .
text2: Lowo ozonda umzalwane wakhe ungumbulali ; niyazi ukuthi akukho mbulali onokuphila okuphakade okuhlezi kuye .

text: Hereby perceive we the love of God , because he laid down his life for us : and we ought to lay down our lives for the brethren .
text2: Uthando silwazi ngalokho ukuthi yena wabeka ukuphila kwakhe ngenxa yethu ; nathi sifanele ukubeka ukuphila ngenxa yabazalwane .

text: But whoso hath this world ' s good , and seeth his brother have need , and shutteth up his bowels of compassion from him , how dwelleth the love of God in him ?
text2: Kepha yena onemfuyo yezwe , ebona umzalwane wakhe eswele , amvalele isihawu sakhe , uthando lukaNkulunkulu lungahlala kanjani kuye na ?

text: My little children , let us not love in word , neither in tongue ; but in deed and in truth .
text2: Bantwanyana , masingathandi ngezwi nangolimi , kodwa ngezenzo nangeqiniso .

text: And hereby we know that we are of the truth , and shall assure our hearts before him .
text2: Ngalokho siyazi ukuthi singabeqiniso ; sizakuyithulisa inhliziyo yethu phambi kwakhe

text: For if our heart condemn us , God is greater than our heart , and knoweth all things .
text2: ngokuthi uma inhliziyo yethu isilahla , uNkulunkulu mkhulu kunenhliziyo yethu , futhi uyazi konke .

text: Beloved , if our heart condemn us not , then have we confidence toward God .
text2: Bathandekayo , uma inhliziyo ingasilahli , sinesibindi kuNkulunkulu ,

text: And whatsoever we ask , we receive of him , because we keep his commandments , and do those things that are pleasing in his sight .
text2: nesikucelayo siyakukwamukeliswa nguye , ngokuba sigcina imiyalo yakhe , senza okuthandekayo ebusweni bakhe .

text: And this is his commandment , That we should believe on the name of his Son Jesus Christ , and love one another , as he gave us commandment .
text2: Yilo umyalo wakhe ukuba sikholwe egameni leNdodana yakhe uJesu Kristu , sithandane , njengokuba asinika umyalo .

text: And he that keepeth his commandments dwelleth in him , and he in him . And hereby we know that he abideth in us , by the Spirit which he hath given us .
text2: Ogcina imiyalo yakhe uhlala kuye , naye uqobo uhlala kuye ; siyazi ngalokho ukuthi uhlala kithi ngaye uMoya asinike yena .

text: Beloved , believe not every spirit , but try the spirits whether they are of God : because many false prophets are gone out into the world .
text2: Bathandekayo , maningakholwa yibo bonke omoya , kepha hlolani omoya ukuthi bangabakaNkulunkulu yini ; ngokuba baningi abaprofethi bamanga abaphumele ezweni .

text: Hereby know ye the Spirit of God : Every spirit that confesseth that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh is of God :
text2: Yazini uMoya kaNkulunkulu ngalokhu : bonke omoya abavuma ukuthi uJesu Kristu ufikile enyameni bangabakaNkulunkulu ;

text: And every spirit that confesseth not that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh is not of God : and this is that spirit of antichrist , whereof ye have heard that it should come ; and even now already is it in the world .
text2: lowo moya ongamvumi uJesu akasiye okaNkulunkulu ; lowo ungowomphikukristu enizwe ngaye ukuthi uyeza , nakalokhu usefikile ezweni .

text: Ye are of God , little children , and have overcome them : because greater is he that is in you , than he that is in the world .
text2: NingabakaNkulunkulu nina bantwanyana , nibahlulile , ngokuba lowo okini mkhulu kunaye osezweni .

text: They are of the world : therefore speak they of the world , and the world heareth them .
text2: Bona bangabezwe ; ngalokho bakhuluma okwezwe , nezwe liyabezwa .

text: We are of God : he that knoweth God heareth us ; he that is not of God heareth not us . Hereby know we the spirit of truth , and the spirit of error .
text2: Thina singabakaNkulunkulu ; omaziyo uNkulunkulu uyasizwa , ongesiye okaNkulunkulu akasizwa . Ngalokho siyamazi umoya weqiniso nomoya wokuduka .

text: Beloved , let us love one another : for love is of God ; and every one that loveth is born of God , and knoweth God .
text2: Bathandekayo , masithandane , ngokuba uthando luvela kuNkulunkulu , nabo bonke abathandayo bazelwe nguNkulunkulu , bayamazi uNkulunkulu .

text: He that loveth not knoweth not God ; for God is love .
text2: Ongathandiyo akamazi uNkulunkulu , ngokuba uNkulunkulu uluthando .

text: In this was manifested the love of God toward us , because that God sent his only begotten Son into the world , that we might live through him .
text2: Uthando lukaNkulunkulu lwabonakaliswa kithi ngalokho ukuthi uNkulunkulu wathumela ezweni iNdodana yakhe ezelwe yodwa ukuba siphile ngayo .

text: Herein is love , not that we loved God , but that he loved us , and sent his Son to be the propitiation for our sins .
text2: Uthando lukulokhu , kungesikho ukuthi thina samthanda uNkulunkulu , kepha ukuthi yena wasithanda thina , wathuma iNdodana yakhe ibe yinhlawulo ngezono zethu .

text: Beloved , if God so loved us , we ought also to love one another .
text2: Bathandekayo , uma uNkulunkulu wasithanda kanjalo , nathi simelwe ukuthandana .

text: No man hath seen God at any time . If we love one another , God dwelleth in us , and his love is perfected in us .
text2: UNkulunkulu akazange abonwe muntu ; uma sithandana , uNkulunkulu uhlala kithi , nothando lwakhe luphelele kithi .

text: Hereby know we that we dwell in him , and he in us , because he hath given us of his Spirit .
text2: Ngalokho siyazi ukuthi sihlala kuye , naye kithi , ngokuba usiphile okukaMoya wakhe .

text: And we have seen and do testify that the Father sent the Son to be the Saviour of the world .
text2: Thina sibonile , siyafakaza ukuthi uYise wayithuma iNdodana ibe nguMsindisi wezwe .

text: Whosoever shall confess that Jesus is the Son of God , God dwelleth in him , and he in God .
text2: Lowo ovuma ukuthi uJesu uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu , uNkulunkulu uhlala kuye , naye kuNkulunkulu .

text: And we have known and believed the love that God hath to us . God is love ; and he that dwelleth in love dwelleth in God , and God in him .
text2: Thina siyalwazi , sikholwa yilo lolu thando uNkulunkulu analo kithina . UNkulunkulu uluthando , nohlala othandweni uhlala kuNkulunkulu , noNkulunkulu uhlala kuye .

text: Herein is our love made perfect , that we may have boldness in the day of judgment : because as he is , so are we in this world .
text2: Ngalokho uthando luphelelisiwe kithi , ukuze sibe nesibindi ngosuku lokwahlulelwa , ngokuba njengalokhu enjalo yena , sinjalo nathi kuleli zwe .

text: There is no fear in love ; but perfect love casteth out fear : because fear hath torment . He that feareth is not made perfect in love .
text2: Akukho ukwesaba othandweni , kepha uthando olupheleleyo luyaxosha ukwesaba , ngokuba ukwesaba kunesijeziso , nowesabayo akaphelele othandweni .

text: We love him , because he first loved us .
text2: Thina siyathanda , ngokuba yena wasithanda kuqala .

text: If a man say , I love God , and hateth his brother , he is a liar : for he that loveth not his brother whom he hath seen , how can he love God whom he hath not seen ?
text2: Uma umuntu esho ukuthi : “ Ngiyamthanda uNkulunkulu , ” kepha ezonda umzalwane wakhe , ungumqambimanga ; ngokuba ongathandi umzalwane wakhe ambonileyo angemthande uNkulunkulu angambonanga .

text: And this commandment have we from him , That he who loveth God love his brother also .
text2: Yebo , lo myalo sinawo , uvela kuNkulunkulu , wokuthi othanda uNkulunkulu makathande nomzalwane wakhe .

text: Whosoever believeth that Jesus is the Christ is born of God : and every one that loveth him that begat loveth him also that is begotten of him .
text2: Yilowo nalowo okholwa ukuthi uJesu unguKristu uzelwe nguNkulunkulu , nalowo othanda ozeleyo uthanda naye ozelwe nguye .

text: By this we know that we love the children of God , when we love God , and keep his commandments .
text2: Ngalokho siyazi ukuthi siyabathanda abantwana bakaNkulunkulu , nxa sithanda uNkulunkulu , senza imiyalo yakhe .

text: For this is the love of God , that we keep his commandments : and his commandments are not grievous .
text2: Ngokuba ukuthanda uNkulunkulu yilokhu ukuba sigcine imiyalo yakhe ; nemiyalo yakhe ayinzima ,

text: For whatsoever is born of God overcometh the world : and this is the victory that overcometh the world , even our faith .
text2: ngokuba konke okuzelwe nguNkulunkulu kuyalinqoba izwe ; lokhu kuyinqobo enqobe izwe : ukukholwa kwethu .

text: Who is he that overcometh the world , but he that believeth that Jesus is the Son of God ?
text2: Ngubani onqoba izwe , uma kungesiye okholwa ukuthi uJesu uyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu na ?

text: This is he that came by water and blood , even Jesus Christ ; not by water only , but by water and blood . And it is the Spirit that beareth witness , because the Spirit is truth .
text2: Nguye lo oweza ngamanzi nangegazi , uJesu Kristu , kungengamanzi odwa kodwa ngamanzi nangegazi ; noMoya ungofakazayo , ngokuba uMoya uyiqiniso .

text: For there are three that bear record in heaven , the Father , the Word , and the Holy Ghost : and these three are one .
text2: Ngokuba bathathu abafakazayo ,

text: And there are three that bear witness in earth , the spirit , and the water , and the blood : and these three agree in one .
text2: uMoya , namanzi , negazi ; labo abathathu bavumelana entweni inye .

text: If we receive the witness of men , the witness of God is greater : for this is the witness of God which he hath testified of his Son .
text2: Uma samukela ubufakazi babantu , ubufakazi bukaNkulunkulu bukhulu kunalobo , ngokuba ubufakazi bukaNkulunkulu buyilobu abufakazile ngeNdodana yakhe .

text: He that believeth on the Son of God hath the witness in himself : he that believeth not God hath made him a liar ; because he believeth not the record that God gave of his Son .
text2: Okholwa yiNdodana kaNkulunkulu unobufakazi phakathi kwakhe . Ongakholwa nguNkulunkulu umenze umqambimanga , ngokuba engakholwanga ngubufakazi uNkulunkulu abufakazile ngeNdodana yakhe .

text: And this is the record , that God hath given to us eternal life , and this life is in his Son .
text2: Yilobu ubufakazi ukuthi uNkulunkulu usiphile ukuphila okuphakade , nalokhu kuphila kuseNdodaneni yakhe .

text: He that hath the Son hath life ; and he that hath not the Son of God hath not life .
text2: Onayo iNdodana unokuphila ; ongenayo iNdodana kaNkulunkulu akanakho ukuphila .

text: These things have I written unto you that believe on the name of the Son of God ; that ye may know that ye have eternal life , and that ye may believe on the name of the Son of God .
text2: Nginilobele lokho , ukuze nazi ukuthi ninokuphila okuphakade nina enikholwa egameni leNdodana kaNkulunkulu .

text: And this is the confidence that we have in him , that , if we ask any thing according to his will , he heareth us :
text2: Yilesi sibindi esinaso kuye sokuthi , uma sicela utho ngokwentando yakhe , uyasizwa .

text: And if we know that he hear us , whatsoever we ask , we know that we have the petitions that we desired of him .
text2: Uma sazi ukuthi uyasizwa noma sicelani , siyazi ukuthi sinakho esikucelileyo , esikucele kuye .

text: If any man see his brother sin a sin which is not unto death , he shall ask , and he shall give him life for them that sin not unto death . There is a sin unto death : I do not say that he shall pray for it .
text2: Uma umuntu ebona umzalwane wakhe ona ngesono esingesiso esokufa , makacele , uyakumnika ukuphila , ekunika labo abenza isono esingesiso esokufa . Sikhona isono sokufa ; angisho ukuba kucelwe ngaleso .

text: All unrighteousness is sin : and there is a sin not unto death .
text2: Konke ukungalungi kuyisono ; kukhona isono esingesiso esokufa .

text: We know that whosoever is born of God sinneth not ; but he that is begotten of God keepeth himself , and that wicked one toucheth him not .
text2: Siyazi ukuthi yilowo nalowo ozelwe nguNkulunkulu akoni , ngokuba ozelwe nguNkulunkulu uyazigcina , nomubi akamthinti .

text: And we know that we are of God , and the whole world lieth in wickedness .
text2: Siyazi ukuthi singabakaNkulunkulu nokuthi izwe lonke limi ebubini .

text: And we know that the Son of God is come , and hath given us an understanding , that we may know him that is true , and we are in him that is true , even in his Son Jesus Christ . This is the true God , and eternal life .
text2: Kepha sazi ukuthi iNdodana kaNkulunkulu isifikile , yasinika ingqondo ukuze simazi oweqiniso ; sikuye oweqiniso , kuyo iNdodana yakhe uJesu Kristu . Yena unguNkulunkulu oqinisileyo nokuphila okuphakade .

text: Little children , keep yourselves from idols . Amen .
text2: Bantwanyana , zilindeni ezithombeni .

text: The elder unto the elect lady and her children , whom I love in the truth ; and not I only , but also all they that have known the truth ;
text2: Ilunga kuyo inkosikazi ekhethiweyo nabantwana bayo , engibathanda ngeqiniso , kungeyimi ngedwa kodwa nabo bonke abalaziyo iqiniso ,

text: For the truth ' s sake , which dwelleth in us , and shall be with us for ever .
text2: ngenxa yeqiniso elihlala kithi neliyakuba nathi kuze kube phakade .

text: Grace be with you , mercy , and peace , from God the Father , and from the Lord Jesus Christ , the Son of the Father , in truth and love .
text2: Kuzakuba nathi umusa , nesihawu , nokuthula okuvela kuNkulunkulu uBaba nakuye uJesu Kristu iNdodana kaYise ngeqiniso nangothando .

text: I rejoiced greatly that I found of thy children walking in truth , as we have received a commandment from the Father .
text2: Ngithokozile kakhulu , ngokuba kubantwana bakho ngifumene abahamba eqinisweni , njengalokho samukele umyalo kuBaba .

text: And now I beseech thee , lady , not as though I wrote a new commandment unto thee , but that which we had from the beginning , that we love one another .
text2: Nakalokhu ngiyakunxusa , nkosikazi , kungengokungathi ngikulobela umyalo omusha kodwa lowo esasinawo kwasekuqaleni ukuba sithandane .

text: And this is love , that we walk after his commandments . This is the commandment , That , as ye have heard from the beginning , ye should walk in it .
text2: Yilolu - ke uthando ukuba sihambe ngokwemiyalo yakhe ; yiwo umyalo ukuba nihambe ngawo , njengalokho nezwa kwasekuqaleni .

text: For many deceivers are entered into the world , who confess not that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh . This is a deceiver and an antichrist .
text2: Ngokuba abakhohlisi abaningi baphumele ezweni , labo abangamvumi uJesu Kristu ukuthi uzile ngenyama ; lowo ungumkhohlisi nomphikukristu .

text: Look to yourselves , that we lose not those things which we have wrought , but that we receive a full reward .
text2: Ziqapheleni nina , ukuze ningalahlekelwa ngesikusebenzileyo , kodwa namukele umvuzo opheleleyo .

text: Whosoever transgresseth , and abideth not in the doctrine of Christ , hath not God . He that abideth in the doctrine of Christ , he hath both the Father and the Son .
text2: Lowo oweqisayo engemi ekufundiseni kukaKristu akanaye uNkulunkulu ; ohlezi ekufundiseni lowo unaye uYise neNdodana .

text: If there come any unto you , and bring not this doctrine , receive him not into your house , neither bid him God speed :
